instructions: Combine vodka, kirschwasser and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Voodoo Daiquiri
instructions: Combine bourbon, vodka, grape juice and ice into a blender and blend at a medium speed until smooth (15 to 25 seconds). Pour into a chilled highball or collins glass. Should be served in a plastic cup while in the French Quarter.

name: Waldorf Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass.

name: Warm Winter Margarita
instructions: Combine apple juice and cinnamon in a heavy pot. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove cinnamon stick carefully. Add sugar, dried fruit, and tequila. Mix well. Serve warm. Serves 4.

name: Warsaw Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass.

name: Washington Apple
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a shot glass. Multiply measurements to make multiple shooters.

name: Watermelon #1
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice and stir.

name: Watermelon #3
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Watermelon Agua Fresca Margarita
instructions: In a mixing glass, muddle watermelon and basil. Add other ingredients, ice and shake 10 to 12 times. Pour into a margarita glass filled with ice.

name: Watermelon and Apple Margarita
instructions: Place all liquid ingredients in a Boston glass or a shaker. Shake hard and strain in to an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an apple fan and enjoy!

name: Watermelon Mojito
instructions: Cut the watermelon into cubes and measure out 1 1/2 cups. Combine the watermelon, lime juice, mint leaves, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Thoroughly muddle the mixture until the watermelon is mostly liquid. Add the rum and some ice cubes. Shake. Next, fill a glass most of the way up with crushed ice. Strain the watermelon mixture into the glass. Top with club soda.

name: Waterwheel
instructions: In a Boston shaker, add blueberries and sugar, muddle hard. Fill the shaker with ice, and add all other ingredients. Shake well, and double strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Garnish with blueberries on a cocktail pick.

name: What’s Up, Doc? Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into cocktail glass over ice. Optional: Sprinkle some cinnamon on top. We juiced some carrots ourselves and used Beefeater 24 gin and Domaine de Canton ginger liqueur. We chose this gin is a little less dry than some other brands. You can substitute store-bought carrot juice and your favorite brands and adjust to taste if needed.

name: Whiskey Sencha
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a pint glass, add 4 ice cubes and shake moderately. Strain over new ice and add mint sprig garnish

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in an Boston or cobbler shaker. Strain over fresh ice in a

name: White Elephant
instructions: Pour an ounce of Kahlúa into a shot glass, layering the Amarula on top. (Amarula is a cream liqueur similar to Bailey’s but made from the marula fruit.) Add a dollop of whipped cream and drizzle with Grenadine. Courtesy of Phil.

name: White Russian
instructions: Combine first two ingredients over ice in a rocks glass, float cream on top.

name: Who Needs Her
instructions: Combine all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Who Needs Him
instructions: In a shaker, muddle one piece of fresh ginger. Add ice and all ingredients. Shake and strain over fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a lime twist.

name: Wicked Red Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and let sit, refrigerated for at least an hour before. If available, add one large block of ice to the bowl. Stir well before serving and garnish glass with a sugar rim and orange slice.

name: Wicked Sky
instructions: In a shaker with ice, add the scotch and melon liqueur. Shake well and pour ice and all into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Enjoy!

name: Wicked Witch Apple Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large black witch’s cauldron with ice and stir. Garnish with large slices of red apple floating on top and dry ice.

name: Wicky Wacky Woo
instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice and pour into a hurricane or parfait glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Yellow Bird #1
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and pour into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Yellow Bird #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice and stir.

name: Yellow Fingers
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Morning
instructions: Layer this drink by pouring the crème de banane slowly into a parfait glass, pour the cherry herring slowly over the back of a spoon on top of the crème de banane and then pour the cognac slowly over the back of a spoon on top of the cherry herring.

name: Yellow Parrot
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass.

name: Yokohama Mama
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass.

name: Yoshi
instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yuletide Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients in large bowl and garnish with seasonal fruit slices. Makes 16 servings.

name: Zapatista
instructions: Beginning with agave nectar and pepper, combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain over fresh ice into tall glass. Garnish with long grapefruit peel.

name: Zen Latte
instructions: Stir and garnish with matcha powder, a fine-ground form of green tea.

name: Zesty Irishman
instructions: In a mixing tin half-filled with ice, add: ¾ oz. Drambuie 1 oz. Irish Whiskey ¼ oz. Triple Sec Juice of ½ Lemon Shake until the tin is frosted, strain into a rocks glass filled with ice, add: Splash Ginger Ale Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Zombie
instructions: In a blender, combine all ingredients except the 151 with crushed ice. Blend at a high speed until smooth and pour into a Collins glass.Float the 151 rum on top and garnish with the orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Zombie – Don the Beachcomer 1934
instructions: Put everything in blender, saving ice for last. Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds. Pour into glass and add ice cubes to fill. Garnish with a mint sprig. DOTW suggestion would be to also stir the ingredients. *Donn’s Mix Ingredients: 3 cinnamon sticks, crushed 1 cup sugar 1 cup water Fresh grapefruit juice Directions: Create an infused simple syrup by heating cinnamon sticks, sugar and water. Bring to a boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle. To finish making the mix, add 1 part of the syrup to 2 parts fresh grapefruit juice.

name: Zombie Peep Corpse Reviver
instructions: Combine the first five ingredients in a pint glass with ice and shake well. Pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with Peeps as appropriate

name: Papa Smurf
instructions: Mix and chill vodka and kool-aid. Crush blue popsicle and add to mixture. The crushed popsicle should settle at the bottom of drink, making it appear as a blue layer at the bottom and a red layer on top.

name: Prairie Fire
instructions: Fill a shot glass with tequila and drop a dash of tabasco sauce in and around the edge.

name: Picadilly Punch
instructions: Peel lemons and stud with cloves. Simmer lemons in a pan along with the other ingredients. Ignite some cognac and pour into the pan. Extinguish with the rest of the cognac. Serves about 10.

name: 57 Chevy
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Walk Me Down (Sweet Jesus)
instructions: Shake ingredients (except Sprite) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and stir. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice, and serve.

name: Muddy River
instructions: Shake ingredients well and pour into a rocks glass.

name: Bacardi Confetti Punch
instructions: In large container, mix all but the soda. Chill for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. When ready to serve, pour over ice in punch bowl, add chilled club soda and stir gently. Makes 8 servings.

name: Creamsicle Margarita
instructions: Blend all ingredients until slushy. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Hula Shake
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a frosted collins glass, garnished with a pineapple wheel and maraschino cherry.

name: Blueberry Freeze
instructions: Blend ingredients thoroughly and pour into a specialty glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a teaspoon of blueberries.

name: Loch Ness Mystery
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Derby Fizz
instructions: Combine all ingredients except water with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes in a chilled collins glass. Fill with sparkling water and stir gently.

name: Magnolia Milk Punch
instructions: Combine ice cream, bourbon and vanilla in a blender and process until smooth. Pour into two glasses and sprinkle with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve.

name: Smooth Pineapple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine limeade and rum in a blender. Add pineapple and ice cream. Blend well. With the blender running, add a few pieces of ice. Continue adding ice until the mixture is smooth and thick and the blender is nearly full. Serve in cocktail glasses.

name: Virgin Mary
instructions: Fill a large wine glass with ice. Add tomato juice, then the rest of the ingredients. Stir and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Raspberry Citrus Punch
instructions: 1. Force raspberries through a sieve to remove the seeds. 2. Combine sugar and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil until sugar is dissolved to make a simple syrup. 2. Combine orange juice, raspberries, pineapple juice, grapefruit juice and simple syrup. Chill. When ready to serve, add soda water and ginger ale. (Serves 100.)

name: Fuzzy Lemon Fizz
instructions: Pour over ice in a collins glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Innocent Passion
instructions: Add syrup and juices to a collins glass. Fill with chilled club soda. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a long straw.

name: Bellini Cocktail
instructions: Mix the peach nectar, lemon juice and schnapps in a chilled glass. Add half a cup (or more) of crushed ice, stir, and add the champagne. (Serves 2). May be prepared in a blender to produce a frozen drink.

name: Orange Smile
instructions: Combine the juice of one large orange with the egg and grenadine. Shake with ice, strain into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Pac Man
instructions: Add grenadine, lemon juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale, and slide an orange slice down the side of the glass.

name: Rumless Rickey
instructions: Add lime juice, grenadine, and bitters to an old-fashioned glass with three to four large ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Stir, garnish with a long twist of lime, and serve.

name: Peach Melba
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender at low speed. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with raspberries.

name: Refreshing Apple Lemonade
instructions: 1. Combine 4 cups of water with 4 cups of sugar in a saucepan. Bring to the boil and continue boiling for 10 minutes. 2. Combine the made syrup with the juices. Serve over ice, or serve hot with a cinnamon stick for stirring.

name: Coconut Brandy Bowl
instructions: 1. Slice off the eyes of the coconuts; drain and save the milk. 2. Gouge out the meat of the coconuts; saving as much milk from that as possible. 3. Combine the brandy, banana liqueur, and all the coconut milk in a blender with the crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for 15 seconds. Serve the drink in the two coconut shells.

name: Hot and Creamy
instructions: Combine the ice and liquors in a blender until the ice is well crushed. Add half-and-half and serve in an 8-oz margarita glass.

name: Swimming Pool
instructions: Mix ingredients well, pour into an exotic glass and float the blue curacao on top.

name: White Cargo
instructions: Mix in a blender until smooth. Add a little extra white wine if necessary. Serve in a chilled wine goblet.

name: Event Horizon
instructions: Blend ingredients at high speed and serve immediately.

name: Glaciermeister
instructions: Mix the ice cream, milk and jagermeister in a blender until smooth.

name: White Rabbit
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk. Shake and serve.

name: Rum Punch (Alcoholic)
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Serve in four seperate tall glasses.

name: Picnic Fruit Punch
instructions: Combine the juices in a large container and refrigerate. When ready to serve, stir in the ginger ale and orange slices. (Serves 4.)

name: Beam Me Up Scottie
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Dead Green Frog
instructions: Chill on ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Basic But Good Punch
instructions: Add the gallon of sherbert to a large punch bowl, pour in 7-up and serve.

name: Getaway Car
instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Pictionary Punch
instructions: In a saucepan, bring sugar and water to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; cool. Pour into a large bowl; add juices. Cover and refrigerate. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. (5 servings.)

name: High Class
instructions: Add ice cubes to a glass, and coat them evenly with the sweet vermouth. Swirl the vermouth around, then pour out the excess. Sift sugar onto the vermouth-coated cubes. Add approximately two shots of amaretto. Garnish with a swirled lemon peel and serve. For contrast, try adding a few drops of lemon juice to the drink.

name: Indiana Jones
instructions: Add the whisky and tequila together, and double-up with champagne or sparkling wine. Place your hand or a beer mat over the glass, slam it down onto table and then down it in one.

name: Jack the Ripper
instructions: Level ice to the top in a shaker, add crown royal and buttershots, then shake. Strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Kryptonite Shot
instructions: Pour the orange juice and beer into a pint glass. Seperately add the lime vodka to a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink.

name: Leather and Lace
instructions: Carefully layer into a shot glass.

name: Mindbender
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Nickler
instructions: 1. Fill a pony glass (tall shot glass) with the cheapest brandy that you can find. Take a round slice of lemon and place it over the top of the pony glass. 3. Open a packet of sugar (apx 1 tsp) and pour it onto one half of the lemon leaving the other half bare. Take 1 tsp instant coffee and pour it on the other half of the lemon (beside the sugar). 5. Fold the lemon slice in half and bite off the rine. Chew and swallow the lemon combination and chase with the brandy in the shot glass.

name: Opera House Special
instructions: Add all ingredients to a metal mixer and strain into a shot glass.

name: Quick Fox
instructions: Carefully layer each ingredient on top of the previous and serve.

name: Rattlesnake Shooter
instructions: Carefully layer each ingredient into a shot or sherry glass in the order listed.

name: Sharpshooter
instructions: Pour and stir.

name: The Big
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Uncle Sam
instructions: Pour, or layer the three (preferably chilled) liquors into a shot glass.

name: Vodka Passion
instructions: Mix both liquids over ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Vulcan Mind Meld
instructions: Pour ingredients into a double-shot glass and drink quickly.

name: Ying Yang
instructions: Serve with alcohol pre-chilled. Can be served as a drink or a double shot.

name: Nightboat to Brazil
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

name: Kangaroo
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chillled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

name: Arctic Fish
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and candy fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. Do not stir, but serve well chilled.

name: Sidecar
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Creme Dream
instructions: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Jupiter Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Banana Split Shooter
instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Preakness Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Melon Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Skylab
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brain Freeze
instructions: Mix jose cuervo and grenadine in a pitcher with crushed ice. Sweeten with powdered sugar if desired.

name: Borinquen
instructions: Combine ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: A Day at the Beach
instructions: Shake rum, amaretto, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Add grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.

name: A Furlong Too Late
instructions: Pour rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: A Goodnight Kiss
instructions: Place a drop of angostura bitters on a sugar cube and drop into a champagne flute. Add champagne and splash of campari.

name: A Joy of Almond
instructions: Pour the kahlua into a chilled rocks glass. Carefully layer the amaretto and creme de almond on top.

name: A Little Dinghy
instructions: Pour the shots into a glass of ice, and fill the glass with equal parts orange juice, cranberry juice, and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice, and an umbrella.

name: A Little Green Man From Mars
instructions: Remove the stem from one mint green maraschino cherry and drop into a large shot glass. Pour in the jagermeister and rumple minze and serve.

name: A Night In Old Mandalay
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, anejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: A Piece of Ass
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a glass. Fill with sour mix and serve.

name: A Southern Screw
instructions: Pour over ice, stir and serve.

name: A Splash of Nash
instructions: Drop a shot glass containing banana and melon liqueurs in, into a 9 oz highball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Shoot.

name: A Sunny Delight
instructions: Using shot glasses or a cannery style mason jar, pour the vodka and the triple sec together. Squeeze the lemon lightly, and place it on the rim. Fill the glass with sunny delight, then add a shot of club soda.

name: A True Amaretto Sour
instructions: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake amaretto with lemon juice, and strain into the glass; over ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: A. J.
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Liquerice Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shot glass. Mix well and serve.

name: 6am Sunrise
instructions: Pour the mountain dew and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Stir, add the grenadine (without stirring), and serve.

name: 8th Birthday
instructions: Add all ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker, shake, and pour into a martini glass.

name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
instructions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Adam Bomb
instructions: 1. Add ice to a blender (or to a glass if you prefer on the rocks). 2. Add the fruit and fruit juice depending on personal preference, then add the rum, vodka, tequila, and triple sec. Blend until smooth. 3. Rim a glass with sugar or salt and pour in the mixture. Garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

name: Cranberry Tea Hot Punch
instructions: Make strong tea with the teabags and boiling water. Add cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, and spices. Stir until the sugar dissolves. Garnish with orange slices, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Watermelon
instructions: Cut a hole into one end of the watermelon and pour in the peach schnapps. Place the watermelon into the refrigerator for at least 6 hours. Alternatively, cut the watermelon into small pieces and place them into a dish. Pour the peach schnapps over the watermelon evenly and refrigerate for a few hours.

name: Halloween Punch
instructions: 1. Use grape juice and a variety of carbonated soft drinks (club soda, ginger ale, lemon-lime, etc). Mix them in a punch bowl. 2. Take scoops of the orange and lime sherbet and float them in the punch. Let them melt a little, so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch. (There should still be "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops.) Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

name: Bullfrog (The Party Mix)
instructions: Pour the soda (lemon-lime, ginger ale, sprite) into a large punch bowl, and add the vodka. Mix, and pour in the grain alcohol. Using a knife, cut the lemons and limes and squeeze the juice into the bowl. (Store-bought lime and lemon juice can be substituted.)

name: Californian Hurricane
instructions: Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together in a punch bowl or pitcher, and add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: The Abba
instructions: Mix absolut citron with sprite, add a twist of lime, and stir.

name: The Army John
instructions: Pour the southern comfort into a shaker glass, and add orange juice and triple sec. Squeeze the juice of one wedge of lime into the glass, and toss in the spent shell. Shake vigorously, strain into highball glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bat Bite
instructions: Pour the spiced rum over ice cubes in a glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and add a splash of grenadine. Stir, and serve.

name: Banana Split
instructions: Combine ingredients, shake, and pour over ice. Garnish with cherries.

name: Black River
instructions: Mix the alcohol in a glass with ice. Pour sprite and soda water simultaneously into the glass. Add the drops of lime and serve with a slice of lime on the side.

name: Egg Nog - Kahlua
instructions: Mix kahlua with eggnog in a wine glass and then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Dr. Pepper #2
instructions: Combine the shots in a collins glass. Fill the glass three-quarters full with coke and add crushed ice.

name: Grapefruit Teaser
instructions: Combine and stir.

name: Lemon Slam
instructions: Pour vodka into an ice-filled glass until 80% full. Using a spoon, drop sugar on top until it forms a large peak on top of the ice. Pour in lemon juice until the glass is about 90-95% full, and using your spoon, stir the mixture for about 30 seconds (or until the ingredients are perfectly mixed). Note: Exact measurements are not used due to the fact that certain people prefer different amounts of sugar and lemon juice.

name: 5-Ball
instructions: Prepare kool-aid as normal, except add double the amount of sugar. When done, add one fifth of the volume of triple sec, and serve chilled.

name: Aftershock
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a glass and stir.

name: Bald Pussy
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and shake.

name: Banana Slush Punch
instructions: 1. Blend the bananas with 2 cups of water in a blender. Set aside. 2. Pour remaining water, kool-aid, sugar and fruit juices (all except for the ginger ale) into a large punch bowl. Add the banana-mash, and freeze for at least 24 hours. 3. Before serving, add the ginger ale and chip the frosted mixture until slushy. Leave for 1 - 3 hours to thaw.

name: Goats Milk
instructions: Add all ingredients and stir.

name: Hot-Buttered Rum
instructions: Place the sugar, butter, rum (light or dark) and cloves into a mug. Fill with boiling water, and stir.

name: Lemonade Bomb
instructions: Follow the instructions on the can of lemonade concentrate, but substitute the vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.

name: Moose Piss
instructions: Mix ingredients together with a ladle in a clean five-gallon pail. Serve with or without a little ice.

name: Off Your Ass In A Glass
instructions: Add all ingredients to a glass, stir, and drink straight.

name: Party Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri Punch
instructions: Chop strawberries, and add to strawberry daiquiri mix. Add fruit punch, followed by lemon juice, and serve.

name: Red Draw
instructions: Fill a beer mug with beer, top off with a shot or two worth of tomato juice. (Miller light and clamato picante go well.)

name: Goat Juice For Everyone
instructions: Mix the vodka and grapefruit juice in a cooler with a ratio of 1 vodka to 2 grapefruit. Serve with ice in cups.

name: Absolut Evergreen
instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top with bitter lemon.

name: Chunky Monkey
instructions: Shake the chocolate syrup and kahlua, and slowly mix in the desired amount of cottage cheese. Serve cold.

name: Creamy Kiss
instructions: Mix ingredients in order; cream last, stir, and serve.

name: Diablo
instructions: Pour casa noble reposado tequila, creme de cassis and fresh lime juice into a glass with ice. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve with a wedge of lime on top.

name: Egg Cream
instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a tall glass. Add soda water, and serve with a straw.

name: Golden Star
instructions: Place two scoops of ice-cream in a blender, add liquor, and blend until milkshake-consistancy.

name: Highlander
instructions: Shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. Garnish with a flag.

name: Iced Lemonade Tea
instructions: Mix the sugar and lemonade together in a large bowl. Pour boiling tea over the top, let cool, and serve.

name: Italian Ice
instructions: Shake well and serve with crushed ice.

name: Kiwi Colada
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in pina colada glasses.

name: Limeade
instructions: Add the lime juice and sugar to a large glass, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass, and serve.

name: Kill the Cold Smoothie
instructions: Take a one-inch slice of ginger and juice one-quarter of a lemon, and add both to hot water. Add cardamom if desired.

name: Klingon Blood Wine
instructions: Add tabasco sauce to an ice-filled beer mug/glass. Pour in the tequila, rum and grenadine, and fill with cranberry juice. Shake twice and serve.

name: Long Summer Night
instructions: Pour the southern comfort, triple sec and sour mix over ice in a glass. Fill with mountain dew, stir and serve.

name: Moosemilk
instructions: Place ingredients in a blender and mix until even consistency. (Note: usually made in a large batch using above ratios and served punch style at parties.)

name: The Naked Lady
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: Naughty Angel
instructions: Stir.

name: Orange Whip
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes and stir.

name: Passion Chi-Chi
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer, and pour into an ice-filled glass. Good for warm days.

name: Quantum Theory
instructions: Pour rum, strega and grand marnier into a collins glass. Add pineapple juice, and fill with sweet and sour mix. Garnish with a lemon cherry flag.

name: Raspberry Trouffle
instructions: Pour in chambord into an ice-filled glass. Add amaretto, and balance with cream. Shake and serve with a straw and a cherry garnish. Good with desserts.

name: Red Devil
instructions: Mix alcohols into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Add the juice and grenadine, and shake. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

name: Red Rock
instructions: Mix vodka and schnapps in the bottom of a glass. Add ice, and pour in the can of dr. pepper.

name: Sex On Ice
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice and blend until the drink has reached the desired consistency. Pour unstrained into a cocktail glass and garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Sex on the Pool Table
instructions: Mix equal parts of each alcohol over ice, and top with grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.

name: Slime Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: South African Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high power until smooth. Pour into a collins glass, garnish with chocolate shavings and a cherry, and serve.

name: Southern Dream
instructions: Pour southern comfort into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Carefully drop the schnapps on top.

name: Spiced Cherry
instructions: Pour spiced rum into a glass, fill with cherry coke, and stir.

name: Strawberry Kiss
instructions: Add all ingredients in the order shown above, and stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.

name: Sugar Kick
instructions: Combine in a glass. Add ice, shake well, and serve with a cherry, a lemon (dipped in sugar), and a straw.

name: Super Smoothie
instructions: Chunk up the two bananas and put them in the bottom of a blender. Place the two large wedges of pineapple, strawberries and ice on top. Add rum if desired. Puree until smooth (a little water or fruit juice might be required). Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

name: Texas Tea
instructions: Fill a 1 gallon pitcher with ice. Add all the ingredients except the coca-cola. Stir, then add the coca-cola and stir again. Pour into your favorite glass with ice and enjoy.

name: Tickle Me Elmo
instructions: Pour schnapps over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice, to taste, and then everclear. Mix and serve.

name: Tomato Tang
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender, cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Tornado
instructions: Mix everything except cola, sugar and ice in a glass. Stir in the sugar, add ice cubes, and pour in coca-cola. Stir three times.

name: Twisted Screw
instructions: Pour the vodka into a glass, add orange juice and fill with tropicana. Add a splash of raspberry sparkling water if desired.

name: UFO
instructions: Pour genever gin into a glass, and fill with bitter lemon. Add ice cubes, and serve.

name: Absolut Mixer
instructions: Shake together over ice, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.

name: Black Widow
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice and shake. Strain into a martini glass and serve with a lemon twist.

name: Bloody Passion
instructions: Build in a highball glass.

name: Blue Dragon
instructions: Mix vodka and blue curacao with crushed ice, shake or stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherries.

name: Blue Lady
instructions: Pour vodka, vermouth and schnapps into a martini glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir, and serve.

name: Blue Moon Martini
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Blue Whip
instructions: Shake vodka, curacao and orange juice with ice cubes, and top off with sprite or 7-up. Garnish with fanned slices of orange floating on top, and serve with a straw.

name: Bomb Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a chilled glass, and serve.

name: Bon Voyage
instructions: Pour tequila and gin over ice in a cocktail glass. Add a dash of lemon juice and blue curacao, and stir lightly. Serve with a straw.

name: Born on the 4th of July
instructions: Pour blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Carefully layer both the sloe gin and cream on top of the ice. (The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.)

name: Bullshot
instructions: Combine vodka and beef boullion with four ice cubes in a mixing glass. Add salt and pepper to taste, stir, and strain into a chilled wine glass.

name: Caesar Cocktail
instructions: Line the rim of a glass with salt and pepper. Over ice, add vodka, fill with clamato juice, then add the remaining ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick. Add more tabasco sauce if desired.

name: California Gold Rush
instructions: Pour 7-up into a clear glass without ice. Add vodka and goldschlager, and stir to mix gold flakes evenly through the drink. Effect: The bubbles of carbon dioxide in the 7-up continuously move the gold flakes around.

name: California Iced Tea
instructions: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Captain Pepper
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Captains Pie
instructions: Pour the ginger ale and cranapple juice together into a glass. Add the rum, and serve.

name: Caribbean Kiss
instructions: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass into kahlua, and into brown sugar. Shake the spirits and cream with ice, strain into a frosted glass and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Caribbean Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Pour into glass.

name: Caribbean
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice, add rum and triple sec. Add juice and stir.

name: Carolina Dream
instructions: Blend with two cups of ice, until all chunks of peach and ice are gone. This drink was inspired by the intense heat of the fourth of july in the south east.

name: Carolina Iced Tea
instructions: Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and serve. Note: Add a splash of lemon and garnish with a twist for a classy drink or serve in a mason jar for a real down-home feel.

name: Carolina
instructions: Pour strega into a chilled wine glass, add champagne, and stir slightly.

name: Chameleon
instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice.

name: Cherry Bomb
instructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Chicks Dig It
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass and shake, or serve up in a cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate Banana
instructions: Pour creme de banane into an ice-filled glass. Add creme de cacao, fill with milk, and serve.

name: Chocolate Orange
instructions: Stir with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: Cinnamon Stick
instructions: Pour goldschlager into a glass. Add apple juice, mix and serve.

name: Cloudberry Dream
instructions: Add ingredients to an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, stir, and garnish with cranberries.

name: Coco Cabana
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

name: Cocoboodo
instructions: Shake with ice chips.

name: Coral Reef
instructions: Pour vodka, tequila, and blue curacao over ice and shake. Slowly add sour mix until bright torquoise, mix again, and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briefly and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #3
instructions: Stir ingredients on ice and strain into a martini glass.

name: Crazy Janie
instructions: Pour orange vodka into a deep stemmed glass with ice. Fill with grapefruit juice, add sprite or champagne, and stir gently. Spin the glass and drizzle in a few drops of grenadine to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

name: Creeping Death
instructions: Shake well.

name: Cry Baby Blues
instructions: Serve with shaved ice.

name: Cubano
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled shaker, shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Dancing Leprechaun
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a glass with ice cubes, and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Dea Lea
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Death of a Virgin
instructions: Pour vodka, schnapps and lime juice into a glass. Add orange juice until the glass is half-filled, and fill completely with 7-up. Stir well, and serve.

name: Deep Blue
instructions: Stir vodka and blue curacao together with ice in a glass. Top with champagne, and drop a blue maraschino cherry to the bottom.

name: Deep Valley
instructions: Pour gin and blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemon juice, pineapple juice and soda. Stir, and garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.

name: Delilah
instructions: Add gin, cointreau and lemon juice to an ice-filled shaker. Shake for 30 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Delta Sunset
instructions: Mix ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice, and serve.

name: Diesel
instructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness. Drink several of these and watch the room spin around! N.B. Only the cheapest lager and cider from the students union bar should be used.

name: Dirty Bastard
instructions: Pour vodka, brandy and cranberry juice (to taste) into an ice-filled highball glass. Add one squeeze of lime, and serve.

name: Dirty Martini
instructions: 1. Place an ice cube and a small amount of water in a cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2 - 3 minutes. 2. Fill a mixer with all ingredients including garnish. Cover and shake hard 3 - 4 times. 3. Remove cocktail glass from freezer, and empty. Strain contents of the mixer into the cocktail glass, include one of the olives, and serve with a mysterious smile.

name: Dirty Monkey
instructions: Pour into a brandy snifter in the order listed, and serve unstirred.

name: Donna Reed
instructions: Pour cranberry juice (more or less to taste) and sour mix over one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend for a few seconds, add vodka and blend again until frothy. Serve in a cocktail or margarita glass, or freeze until slushy.

name: Drum Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 2 - 3 ice cubes. Blend for about 10 seconds, and pour into a highball glass over 2 - 3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.

name: The Drunken Elf
instructions: Thoroughly blend all ingredients in an electric blender with two cups of ice. Pour into a frosted glass, and serve.

name: The Eclipse
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a glass.

name: El Nino
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a hurricane glass, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Electric Jam
instructions: Pour vodka, blue curacao and sour mix over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Elmo
instructions: Pour southern comfort, amaretto, vodka and sour mix into a shaker. Fill with sprite, shake, and strain (or roll) into a glass.

name: Emerald Martini
instructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

name: Eroticolada
instructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Evil Princess
instructions: Pour over ice, stir and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Exotica
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker, shake hard and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Extreme Valentine
instructions: Mix ingredients with ice in a glass. Serve with an orange slice.

name: Far East
instructions: Shake with ice, and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a speared cocktail cherry, and serve with two straws.

name: Far West
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Field of Green
instructions: Pour sloe gin and amaretto into a glass. Fill half-way with 7-up (optional), and fill completely with orange juice.

name: Fire Fly
instructions: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass with ice. Add grenadine, stir, and serve.

name: Firehammer
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flaming Moz
instructions: 1. Place a short rocks (wide mouthed spirit) glass on the bar. 2. Pour the blue curacao, white sambuca and chartreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally, balancing on the mouth of the short rock. 3. Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon, and rotate (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture into the short rock while alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. 4. Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. 5. Be sure the flames are out. Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink, and hold on to the bar.

name: Fluffy Duck
instructions: Pour the creme de cacao into a chilled margarita glass one-quarter filled with crushed ice. Add the advocaat, and slowly fill with 7-up or soda. Stir, and serve.

name: Football
instructions: Fill a glass with fernet branca. Drop in a splash of cream, either whipped or foamed, and serve.

name: Forbidden Smoke
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a piece of edible dry ice.

name: Forgive Me
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fox Trot
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Cosmopolitan
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except grenadine) into a shaker, shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Pour a drop of grenadine into the middle of the glass and let it fall to bottom. (It will color the stem red.) Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: French Pirate
instructions: Pour orange curacao into a champagne flute, add dark rum, and fill with champagne (preferably brut).

name: Frooty Biznitch
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Strawberry Banana Colada
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a glass, garnish with a fresh strawberry, and serve.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Fucking Shit
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a large glass. Add cranberry juice, frozen pink lemonade concentrate, and mix.

name: Full Moon #2
instructions: Tilt a brandy snifter and pour in the amaretto. While still tilting, add grand marnier. Gently "roll" snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix equal parts of each ingredient in a highball glass, top with ice, and serve.

name: Galapagos
instructions: Combine bitters, pineapple juice, pina colada mix, melon liqueur, lemon vodka and strega in a tall glass. Add whipped cream and serve with pineapple chunks, dessicated coconut and cherries on top.

name: Galway Grey
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cream) together, and pour into a cocktail glass. Float fresh light cream on top, sprinkle with grated orange peel, and serve.

name: The Game
instructions: Pour light rum into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cranberry juice, top with triple sec, and serve.

name: Gege
instructions: Shake ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry, and serve.

name: Geneva Convention
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Georgia Peach
instructions: Pour peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with orange and cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Gin Gin
instructions: Pour ginger ale over gin in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ginger Spice
instructions: Pour spiced rum over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Gingervitas
instructions: Pour absolut citron and vermouth into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add ginger ale, and serve.

name: Glacier Mint
instructions: Stir ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves, and serve.

name: Godiva Chocolate Martini
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Delicious
instructions: Pour sparkling apple cider into a highball glass. Add goldschlager, stir, and serve.

name: Gooseberry Jam
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. Shake until slightly frothy, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Grapefruit and Orange Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Grateful Dead
instructions: Shake ingredients, pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Green Coconut
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Green K
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, and pour into four seperate sugar-rimmed cocktail glasses.

name: Greenland
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) with ice, and strain into a highball glass. Top with fresh orange juice, to taste. Garnish with an orange slice, a cherry and a mint leaf. Add straws, and serve.

name: Grenadine Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients with plenty of ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Gun Barrel
instructions: Add vodka, triple sec and cranberry juice to a mixing glass, and mix well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hairy Armpit
instructions: Pour ouzo over three ice cubes in a highball glass, and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Hazelnut Martini
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Head
instructions: Pour rum and peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: High Voltage
instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Homewrecker
instructions: Shake, pour over cracked ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Horny Toad
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Hot Whiskey
instructions: Pour the whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add cloves into the fresh lemon and place into the whiskey. Fill with hot water and dissolve in the sugar. Serve immediately.

name: Imperial Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Irish Lady
instructions: Almost fill a champagne flute with champagne. Add midori and orange juice, and serve.

name: Irish Whip
instructions: Mix vodka, pernod, rum and creme de menthe together with a few ice cubes in a pint glass. Fill with equal parts of 7-up and orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Island Girl
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass, roll, and serve.

name: Island Tide
instructions: Pour anejo rum and bacardi limon into a collins glass; with ice if desired. Almost fill with peach juice, and add lemon juice. Stir, and sink 3 mandarin orange and 2 peach slices to the bottom. Garnish the glass with a lemon slice, peach slice or mandarin orange slice if desired, and serve.

name: Italian Margarita
instructions: Pour into a margarita glass, stir, and add ice cubes.

name: Italian Sunrise
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral, and serve.

name: Jake-Knife
instructions: Pour jagermeister over ice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with coke, shake vigorously, and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with rum, and ignite if desired. Extinguish, and serve.

name: Japanese Slipper
instructions: Combine equal parts of each ingredient in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Japanese Slipper #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jihad
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Jimtini
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocoa-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jitterbug
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except soda water) over ice in a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Joan Mir�
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass, stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry, and serve.

name: The Jolly Rancher
instructions: Pour vodka and melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker, and fill with cranberry juice. Shake, pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Juicy Lucy
instructions: Pour vodka, gin and curacao into a tall glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite, and serve.

name: Jumanji
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, add ice and shake well. Pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish with fresh fruit.

name: Kahlua Butterball
instructions: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add butterscotch schnapps, to taste, and fill with milk. Serve.

name: Kahlua Kiss
instructions: Pour kahlua half-way in a champagne flute filled with crushed ice. Add creme de noyaux, top with cream, and serve.

name: Kahlua Sour
instructions: Mix kahlua and lemon juice in a cocktail glass. Add sugar, and serve.

name: Kanaan
instructions: Prepare in a blender with a little ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kansas City Ice Water
instructions: Pour gin, vodka and lime juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: King Kong
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender, and combine on medium power for 45 seconds. Serve in a pitcher with a cute umbrella and a straw.

name: Knoxville Lemonade
instructions: Pour peach schnapps and vodka into a mason jar three-quarters filled with ice cubes. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange, add two straws, and serve.

name: Kung Fu
instructions: Pour jagermeister and pisang ambon over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with cola, and serve.

name: Lady 52
instructions: Pour kahlua into a pousse cafe glass, and float irish cream over the top. Shake cream with cointreau, and float over the irish cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Lady Cello
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar-rimmed highball glass. (Use limoncello and sugar.) Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Lake George Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola), and pour into a highball glass. Fill with pepsi, stir gently, and serve.

name: Lara Croft
instructions: Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
instructions: Pour triple sec, vodka, rum and gin into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, and sweeten to taste. Add a splash of sprite, stir, garnish a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Legspreader #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Lemon Cocktail
instructions: Stir orange juice and lemon juice with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lemon Flip
instructions: Add egg yolk, sugar syrup and lemon juice over several ice cubes in a shaker. Shake very well and strain into a highball glass. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Lemonade Lush
instructions: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Leprechaun
instructions: Pour whiskey over ice in a chilled old-fashioned glass. Top with tonic water and stir gently. Drop in a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Limon and Ginger
instructions: Serve pre-chilled or on-the-rocks in a highball glass.

name: Liquid Desert
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, stir, and serve.

name: Liquid Nitrogen
instructions: Pour sambuca and ouzo over four ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir if desired, and serve.

name: Log Cabin
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with orange soda, and serve.

name: Lolita
instructions: Shake, strain over one or two ice cubes in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Loose Caboose
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice, and shake well. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Love Me Tender
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass, and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Add an orange twist, and serve.

name: Lucky Stiff
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Madeleine
instructions: Shake all ingredients with four ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Madonna
instructions: Pour cherry vodka into a whiskey-sour glass. Fill with 7-up, and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Malibu Dew
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass. Fill with mountain dew, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Malibu Smash
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass with ice, mix, and serve.

name: Mandarin Delight
instructions: Pour absolut mandrin into a glass over ice. Fill with tonic water. Squeeze and drop the wedge of lime or orange into the drink. Stir, and serve.

name: Maryville Sweet
instructions: Pour southern comfort and lime juice over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Matisse
instructions: Pour stoli oranj over ice in a shaker, and shake. Glaze a chilled cocktail glass with chambord, and add the stoli oranj. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Merete
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: Mexican Iceberg
instructions: Mix tequila and yukon jack together with ice cubes in a large tumbler glass. Add triple sec and lime juice (to taste). Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Miami Ice
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except peach schnapps) into a beer mug. Stir gently, and almost-fill with ice. Add peach schnapps, and serve.

name: Miami Vice
instructions: 1. Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. Set aside. 2. Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. 3. While frozen, add pina colada mix to a cocktail glass. Add the daiquiri mix on top, keeping it seperated from the pina colada mix. Serve.

name: Midori Sun
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Vary lemon-lime mix to taste. Garnish with a lime wedge or a cherry, a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Milk of Amnesia
instructions: Add ice cold champagne to a champagne flute, and slowly add chilled chambord until desired raspberry flavor is achieved. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Mint Condition
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve with a straw.

name: Moment Brutale
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except gin) in a blender. Strain into seperate cocktail glasses, stir in the gin, and serve.

name: Mochito
instructions: Place mint leaves with lemon juice in a collins glass, and mash the mint with a spoon. Add ice, rum and fill up with club soda. Top with angostura bitters, and serve.

name: Moonlight Drive
instructions: Pour alcohol into a shaker, and add juices. Shake and pour into a punch cup with ice. Add a cherry and a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Mother Cocktail
instructions: Mix gin, vodka, grenadine and sour mix together in a shaker. Pour into a collins glass with ice, filling from half to three-quarters full. Top with beer, to taste, and serve.

name: Murder in the Forest
instructions: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a shaker, shake well, and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes if desired. Slowly add a dash of grenadine, garnish with a cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Naked Twister
instructions: Pour midori, vodka and tuaca into a pint glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice, and top with 7-up. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Navy Seal
instructions: Serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Niagara Falls
instructions: Build all ingredients (except ginger ale) in a cocktail or champagne glass. Add ginger ale, and serve.

name: Nitro Cocktail
instructions: Combine vodka, whiskey and juices in a shaker half-filled with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice, and shake. Strain into a collins glass almost-filled with ice, add grenadine, and serve.

name: Norwegian Iceberg
instructions: Pour vodka and sprite into an ice-filled beer mug. Add blue maui; until iceberg color, and serve.

name: Nuclear Ice Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except sour mix) into an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill with sour mix, top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Ocean Drive
instructions: Pour malibu rum and curacao into a cocktail glass. Add by pouring down the side of the glass, in order; orange juice, pineapple juice, and cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Mix sugar, water and angostura bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Drop in a cherry and an orange wedge. Muddle into a paste using a muddler or the back end of a spoon. Pour in bourbon, fill with ice cubes, and stir.

name: Orange Cocktail
instructions: Stir juices together in a mixing glass, strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Orange Flip
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender, and serve into glasses.

name: Orange Margarita
instructions: Combine tequila, triple sec and orange juice over ice in a margarita glass. Stir, top with lime juice or sour mix, and serve.

name: Original Sin
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except champagne and fruit) over six crushed ice cubes in a brandy snifter or goblet. Stir contents, and add slices of fruit (orange, lemon and lime). Top with champagne, and serve.

name: Original Margarita
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass, garnish with a lime or lemon slice, and serve.

name: Out of Africa
instructions: Blend with crushed ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Pajama Jackhammer
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass with shaved ice, and serve.

name: Paralyzer
instructions: Pour tequilla, vodka and kahlua over ice in a collins glass. Half-fill with coke, and top with light cream or milk. Stir gently with a straw, and serve.

name: Paralyzer #2
instructions: Build ingredients, in order, over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Passionate Kiss
instructions: Pour liquors into a mixing glass over ice. Fill with pineapple juice, stir, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Decorate with a flag, and serve.

name: Passoa Recovery
instructions: Pour passoa and lemon juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Peach Margarita
instructions: Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet and sour over ice in a margarita glass. Add grenadine, stir slightly, and serve.

name: Perfect Kiss
instructions: Pour white rum and peachtree schnapps over crushed ice in a margarita glass. Top with sprite, and gently place one half-strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

name: Perroquet
instructions: Pour pernod and mint syrup over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water, stir well, and serve.

name: Phoenix Paradise
instructions: Combine ingredients with four ice cubes in a blender for 20 - 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass or gibralter glass, and serve.

name: Pillow Mint
instructions: Pour whiskey into an old-fashioned glass, and add kahlua. Splash the mint schnapps, stir, and serve.

name: Pimp Cocktail
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Pina Colada #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with crushed ice. Mix well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple, and serve.

name: Pineapple Bomber
instructions: Pour equal parts of amaretto and southern comfort into an ice-filled highball glass. Add (at least) another equal part of pineapple juice to fill, and serve.

name: Pink Cello
instructions: Pour limoncello and vodka over ice in a collins glass, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Pixie Stick
instructions: Pour gin and midori over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up, and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Porch Monkey
instructions: Pour vodka and grapefruit schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, stir well, and serve.

name: Psycho Citrus
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Purple Cow
instructions: Pour vodka into a shaker. Add grape juice, to taste. Shake, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Purple Rain
instructions: Pour gin into an ice-filled highball glass, and fill with cranberry juice. Add blue curacao, sour mix and soda. Shake gently, add more curacao (until royal-purple), and serve.

name: Pussy Foot
instructions: Shake or blend briefly, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with fresh fruit and a cherry. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Rail Splitter
instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice, to taste, in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Ramos Fizz
instructions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

name: Raspberry Swirl
instructions: Mix vodka, amaretto and ice cream in a blender, and pour into a hurricane glass. Gently pour in chambord; swirl with a straw or stirring stick to produce the desired effect, and serve.

name: Raspberry Truffle
instructions: Pour vodka and liqueurs into a cocktail glass. Fill with milk, and serve.

name: Rearbuster
instructions: Pour tequila and kahlua into a highball glass with ice, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and umbrella, stir, and serve with a straw.

name: Red Dwarf
instructions: Mix rum, lemon juice, orange juice and peach schnapps together with plenty of ice in a shaker. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Add creme de cassis; allowing it to form a layer at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with cherries, orange or lemon to taste, and serve.

name: Red Lion
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Moisten rim with water or juice, dip in caster sugar, and serve.

name: Red Rattlesnake
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, shake, and serve.

name: Resaca Water
instructions: Place the vodka, rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add pineapple and orange juice, and shake. Pour over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Retribution
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rip Griffin
instructions: Pour peppermint schapps over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with orange juice, stir, and garnish with a cherry.

name: Riprock
instructions: Pour jim beam into a cocktail shaker. Add ice, fill with orange juice, and shake. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Royal Bill
instructions: Pour chilled poire william into a champagne flute, and fill with champagne. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

name: Rubber Chicken
instructions: Pour rye whiskey into an ice-filled mason jar. Add equal parts of limeade and ginger ale, and serve.

name: Rum Snap
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Russian Seven
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up, garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Safari Juice
instructions: Pour cointreau and midori melon liqueur into a mixing glass and add orange juice. Stir rapidly, three to four times, and pour into a cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time. Garnish with tropical fruits, and serve.

name: Sailor Moon
instructions: Shake white rum, charleston follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with champagne, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Salt and Pepper Martini
instructions: Combine vermouth and absolut peppar in a mixing glass over ice. Stir, strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apello
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Apple Berry Smoothie
instructions: Combine berries and sliced apples in a blender, blend, and pour into suitable glasses.

name: Apple Pie With A Crust
instructions: Combine the apple juice and malibu rum in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle cloves or cinnamon on top, and serve; warm, or cold.

name: Backseat Boogie #2
instructions: Pour vodka and gin over ice in a collins glass. Fill with equal parts of ginger ale and cranberry juice. Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Aviator Fuel
instructions: Fill a large cup or glass one-third full with lemonade. Add equal amounts of vodka and sprite, and serve.

name: Bloody Shame
instructions: Pour V8 into an old-fashioned glass, add tabasco sauce and stir with a celery stalk. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Blow Blue Bubbles
instructions: Pour blueberry schnapps into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Caribbean Sunset
instructions: Combine melon liqueur and malibu rum together in a hurricane glass. Slowly pour cranberry juice on top until it fills half the remaining space. Float orange juice on top, and serve.

name: Carnegie Sunrise
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Shock
instructions: Pour aftershock into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate, and serve.

name: Danger
instructions: Pour chilled beer and vodka into a beer glass, and serve.

name: Dirty Banana
instructions: Blend six ice cubes with ice-cream in a blender until smooth. Add liqueurs and continue blending, again until smooth. Add more ice-cream if needed (for milk-shake consistency). Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper
instructions: Pour beer into a pint glass, and add coke. Seperately add amaretto to a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass, and drink immediately.

name: Dr. Peppermint
instructions: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter
instructions: Pour kahlua and irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Delight
instructions: Pour irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Night
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add amaretto, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add irish cream, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Dream Cocktail
instructions: Shake, strain into highball glass with ice, and serve.

name: Duncan MacLeod
instructions: Combine pre-chilled shochu and scotch in a beer mug. Fill with coke, mix gently and serve.

name: African Lullaby
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup crushed ice. Pour into a beer pilsner, garnish with a red cherry, and serve.

name: After Eighteen
instructions: Pour kahlua and white creme de menthe into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with chocolate milk, and serve.

name: Pink Panties
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Sexy Lemonade
instructions: Pour into a large rocks glass filled with ice. Stir well, garnish with two slices of lemon, and serve.

name: Big Zacs Morning After
instructions: Combine ingredients in a pint glass with plenty of ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Carmel Apple Funtini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold, and pour into a chilled stemmed or rocks glass with ice.

name: Toxic Waste
instructions: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Alaskan Iced Tea
instructions: Mix the rum, gin, vodka, blue curacao, and sour mix in a mixing glass. Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a twist of lemon or lime, and top with a cherry. Serve.

name: Milky Way Galaxy
instructions: Combine milk, amaretto and vanilla extract in a blender for 60 seconds. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and sprinkle with cinnamon. Stir with a straw, and serve.

name: Carmel Sour Apple Shooter
instructions: Pour equal parts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until sufficiently chilled, pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Wild Buttery Squirrel
instructions: Pour into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold, pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Slippery Nuts Shooter
instructions: Pour equal parts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hairy Lemon
instructions: Rub salt onto the back of your hand. Bite the lemon, drink a good two mouthfuls of vodka, and lick the salt.

name: Alcoholic Icy-Pole
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into an icy-pole template, and freeze. Serve on a hot day.

name: Beautiful Disaster
instructions: Empty the mickey into a half-empty bottle of sprite. Put the cap on, and turn upside down slowly a few times - allowing it to mix. Serve in a collins glass with ice.

name: Slippery Rootbeer Lollipop
instructions: Pour equal amounts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold, pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nutty Slippery Rootbeer Lollipop
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into an old-fashioned glass with ice, and serve.

name: Mexican Sexy Lemonade
instructions: Pour jose cuervo, triple sec and 7-up into a large ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour, and add sugar. Drop in a slice of lemon, stir well, and serve.

name: Pain Killer
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur in an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill, with equal parts; cranberry, orange, and pineapple juice. Add rum, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Wet and Wild Lip Tickler
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Absolut Sexy Lemonade Punch
instructions: Pour vodka, triple sec, 7-up, and lemon juice into a 64 ounce container. Slice a lemon, add, then almost-fill with sweet and sour mix. Add sugar and a touch of grenadine, and shake well. Serve into highball glasses. Stir or shake well with each serving to circulate the sugar.

name: Silk Panties
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Original Zombie
instructions: Pour light rum, dark rum, creme de almond and triple sec into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Almost-fill with equal parts of sweet and sour and orange juice. Top with 151 rum. Add a large straw, and serve unstirred.

name: Singapore Sling
instructions: Pour grenadine into the bottom of a collins glass, and fill with ice. Add gin, and almost-fill with equal parts of sweet and sour and chilled soda. Top with cherry brandy, and serve unstirred, garnished with a cherry.

name: Surfer On Acid
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into a large shot or old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Scooby Snack
instructions: Pour rum, creme de banane, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Add whipped cream, and shake; until well mixed and sufficiently chilled. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Hurricane
instructions: Pour all but the juices, in order listed, into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of grapefruit and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Anti-Freeze
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold, strain into a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Lime Green Bullfrog
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker, and shake until completely cold. Strain into a rock glass filled with ice, garnish with a lime wheel, and serve.

name: Mexican Prairie Fire
instructions: Pour Cuervo Gold into a shot glass,top with Tabasco Sauce. Shoot the fire!!!!

name: Purple Haze
instructions: Pour Sambucca into a shot glass then pour Chambord very slowly.

name: Tidy Bowl
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, float 4 to 6 raisins, and serve.

name: Orange Scorpion
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Buffalo Sweat
instructions: Pour 151 proof rum and tabasco sauce into a stainless shaker over ice, shake until completely cold and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Pour a 1/4 cup of orange juice over the bar, clean up with the bar rag then squeeze 1 oz. out of bar rag into the drink. Serve to your nastiest customer.

name: Cape Brenton Slide
instructions: Add drambuie to a pousse-cafe glass. Use a knife/spoon to drizzle the shot of irish cream so it layers on top, and serve.

name: Redneck Prairie Fire
instructions: Pour 1 oz. White Lightning into a shot glass then float 1/8 oz. Louisiana Hot Sauce on top wait a few seconds for it to look like an upside down fire then shoot it down. After about 4 everything just might look upside down.

name: Teddybear
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Teddybear Shooter
instructions: Pour 3/4 oz. Rootbeer Schnapps into a shot glass,then use barspoon to carefully pour 1/4 oz. vodka on top to layer.

name: Orange Tiger
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a Rocks glass filled with ice.Garnish with orange wheel or wedge.

name: Orange Venom
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.Garnish with orange wheel or wedge.

name: Green Orange
instructions: Pour vodka, Grand Marnier and orange juice into a collins glass filled with ice. Top with Midori melon liqueur. Garnish with an orange and lime wheel aside each other on the edge of the glass.

name: Dark Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

name: Alabama Slammer
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Alabama Slammer #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Emerald Jewel Funtini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Gold Emerald Shooter
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Jelly Bean
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Jelly Bean #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Lemon Drop
instructions: Add sugar to the rim of an old-fashioned glass, and drop a cube or packet of sugar into the bottom of the glass. Pour vodka and lemon juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Pour into the prepared old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Grand Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish a slice of orange or a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Screw #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw #2
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts pineapple juice and orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice or a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Florida Iced Tea
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.Garnish with an Orange slice.

name: California Iced Tea
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or an orange slice.

name: June Bug
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

name: Full Moon
instructions: Pour above ingredients into an ice-filled rocks glass, and serve.

name: Moody Blue
instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve

name: Malibu Surfer
instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bastard
instructions: Pour ingredients in order listed above into a Hurricane glass filled with ice.Garnish with an Orange Slice.

name: Suntanned Malibu Surfer
instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a rocks/old-fashioned glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Cobra
instructions: Pour ingredients into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel or squeeze, and serve.

name: Juicy Fruit
instructions: Pour the above ingredients in the order listed into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a wedge of pineapple.

name: Between The Sheets
instructions: Pour cognac, rum and triple sec into an ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix, and serve.

name: Pink Pussycat
