instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Pink Pussy Slam
instructions: Pour above listed ingredients into a stainless steel shaker with ice, and shake until completely cold. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Sexy Lemon Slam
instructions: Place a small sugar coated lemon wheel (approx.1/4 in.thick) into the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Pour above listed ingredients into a stainless steel shaker with ice, shake until completely cold, and pour into the prepared old-fashioned glass. Sip or slam.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka, tomato juice, red hot sauce, green hot sauce, worchester sauce, lemon juice, pinch of salt, pinch of pepper. Pour back and forth between two mixing glasses. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Mojito
instructions: Alcohol Content 0.44

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: This is a popular Sex on the Beach and what is most likely the original. Popular substitutes include using pineapple for the orange, or Midori & Chambord instead of schnapps.

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka in ice-filled glass and top with orange juice.

name: Jello Shots
instructions: Jello shots are easy to make and great for parties. There are tons of flavors and variations, read all the suggestions... this recipe is a nice tasting example on how to do it.

name: Hawaiian Punch
instructions: Pour over ice, (grenadine last), and stir.

name: Champagne Punch
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and serve in punch cups.

name: Banana Punch
instructions: Pour brandy, vodka, and juice of lime into a collins glass over crushed ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with banana slices and mint sprigs and serve.

name: Banana Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Windex
instructions: The Windex looks and smells like Windex and tastes like fizzy Kool-Aid.

name: Cowboy Roy
instructions: Pour vodka, rum and orange juice into a very tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Redneck Cocktail
instructions: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort, depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time

name: Polar Bear #3
instructions: Pour equal parts of vodka and lime juice into a glass with ice. Add the same, combined amount in 7-up or sprite. Mix and serve with a straw.

name: Polar Bear #2
instructions: Blend with ice in a highball glass.

name: Polar Bear
instructions: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty!

name: Swedish Polar Bear
instructions: Combine and mix absolut vodka and blue curacao over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with sprite, and serve.

name: Godiva Polar Bear
instructions: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.

name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fuck
instructions: Mix blue curacao and melon liqueur (cold strain for best results) and top off with 2 splashes of Canadian Club Rye.

name: BearCat Special
instructions: Put both in shot glass, mix, and down.

name: Bearded Boy
instructions: Add all ingredients and stir for 5 minutes, allowing alcohol to settle.

name: Blue PolarBear
instructions: Shake schnapps and vodka together until well-mixed. Add crushed ice, shake lightly, then pour to shot glasses.

name: Chocolate Snow Bear
instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Grizzly Bear
instructions: Serve over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

name: Ice Bear
instructions: Mix vodka and Curacao. Pour in a high glass. Fill it up with soda.

name: North Polar
instructions: Mix and serve over ice with a slice of orange.

name: Red Beard
instructions: Mix on ice and serve.

name: Black Magic Shooter
instructions: Shake both ingredients with ice and strain into a shot glass. Slam it and cast your evil spell.

name: Green Devil
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over a few ice cubes.

name: Zombie
instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice except Bacardi 151 proof rum. Pour into a collins glass. Float Bacardi 151 proof rum on top. Garnish with a fruit slice, sprig of mint and a cherry.

name: Salem Witch
instructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

name: Vampire
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice. Serve as shots in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Neon Ghost
instructions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass

name: Green Goblin
instructions: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

name: Spooky Juice
instructions: Stir together with ice.

name: The Graveyard
instructions: Pour 1 oz of Tobasco Sauce over ice. Add 1 oz. of Tequila and fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Shake or stir and serve.

name: Great Pumpkin Punch
instructions: Serve in a hollowed out pumpkin with floating pumpkin chunks.

name: Ecto Cooler
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large (1/2 gallon) pitcher. Shake and enjoy!

name: Smurf Piss
instructions: Serve pre-chilled ingredients in a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Black Mexican
instructions: Chill ingredients.

name: Red Headed Slut
instructions: Chill and serve.

name: Red Headed Mexican
instructions: Pour desired amount of sprite over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila, splash grenadine, and serve.

name: Death Mix
instructions: Just run the coke syrup down the side of the glass (the dark stuff not the soda). Any size glass will do. Then, fill the rest with grenadine. Do not skull it because it is very very strong. Look at it in the light - it should be very dark.

name: Panty Burner
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Simply Exquisite
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless shaker over ice, shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass.

name: Slippery Panties
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Nutty Irishman #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Cinnamon Nuts and Cream
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Red Nuts
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Tumbleweed
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Nuts and Cream
instructions: Pour ingrdients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Impatient Virgin
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Slippery Nutcracker
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Nuts and Berries
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into a chilled, stemmed or rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Kama Sutra
instructions: Shake Well With Ice And Strain Into Chilled Martini Glass

name: Peachbreeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins Glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Blaster
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Purple Dream
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Red Death
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Red Panties
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Raspberry Kiss
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Chocolate Squirrel
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Snow Melt
instructions: Pour Vodka and Amaretto into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and cherry.

name: Hot Nuts
instructions: Pour Amaretto and Frangelico into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream then slowly pour 1/8 oz. Cherry Brandy in a circular motion on to the whipped cream,top with a cherry.

name: Kali Fury
instructions: Pour Malibu Rum into a Lg. Rocks(Bucket)glass or Collins glass filled with ice then pour in juices and top with 1/2 oz. Creme de Banana.

name: Watermelon Pucker Fucker
instructions: Mix in a hurricane glass.

name: A Dixon Thing
instructions: Mix Slow Gin and Amaretto in glass.

name: After Dinner Mint
instructions: Shack vigorously and serve.

name: Abbey Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Abilene
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Absinthe Liqueur
instructions: Steep wormwood in vodka for 48 hours. Remove, add the rest and steep for one week. Age.

name: Absinthe Liqueur #2
instructions: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

name: Absinthe Cocktail
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Absinthe Flip
instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Absinthe Martini
instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

name: Absinthe Minded Martini
instructions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Absinthe Suissesse
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Absolut Anti-freeze
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Absolut Lemonade
instructions: Mix alcohol, sweet and sour. Add Ice and top off with Sprite.

name: Absolut Limousine
instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

name: Absolut Royal Fuck
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake, and serve up in a rocks glass.

name: Absolut Sex
instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice. Strain into a rocks glass with a splash of seven on top.

name: Absolut Stress
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing tin and shake with ice. Pour into a collins glass. No garnish.

name: Absolut Stress #2
instructions: Mix well. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Absolut Tooch
instructions: Chill with ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Absolute HB
instructions: Pour everything in a beer mug and shake it. Then you simply drink it.

name: Absolutely Fruity
instructions: Mix banana and watermelon liqueur in shot glass top with vodka.

name: Absolutly Screwed Up
instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

name: Absolutly Screwed
instructions: Mix OJ and Mandrin then enjoy.

name: Acapulco Twister
instructions: Mix the lemon, tabasco sauce, clamato juice, salt and pepper. Fill the glass with some ice, add the rum and fill with Corona beer.

name: D & D Lay
instructions: Serve shaken, not stirred.

name: Acapulco Zombie
instructions: Pour the alcohol in first, then finish off the glass with the two juices. Also, remember, just a little Creme de Menthe, not too much!

name: Acapulcos Malibu
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add rum and mango juice. Stir.

name: Acapulco
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: D-Roy
instructions: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

name: D.O.A.
instructions: Pour liqour in order listed and layer. Serve and shoot

name: Acid Rain
instructions: Drink about a third of the bottle of Snapple Rain, and then fill it back up with bacardi. Put the cap back on and shake it up.

name: ACID
instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

name: D.P.R.
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

name: Adam Sunrise
instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with bartons vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

name: D.R.F.O.
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir, strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Adam
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with shaved ice, strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Addison Special
instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

name: Adios Motherfucker #2
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Daiquiri Liqueur
instructions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the limes (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups of the rum. Close the jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until rum has absorbed the flavor. Remove the peel and add the sugar. Shake vigorously until the sugar dissolves and add remaining cup of rum. Close jar and store in a cool, dark place at least 1 month to age

name: Adios Motherfucker #3
instructions: Shake alcohol, then add sprite on top. Serve on the rocks.

name: Adios Motherfucker
instructions: Pour all ingredients except the 7-Up into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up and stir gently.

name: Adios Mother
instructions: Add vodka, gin, white rum and blue curacao to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill the glass with equal parts sour mix and 7-Up, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dakota
instructions: Combine in a double shot glass and enjoy.

name: Adonis Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Affair
instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

name: Affinity
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Affirmative Action
instructions: Fill glass about 1/4 with chilled orange juice. Add Vodka at a 2:1 ratio with cognac and add to highball glass with Orange Juice. Optional squeeze of lemon.

name: Afghanistany Whore
instructions: Just pour to taste and enjoy.

name: After Dinner Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: After Party
instructions: Mix all ingredients! More or less vodka and sugar can be used. Mix to your taste!

name: After Sex
instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar.

name: After Supper Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Afterburner
instructions: Pour both ingredients and let them mix somewhat. (You can stir it to help it out)

name: Afterburner #2
instructions: Pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass. (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking

name: Afterburner #3
instructions: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Afterglow
instructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

name: Afterlanche
instructions: Layer liquors in a shot glass.

name: Agent Orange
instructions: Have a hurricane glass filled with ice. Add ingredients, and shake. Garnish with cherry and orange.

name: Aggie Banana
instructions: Place bananas in an uncovered plastic bowl to freeze. Allow frost to form on them. Blend ice cream, milk, and frozen bananas until smooth. Add Schnapps, blend, and pour.

name: Aggie Punch
instructions: Combine ingredients and stir. Best served over ice and in a clear glass.

name: Aggravation
instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice, then add Scotch and Kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.

name: Agua de Valencia
instructions: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.

name: Airhead
instructions: Pour peach Schnapps into shot glass. Add chilled cranberry juice to fill.

name: Akis Special
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

name: Alabama Riot
instructions: Pour fruit punch and ice into a glass, add southern comfort, peppermint schnapps and vodka. Stir. Finish with lime juice.

name: Aladdin Sane
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake, allow to chill for 5 minutes, re-shake, and pour into a martini glass.

name: Alamo Splash
instructions: Mix with cracked ice and strain into collins glass.

name: Alaska Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Alaskan Pipeline
instructions: Mix equal parts Yukon Jack and amaretto in a tumbler with ice and shake. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Alaska
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Albysjon
instructions: Pour vodka, sprite, fanta and kiwi juice into a glass over ice, and stir well. For best results add kiwi juice concentrate last.

name: Alebrije
instructions: First mix some orange juice and pinapple juice in equal parts, and color it with some grenadine (as sweet as you want). This is "conga mix". Fill the glass with ice, add the five licours and mix them, fill the glass with some conga mix and enjoy.

name: Alex Chi-Chi
instructions: Shake in an ice filled shaker. Strain and serve.

name: Alexander
instructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass.

name: Alexander Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexander Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alexandra
instructions: Mix in a shaker, add some ice and shake very well.

name: Alfie Cocktail
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Algae
instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.

name: Algonquin
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alice Cocktail
instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Alice in Wonderland
instructions: Combine all three ingredients in equal parts in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Alien Secretion #2
instructions: Add ingredients together in small shaker w/ice. Stir. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Alien Secretion
instructions: Combine and mix all ingredients in equal portions, and serve.

name: Alien Urine Sample
instructions: Hand shake or blend with ice the Liqueur with the Sweet + Sour. Strain this mixture from the ice into a pounder glass with the Schnapps, Malibu, Creme de banane and soda. Float the Blue Curacao before serving.

name: Alien Urine
instructions: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass, but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori, Malibo, and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

name: All American
instructions: Serve with two ice-cubes. You can vary the amount of coca-cola depending on how soft you want your drink to be.

name: All Night Long
instructions: Mix all together in hurricane glass. Shake well. Garnish-orange flag.

name: All Puckered Out
instructions: Add ice and a shot of pucker to the highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime and toss it in the glass. Stir.

name: Allegheny
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Allies Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alligator Piss
instructions: Shake, strain into glass.

name: Alligator
instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.

name: Almeria
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Almond Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except almond, then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

name: Almond Cooler
instructions: Blend all except ice for 10-15 seconds. Add the ice cubes and blend for another 10 seconds to break up the ice cubes slightly. Serve in a Poco Grande or Hurricane glass garnished with a slice of orange and a Marichino cherry.

name: Almond Delight
instructions: Pour Sambuca first, then Amaretto.

name: Almond Joy #2
instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice, add Malibu, amaretto, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Almond Joy Dark
instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Fill with pineapple. Add grenadine to color. Shake. Garnish with pineapple flag.

name: Almond Joy
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Almond Shrub
instructions: Put into gallon or half-gallon jar the spirits, thin lemon peel, orange juice, and sugar. Now take the essence of bitter almonds (you can use any amount you please) and add it to the glass of milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into the jar. Cover, put in a warm place (65-70 degrees fahrenheit), and keep it there until the milk has curdled. This takes from one to three hours. Then filter through filter paper and bottle. Rest it for two weeks before drinking it.

name: Almost Heaven
instructions: Build in a collins glass over ice.

name: Aloha Fruit Punch
instructions: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill thoroughly.

name: Alpine Sprite
instructions: Pour and stir. Add ice if desired.

name: Alternate Root
instructions: Mix Schnapps and juice in glass of ice. Place in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in chilled glass.

name: Amaretto Alexander
instructions: Combine liquers in shaker along with cream and ice. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Amaretto And Cream
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Liqueur
instructions: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container, combine apricot halves, almond extract, grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water, and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

name: Amaretto Mist
instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

name: Amaretto Paradise
instructions: Mix over ice. Shake and serve.

name: Amaretto Rose
instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Amaretto Shake
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled champagne saucer garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Pour the amaretto liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a splash or two of sweet and sour mix, and shake well. Strain or pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Amaretto Stinger
instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour #2
instructions: Pour amaretto, orange juice, and sour mix into a tall glass over ice, and serve.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
instructions: In a shaker tin with ice, add sour mix, tequila, and amaretto. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour
instructions: Shake and serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Amaretto Stone Sweet
instructions: Blend with ice.

name: Amaretto Sunrise Crush
instructions: Blend orange juice, amaretto, grenadine and ice cubes in blender until smooth. Pour into margarita/coupette glass and add lemon juice.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner. This is made in a blender, hence the measurements are according to a blender.

name: Amaretto Tea
instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

name: Amarita
instructions: Pour Amaretto and margarita mix over ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Amazon Street Lemonade
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add 2 oz vodka and fill the glass with lemonade.

name: Ambijaxtrious
instructions: Pour mixture into a cup filled with crushed ice and stir briskly.

name: Ambrosia
instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except champagne). Pour contents into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Amenie Mama
instructions: Pour into shot glass. Stir.

name: Amer Picon Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amer Picon Punch
instructions: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda, leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.

name: American Beauty
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully, float the port on top.

name: American Dream
instructions: Chill with ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: American Flag
instructions: When properly prepared this shot will look red, white and blue. First poor in 1/3 grenadine. Then the White Cream de cacao should be poured in over a bar spoon. Finally the Blue curacao can be poured in the same way.

name: American Pie
instructions: Pour grenadine in glass. Add straw and ice carefully. Fill 1/3 of glass with sweet and sour. Add Vodka. Fill glass almost to the rim with 7-up. Add Blue Curacao. Do not stir.

name: Americano
instructions: Pour over ice into an collins glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists. You may fill with some club soda.

name: Amor de Cosmos
instructions: Shake rye, grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Andalusia
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Anestesia
instructions: In a shaker glass put all ingredients and shake for 10 seconds. Then serve it in a coctail glass adding a piece of orange and a cherry.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Angelica Liqueur
instructions: Combine all herbs, nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter, discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved, set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool, dark place for one month.

name: Angry Chameleon
instructions: Dissolve kool-aid mixture in rum, add mountain dew, and serve.

name: Ankle Breaker
instructions: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Ante
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Anti-Freeze #2
instructions: Pour the hot chocolate mix into a 9 ounce glass mug. Add the schnapps and boiling water. Stir Well. Top with a swirl of whipped cream. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a peppermint stick.

name: Anti-Freeze #3
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add water and lemon lime mix, stir until dissolved, and serve.

name: Anti-Freeze #4
instructions: Chill w/ ice cubes in shaker. Pour into rocks glass or split into two shots.

name: Antoine Special
instructions: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

name: Apfel Orange
instructions: Mix the ingredients, add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.

name: Apocalypse
instructions: Combine alcohol in a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Apple and Cinnamon Joy
instructions: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Dribble Goldschlager into schnapps. Stir twice.

name: Apple Blossom
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass almost-filled with ice. Stir, and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Apple Blow Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Highball
instructions: Pour apple brandy over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel on top and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred)

name: Apple Brandy Sour
instructions: Shake apple brandy, powdered sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Apple Cider Punch
instructions: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.

name: Apple Cider Punch #2
instructions: Make sure ingreadients are well chilled. Cut unpeeled apples 1cm cubes. Combine fruit and mint with apple juice in large punch bowl. Mix well, cover and refrigerate until serving. Before serving add chilled apple cider and lemonade.

name: Apple Cider Slider
instructions: Pour over ice. Shake and strain into shooter glass.

name: Apple Colada
instructions: Blend schnapps, cream of coconut, half-and-half, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Apple Grande
instructions: Chill both ingredients! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

name: Apple Jolly Rancher
instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

name: Apple Judy
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Karate
instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Apple Martini
instructions: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

name: Apple Pie Shot
instructions: Pour apple juice and vodka into a shot glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on the tongue and pour contents of shot glass into your mouth. Shake head until cinnamon is dissolved, and consume.

name: Apple Pie Shot #2
instructions: Bang glass on table and immediately take shot.

name: Apple Pie Shot #3
instructions: Pour ingredients in order listed into a shot glass.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Rum Rickey
instructions: Pour applejack and rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Squeeze lime and drop in glass. Stir and serve.

name: Apple Slammer
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with their palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

name: Apple Slut
instructions: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.

name: Applecake
instructions: Shake well and use it as a shot.

name: Applecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Appled Rum Cooler
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, applejack, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: Apricot Adventure
instructions: Crush part of the mint together with the sugar and some Zwack. Shake the rest of the Zwack with the lime juice and ice as desired and pour into the glass. Fill up with club soda and decorate with the remaining mint and perhaps some lime.

name: Apricot Anise Collins
instructions: Shake gin, brandy, anisette, and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir lightly. Decorate with the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Apricot Brandy Sour
instructions: Pour apricot brandy. Add lemon juice. Fill in with orange juice and add ice cubes. Shake. Optional: Add 1/2 oz triple sec, or 1 teaspoon grenadine.

name: Apricot Breeze
instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add Vodka and apricot nectar to glass then fill with tonic. Stir.

name: Apricot Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apricot Lady
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Apricot Punch
instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided. If you wish for a little different taste substitute orange juice with apple juice and oranges with apples.

name: Apricot Smoothie
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice. 7-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired. For a little different taste use apple juice instead of orange juice.

name: Aqua Fodie
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of Gin followed by 1 oz. of Blue Curacao. Fill glass with Orange Juice, garnish with Orange and Cherry, and serve.

name: Aqualung
instructions: Brew espresso, mix in shots of kahlua and syrup.

name: Aquarium Jello
instructions: Use a new or well-cleaned goldfish bowl. Mix gelatin according to package directions, substituting curacao for water in whatever ratio you prefer. Place the hard candies in the bowl. When gelatin is cool but not yet setting up, pour it slowly into the bowl and be careful not to disturb the candies or the color will run. Cool until half-set then add foliage and fish, placing them with strands of spaghetti. Refrigerate until serving-time.

name: Aqueduct
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Aranov
instructions: Mix vodka and juice in a pitcher or similarly large container.

name: Arcadia
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Archbishop
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Arctic Mouthwash
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

name: Ario Bomb
instructions: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

name: Arise My Love
instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

name: Arizona Anti-Freeze
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam.

name: Arizona PowWow
instructions: Mix the three alcohols together and pour into shot glasses leaving enough room to add a little club soda. Best if drunk with a lime, lemon, or an orange wedge.

name: Arizona Stingers
instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass. Add 2 heaping shots of absolut vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of absolut as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with Arizona Iced Tea w/lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy.

name: Arizona Twister
instructions: Mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

name: Army Green
instructions: Pour into a shot glass. A chaser may be needed.

name: Arthur Tompkins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Artic Red
instructions: First smash the limes and sugar to bottom of the glass. Then add vodka and soda. Mix the drink with a spoon. Add ice cubes and lemon.

name: Artillery Punch
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

name: Artillery
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ash Blonde
instructions: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

name: Asphalt
instructions: Pour brandy over ice the glass. Fill with Coke. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Asthma Attack
instructions: Shake and serve.

name: Astoria
instructions: Shake with cracked ice: strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with twist of orange or lemon.

name: Astral Gateway
instructions: Put ingredients into the glass, fill with ice.

name: Astropop
instructions: Layer all three liqours into shot glass.

name: Astroturf
instructions: Mix creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk in glass. When ready to serve, squirt in chocolate syrup and mix until it turns a grass-like green/brown color.

name: AT&T
instructions: Pour vodka and gin over ice, add tonic water and stir.

name: Atlantic Sun
instructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Atomic Bomb
instructions: Fill a small glass with bear and put in a pint. Fill pint with Loitens linje.

name: Atomic Lokade
instructions: Pour lemonade, vodka, blue curacao, and triple sec into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add sugar to taste.

name: Atomic Watermelon
instructions: Mix ingredients in glass over ice and enjoy!

name: ATP
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass, then add the amaretto. Stir.

name: Attitude Adjustment #2
instructions: Pour all ingredents into a mixing tin with ice, and strain into glass.

name: Attitude
instructions: Stir. Garnish with a lemon & lime slice.

name: Auburn Headbanger
instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. Enjoy!

name: Autodafe
instructions: Mix vodka and lime juice together in a highball glass. Fill up with soda water, and serve. NOTE: Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

name: Autumnal Equinox
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Avalanche
instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

name: Avalon
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

name: Aviation
instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar, if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino, and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass. The strict recipe does not have any sugar, but I like to add a little.

name: Avocado Daiquiri
instructions: Crush ice in blender. Add rum, lime juice, and 1/4 medium avocado in blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed and smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Avocado Milkshake
instructions: Blend on medium for 3 to 5 minutes.

name: Axe Murderer
instructions: Mix like a long island iced tea. Very strong.

name: Aztec Gold
instructions: Ice a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigourously for 12- 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel on the rim. Look for the star shaped film on the surface of the drink!

name: Killer Koolaid
instructions: Pour your shot of everclear into a rocks glass and fill the rest of glass with (FP) pucker.

name: Mayan Sacrafice
instructions: Pour Kahlua into a small rocks or old-fashioned glass. Add Bacardi 151 and tequila, and top with vodka. Ignite the top on fire, and allow to burn for a few seconds. Extinguish, quickly take the straw to the bottom of the glass and consume.

name: Peach Bullfrog
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Darth Vader
instructions: Pour vodka,Gin,Tequila,Triple sec and rum into a Collins glass filled with ice then top with 1/2 oz.Jaegermeister.

name: Electric Koolaid
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Dirty Silk Panties
instructions: Pour vodka & Peach Schnapps into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a large shot glass and top with 2 drops Grenadine.

name: Firestorm
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Firery Kiss
instructions: Coat rim of shot glass with Honey then por Red Cinnamon Schnapps(HOT DAMN)

name: Jawbreaker aka Fireball
instructions: Pour Red Cinnamon Schnapps into a shot glass then add Tabasco Sauce.

name: Foxy Lady
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: French Tickler
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: B&B
instructions: Float brandy on top of benedictine in a cordial glass without mixing and serve.

name: B-53
instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glass in that order. Better than B-52

name: Baby Aspirin
instructions: Pour equal parts into cup, mix and pour into shot glass.

name: Baby Doll
instructions: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

name: Baby Eskimo
instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

name: Bacardi Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bacardi Gold & Cola
instructions: Fill a tall glass completely with ice cubes. Mix the ingredients into the glass and serve with a slice of lemon put on the glass. It is a very simple drink, but never the less it is very delicious - especially in the summertime.

name: Bacardi Stinger
instructions: Add Amaretto and rum, fill with coke, and stir. Consume slowly, this drink packs a punch.

name: Bacci Ball
instructions: Serve with ice and stir.

name: Back Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients over ice.

name: Backdraft
instructions: Pour equal amounts into Brandy Snifter and light. Place hands over top of glass to form airtight seal that extinguishes flame. Slide straw between fingers keeping seal as tight as possible. Drink beverage through straw. Remove straw after drink is finished. Put glass to nose and remove hand to allow burnt fumes to be inhaled through nose. Definitely a one-a-nighter.

name: Backseat Boogie
instructions: Pour Gin and Vodka over ice, followed by the cranberry juice and then the ginger ale.

name: Bad Habit
instructions: Combine in a shot glass, vodka first.

name: Baduizm
instructions: Shake with ice strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Bahama Mama #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.

name: Bahama Mama Sunrise
instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Bahama Mama
instructions: Combine all ingredients and pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Decorate with a strawberry or cherry and serve.

name: Bahama Todd
instructions: Add light rum, dark rum, spiced rum, and malibu rum to an ice-filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top, and serve.

name: Bairn
instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Strain into an old-fashioned glass on the rocks.

name: Bakkus
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well, pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.

name: Bali Dream
instructions: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

name: Ball and Chain
instructions: In shot glass, mix 1 part Gold with 1 part Rump, add a splash of Jager over the top. Manly shot with a tasty surprise.

name: Ball Hooter
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short, cold glass of beer.

name: Ball of Fun
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl and stir. "Drink the fuck up, get fucked up, and break the ball of fun." (BSU)

name: Balmoral
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Baltic Murder Mystery
instructions: Pour vodka and creme de cassis in cocktail glass and fill with 7-up. If it is too sweet, try soda water. A slice of lemon compliments the drink quite nicely.

name: Baltimore Bracer
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Baltimore Eggnog
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Bambus
instructions: Pour ingredients into a red wine glass and serve.

name: Banana Boat
instructions: Place a banana into a 12-oz glass, and add cracked ice. Combine the other ingredients in another glass and pour over the ice. Add the pineapple slice and enjoy.

name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
instructions: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

name: 4th of July
instructions: Layer in order given.Pour into a shot glass.

name: Banana Colada
instructions: Blend 4 first ingredients with 1/2 cut cracked ice at high speed in 15-25 seconds. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice.

name: Banana Colada #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender except for the ice and blend. Then add ice until the drink begins to thicken then serve.

name: Banana Cow
instructions: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Banana Cream Pie #2
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Banana Cream Pie
instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice then strain.

name: Banana Dream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Much better if mixed with a blender, but a stir stick will do.

name: Banana Jabs
instructions: Pour banana liqueur into a highball glass over ice. Add malibu rum, top with mountain dew, and serve.

name: Banana Milk Shake
instructions: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

name: Banana Punch #2
instructions: Boil water and sugar for 5 minutes. Cool and add the remaining ingredients except ginger ale. Freeze. Remove from freezer 2 to 3 hours before serving. Mix with ginger ale. Float assorted fruit in punch bowl. Vodka could also be added.

name: Banana Rum Cream
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Russian
instructions: Fill Cocktail glass with ice. Shake Stoli Vanil, Creme de Banane, and half & half. Pour over ice.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake
instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake #2
instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Banana Sunrise
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice, shake, and strain into a highball glass.

name: Bananaball
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Substitute Orange juice for some Pineapple juice for a different taste.

name: Bananas and Cream
instructions: Stir until ingredients are mixed well.

name: Banderas
instructions: Align the shot glasses in the following order: Tomato (red), Tequila (white) and Lemon (green), resembling the Mexican Flag. Quickly gulp one after another: Tomato, Tequila and finally finish with the Lemon.

name: Bankers Doom
instructions: Put the spirits in together then add the soda water. Stir.

name: Bannister
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banshee Berry
instructions: Pour each of the three ingredients into a shot glass. Stir.

name: Banshee
instructions: Combine ingredients w/ crushed ice in a mixing glass, then shake & strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banshe
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a rocks glass. Lightly stir, and serve.

name: Barbarian
instructions: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

name: Big Red Hooter
instructions: Pour Tequila and Amaretto over ice into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Cinnamon Rose
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Slippery Virgin
instructions: Pour into a stainless steel shaker over ice,shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled steemed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Caribbean Breeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve!

name: Silver Spider
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Barbary Coast
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Barbie Shot
instructions: In shaker tin with ice, mix and shake all ingredients.

name: Bacardi Volcano
instructions: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass, then pour in cola and bacardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!

name: Barney on Acid
instructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Baron Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon wedge and serve.

name: Barracuda
instructions: Put the liquor in the shot glass equally.

name: Barrier Breaker
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Barrier Reef
instructions: Blend ingredients together in a blender. Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Bart Simpson
instructions: Chill and serve in large shot glass.

name: The Bartman
instructions: Add rum and Mountain Dew to glass. Then add enough Maui to make the drink bright green.

name: Barton Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Baseball Pleasure
instructions: Begin by making a standard Screwdriver (OJ and vodka). Add the whiskey and the amaretto, mix and serve.

name: Basic Bill
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Baso
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass, garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Bastardized Screwdriver
instructions: Ice, then rum, then orange juice. Mix.

name: Batida Abacaxi
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Batida de Coco
instructions: Blend well and add crushed ice.

name: Batida Mango
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Batida Morango
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well, pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Battering Ram
instructions: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass, fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

name: Bavarian Alps
instructions: Shake together all ingredients and serve in a frosted glass.

name: Bavorak
instructions: Fill glass with tonic, pour Fernet over spoon and add a straw.

name: Bayou Backwater
instructions: Pour southern comfort and lemonade into a 12 oz glass. Stir. Add ice if desired.

name: Bay Breeze
instructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.

name: Bayou Juice
instructions: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice. Chill, shake and strain!

name: Baywatch
instructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Be Sweet
instructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale.

name: Beach Bum
instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

name: Beach Sunday
instructions: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice, and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

name: Beachcomber
instructions: Add pineapple juice, orange juice, Smirnoff No.21 Vodka, Captain Morgan Parrot Bay Coconut Rum. Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Beadlestone Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beakers Blue
instructions: Add ice cubes, stir, and garnish with cherry.

name: Beam Me Up
instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add Jim Beam Bourbon and Amaretto. Then add Coca-Cola and stir.

name: Beam Scream
instructions: Mix shots in 3-4 oz glass, stir, then drain it.

name: Beautiful
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Beauty Spot Cocktail
instructions: Pour a dash of grenadine into a cocktail glass. Shake remaining ingredients with ice, strain into glass over grenadine, and serve.

name: Bee Stinger
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beelzebub
instructions: Usually you mix the Cointreau with the hot chili sauce before you start to mix the drink. It needs to mix well. Then you pour the right amount into a shot glass, and add the vodka.(50/50)(The amount of chili sauce can be altered to find the mix that will grow hair on your chest)

name: Beer Breezer
instructions: Add freezer chilled vodka to frosted glass, add tabasco and celery salt, top up with very cold very strong lager.

name: Beer Top
instructions: Fill glass with Beer and top it off with some 7-up. You can add more or less 7-up to suit your taste. If you make it 50/50 it is known as a Shandy. Great on a hot Summer day or the night after a lot of drinking.

name: Beeraquirilla
instructions: Pour into a blender in this order: ice - beer - tequila - rum - daquari mix - margarita mix. Blend until frothy, then pour.

name: Beetlejuice
instructions: In a tall mixing glass with ice pour the vodka on the bottom. Then fill the glass 3/4 full with sour mix. Pour in the rest of the ingredients one at a time. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry.

name: Ampiainen
instructions: Add couple of ice cubes to a highball glass. Measure vodka and banana liqueur. Fill with ginger ale, and stirr couple of times. Garnish with a red cherry. Add a straw and serve.

name: Belgian Blue
instructions: Pour all ingredients into the glass and stir.

name: Belgian Brownie
instructions: Pour the gin, cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

name: Buttery Nipple
instructions: Pour buttershots into a chilled shot glass. Carefully layer or float the irish cream on top, and serve.

name: Time of the month
instructions: Mix the alcohol in a mixing glass with ice. Fill a clear glass 1/4 full with the mixture, add 2 parts orange juice, 1 part pineapple juice, and pour 2 count of grenadine to finish. DO NOT MIX ONCE GRENADINE IS ADDED!!! It should settle out on the bottom. Serve cold :-)

name: Heavy Flow
instructions: Combine and mix vodka, schnapps and gin over ice in a tall glass. Pour and add equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Add 2 counts of grenadine and mix.

name: Italian Valium
instructions: Mix thoroughly.

name: IAS-Special
instructions: mix aquavit and banana liqueur insert dash with lime fill up with 7-up Served with ice cubes strawberry

name: Gorilla Fart
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a shot glass and shoot!

name: Watermelon
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Watermelon #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Purple Hooter
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Strain into a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Black Pearls
instructions: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice, shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Cable Car
instructions: Combine everything in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Add vodka and frangelico to a shaker with ice. Shake. Garnish with a sugar-coated lemon. Shoot the drink, like you would tequila.

name: Sex with an Alligator
instructions: Add sweet and sour & Midori to a shaker w/ice, shake and strain. Layer in razzberry liqueur and jager. Razzberry should go to the bottom and jager should float on top. Works best in Martini glass.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked
instructions: Add liqueurs in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Add 1/2 oz lime juice. Fill with orange juice and float the grenadine.

name: Cucaracha
instructions: Place equal measures of tequila and kahlua in a glass with ice, stir, and serve.

name: Grape Bubbolicious
instructions: Pour the Skyy Vodka, Chamborde, Grape Pucker and Soda with a splash of cream into a shaker full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into sugar rimmed collins glass.

name: Midori Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients. Best served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Malibu Sunrise
instructions: Pour malibu rum in a highball glass, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side. (by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly) The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Enjoy!

name: Complete Mess
instructions: Place an equal amount of Smirnoff Ice into three seperate half-pint glasses (from a full bottle of Smirnoff Ice). Add both half a shot of cointreau and half a shot of cassique to each. Mix the ingredients. Fill with coke and add ice. Stir well. Serves 3.

name: The Real Slippery Nipple
instructions: Pour the buttershots and carolanns into a shot glass. (let them mix) Add grenadine to form a perfect nipple in the bottom of the shot glass. Take as shooter, lick nipple from bottom of glass.

name: The Bathroom Floor
instructions: add ingredients to a 16 oz draft glass, allow to mix, then chug, and enjoy the bathroom floor.

name: The Maxim
instructions: Mix all ingredients except cranberry juice and sprite in a shaker of ice. Add cranberry juice slowly till you reach desired gray color. Shake, top off wiht a splash of sprite. Garnish with a lemon peel. Enjoy

name: Bee Bite
instructions: Layer: Kahlua, Banana Liquer and then Vodka

name: Spanish Coffee
instructions: Build the ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream, and garnish with a cherry.

name: Egg Nog
instructions: Beat yolks until light in color. Slowly add bourbon, cognac, while beating at slow speed. Chill 3 hrs. Add salt to whites, beat to peaks. Whip s cream until stiff. Fold whipped cream into yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. Serve with nutmeg sprinkled on top. For thinner mixture add 1 or 2 cups of milk. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl.

name: Egg Nog #2
instructions: Separate 6 eggs. Beat yolks well. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Clean/degrease beaters and bowl. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Fold in yolks to whites. Gently stir in 1 pt heavy cream, 1 pt milk, 1 pt bourbon, and 1 oz rum. Serve as is or well chilled. Double recipe to fill a punch bowl.

name: Egg Nog #3
instructions: Separate eggs and refrigerate the whites. Beat ylks until light in color. Gradually beat in sugar, then slowly beat in 1 cup of rum. Let stand covered for atleast 1 hr. Add rest of liquor, cream, and peack brandy, beating constantly. Refrigerate, covered, for 3 hours. Beat egg whites until stiff, fold in. Serve sprinkled with nutmeg. Serve in a punch bowl or another medium sized bowl.

name: Egg Nog #4
instructions: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

name: Egg Nog #5
instructions: In an electric mixer, beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac, while beating at a slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff, or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream intothe yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve, sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve in punch bowl. If desired, add one or two cups of milk to the yolk mixture for a thinner eggnog.

name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
instructions: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

name: Egg Nog - Healthy
instructions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

name: Eggnog - Spiked
instructions: Separate the eggs. In an electric mixer, beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac, while beating at slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff, or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream into the yolk mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve, sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Egg Nog - Williamsburg
instructions: Separate the eggs (yolk and white) Set the white aside. Mix yolks well, gradually adding the cream, milk, and sugar. Get back to the egg white - WHIP IT (whip it good!) until "soft peaks" form. Fold the white into the rest. Gradually add the alcohol. Either add nutmeg right away, or sprinkle on top later. AGE for at least 2 hours in refridgerator, uncovered.

name: Eggnog - Kentucky Style
instructions: Separate eggs. Beat yolks, add sugar. Add bourbon slowly while beating. Beat egg whites until stiff. Fold whites into egg yolk mixture, then fold whipped cream into mixture. Refrigerate for more than 4 days. Stir frequently to avoid separation. Color will change to a pale Serve w/nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Rum Eggnog
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sherry Eggnog
instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Whiskey Eggnog
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinke nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer
instructions: Mix the light rum, lemon juice, and grenadine. Add the ice cubes and fill to your own taste with Cranberry juice. Add a wedge of lemon on your glass and voila! Enjoy!

name: Cherry Vodka Sour
instructions: Place ice in a cocktail glass. Fill 1/2 the glass with Vodka and the rest of the glass (leaving 3 cm at the top) with sour mix. Add a tablespoon of Grenadine per 8 oz. glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry!

name: Royal Fuck
instructions: Pour just a tad of Crown (depending on how much you can handle) into a shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with Apple Pucker.

name: Hard Root Beer
instructions: Combine Captain Morgan spiced rum with IBC Root Beer over ice in a collins or tall glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Belize Rum Punch
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine, stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

name: Belle Melon
instructions: Shake and pour into cocktail glass.

name: Bellini #2
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Bellini Martini
instructions: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice.

name: Bend Me Over
instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.

name: Bengal
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bennett Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bentley
instructions: Stir apple brandy and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Berlin Martini
instructions: Take a shaker filled with ice. Add 2 oz smirnoff vodka, 3 dashes of schnapps, a wee splash of black zambuca and shake well, keeping your feet firmly planted, posture perfect. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry.

name: Bermuda Highball
instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bermuda Rose
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bernardete
instructions: The Bernardete is very sweet, lots of fun and yet very easy to mix. Just put 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass and cover with the Peach Liqueur. Then fill up the glass to the top with Peach Juice. Both ingredients should have been in the fridge before serving.

name: Bernardo
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Berry Me In The Sand
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Berry-Berry
instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Berrynice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry on the glass, and with another summer berry held on with a toothpick.

name: The Berserker
instructions: Pour shot of Amaretto into glass and fill with pineapple juice. Mixing is optional.

name: Betsy Clear
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Stir. Garnish with an orange wedge. Enjoy!

name: Betsy Ross
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Better Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix ingredients together, then freeze drink until slushy (usually 2 hours). Serve in highball glass, and enjoy!

name: The Betty Ford
instructions: Add grenadine (based on desired sweetness), followed by absolut. Add ice and then sprite (her preferred mixing).

name: Betty Paige
instructions: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

name: B.F.D.
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add vodka, triple sec, & Everclear. Top off with grapefruit juice.

name: The Bianca Pop
instructions: Pour coconut rum first then add amaretto.

name: Bible Belt
instructions: Mix all ingredients, pour over ice, and serve.

name: Biffy Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Big Apple
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe, stir, and serve.

name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
instructions: Sling Malibu, RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange, pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

name: The Big Banana
instructions: Over ice in a 20 oz glass; pour booze in first and top with pineapple juice, giving it a two layered look with the brown amaretto on bottom. Add two straws, two cherries and serve.

name: Big Booty Shake
instructions: Blend.

name: Big Brothers
instructions: Combine ingredients on-the-rocks (over ice cubes) in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Big Bull
instructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

name: Big Daddy
instructions: Pour over ice & stir.

name: Big Dumb Russian
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

name: Peach Daiquiri
instructions: Combine peach, lime juice, sugar and rum in a blender; puree until smooth. Almost fill a large wine glass with crushed ice. Pour peach mixture over, garnish with a mint sprig and serve immediately.

name: Classic Peach Daiquiri
instructions: Combine in blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a large cocktail glass. Optional: add 1/4 canned peach with juice.

name: Frozen Peach Daiquiri
instructions: Mix with shaved ice in blender; serve in wine glass. Variations: Substitute several large, ripe strawberries for the peach.

name: Peach Daiquiri #2
instructions: Combine the peaches, lime juice, rum, schnapps, brandy, vanilla, and sugar in the blender until smooth. Slowly add the ice with the blender running and process until smooth. Serve in chilled cocktail glasses.

name: Heart Attack
instructions: Pour over Ice and serve. Your heart will race.

name: Big Red
instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

name: Big Stick
instructions: Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass. Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle.

name: Big Time
instructions: Mix in a shot glass and enjoy.

name: Big Unit
instructions: With tequila already in glass, pour Blue Curacao down the side so that it underlays the tequila. Do not mix!

name: The Big-V
instructions: Try to layer in shot glass.

name: Bigger Better Blue Lagoon
instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

name: Bijou Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Bikini Cocktail
instructions: Shake rum, vodka, milk, sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Billy Taylor
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Bionic Beaver
instructions: Put a little crushed ice in the bottom of the pitcher, then the beer, and then the shots. Then top off the pitcher with equal amounts of Orange Juice and 7-Up. Stir.

name: The Bionic Drink
instructions: First pour the Vodka then fill up with the Grapefruit soda or juice. Then add the lemon juice.

name: Bird of Paradise
instructions: Combine all ingredients, stir, and serve.

name: Bishop Cocktail
instructions: Shake juice of lemon, juice of orange, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes, fill with burgundy, and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Bisp
instructions: Let sugar, water and spices simmer for two hours. Strain. Add wine and alcohol. Serve.

name: Bitch Slap
instructions: Mix vodka, 7-up, gin, everclear and rum together over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, and serve.

name: Bitch-On-Wheels
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bitches Tit
instructions: Pour the chamborde into a shaker, add cream or milk and shake well. Pour into an Irish Cream mug filled with ice. Enjoy!

name: Bite of the Iguana
instructions: Mix ingredients and shake. Strain and pour into shot glass. Share with a friend.

name: Bittersweet With A Twist
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

name: Bjorns Moscow Mule
