instructions: Pour lemon juice and vodka into a collins glass. Mix together, fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Black & Blue Berries
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Black & Tan
instructions: Fill stien half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

name: Black and Blue #2
instructions: Gently shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Black and Blue
instructions: Layer in order.

name: Black and Brown
instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness. I prefer Henrys for the rootbeer (cold) and the Guinness warm and flat. I have used other beers and for me stouter is better. Porter works. You may vary the 50/50 proportions to taste. One of the most charming traits of this drink is the disgusted looks you get when you order it.

name: Black and White
instructions: Stir the ingredients with and and pour into a well-chilled cocktail glass.

name: Black Baltimore
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Cactus
instructions: Pour Tequila and blackberry brandy together. Add club soda. Drink like a shooter.

name: Black Christmas
instructions: Mix black sambuca into a glass filled with 6 ounces of eggnog. Stir, and serve.

name: Black Cow #2
instructions: Pour over ice. Stir lightly. Tastes like the treat known as a Black Cow, which is vanilla ice cream and root beer.

name: Black Cow #3
instructions: Pour Coke into glass of milk.

name: Black Cow
instructions: Pour root beer over ice cream and chocolate syrup in a large tumbler glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw and a long spoon.

name: The Black Death
instructions: Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!

name: Black Devil
instructions: Stir rum and vermouth with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the black olive and serve.

name: Black Dragon
instructions: First add the mint schnapps, then add the kahlua and finally add the scotch. If done correctly you should have three different layers.

name: Black Feather
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an Orange Twist.

name: Black Fog
instructions: Pour the Chambord in to a mug of Guinness. Swirl slightly to mix.

name: Black Forest Shake
instructions: Blend all ingredients; chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk with ice cubes very well in a blender. Pour into an attractive low glass, and serve.

name: Black Forest
instructions: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater, then add a cherry.

name: Black Fruit Tree
instructions: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

name: Black Gold
instructions: Pour both ingredients in shot glass and enjoy!

name: Black Hawk
instructions: Stir blended whiskey and sloe gin with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Black Hole
instructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, add Sambuca and fill with soda.

name: Black Irish
instructions: Stir ingredients and let sit for one minute.

name: Black Magic
instructions: Mix ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Black Maria
instructions: Combine and stir all ingredients in a brandy snifter. Add cracked ice and serve.

name: Black Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Black Martini #2
instructions: Combine in shaker. Shake vigorously. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Black Monday
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Orchid
instructions: Shake and serve. You should not use Meyers Dark Rum for this one.

name: Black Orgasm
instructions: Just pour, stir, and enjoy.

name: Black Pagoda
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black River Boogie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a glass and mix well.

name: Black Russian #2
instructions: Pour Stoli, Kahlua into a highball glass over ice. Top with Coke and serve.

name: Black Russian #3
instructions: Stir briefly or until spoon disintegrates.

name: Black Russian
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Black Samurai
instructions: Add the one oz. of Sake to a shot glass, followed by the 1/2 oz. of Soy Sauce...Let settle for 30sec...

name: Black Stripe Cold
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a mixing glass and stir well to dissolve the honey and molasses. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Black Swedish Virgin
instructions: Mix on the rocks.

name: Black Tartan
instructions: Straight: Float all ingredients. -- On the Rocks: Shake w/ice and strain over ice.

name: Black Tooth
instructions: Fill a shot glass with a shot of crown royal. Add just enough Coca-Cola to give the shot a black appearance.

name: Black Unicorn
instructions: Pour in kahlua, then butterscotch schnapps. Layer Irish cream on top.

name: Black Velvet
instructions: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Add champagne carefully, so it does not mix with stout, and serve.

name: Black Watch
instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Stir well - strain into a highball glass.

name: Black Wolf
instructions: Add chartreuse first and then sambuca. Top with tabasco.

name: Black-Eyed Susan
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Just before serving combine in a punch bowl. Unmold ice ring and float in bowl. Serve in tall glasses. Makes 10 large servings.

name: Blackjack
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Blackjack #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blackjack Margarita
instructions: Fill a large margarita glass with ice. Add with tequila, triple sec, and chambord. Add the lime juice or sour mix. Shake, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Blackthorn
instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Blackula
instructions: Pour Blavod Vodka in hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Add jalepeno pickle for spicy taste.

name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
instructions: Shake Irish whiskey, anis, triple sec, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the olive, and serve.

name: Blavod Martini
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into martini glass. Add cherry.

name: Bleacher Creature
instructions: Pour butterscotch over rum. Do not stir.

name: Bleeding Snatch
instructions: Add ingredients together in highball glass stir with cinnamon stick, and enjoy your very own bleeding snatch.

name: Bleeding Surgeon
instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

name: Blimey
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blinder
instructions: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

name: Blindside
instructions: Pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a large glass. Add vodka, and serve.

name: Blister
instructions: Shake and strain into glass.

name: Blitz
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain or with ice.

name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Block and Fall
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blonde Bombshell
instructions: Add ice, rum, and frozen lemonade concentrate to a blender. Blend at high speed. Pour into a margarita glass.

name: Blonde Moment
instructions: Mix over Ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Blonde Ron
instructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

name: Blonde Smoothie
instructions: Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass, but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny, or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.

name: Blood Clot
instructions: Drop shot glass of s.c. into lowball glass mixed with 7-UP and grenadine. Slam it!!!

name: Blood Clot #2
instructions: Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon, drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy, throw the shot back, place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!

name: Bloodhound Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except strawberries) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the 3 crushed strawberries and serve.

name: Bloody Bull
instructions: Pour vodka, tomato juice, and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Caesar
instructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.

name: Bloody Chicken
instructions: Pour Wild Turkey into shot glass. Fill the rest up with the Tequila. Finally, add the drop of Tabasco Sauce. Make sure you have a chaser for this one.

name: Bloody Coochie
instructions: Fill a glass half full of ice. Pour in the ingredients in order. Stir or shake. Serve.

name: Bloody Maria
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Mary Jolly Style
instructions: Add together in an old-fashioned glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge, a chunk of cheese and an olive.

name: Bloody O.J.
instructions: Pour ingredients over two crushed ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and decorate with a bloody glove if available.

name: Bloody Pearl Harbor
instructions: Stir well with ice. Adding a few drops of hot sauce for flavor is optional.

name: Bloody Smurf
instructions: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

name: Bloody Sun
instructions: Add gin, orange liqueur and cointreau to a shaker. Fill with orange juice, and shake well. Pour into a glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: B.L.T.
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add bacardi limon. Fill with iced tea. Add lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Blue Balls
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Chill with ice and strain into a shooter glass!

name: Blue Banana
instructions: Pour creme de banana in a glass. Pour blue curacao on top of it creating two layers. Pound it.

name: Blue Bay
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Blue Blazer #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour in Old-fashioned glasses with a spoon in it (to prevent the glass from breaking if the drink is too hot).

name: Blue Blazer
instructions: Boil water and whisky in seperate glasses, ignite whisky, then slowly mix the whisky and water 4-6 times.

name: Blue Bohemian
instructions: Shake ingredients, garnish with an orange twist and a cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Chili
instructions: Shake the first 5 ingredients in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail class. Add a dash of sprite. Garnish with cherry and lemon reel.

name: Blue Cosmopolitan
instructions: Frost the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Stir absolut citron, blue curacao, grapefruit juice, and sugar syrup in a mixing glass with ice to prevent cloudiness. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Blue Cowboy
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blue Devil Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Diamond
instructions: Pour 3/4 shots of each into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Blue Dog
instructions: Combine both while cold.

name: Blue Edisonian
instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blue Ed
instructions: Fill 16oz glass with Ice. Add liquor. Fill with sour.

name: Blue Eye
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and build ordinary with vodka, Battery, Sweet & Sour and Blue curacao at the end.

name: Blue Fox Trot
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Blue Hawaiian
instructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Blue Heaven
instructions: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto, rum, and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Blue Ice Mountain
instructions: Combine the first three ingredient into a high-ball glass. Stir well. Top with club soda.

name: Blue Iguana
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a frozen mug.

name: Blue In The Face
instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add liquors. Add sugar and tonic to taste. Stir.

name: Blue Kamikaze
instructions: Combine the Vodka, Blue Curacao, and Lime Juice in a glass with ice. Shake well, then pour through a strainer into a normal glass with ice in it. Makes 1 drink.

name: Blue Kisok
instructions: Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.

name: Blue Knickers
instructions: Shake the Vodka, Blue Curacao, Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

name: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Lemonade
instructions: Mix into punch bowl and make sure that the koolaid is already pre measurable with sugar already added. Be careful, hard to taste alcohol so intoxication sets in quickly!

name: Blue Light Special
instructions: Shake.

name: Blue Margarita
instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Blue Marlin
instructions: Build ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Blue Meanie
instructions: Combine Blue Curacao, Vodka and Sour mix in a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a shot glass. Could also be made on the rocks.

name: Blue Monkey
instructions: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

name: Blue Moon
instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Blue Motorcycle #2
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add the ingredients, shake and serve.

name: Blue Motorcycle
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Fill with sour mix and add a splash of 7-Up.

name: Blue Mountain
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Blue Nut
instructions: Pour into a shaker with ice and shake and strain.

name: Blue Peach
instructions: Mix the two in shaker with ice. Shake. Pour in shot glass.

name: Blue Screw
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour Mandrin and Blue in, then fill it with OJ. Simple.

name: Blue Shark
instructions: Combine vodka and rum in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Add several dashes of blue curacao, and shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Blue Skies
instructions: Simply follow the order above, pouring directly into the glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the glass.

name: Blue Slammer
instructions: Put drop of lemon in first, then add Blue Curacao, and Sambuca. Then slowly add vodka. Sit down, shoot back, and enjoy!

name: Blue Smurf Piss
instructions: Pour as listed. Strain through Ice.

name: Blue Sunset
instructions: Mix over ice and serve.

name: Blue Tahoe
instructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last.

name: Blue Thrill
instructions: Fill one shot glass with the Blue Curacao. Fill another shot glass with the lemon juice, and serve. To drink, first put lemon shot in mouth, then put curacao shot in mouth, swish around then swallow. Remember, yellow before blue!!

name: PJ
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cooler, add fruit and serve. A great party drink.

name: La Tigre
instructions: Mix into a glass and drink.

name: Midori Sour
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the midori, sour mix and sprite, give a quick stir, and add cherries.

name: Poland
instructions: Pour raspberry syrup in a shooter. Fill the rest of the shooter with Vodka very slowly, so it will not get mixed with the syrup. (It should look like a White and Red flag). Drink straight up!

name: Blue Whale
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker. Strain into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Brian Fabulous
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Tom and Jerry
instructions: To make the batter: beat egg whites stiff with electric beator. Add sugar gradually. Add cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla. Add in half of the eggs yolks, and blend until smooth. In a large mug fill with 1/2 batter, 2 shots of [60% rum and 40% brandy]. Balance with boiling hot water. Stir well and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Blue-Woo
instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

name: Blueberry Daiquiri
instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Blueberry Kami
instructions: Shake in shaker with ice. Pour the shots.

name: Blueberry Tea #2
instructions: Pour amaretto and grand marnier into a glass. Add hot tea, and serve immediately.

name: Blueberry Tea
instructions: Mix amaretto and grand marnier in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste.

name: Bluebird
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

name: Bluesberry Cooler
instructions: Fill coctail chimney glass with crushed ice, fill 3/4 full with club soda, add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.

name: Boardwalk Breeze
instructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a hurricane glass.

name: Bob Dylan
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, mix until smooth. Be careful surge is carbonated, it will foam up. Enjoy!

name: Bob Marley
instructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass.

name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bobby Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Bocci Ball
instructions: Shake amaretto and orange juice first then top with soda.

name: Body Shot
instructions: The Body Shot is a simple and fun shot ritual, designed to give a sweet & sour taste from the sugar and lemon. A similar method is to use tequila and salt instead of sugar (see Tequila Shot).

name: Bogomip
instructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

name: The Boiling Panther
instructions: Pour shots into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with dr. pepper or mountain dew, mix and serve.

name: Bold Gold Monkey
instructions: Combine all in a shaker with adequate ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Bolduc On The Beach
instructions: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

name: Bolero
instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bombay Bellini
instructions: Pour mango puree into a champagne flute (recommended) or a glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice.

name: Bombay Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Bomb
instructions: Mix over ice in a shaker cup, strain and shoot.

name: BonBon
instructions: Shake & Strain.

name: Bonecrusher
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Bonfire
instructions: Layer this drink! Grenadine first, Amaretto next, and 151 on top. Light the 151 and let it warm for about 3 seconds. Blow (lightly) to put the flame out and take the shot.

name: Bonsai Pipeline
instructions: In shoot glass add Wild Turkey and melon liqeur. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Light drink, and squeeze lime in drink. Blow out and shoot.

name: Boo Punch
instructions: Combine Orange Kool-Aid and Vodka. Add some Jagermeister and it will look and taste scary.

name: Boom Box
instructions: Add Vodka and White Wine to the coffee. The coffee must still be hot.

name: Boomerang Shot
instructions: Fill a shot glass 1/2 way with the yukon jack. top it off with the jagermeister.

name: Boomerang
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Boomer
instructions: Blend, add ice, strain.

name: Boot Blaster
instructions: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of coca-cola to dirty the drink.

name: Bootlegger Tea
instructions: Pour vodka, rum and triple sec over ice in a pint glass. Fill with equal parts of sweet and sour mix and 7-up, add grenadine, and serve.

name: Booty Juice
instructions: Fill mixing glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all ingredients. Strain into a rocks glass.

name: Bootzilla
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

name: Boozy Maria
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Bora Bora
instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Border Crossing
instructions: Pour the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Bosom Caresser
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Boston Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boston Ice Tea
instructions: Build over ice. Stir. Garnish with lemon slice and a straw.

name: Boston Sidecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boston Sour
instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Boswandeling
instructions: Just add all ingredients and add quite a lot of Angostura and try to make sure that the Angostura is mixed through the drink.

name: Bottlecap
instructions: Combine ingredients. May be served on the rocks or chilled and strained as a shot.

name: Bot Cocktail
instructions: The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. However, the really slick way is much more impressive: Add cranberry juice, lime juice, triple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

name: Bourble
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon and Branch
instructions: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Bourbon and Sprite
instructions: Pour the bourbon into a highball glass with some ice cubes. Fill glass with sprite or 7-up, and serve.

name: Poinsettia
instructions: Mix the champagne and cranberry juice, then float the Grand Marnier on top.

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.

name: Tabouzo
instructions: Chill ouzo beforehand. Pour into a shot glass, add a splash of tabasco sauce, and serve.

name: Screwdriver #2
instructions: Pour in rum and then add orange juice. Add three ice cubes and serve.

name: Hard Rootbeer
instructions: Mix desired amount of Captain Morgan (I prefer 2 shots) and one 12 oz IBC Root Beer over ice. Goes down smooth!

name: Green Monkey
instructions: Just pour a 1/3 of each bottle into a pint glass and enjoy

name: French Martini
instructions: Pour each of the above into a tall bar glass. Shake with ice, pour into a cocktail or martini glass, and serve.

name: Red Royal
instructions: Pour 3/4 oz. Crown Royal in shot glass. Add 1/4 oz. Amaretto. Serve

name: Doctor Pepper
instructions: Place 1/2 of Draft in a mug. Place 3/4 oz. Amaretto into a shot glass. Float/Layer 1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 on top of the Amaretto. Light the Bacardi as to set it on fire. Quickly drop the shot glass with Amaretto and Bacardi into the Draft Beer and shoot.

name: Sublime
instructions: Dissolve lime jello in a cup of boiling water. Add another cup (or more to taste) of tequila (for special occasions add slices of lime) and mix well. Chill for 2 hours in a freezer or 4 hours in a fridge. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Mid-Night Passion
instructions: Mix 1 packet Black Cherry jello with 1 cup boiling water. Mix until sugar dissolved. Mix 1 cup Vodka (or more to taste) and chill in freezer for 2 hours or fridge for 4..

name: Get Faced
instructions: Pour contents on ice pour into shaker give one hard shake then pour back into glass serve chilled

name: The Teddy Toolman
instructions: Pour 2 oz of vodka into glass, then add the gummi bears. Pour in orange juice and serve.

name: Woo Woo
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Red Corona
instructions: Drink your Corona a little bit past the neck. Add 1 Shot Vodka 1 Tablespoon of Grenadine 1 Slice of Lime Put your thumb over the top, flip(not shake) once to mix, enjoy.

name: Liquid Viagra
instructions: Pour red bull into a shot glass. Add a shot of jagermeister, including the shot glass, into the red bull. Shoot it down.

name: Jessica in the Snow
instructions: Mix ingredients together and serve cold.

name: Three Wise Men #2
instructions: Add in parts into a shot glass. Can also be served with ice in the shot glass.

name: Illusions
instructions: Add all ingredients and fill the rest of the shaker with Orange Juice. Add ice and shake.

name: Tequila Slammer
instructions: Lick the back of your hand, put salt on the (now) sticky back of your hand, lick the salt, down a large dose of straight tequila and then bite into the lemon.

name: Delhis Devils
instructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve on the rocks.

name: Indian Flag
instructions: First pour Creme de Menthe into a shooter glass. Secondly add the peach schnapps and at last pour in the Cognac.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and sloe gin. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Bourbon Cobbler
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with the cherry, orange and lemon slices.

name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
instructions: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with strawberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

name: Bourbon Cooler
instructions: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Bourbon County Cowboy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon Daisy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, grenadine, and sugar. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Bourbon Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Bourbon Flip
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Highball
instructions: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
instructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, half-and-half, sugar, and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bourbon Old-Fashioned
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Bourbon Sling
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bourbon Slush
instructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and put desired amount in blender for a second or put in a bowl and mix till it is semi-liquified. Serve in old-fashioned glasses.

name: Bourbon Sour
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

name: Bourbon Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, bourbon, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Bouzo
instructions: Pour in the bourbon, then pour in the ouzo and serve.

name: Boxcar
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: The Bozek
instructions: Add ingrediants in following order: ice, vodka, lime, and then pineapple. Stir vigorously.

name: Brain Candy
instructions: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

name: Brain Damage
instructions: Pour all the ingredients over an ice-cube and stir gently.

name: Brain Eraser
instructions: In a sizable shot glass pour the Schlager, then Kahlua, then Vodka. Keep liquor levels seperate. Carefully slide a straw to bottom along side of the glass. Shoot from bottom thru straw. Bombs away!

name: Brain Eraser #2
instructions: Pour ingredients in shotglass. (Try it in a frozen shotglass.)

name: Brain Eraser #3
instructions: Pour first two ingredients over ice, fill glass with club soda. Drink through straw.

name: Brain Fart
instructions: Pre-chill soda, and mix slowly with other ingredients and ice in a punch bowl.

name: Braindead
instructions: Fill the shaker half with ice cubes, and add the ingredients. Shake well. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Brainstorm
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Brainteaser
instructions: Layered Erin Cream first, then sambuca and then advocaat (should sit in middle of other two). To drink: use a straw to suck up advocaat then shoot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

name: Brandied Egg Sour
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, crack the egg and add the rest of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Brandied Madeira
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Brandy Alexander #2
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and half-and-half. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandy Alexandra
instructions: Blend all the ingredients in blender, garnished with cinnamon powder.

name: Brandy and Soda
instructions: Pour the brandy and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Brandy Blazer
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in brandy. Add the orange slice. Tilt the glass and carefully ignite the drink with a match. Stir with a long spoon until the flame is extinguished. Strain into a punch cup and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Brandy Cobbler
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Brandy Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Brandy Collins
instructions: Shake juice of lemon, brandy, and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Brandy Cooler
instructions: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Brandy Daisy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Brandy Fix
instructions: Combine juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Stir, fill with shaved ice, and add brandy. Stir again, add the lemon slice, and serve with a straw.

name: Brandy Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

name: Brandy Flip
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandy Highball
instructions: Pour brandy into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, add the twist of lemon peel, stir gently, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Brandy Manhattan
instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add Cherry juice and cherry, then bitters. Add brandy, then sweet vermouth. Add water, stir. Enjoy!

name: Brandy Milk Punch
instructions: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brandy Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Sling
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and brandy. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Brandy Smash
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the mint sprigs lightly with the sugar and club soda. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Brandy Sour
instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Brandy Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, brandy, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Brandy Toddy
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add brandy and one ice cube and stir. Add twist of lemon peel on top and serve.

name: Brandy Vermouth Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brantini
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Brass Monkey
instructions: Toss the rum and vodka together and stir gently. Pour in the orange juice, and shake well. Pour over ice in a highball or tall glass.

name: Brave Bull Shooter
instructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

name: Brave Bull
instructions: Pour tequila and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve.

name: Brazil Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Breakfast Drink
instructions: The amount of ingredients can vary depending upon the size of the punch bowl.

name: Breath Freshener
instructions: Place the mint leaf in the bottom of the glass. Add the vodka first and fill with the creme de menthe.

name: Breath Stealer
instructions: Add chartreuse and Yukon Jack to 151.

name: Breathalizer
instructions: Mix together and serve.

name: The Brett Schroeder
instructions: Shake, then add Orangina and ice cubes.

name: Brevann Springwater
instructions: Everything goes in a highball glass with ice. Pour Seven Up or Sprite on the top Garnish with lemon and some other fresh fruit. Drink with a straw.

name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch
instructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonade, sugar, and water. Add booze and ice cubes and let cool. Add champagne and ginger ale before serving. Adjust punch to party mood with more vodka.

name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch #2
instructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add ice cubes and let cool. Add ginger ale before serving.

name: Brimstone
instructions: Shake with cracked ice.

name: Brittle Fracture
instructions: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

name: Broken Spur Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Broken Down Golf Cart #2
instructions: Place amaretto, melon liqueur, cranberry juice, and ice in a shaker. Then strain into a shot glass.

name: Broken Down Golf Cart
instructions: Shake and strain through ice.

name: Bronx Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add orange slice and serve.

name: Bronx Golden Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the orange slice and serve.

name: Bronx Silver Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Bronx Terrace Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Brooklyn Zoo
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix rum vodka, and gin. Add splash of pinepple juice, Razzmatazz, and sour mix. Drinker or assistant pours beer.

name: Brown Bomber
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brown Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brown Cow #2
instructions: Fill the glass with the amount of Tia Maria you would like and put an equal amount, or a little more, of milk. Add two ice cubes and down.

name: Brown Cow From Hell
instructions: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled.

name: Brown Cow
instructions: In a champagne flute with ice, add kahlua and top with milk. Stir. Garnish stirrer with nutmeg.

name: Brown Hen
instructions: Fill glass with ice, then vodka, then bitters. Stir.

name: Brown Pelican
instructions: Combine in a mixing glass, stir gently and pour over ice cubes in a highball glass.

name: Bruised Heart
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass.

name: Bruja Mexicana
instructions: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

name: Brush Fire
instructions: Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.

name: Brutal Hammer
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and slam.

name: Bubble Gum
instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

name: Buccaneer
instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently.

name: Buck Jones
instructions: Pour rum, sherry, and juice of lime in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Buddy
instructions: Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.

name: Bull Rider
instructions: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

name: Bullshot #2
instructions: Dissolve boullion cube in water. Mix in vodka and Tabasco. Garnish with celery.

name: Bullshot #3
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Bulldog Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bulldog Highball
instructions: Pour gin and juice of orange into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Bullfrog
instructions: Shake well in a closed container, pour into an open container and stir well.

name: Bullshot #4
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker or pitcher with several ice cubes and stir. Strain into glass straight up or on the rocks and garnish with a stick of celery.

name: Bullvodka
instructions: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

name: Bumble Bee #2
instructions: Both liquors should be chilled. Pour the 1 oz of Jagermeister into glass. Add 1 oz of Barenjager, it will float on top. Enjoy!

name: Bumble Bee #3
instructions: The crushed ice should be added first, followed by the honey. Stir the mixture as you pour the gin on top, which should be relatively chilled. Add the squirts of lemon to your liking, and place a wedge over the rim, if desired.

name: Bumbo
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Burgundy Bishop
instructions: Shake rum, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine and stir. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Buried Under An Avalanche
instructions: In shot glass, drop in one small ice cube. Pour in Ouzo and then Rumple Minze.

name: Burning Nazi
instructions: Keep bottles chilled or mix over ice and strain into shot glass.

name: Burning Sun
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass, stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

name: Burning Worm
instructions: Put into seperate shot glasses. Shoot the mezcal first then chase with goldschlager.

name: Burnso Tropical
instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

name: Burnt Embers
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Burn Cocktail
instructions: Fill a shot glass half full with vodka, and add several drops of tabasco sauce. Add a half dash of salt and pepper, stir, and shoot.

name: Bushranger
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Dubonnet, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bushranger #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bushwacker
instructions: Combine ingredients with two cups of ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and serve up in two 12 oz cups.

name: Bushwacker #3
instructions: Put all contents in a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half.

name: Butcherblock
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a large glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate.

name: Butt Naked Kiwi
instructions: Fill a resealable 32. oz container with one can of Mountain Dew. Add the 2 shots of everclear then the second can of Mountain Dew. Add the sprees and shake until they turn white. Strain the mixture into the serving pitcher. Keep the sprees and eat them later.

name: Buttafuoco
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir, then add cherry.

name: Butter Nut Scotch
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Butterballs
instructions: Use a double shot glass. Pour the Butterscotch Schnapps first, then the coffee liqueur.

name: Buttmeister
instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing glass, swirl and strain into shot glass.

name: Button Hook Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Buttsex
instructions: Start with the coffee, preferably espresso. Add in the vodka, triple sec and lemon juice (lime juice can be used instead) and stir. Top with the whipped cream.

name: Buzz Inducer
instructions: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

name: Buzz Lightyear
instructions: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

name: Buzzby
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with ice, and stir. Add a slice of lime if desired, and serve.

name: The BV
instructions: Add ice first, then vodka, OJ and tomato juice. Give a light stir. Substitute Bloody Mary Mix for Tomato Juice for a spicier taste.

name: By The Pool
instructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Bye Bye Bahamas
instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: The Sabino Special
instructions: Pour the Midori, Malibu, Schnapps, and orange juice into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and add the grenadine. Garnish with orange wedges and cherries as seen fit.

name: Sabra
instructions: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: Sacrilicious
instructions: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

name: Safe Sex on the Beach
instructions: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Sailor Mercury
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Sailor Venus
instructions: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

name: Saint Clemence
instructions: Mix with ice, serve. "Oranges and lemons say the bells of St Clemence"

name: The Saint Lawrence
instructions: Stir, pour into plastic cup and chug.

name: Saint Paul
instructions: Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass. Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

name: Saketini
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

name: Salisbury Special
instructions: Pour coke into an old-fashioned glass, then orange juice, then vodka. Stir it about a bit, then add cordial. Enjoy.

name: Salty Balls
instructions: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice, pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice, and float midori melon liqueur on top.

name: Salty Chihuahua
instructions: Pour tequila over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with grapefruit juice and add a dash of salt.

name: Salty Dog (Vodka)
instructions: In a shaker, add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and grapefruit juice. Stir and serve over ice in salt-rimmed glass.

name: Salty Dog
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Sammy Slammer
instructions: Combine and drink.

name: Sammy Special
instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. (More ice = more froth.) Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glass and enjoy.

name: San Diego Seabreeze
instructions: Build all ingredients in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve.

name: San Diego Silver Bullet
instructions: Shake the ingredients over ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve. Down it in one.

name: San Francisco Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: San Francisco
instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

name: San Juan Cooler
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum and dry vermouth. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: San Juan Tea
instructions: Shake liquor and sour mix. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Sancho Panza
instructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

name: Sand-Grown-Un
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktial glass.

name: Sand-Martin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sandra Buys A Dog
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Sangria Liqueur
instructions: Mix all together and put in the refrigerator till cold. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste.

name: Sangria Liqueur #2
instructions: Peel the apples and cut into small cubes. Peel the oranges, take out the pips and cut them into small cubes. Warm the orange juice, the sugar and the mandarin peels until the sugar dissolves. Mix all the ingredients - except the ice and the soda. The ice and the soda add just before serving.

name: Sangria Liqueur Classic
instructions: Cut orance and half (1/2 into thin slices), and juice the other half of the orange. Cut the lemon into thin slices and combine with orange juice, wine, sugar, brandy and contreau. Chill. To serve, add ice and club soda, stir gently.

name: Sangrita
instructions: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!

name: Santa Fe
instructions: In a highball glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Santa Maria
instructions: Combine all ingredients except orange in shaker with ice. Shake gently, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Santa Monica Pier
instructions: In a tall glass with ice, pour the Alize and Triple Sec, stir and enjoy.

name: Santa Shot
instructions: Taste like a candycane layer these in the order listed to get a red green and white(clear) shot.

name: Santiago Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Santorini Sundown
instructions: Shake and strain the drink into a well chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

name: Saratoga Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Satin Angel
instructions: Add a splash of Coca-Cola to the Frangelico over Ice, and fill add the cream.

name: Satin Sheet
instructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

name: Saucy Sue Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Saurian Brandy
instructions: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

name: Sauterne
instructions: Mix the cognac and curacao several hours ahead of time. When ready to serve, pour the necessary amount of this mixture over a block of ice or ice mold in a cold punch bowl, and add thoroughly chilled champagne. Stir and serve at once. *Do not let the mixture ladle back and forth over the ice, as this will eliminate the bubbles.

name: Savannah
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sax With T.
instructions: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.

name: Saxon Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Sazerac #2
instructions: In a spare glass, mix the bourbon, the sugar syrup, and the two kinds of bitters. Make a twist of lemon peel by peeling it from a lemon with a sharp vegetable peeler. Rub firmly around the rim of a well-iced old-fashioned glass. Put the Pernod in the glass and swirl it around to coat the bottom. Add the contents of the other glass along with one ice cube. Serve.

name: Sazerac Cocktail
instructions: Chill an old-fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice, stirring to chill. In the old-fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the rye whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the lemon twist.

name: Sazerac
instructions: Pour ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat the glass; discard any excess. Place the sugar, peychaud bitters, and water into the glass and muddle with the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the bourbon over the ice cubes, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Scanex
instructions: Shake and serve.

name: Scarlet Fever
instructions: Mix together and shake, pour into a draft glass. Add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

name: Scarlett Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Schlag-n-nog
instructions: Add the egg nog and Goldschlager together in a bowl. Add nutmeg if desired.

name: Schmooze
instructions: Add Orange Juice and 7-up. Stir. Add ice.

name: Schnapp It Up
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Schnapp Pop
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add schnapps and fill with club soda. Turn over once to mix. Serve with straw.

name: Schnappster
instructions: Mix together in a large collins glass, and serve.

name: Schnider
instructions: Pour schnapps in a pint glass, top up with cider, and serve.

name: Schwartzy
instructions: Serve in a tall glass.

name: Scooby Snack #2
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

name: Scooby Snack #3
instructions: Pour all into shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into highball glass.

name: Scooley Slammer
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Triple Sec and Peachtree into glass. Add Sour mix and Sprite. Stir gently and enjoy.

name: Scooter
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Scope #2
instructions: Place ice in a tin then pour 1/2 oz. of Midori melon liqueur and 1/2 oz. of Rumple Minze. Shake and then strain into a rocks glass.

name: Scope
instructions: Put double of creme de menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to the top with ginger ale, tonic, or soda water.

name: Scorpion
instructions: Fill a 12 oz wine glass with ice, add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients, shake and pour back into glass. Garnish stirrer, straw, cherry-pineapple, parasol, and mint.

name: Scotch And Water
instructions: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Scotch Bird Flyer
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Scotch Bishop Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Scotch Cobbler
instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

name: Scotch Cooler
instructions: Pour scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Scotch Daisy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Scotch Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Scotch Flip
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Scotch Highball
instructions: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Scotch Holiday Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Scotch Mist
instructions: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.

name: Scotch Old-Fashioned
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the scotch. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Scotch Rickey
instructions: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.

name: Scotch Sour
instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Scotch Toddy
instructions: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch, honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.

name: Scottalian
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients except the Grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice if you like. Drop the Grenadine into the center and serve.

name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

name: Scotty Boy
instructions: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda.

name: Screaming Banana Banshee
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Screaming Banana
instructions: Shake or mix with a straw in a glass full of ice.

name: Screaming Blue Messiah
instructions: Build in a shot glass.

name: Screaming Blue Viking
instructions: Combine liquors in a shaker of ice and shake. Strain into shot glasses. Partakers must scream "Valhalla!!" before doing the shot. Can also be served on the rocks in a large goblet for the brave warrior.

name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey
instructions: Shake well and pour over ice, top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.

name: Screaming Dead Nazi
instructions: Pour all in shot glass, one by one. Set a flame, blow it out, and enjoy.

name: Screaming Epsilon
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.

name: Screaming Multiple Climax
instructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm On The Beach
instructions: Fill glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all liquors and speed shake. Top with club soda.

name: Screaming Nazi #2
instructions: Mix it up and serve.

name: Screaming Nazi
instructions: Add ingredents with ice and shake.

name: Screaming Purple Jesus
instructions: Mix together and serve over ice.

name: Screaming Viking
instructions: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.

name: Screw-Up
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes, add all ingredients, mix then drink.

name: Screwdriver #3
instructions: Add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pouring should do most of the stirring.

name: Screwdriver Boricua
instructions: Mix with ice.

name: Screwdriver With Color
instructions: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add orange juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua, just until it has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stir.

name: Screwdriver a la Carla
instructions: Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some ice cubes and stir. Serve well chilled.

name: Screwed Banana
instructions: Put ice in highball glass, about 1/2 full, then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

name: Screwed Driver
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with lemonade and add a dash of cranberry juice.

name: Scrumdriver
instructions: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

name: Scrumptious Coffee
instructions: Sweeten the coffee with brown sugar to taste. Mix coffee, liquor, and orange peel in a pan. Heat gently, but do not boil. Let infuse for a couple of minutes. Pour into pre-warmed heat-resistent glasses. Float whipped cream on top. Garnish with thin strip of peel of orange and nutmeg.

name: Scurvy
instructions: Pour the banana liqueur into a glass. Add vodka and last the orange juice to taste.

name: SD Special
instructions: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir. Add 5 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Sea Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

name: Seaboard
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint leaves) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

name: Seabreeze
instructions: Pour vodka over ice into highball glass. Add mixers. May be garnished with a wedge of lime.

name: Seadoo
instructions: Add the vodka to a tall glass with lots of ice.Throw in a splash or two of cranberry juice and then fill with the soda.

name: Seaside-Summerbliss
instructions: Red wine first, then the cider.

name: Seattle Smog
instructions: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

name: Seaweed
instructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

name: Secret Blue
instructions: Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.

name: Secret Place
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Seduction on the Rocks
instructions: Pour Butterscotch schnapps and orange juice into glass, then add lemon-lime soda. Add one to two ice cubes before serving.

name: Seelbach Cocktail
instructions: Add bourbon, bitters, and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute, you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

name: Seizure
instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Mix through a couple times and serve.

name: Selena Jo
instructions: Put the crushed ice in glass first then add the Captain Morgan then add the Amaretto then top off with Coke.

name: The Seminole
instructions: First pour Goldschlager into a shot glass, then add grenadine.

name: Sensation Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprigs) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprigs of mint and serve.

name: Separator
instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice, add brandy, Kahlua, and milk. Shake well, return to glass. Brandy can be substituted for Cognac.

name: September Morning
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Serena
instructions: First of all put in the mixing glass absolut vodka then strawberry vodka, dry vermouth, pineapple juice, blue curacao and lemon juice. Now shake with ice and fill up the glass.

name: Serpentine
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Seventh Heaven Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprig) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Sever St. Special
instructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

name: Sevilla Cocktail #2
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Sevilla Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Sex Appeal
instructions: Mix two rums, melon, peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

name: Sex At My House
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Shake and strain.

name: Sex in the Desert
instructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Sex in the Red Zone
instructions: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

name: Sex in the Shower
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into Champagne Flute.

name: Sex On Acid
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter

name: Sex On An Arizona Beach
instructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

name: Sex On Daytona Beach
instructions: Blend ingredients by shaking well.

name: Sex On My Face
instructions: Mix in tall glass w/ice.

name: Sex on the Beach #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients together over ice. Chill and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sex on the Beach #3
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher of ice to chill, adding just enough grenadine to color pink. Add more or less OJ and 7-up to achieve desired strength. Strain into bottle to serve as shooters or serve the whole pitcher with a number of straws for a group to slurp down at the same time!

name: Sex on the Beach #4
instructions: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.

name: Sex On The Beach #5
instructions: Pour vodka over crushed ice in a champagne saucer. Add cranberry juice, midori, chambord, and top off with pineapple juice. Stir gently and serve.

name: Sex On The Beach #6
instructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schnapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted to taste.

name: Sex on the Beach #7
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir heavily. Serve cold.

name: Sex on the Beach #8
instructions: Pour the rum into a highball glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice, and top with grenadine and sprite. Coconut rum can be substituted for malibu rum.

name: Sex on the Beach #10
instructions: Shake vigorously with some ice, strain into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #11
instructions: Pour into a glass, and serve unstirred.

name: Sex on the Beach #12
instructions: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.

name: Sex on the Beach - Jersey Style
instructions: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liqueurs in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice.

name: Sex on the Beach - Bettsy Style
instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

name: Sex on the Brain
instructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. *The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

name: Sex on the Grass
instructions: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.

name: Sex under the Boardwalk
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Sex with the Bartender
instructions: Mix rum, triple sec, lime juice, grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime, then splash irish cream down the middle.

name: Sex with the Captain
instructions: Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Sexoholic
instructions: First 5 droplets tabasco sauce in the shot glass. Make sure the inside are covered with sauce. Top it up with drambuie.

name: Sexual Harrassment
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. *Pineapple Juice is optional.

name: Sexual Trance
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain over ice cherry garnish.

name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Shady Lady
instructions: Pour melon liqueur, tequila, and grapefruit juice over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Shaft
instructions: Pour Apoerol and gin over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Fill with sparkling white wine.

name: Shag by the Shore
instructions: Build the midori and orange into the collins glass, filled with ice, then pour peach schnapps and cranberry into mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into glass so it floats above orange & midori. Float Blavod vodka on top.

name: Shake That Ass
instructions: Build in a shot glass.

name: Shakes - Party To Go
instructions: Drink the first 6oz of a fresh samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby.

name: Shalom
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Shamrock Juice
instructions: In an Hurricane Glass filled with Ice pour equal amounts of all liquors. Top off with Orange Juice. Garnish with a slice of an Orange and a couple of cherries.

name: Shamrocks
instructions: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and Orange Juice for a light green color.

name: Shamrock
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: The Shanaynay
instructions: Mix the water and rum, and add powdered lemonade mix to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Shandy
instructions: Fill a glass half full of beer (lighter beer works better). Fill the rest with Ginger Ale or 7-Up (preference).

name: Shanghai Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Shannon on the Beach
instructions: Mix the two alcohols and fill with orange and cranberry juice.

name: Shark Attack Punch
instructions: Mix in a large container like a coleman cooler.

name: Shark Attack
instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

name: Shark Bite
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the spiced rum, light rum, sour, and blue curacco. Shake the ingredients well. Strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with three drops of grenadine.

name: Shark Tank
instructions: Mix vodka and lemonade in a large glass. Drop in grenadine last, but do not stir. Best served over ice, through a straw.

name: Shazam Shooter
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake to chill. Strain out ice and pour into glass.

name: The Shearer Special
instructions: Mix fifth of a gallon of bacardi to a splash of cranberry juice.

name: The Sheedy
instructions: Add, grab glass and shoot back.

name: Shellshock
instructions: Pour clamato juice over salt, pepper and lemon. Then add beer slowly as it will fizz up.

name: Sherry Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sherry Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Shimmers
instructions: Pour the st. hallvard over ice (on the rocks) in an old-fashioned glass, then add aquavit. Add a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Shiny Nail
instructions: Stir with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Shirley Temple
instructions: Build in a highball glass. Add ginger ale over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Shit On Grass
instructions: First add half a shot of Midori Melon Liqueur, then pour Kahlua to top it off.

name: Shitface
instructions: Add rum, grenadine, and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake, strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.

name: Schlagerfloat
instructions: Put two scoops of vanilla ice-cream in a glass. Pour in a shot of Goldschlager then fill the glass with root beer. Mix with a spoon and enjoy.

name: Shocking Chocolate
instructions: Heat the hot chocolate and add the cinnamon schnapps.

name: Shogun
instructions: Mix in blender and garnish with orange slice.

name: Shoot
instructions: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Short Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients, except Coke, over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

name: Shot in the Pot
instructions: Add to shot glass and shoot.

name: Shot of Hell
instructions: Pour shot of vodka into shot glass then top off with a generous portion of Tabasco.

name: Shot of Respect
