instructions: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

name: Shot-o-Happiness
instructions: Combine 1 oz. Goldschlager, 1 oz. razmatazz, splash of pineapple juice, splash of sweet-n-sour with ice in a shaker tin. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.

name: Shotgun Lou
instructions: Mix brandy, milk and brown sugar on ice. Top with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Shrewsbury Slammer
instructions: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin, then strain into a shot glass.

name: Shriner Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Shrub
instructions: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. *Before squeezing the lemons, peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice, cover, and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle

name: Shut the Hell Up
instructions: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear, & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & shut the hell up.

name: Si Kami Ki
instructions: Mix vodka and cinnamon schnapps in cocktail glass, add carbonated water, serve with ice.

name: Siberian Dutchman
instructions: Mix ingredients, and pour over ice into highball glass.

name: Siberian Slider
instructions: Mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

name: Siberian Sunrise
instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.

name: Sicilian Kiss
instructions: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar.

name: Sid Vicious
instructions: Pour whiskey, gin, vermouth over ice and stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, add bitters and worcestershire sauce. Garnish with poppy seeds.

name: SigTau Scorpion
instructions: Mix ingredients, stir, and add ice to bring level to top of glass.

name: Silent Broadsider
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Silk Stockings
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Silver Bronx
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Silver Bullet
instructions: In a mixng glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Scotch. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass. Carnish with the lemon twist.

name: Silver Bullet #2
instructions: Pour scotch into an iced glass and coat sides. Empty scotch out pour in vodka.

name: Silver Cloud
instructions: Mix amaretto, kahlua, and milk together. Fill with ice cubes and top with whipped cream.

name: Silver Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Silver Fizz
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender half-filled with ice. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Silver King Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Silver Stallion Fizz
instructions: Shake gin and vanilla ice-cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve

name: Silverado
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Simple But Sweet
instructions: Pour vodka in rocks glass. Half fill with apricot nectar.

name: Simple Charm
instructions: Stir liquors and strain in to coctail-glass. Float cream gently on top. Garnish with cinnamon powder.

name: Simpson Bronco
instructions: Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain.

name: Simpson Solution
instructions: Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!

name: Sinfonian
instructions: In the shot glass, layer equal parts of each liquor, the Grenadine on the bottom, the Kahlua in the middle, and the Grand Marnier on top. This creates Red, Black, and Gold layers.

name: Singapore Sling #2
instructions: Combine gin, cherry brandy, pineapple juice, and grenadine into a collins glass. Stir well. Top up with club soda and garnish with the cherry.

name: Sip And Get Funky
instructions: Mix ingredients and slam it.

name: Sip And Go Naked
instructions: Mix all ingrediants together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic, but packs a wallop.

name: Sir Francis
instructions: First, pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with grenadine, shake & serve.

name: Sir Knight
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Sir Walter Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sister Starseeker
instructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Sitarski
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Sizz Snot
instructions: Pour the two measures of Schnapps into the cocktail glass. With a cocktail stick stir the liquid whilst adding the two or three dashes of Creme de Menthe. Do not mix too hard. Once the Creme de Menthe has started to be added, stop stirring. Finally, gently pour in the lemonade until the glass is topped up. Add maybe a cocktail cherry for decoration.

name: Sjarsk
instructions: Add the coffee first, then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well.

name: Skane-i-Fier
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add whiskey, Malibu and Dr. Pepper. Stir.

name: Ski Shooter
instructions: Put ice in a shaker, then the vodka, followed by the amaretto and the sweet and sour. Cover and shake like crazy. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Skid Marks
instructions: Add Chocolate syrup at bottom of shot glass. Add Kahlua and stir with a small spoon. Enjoy!

name: Skinhead Paramedic
instructions: Add all ingredients in a collins glass. Do not stir. Garnish with a lime wedge or an ear of baby corn.

name: Skinny Dipper
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Skinny Dip
instructions: In a blender throw in: 8 scoops of sherbet, 1 can of Fresca and 2 shots of Vodka. Blend until you reach desired thickness.

name: Skip And Go Naked #2
instructions: Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.

name: Skip And Go Naked
instructions: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Skittle
instructions: Add Absolut Vodka and Banana Liqueur to Collins glass. Fill glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid. Add crushed ice, stir, and serve. Kool-Aid flavor determines what flavor Skittle you get.

name: The Skunk Pussy
instructions: Add alcohol to a brandy snifter, then add ice with the 7-up.

name: Sky Blue Fallout
instructions: Mix all ingredients except 7-Up in a mixing glass. Pour into a hurricane glass and add the 7-Up. Stir lightly with a straw and serve.

name: Skydiver
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add Skyy vodka, add orange juice, preferable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Skylab Fallout
instructions: Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila, gin, vodka and your blue curacao in. Put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry.

name: Slam Dunk
instructions: Start with a rocks glass filled with ice. Add southern comfort. For the mix, add 1 can of cranberry juice with half a can of orange concentrate into a pitcher. Use this mix to fill the glass.

name: Slap Your Mama
instructions: Shake one part Orange Juice and one part Vodka together. Pour over ice and add one part Mountain Dew, then stir slightly.

name: Slaughtering the Slothman
instructions: Shake the Grand Marnier, Orange Curacao, freshly squeezed lemon juice and a dash of grenadine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sleigh Ride
instructions: Float the ingredients in order by pouring over the bottom of a spoon.

name: Slemmig Slyna
instructions: Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.

name: Slider
instructions: Add Rye, kahlua and milk to a high ball glass, glass should be full of ice. Stir and enjoy.

name: Slimer #2
instructions: Add liquor first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.

name: Slippery Box
instructions: In a glass, put in all liquor and then fill the remaining glass with the kool-aid.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw
instructions: Stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #2
instructions: Shake with ice in a tumbler. Strain and pour.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #3
instructions: Pour gin, liqueurs and whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #4
instructions: Add the southern comfort to the sloe gin, and fill with orange juice. Float galliano on top, decorate with a cherry, and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Collins
instructions: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Add slices of lemon and orange, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Sloe Gin Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Rickey
instructions: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Sloe Tequila
instructions: Combine ingredients with a half-cup of crushed ice in blender. Blend at low speed and pour into old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and twist of cucumber peel.

name: Sloe Vermouth
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sloeberry Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sloughdriver
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add 2 shots of Blavod black vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Sprinkle shredded orange peel on top.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
instructions: Pour sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Slow Cooker Cider
instructions: Place cinnamon, cloves and allspice in a double thickness of cheesecloth: bring up corners of cloth and tie with a string to form a bag. Place cider and brown sugar in a slow cooker: stir until sugar dissolves. Add spice bag. Place orange slices on top. Cover and cook on low for 2-5 hours. Remove spice bag before serving.

name: Slow Painful Movement
instructions: Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass. Dribble the chocolate syrup into a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)

name: Slow Screw
instructions: Pour sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Slushy
instructions: Mix drink with crushed ice or blend with 2 1/2 scoops of ice. For added enjoyment stick a straw in the middle and drink for a slushy rush.

name: Sly Goes To Havana
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Small Bomb #2
instructions: Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto, add shots of melon, add shots of everclear, add rest of glass with pineapple juice, stir, then pour into glass with ice.

name: Small Bomb
instructions: Serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Small Sand
instructions: Mix the first 4 ingredients with ice. Fill with lemonade. Garnish with carambole and strawberry on the edge of glass.

name: Smart Christine
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and orange juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Smartie
instructions: Put 1/2 oz. of Grape Schnapps, and 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur into a shot glass.

name: Smarty
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice, strain and serve. Tastes like a sweet tart.

name: Smeraldo
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake it for a while and serve in a cold cocktail glass.

name: Smile Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Smiler Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Smirnoff Snapple Spikage
instructions: Add half of glass with ice cubes. Add Vodka. Fill with Snapple. Mix and serve.

name: Smith and Wesson
instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and cream into glass filled with ice, then top off with Pepsi.

name: Smoked Martini
instructions: Pour the scotch and vodka into a pitcher, and squeeze in the juice from a slice of lemon. Mix with ice, let stand for a few minutes to chill, then pour into glasses with ice. Add lemon to taste.

name: Smooch
instructions: Pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire.

name: Smooth Black Russian
instructions: Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.

name: Smooth Dog
instructions: Mix and drink.

name: Smooth Sailing
instructions: Serve over ice. Drizzle cherry brandy over the top of the other ingredients. Garnish with lime and a cherry.

name: Smooth Operator
instructions: Combine all ingredients, except 7-Up, in blender. Divide into 2 jars. Top with 7-Up, stir well.

name: Smoothie
instructions: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a 4 oz. shooter glass.

name: Smurf Punch
instructions: Put ice in cup and fill it half full with sprite. Add maui filling the glass. Stir.

name: Smurf Fart
instructions: In a shaker glass, fill with ice, add all ingredients, shake and pour into a shot glass.

name: Smurf on the Rag
instructions: Mix Peach Schnapps and Blue Curacao in a shot glass and top with whipped cream and four or five drops of grenadine.

name: Smurf-o-Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stirring the drink.

name: Smurfs Up
instructions: Combine and stir.

name: Smurf Cocktail
instructions: Take the vodka in first, then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.

name: Smut
instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

name: Snake Bite
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over. *Can substitute sweet cider for the dry.

name: Snake Bite Black
instructions: Pour 1/2 pint Lager, and 1/2 pint Cider into a Pilsner glass, then add Black Currant until drink is purple in color.

name: Snake In The Grass
instructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass.

name: Snake Piss
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir occasionally.

name: Snake Venom
instructions: Pour the ingredients in a tall pint glass and let it swim.

name: Snakebite
instructions: Pour two ounces of yukon jack over ice. Add a dash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Snakebite #2
instructions: Very carefully layer the vodka on top of the green Chartreuse. Drop in the Tabasco, which should sink to the bottom. Slam it.

name: Snakebite #5
instructions: Pour the green chartreuse into a shot glass, add a dash of tabasco sauce, and serve. Add more tabasco sauce for a more venimous bite.

name: Snakebite And Black
instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the lager and cider one after another.

name: Snapple and Schnapps
instructions: Fill shaker (or glass) with crushed ice. Pour schnapps in first and top with Snapple. Shake like hell and pour into a frosted (preferably) highball glass.

name: Sneaky Pete
instructions: Pour kahlua over ice. Add milk and rye whiskey, stir, and serve.

name: Sneeky Sucker
instructions: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

name: Sno-Cone
instructions: Fill glass with ice, then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

name: Snow Blinder
instructions: Pour vodka in blender and add ice cream. Blend. Top with lemonade.

name: Snow Cap Columbian Monk
instructions: Pour 2 1/2 oz. frangelico into a tall glass and fill with strong coffee. Top with a scoop of ice-cream.

name: Snow Snake
instructions: Larger glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

name: Snow White
instructions: Place Sprite/7-Up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.

name: Snowball #2
instructions: Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon, then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass, pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.

name: Snowball
instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Snowboard
instructions: Mix everything togeather in the glass and make sure that the ice is crushed. The best is if the ice is like "slush". You can also serve the drink with a slice of kiwi.

name: Snowflake
instructions: Blend Pear Liqueur, Milk and Ice. Add 7-Up to taste.

name: Snowshoe
instructions: Pour peppermint schnapps in shot glass, top with Wild Turkey, drink it up!

name: Snowshot
instructions: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste, sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

name: Snyder
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Soapy Tits
instructions: Pour Goldshlager, Rumple Minze and Aftershock into mug. Fill with sprite.

name: Soft Serbian
instructions: Mix alcohol, then juice and tonic water. Add crushed ice and drink.

name: Solaris
instructions: Measure the parts so the glass is 2/3 full. The sugar teaspoonfull should be skimmed and stirred a little.

name: Sombrero
instructions: Pour brandy into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Somebird
instructions: Mix ingredients in random order and shake on ice.

name: Something Peachie
instructions: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange.

name: Son Of Adam
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sonny Gets Kissed
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sonoma
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Soother Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sorrento Cafe
instructions: Pour Limoncello and Grand Marnier into coffee cup or glass. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream.

name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Soul Taker
instructions: Mix the the parts together and stir briefly.

name: Sour Apple #2
instructions: Place ingredients in mixing cup with ice, shake, strain into glass.

name: Sour Death
instructions: Mix with ice and pour into glass.

name: Sour Kiss
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin. Stir over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Cocktail glass should be sugar rimmed and garnished with a lemon.

name: Sour Pussy
instructions: Mix over ice.

name: South Bank
instructions: Shake the spirits with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with Grape Tonic and stir gently. Serve with a Lemon Slice on the rim and a straw. *If you find the Grape Tonic too sweet, add a splash or two of Lemon Juice or Sour Mix. A Sour Bank is made in an old-fashioned glass with two ice cubes and Grape Fruit Juice instead. A Southern Bank is a South Bank which has 1 part Southern Comfort added.

name: South Beach Martini
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into large martini glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.

name: South Of The Border
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: South Padre Island
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order listed above. Allow Cranberry to float. Do not stir this drink. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: South Side
instructions: Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluctuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.

name: Southampton Slam
instructions: Serve in rocks glass - no ice. Pour both liquors, fill with club soda, roll once. Serve with straw.

name: Southern Beamy Brain Damage
instructions: In shot glass, pour 1/3 Southern Comfort and 1/3 Jim Beam. Add 1/3 Tia Maria and let set and form. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine (or as sweet as desired).

name: Southern Belle
instructions: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this precedure with the Benedictine.

name: Southern Bell
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and pour in Southern Comfort. Fill with Root Beer.

name: Southern Blast
instructions: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results, try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of "all-citrus" fruit juice, even OJ.

name: Southern Blues #2
instructions: Mix Schnapps and Southern Comfort together, chill, and serve cold. Tastes like Kool Aid.

name: Southern Blues
instructions: Add ingredients to a small shaker w/ice. Stir, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Southern Bondage
instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing/cheater tin over ice, shake and pour.

name: Southern Bound Meteor
instructions: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from cherry and drop in glass. Pour in Southern Comfort and Goldschlager. Carefully float in a splash of 151 Rum. With a cigarette lighter ignite 151 Rum on fire and serve. Put out fire before drinking.

name: Southern Brain Damage
instructions: Fill 2/3 shot with Southern Comfort. Add 1/3 left Tia Maria. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine for effect (or for sweetness desired).

name: Southern Bride
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Southern Bubbles
instructions: No mixing required.

name: Southern Chase
instructions: Mix together and drink.

name: Southern Comfort Kamikaze
instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

name: Southern Dew
instructions: Basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew.

name: Southern Doctor
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort in mason jar, fill with Dr. Pepper, chill with ice, and throw a party!

name: Southern Frost
instructions: Mix together over ice.

name: Southern Fruity Passion
instructions: Add first the Southern Comfort. Then add the Triple Sec. Finish the shot with some Grenadine. Tip your head back and enjoy this smoothest shot in the south.

name: Southern Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Southern Hospitality
instructions: Add all ingredients into a sauce pan. Warm mixture on stove, until all flavors have steeped together (about 5 min.). Do not let it boil. Remove cinnamon sticks. Serve while still hot.

name: Southern Peach
instructions: Add all with ice shack and strain.

name: Southern Pink Flamingo
instructions: Mix in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain into a pony glass.

name: Southern Pride
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass, then put in the Peach Schnapps.

name: Southern Raspberry Tart
instructions: Mix the 4 equal parts and pour into short rocks glass.

name: Southern Salutation
instructions: Add 2 oz. of Southern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.

name: Southern Santa
instructions: Pour coconut rum into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Fill with eggnog. Stir in grenadine to desired red (no more than 1 oz).

name: Southern Smile
instructions: Fill jigger with ice. Add all ingredients. Cover, shake and pour into shot glasses.

name: Southern Sparkler
instructions: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass, or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).

name: Southern Special
instructions: Combine and mix ingredients over plenty of ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Southern Sunrise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into cocktail glasses.

name: Southwest Cooler
instructions: Pour the juices first, then top off with the liqueur.

name: Soviet Cocktail
instructions: Mix all ingredients, except lemon peel, with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and drop into glass.

name: Soviet
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Space Odyssey
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of bacardi and malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

name: Spanish Chocolate
instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Spanish Coffee #2
instructions: Mix congac, kahlua, and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Spanish Fly
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir. Serve cold.

name: Spark In The Night
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sparkplug
instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 in the shot glass first, then pour Rumplminze on top, do not mix.

name: Spear Chugger
instructions: Simply add in order vodka, ice, orange juice, lemon, and vinegar. Ice can be crushed.

name: Special Rough Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Special Tequini
instructions: In a shaker, combine tequila and Cointreau with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

name: Speedball
instructions: Pour the alcoholic ingredients into a shot glass and squeeze a little amount of lime juice on top.

name: Spencer Cocktail
instructions: Shake brandy, gin, orange juice, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Sperm
instructions: Fill the slammer glass with tequila and vodka and drop carefully some cream in it.

name: Sphinx Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Spice and Ice
instructions: Mix all three on the rocks.

name: Spice Cake
instructions: Mix with ice, strain, and serve in shot glass.

name: Spiced Cherry Jello
instructions: Boil one cup of water. Add the package of cherry jello. Stir for 2 minutes. Then pour in the cup of spiced rum. Stir until mixed. Pour into a pan and refrigerate.

name: Spiced Peach Punch
instructions: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

name: Spicey Scot
instructions: Add equal parts of liqeuer to hot chocolate or cocoa and top with whipped cream and shave chocolate, cinnamon or nutmeg.

name: Spicy Martini
instructions: Shake the Gin and Vermouth with ice in a shaker. Pour into a large Martini glass. Pour the tabasco into the finished drink. Stir very lightly.

name: Spic
instructions: Pour in all ingredients then mix completely so that the drink turns a red color. Add more Grenadine for a sweeter, thicker taste.

name: The Spiff
instructions: Stir the Amaretto with the Dr. Pepper. Pour over ice cubes and add two cherries. Enjoy.

name: Spikey Hedgehog
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.

name: Spiking Coffee
instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

name: Splender Blenders
instructions: Add all ingredients in blender, blend till slushy, add sugar to taste.

name: Split Beaver
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large glass with lots of ice and enjoy.

name: Splurge
instructions: Start with glass of soda then add other ingredients and stir.

name: Spooge
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin, shake like a wild man, and strain into a martini glass.

name: Sprawling Dubinsky
instructions: First, add one part of Johnnie Walker Red. Next add one part Johnnie Walker Black, followed by another part of Absolut Citron. Finally, throw in a touch of amaretto, for flavor.

name: Spring Feeling Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Springbok
instructions: Layer the amarula gently onto the creme de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

name: Springtime
instructions: Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Spring
instructions: Mix gently, and add ice cubes. Serve with a straw.

name: Spritsor
instructions: Add ice, then whisky, fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

name: Spudgun
instructions: Mix it together and hurl it down.

name: Spunky Monkey
instructions: Pour above ingredients into a blender with 6 ice cubes. Blend on high until the ice is crushed, and serve in a highball glass.

name: St. Charles Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except port) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with port, add the slice of lemon, and serve.

name: St. Clements
instructions: Put the two ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice, and serve in a highball glass over whole ice cubes with a twist of lemon and a twist of orange.

name: St. Petersburg
instructions: Pour vodka and bitters into mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score peel of orange wedge with tines of fork and drop into drink.

name: Standard Cream
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Stanley Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Stanley Senior
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Stanley Steamer
instructions: Take a warm beer mug w/handle. Put in the liquor. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream dashing a little Orange Liqueur (Grand Marnier) on top. Serve with a straw.

name: Star Wars
instructions: Mix equal parts of all ingredients, and serve in an old-fashioned glass with/without ice.

name: Stardust
instructions: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.

name: Starseeker
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Start Me Up
instructions: Mix everything in a container (bottle, glass etc.), then it is ready for consumption.

name: Steamboat
instructions: Mix all ingredients, strain into glass, and enjoy!

name: Stevie Wonder
instructions: Pour in the order given and enjoy.

name: Stiff Pounder
instructions: Take a 12 oz bottle of beer and drink the neck of the bottle. Pour 1 or more shots of J�germeister into the neck. Swish it around a little bit and presto, instant drunk.

name: Stiletto Manhattan
instructions: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass, and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice, pour crown royal, amaretto, and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

name: Stiletto
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for blended whiskey, if preferred.)

name: Stinger #2
instructions: Shake with ice, strain, serve in cocktail glass.

name: Stinger Shot
instructions: Tabasco in the bottom of the shot. Pour Vodka and Cr�me de M�nthe gently on top. Shoot!

name: Stinger
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Stinky Weasel
instructions: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

name: Stirrup Cup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Stockholm 75
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the vodka, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

name: Stoli Around the World
instructions: Build in a pint glass (preferably), shake and serve with a lemon wedge. Or you can mix in tin and serve over ice.

name: Stoli Fruit Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients together in an ice filled glass. Shake and pour back into glass.

name: Stone Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Stone Fence
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add scotch and bitters and fill with carbonated water. Stir and serve.

name: Stone Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Stoned
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour in jagermeister and pear liqueur. Top with lemon mix and "Battery" energy drink. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Stoner On Acid
instructions: Shake Malibu Rum and Aliz� on ice. Strain into glass. Stir in J�germeister.

name: Storm Trooper
instructions: Mix ingredients together.

name: STP
instructions: Add whisky and vodka to glass of ice. Stir in maple syrup. Wait 2 minutes and enjoy.

name: Straight Jacket
instructions: Add Aftershock then Passoa. Fill with orange juice and ice to taste.

name: Straight Law Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Stranger-In-Town
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, Calvados, and cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Strawberries And Cream
instructions: Place schnapps, half-and-half, sugar, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a high speed. Add 2 of the strawberries and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a parfait glass, top with the other strawberry, and serve with a straw.

name: Strawberry Banana Colada
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Shake well. Garnish with a flag (orange and cherry).

name: Strawberry Bolle
instructions: Sprinkle strawberries with sugar, add one bottle cider. Chill for several hours. To serve, pour into large bowl with ice, add the rest of the wine. Serve in small wine glasses.

name: Strawberry Bomb
instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
instructions: Add ingredients with a bit of ice in a blender. Blend and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish w/ strawberry.

name: Strawberry Dawn
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except mint sprig) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass, add the sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Strawberry Dream #2
instructions: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.

name: Strawberry Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

name: Strawberry Fields Forever
instructions: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Strawberry Fields
instructions: Blend strawberries into 4 oz puree, add 2 oz of rum (and some sugar if you want to) and blend for a couple of second. Pour into sugar rimmed glass. Mix the orange juice and 1 oz of rum, and gently layer on top in glass.

name: Strawberry Kir Royale
instructions: Mix strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let stand for 5-10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Divide into two white wine glasses, add champagne and creme de cassis.

name: Strawberry Lemonade
instructions: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

name: Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: TNT Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: T-52
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Cough Syrup #2
instructions: Pour in Hot Damn, then add grape soda and then top off with cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry if you can avoid choking on it.

name: T-Bone
instructions: Pour the 151 rum in a shot glass and splash a little A-1 sauce on top. Really easy to make but not so easy to go down.

name: T.K.O.
instructions: Just pour off the amount into a shot glass. Shoot and enjoy!

name: TNT #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: T2
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Tachyon
instructions: Stir over ice. Either strain in a cocktail glass or on the rocks in a highball glass. Serve with curl of lemon peel.

name: Tahitian Tea
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add 1/2 oz of each liquor. Fill with 3 oz of each juice. Shake. Serve in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices (if you have the patience).

name: Tahitian Treat
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add liquor, juice, and then sprite.

name: Tailspin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve. (An olive may be substituted for the cherry, if preferred.)

name: Tainted Heart
instructions: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

name: Talos Coffee
instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

name: Tampico
instructions: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

name: Tampon String
instructions: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

name: Tangaze
instructions: Mix vodka with alize and tang. Stir, serve with shaved ice, and serve.

name: Tanga
instructions: In blender add Orange Tang Mix, Absolut Vodka, and ice. Blend until smooth.

name: Tangerine Dream
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

name: Tango Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tanqueray and Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Tanqueray London Dry, lime juice and tonic water.

name: Tap That Ass
instructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice. Pour the Hennessy, Red Alize, and Yellow Alize. Splash in some Cranberry Juice and top it off with soda. For garnish you can add a slice of pineapple and cherries.

name: Tartan Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine lime juice, sugar, Scotch, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain mixture in shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Tartantula
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, vermouth, and Benedictine. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Taste of Winter
instructions: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes

name: Tattooed Love Goddess
instructions: Fill glass w/ ice, add all liquers, top off w/cream and shake well.

name: Tattooed Smurf
instructions: Pour sprite over ice, add schnapps and stir.

name: Tea Punch
instructions: Combine and serve with ice.

name: Tea-riffic
instructions: Pour in the 6 oz. of triple sec to the sweet tea and add the juice of 2 lemon wedges to it. Leave lemon wedges in drink then add 5 ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Teal Squeal
instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend well. Serve in highball glass. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Telegraph
instructions: In a shaker with ice, combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

name: Temptation Cocktail
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, Dubonnet, triple sec, and anis with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twists of orange and lemon peel and serve.

name: Tempter Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Temptress
instructions: Toss some ice cubes into a glass. Pour in a shot of grenadine and a shot of vodka. Fill with gingerale or Sprite and enjoy.

name: Ten Quidder
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, and bitters. Stir well. Pour the Curacao into the center of the drink.

name: Tequila (Straight)
instructions: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

name: Tequila and Tonic
instructions: Pour 2 1/2 ounces Cuervo Gold Tequila over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with tonic. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Tequila Bay Breeze
instructions: Blend.

name: Tequila Bom-Bom
instructions: Place a coaster on top, pound on table twice, guzzle it!

name: Tequila BoomBoom
instructions: Throw everything in a glass. Put a towel over the glass slam it on the bar. Before the foam hits the edge off the glass you must have finished it .

name: Tequila Canyon
instructions: Pour first 3 ingredients over ice into collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juices. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve with a straw.

name: Tequila Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Tequila Colagallo
instructions: Pour lemon juice into glass. Add ice cubes. Add salt. Pour tequila and stir to blend. Fill with coke, and serve.

name: Tequila Collins
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with club soda and stir. Decorate with slices of lemon and orange, and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Tequila Comfort
instructions: Add ingredients.

name: Tequila Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Tequila Manhattan
instructions: Shake tequila, vermouth, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Tequila Matador
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Tequila Mockingbird
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tequila Old-Fashioned
instructions: Mix sugar, bitters, and 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila, ice cubes, and carbonated water. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

name: Tequila Pink
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tequila Press
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.

name: Tequila Screwdriver
instructions: Pour a shot of Tequila in glass, and fill with orange juice. Stir.

name: Tequila Sour
instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Pour tequila in a highball glass with ice, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish stirrer, straw and cherry-orange.

name: Tequila Sunset
instructions: Pour tequila into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and stir well. Top with blackberry brandy and stir lightly. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Tequila Surprise Shooter
instructions: Fill a shot glass with tequila. Add drops of Tabasco sauce, and serve.

name: Tequila Twilight
instructions: Fill the glass 1/3 full of tequila and then the rest with the cranberry juice, leaving enough room for the shot of grape juice.

name: Tequilini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tequillya
instructions: Pour ingredients together into glass, over ice. Mix well. Serve with lime and salted glass if desired.

name: Tequini
instructions: Stir tequila, vermouth, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel, top with the olive, and serve.

name: Tequonic
instructions: Pour tequila over ice cubes into old-fashioned glass. Add fruit juice, fill with tonic water, and stir.

name: The Terminator
instructions: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy.

name: Terminator
instructions: 151 first, then Rumple Minze.

name: Terror From the Deep
instructions: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.

name: Texas Apple Delight
instructions: Nothing special, just mix.

name: Texas Cool-Aid
instructions: Pour over ice, shake until cooled, then pour into glass.

name: Texas Prairie Fire
instructions: Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass, top off with lime juice, splash in tabasco sauce, and shoot.

name: Texas Rattlesnake
instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end.

name: Texas Rose
instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Texas Sling
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, topped with whipped cream.

name: Texas Sweat
instructions: Mix all together and filter back and forth through ice to chill and mix. Not a sipping drink, shoot it.

name: Texas T
instructions: Make tea add tequila, and shake.

name: TGV
instructions: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.

name: Thai Iced Coffee
instructions: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

name: Thai Iced Tea
instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

name: Thames Water
instructions: Pour the two small bottles (Britvic size) of Orange Juice in first. Top up with Cola, the fizzier, the better. Stir.

name: Thanksgiving Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Think Pink
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cold glass. Stir well.

name: Third Rail
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Third-Rail Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: This-n-That
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Thorazine
instructions: Add all three ingredients in order to a shot glass. Best served with top layer on fire. (For effect only)

name: Thorny Mexican
instructions: Add Tequila Rose and follow with tequila.

name: Three Day Weekend
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with plenty of ice. Add J�germeister and rum first. Top off with pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well.

name: Three Miller Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Three Musketeers
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Three Sheets to The Wind
instructions: Combine equal amounts of ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Three Wise Men #3
instructions: Pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingredient into a shot glass and drink.

name: Three-Legged Monkey
instructions: Shake and strain, into rocks glass.

name: Thriller
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Thug Heaven
instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

name: Thumb Press
instructions: Add the vodka, 151, and Midori forming a nice green shooter. Then tilt in some grenadine to give it some red flare at the bottom -- burn it down!

name: Thunder And Lighting
instructions: Mix in shaker and serve.

name: Thunder King
instructions: Just mix it and shake it.

name: Thunder Peel
instructions: Shake it all chill and serve.

name: Thunder Quake
instructions: Swill the Congac around the glass then add the cider and float the brandy over the top.

name: Thunderclap
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Thunder
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tia-Maria
instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffee for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

name: Tijuana Carbomb
instructions: Pour bottle of corona in a pint glass. Wait for it to settle, then drop in shot of cuervo, and chug it down. Enjoy.

name: Tidal Wave
instructions: Pour gin, vodka, rum and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add orange and pineapple juices, a dash of grenadine, and float 151 rum on top. Garnish with a piece of fresh cut pineapple. The wave will sweep you away!

name: Tidbit
instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #2
instructions: Fill shaker glass with ice. Add ingredients. Shake well. Pour into highball glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost - Hawaiian
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost Baby
instructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Tiffany Marshall
instructions: Mix as punch (Lemon Juice to taste). Add orange or lemon slices, or olives.

name: Tiger Paw
instructions: Add vodka, lemon juice, ice, and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

name: Tiger Tail
instructions: Layer in shot glass.

name: Tiger Woods
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Tight Snatch
instructions: Shake with ice. Serve in ice-filled glass.

name: Tijuana Taxi
instructions: Pour tequila, curacao, and schnapps over ice into large highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Tiki Torch
instructions: Fill glass halfway with tang. Add vodka until you can begin to taste the vodka, and serve to taste.

name: Timberwolf
instructions: Mix together in a large glass and fill remainder of glass with orange juice. Serve cold.

name: Tina Baker
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. of peach schnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with Orange Juice. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-Up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.

name: Tipperary Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tipsy Island
instructions: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

name: Tirade
instructions: Takes a 2 oz shot glass. First put in the triple sec, then tequila, last the spiced rum.

name: TLA
instructions: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom, amaretto in the middle, and a splash of lime juice on top.

name: To Hell With Swords And Garter
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Toasted Almond
instructions: Shake, strain into highball glass.

name: Toasted Fisherman
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry.

name: Tokyo Ice Tea
instructions: Mix the alcohol. Add sugar syrup, ice, and 7-up to taste. Garnish with/add pieces of lemon. Stir.

name: Tokyo Rose
instructions: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Tom and Jerry Punch
instructions: Beat egg whites to a stiff froth. Separately beat egg yolks until light in color, gradually add the powdered sugar and spices. Fold yolk mixture into whites. Divide mixture between four 8 oz. mugs. Add 1/2 shot brandy and 1 shot rum to each mug, fill with hot beverage(coffee, can also try water or milk). Stir well and top with nutmeg.

name: Tom Collins ala Olsen
instructions: Just mix the ingredients.

name: Tom Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Tomato Cocktail
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

name: The Tony Kelly
instructions: Mix. Shoot.

name: Toocan Sam
instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, add first 5 ingredients. Shake well. Strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. Lace with grenadine.

name: Toolkit
instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour into shot glasses. Slam it.

name: Tootsie Pop
instructions: Layer grenadine, amaretto, and lemon juice, then stir. Add 2 drops of chocolate syrup, let sink, and serve.

name: Tootsie Roll Float
instructions: Pour all over ice, mix and strain off ice.

name: Tootsie Roll
instructions: Because of the darkness of this particular shooter, layering is not necessary.

name: Tootsy Pop
instructions: Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnapps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

name: Top Banana
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Top Shelf Margarita
instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake well. Pour into salt rimmed glass. Add lime wedge or wheel.

name: Topaz
instructions: Cobine ingredients in a shaker 2/3 filled with ice. Shake well, and then strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Topher Special
instructions: Fill bottom of glass with tang then add Vodka, Stir till most of the tang is dissolved. Fill to 3/4 full with Mountain Dew. Stir again. Fill rest of way.

name: Toreador
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.

name: Torombolo
instructions: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass, and add the licor 43. Mix well, and serve cold.

name: Toro
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled shaker and shake. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Torpedo
instructions: Mix the liquors, and garnish with a cherry, cucumber slice, and twist of lemon peel. NOTE: From the musical "Follow the Boys".

name: Torridora Cocktail
instructions: Shake light rum, brandy, and cream with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151 proof rum on top and serve.

name: Tossed Salad
instructions: Dip rim of shot glass in chocolate syrup. Add Kahlua and J�germeister. Place arms behind back. Drink shot using mouth only (a la "blowjob").

name: Tovarich Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Toxic Antifreeze
instructions: Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice, add 1 ounce of vodka, 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori, fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.

name: Traffic Light Cooler
instructions: In a pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

name: Traffic Light
instructions: Layer Grenadine, Galliano, and Midori.

name: Transmission Overhaul
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a large container. Shake or stir well. Server chilled or over ice. This will sneak up on you.

name: Trashcan Punch
instructions: Slice the fruit. I recommend strawberries, oranges, lemons, and limes. Then mix the punch and everclear together in a clean trashcan with ice. Hawaiian punch is my preference, but you can use any sort of fruit punch. Make sure you use ice and have a blast.

name: Tree Frog
instructions: Mix vodka, Maui, and grapefruit juice together, then pour over highball glass with ice.

name: Tree Smacker
instructions: Add liquors, then add juices. Color red with grenadine. Float the 151 proof rum.

name: Triad
instructions: Pour the rum, vermouth, amaretto, and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Trial of the Century
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Trilby Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Trinity Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Triple Asp
instructions: Poor the ingredients in a glass. Ice if preferred. Drink it on a hot summer-night.

name: Triple Sec Sunrise
instructions: First fill glass 3/4 full with Orange Juice. Next add 1/4 Triple Sec. Finaly add Grenadine and mix thoroughly! Garnish with a slice of Orange. *If too weak add more Triple Sec.

name: Triplesex
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Serve.

name: The Triple
instructions: Straight out of the freezer, pour into a double shot glass the vodka, then J�germeister, then Goldschlager.

name: Tripple Pleasure
instructions: Dump it in a glass of ice and enjoy.

name: Tripwire
instructions: In 5 gal. jug mix thoroughly all of vodka with all of lemons, lemonade, and water, which should be previously combined. Make sure water is ice cold, if not ice or refridgeration may be required.

name: Trojan Horse
instructions: Mix coke and guinness in a pint glass.

name: Tropic Heat
instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass, garnish with fruit.

name: Tropical Binalada
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the contents unstrained into a collins glass and top up with club soda.

name: Tropical Clarkson
instructions: Prepare the hot chocolate and add the Kahlua. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Tropical Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tropical Dream
instructions: Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.

name: Tropical Heat
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

name: Tropical Hibiscus
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a iced punch bowl. Serve cold.

name: Tropical Hooter
instructions: Mix and pour into shotglass.

name: Tropical Itching
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Tropical Kermit Piss
instructions: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

name: Tropical Life Saver #2
instructions: Mix together in a tall glass.

name: Tropical Life Saver
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Then add the Malibu and Midori. Then fill the remainder of the glass up with Pineapple Juice. Shake and enjoy!

name: Tropical Lust
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice, then add southern comfort and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

name: Tropical Martini
instructions: Pour Amaretto into a chilled glass, then add Malibu Rum. Stir and serve. The ingredients should be well chilled before use.

name: Tropical Nat
instructions: Pour rum and vodka over ice, and add juices one by one, letting the juices swirl together, rather than mix. Garnish with a slice of lime, orange, or pineapple.

name: Tropical Orgasm #2
instructions: Add all ingredients. Shake and pour into glass with ice.

name: Tropical Orgasm #3
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Pour over ice. Garnish with cherry.

name: Tropical Orgasm
instructions: Start with 3/4 of a pitcher with pink lemonade. Then add the vodka. Mix till you can barely taste the vodka, then add the strawberry daiquiri mix, then a splash of rum. (Just a bit, do not add too much) Stir and then chill.

name: Tropical Passion
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass(es).

name: Tropical Peach Martini
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tropical Pear Fizz
instructions: Pour first four ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake until chilled, and well blended. Pour into glass, and add 7-up. Stir to mix.

name: Tropical Storm Jack
instructions: Put all in hi-ball glass and shake garnish w/lime.

name: Tropical Sunrise
instructions: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum, triple sec, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Stir. Add Grenadine and top with cherry and other fruit.

name: Tropical Teaser
instructions: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

name: Tropical Titty Twister
instructions: Mix in glass then shake.

name: Tropical Waters
instructions: Pour the Melon liqueur and the Blue curacao into a highball glass. Then add Sprite, and finally the ice cubes.

name: Tropical Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake or build directly in the glass.

name: Tropicetto
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Tropiflipano
instructions: Put all ingredients into a large mixing bowl (or simmer pot whenever possible). Mix well! This drink serves 2-3 quite well.

name: Troutie
instructions: Pour the vodka first, add grapefruit juice, and fill with about 6 ounces of 7-up or Sprite.

name: Truck Punch
instructions: Give yourself a break, use ice.

name: Tsunami #2
instructions: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with mountain dew.

name: Tuaca Nutter
instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

name: Tubboocki
instructions: Just pour and serve.

name: Turbo
instructions: Shake. Strain into ice filled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a straw.

name: Turf Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Turkey Trot
instructions: Mix with a stirrer in a pitcher then pour over ice into glasses. A thanksgiving tradition for the truly disfunctional family.

name: Turkeyball
instructions: Combine 1 oz. Wild Turkey, 3/4 oz. Amaretto, and a splash of Pineapple Juice with ice in a shaker tin. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Tuve Nightmare
instructions: Mix the Vodka with the wine. Drop the fruit from a height of at least 3 feet. Pour the sprite and the Ginger Ale with the rest. Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon into the punch. Enjoy!

name: Tuxedo Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Tweaked
instructions: Fill glass 3/4 way full with ice, add Vodka and Southern Comfort, then fill to the top with Root Beer, stir then drink.

name: Tweetie Bird
instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixer with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Twenty Thousand Leagues
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Twin Hills
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Twinkle My Lights
instructions: Mix in shaker over ice, strain into glass(es).

name: Twister
instructions: Pour vodka and juice of lime into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: The Two
instructions: Just simply pour into a shot glass or any glass of small size will work. Pour the ingredients in any order that you wish.

name: Typhoon
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill glass with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Tyson Punch
instructions: Pour all 8 liters of soda in cooler/bowl over 1 bag of ice. Add 2 quarts of Orage Juice. Add 1 bottle of Everclear. Add 4 big scoops of Kool-Aid. (preferably Tropical Punch) Stir.

name: XYZ Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Xeres Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Xanthia Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: X
instructions: Mix all ingredients in mixing glass and shake with ice. Strain into glass and shoot.

name: Y2K Shot #2
instructions: Mix shot over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glass.

name: Y2K Shot
instructions: Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Yaka
instructions: Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolut vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. Serve cold.

name: Yale Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Yaps
instructions: Mix 1 part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.

name: Yellow Bellied Sap Sucker
instructions: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up, and add the tonic.

name: Yellow Birdie
instructions: Pour Vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir. *Can substitute Light Rum for Vodka.

name: Yellow Bird
instructions: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass. Stir sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.

name: Yellow Cake
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Yellow Motherfuckers
instructions: It is best to use a large cooler with a spout. The amount of Vodka and Gin you use depends on the size of your cooler. Add the ingredients to your prefered taste.

name: Yellow Parakeet
instructions: Fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour.

name: Yellow Parrot
instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Rattler
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cocktail onion) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onion and serve.

name: Yellow Sock
instructions: Add the vodka along with the pisang ambon. Fill with orange juice and stir.

name: Yellow Strawberry
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except banana slice) with ice and strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass. Garnish with the banana slice and serve.

name: YIP!
instructions: Fill glass with Tequila, then club soda, then squeze a slice of lemon, toss in and add one ice cube, stir, drink, enjoy.

name: Yo Mama Cocktail
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add soda, top with a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Yolanda
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: YoYo Blow Out
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

name: Yucca
instructions: Put the Vodka and the sugar into a container. Slice 10 lemons and 10 limes and add them to the Vodka. Mix for 10 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved.

name: Yukon Cornelius
instructions: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager, filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

name: Yukon Dew Me
instructions: Just mix and drink.

name: Yummy Bidnis
instructions: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir.

name: Yuppidoo
instructions: Shake all on ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Za Za
instructions: Pour a dash of angostura bitters into the bottom of the glass. Add gin and dubonnet. Stir.

name: Zadarade
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add absolut mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

name: Zambeer
instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice.

name: Zenmeister
instructions: Mix together and enjoy.

name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
instructions: Serve without ice. The juice should be at room temperature.

name: Zima Blaster
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

name: Zimamazing
instructions: Put the first six ingredients in a shaker glass without ice and shake until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker glass at the time so it is a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.(depending on the ice) Tastes like an Electric Lemonade with Zima instead of lemon-lime soda and more sour mix. Instead of triple sec, you can also use blue curacao. It makes it a pretty blue-green drink. Also, keep a LOT of extra ice on hand because this drink has so much alcohol it melts the ice immediately, which is why you should not put ice in the shaker, it will dilute the drink.

name: Zimaretto
instructions: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

name: Zimartini
instructions: Pour together over 2-3 ice cubes and serve.

name: Zinger
instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the Schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would. *Add 1 shot Strawberry Schnapps for an alternate taste.

name: Zipperhead
instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, then soda on top).

name: Zipper
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

name: Zizi Coin-Coin
instructions: Pour 5 cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2 cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

name: Zoksel
instructions: No specific mixing instructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass, experiment to taste. The lemon goes with it.

name: Zombie #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

name: Zombie #3
instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Zombie #4
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the high-proof rum) over ice, the pineapple stick and the sugar. Strain and add ice. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry. Float the high-proof rum on top and sprinkle a little sugar over it.

name: Zombie #5
instructions: Strain ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Top with 151 Proof Rum.

name: Zombie #6
instructions: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a tumbler on crushed ice.

name: Zoo Station
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Ugly
instructions: Fill beer glass 3/4 full of beer, slowly pour tomato juice down the side so it settles on the bottom. Shake salt in the palm of your hand. Throw salt into the glass and wait until the top foams up. Chug the drink and then scream "UGLY"!

name: Ulanda Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ultimate Blue Frozen Margarita
instructions: Pour ingredient into a blender, over the ice, in order listed. Blend on "high" for a few seconds until drink has a consistancy a bit icier than a slurpee. Take lime wedge and run it over the edges of the margarita glass, then, upturned, place the wetted rims into course salt. Pour the now ready margarita into the now salted glasses and serve.

name: Ultimate June Bug
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Ultimate Margarita
instructions: Pour tequila, cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

name: Ultra-Marine
instructions: Add Blue curacao then top up with Champagne and garnish with a grape or strawberry.

name: Unabomber
instructions: Mix all ingredients, place in shot glass. Introduce to mouth.

name: Under Current
instructions: Mix everything except Chambord in a mixing tin, and pour into glass. Layer Chambord on top with a spoon.

name: Under Kurant
instructions: Shake the absolut kurant, blue curacao, and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a shot or low-ball glass, be sure and leave a bit of room to spare. Add just enough chambord to color the bottom of the glass.

name: Undertow
instructions: Pour schnapps, then curacao into the glass. Do not mix.

name: Union Jack Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Unknown Warrior
instructions: Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted, use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.

name: Up All Night
instructions: Pour Red Bull into a Collins Glass. Pour a shot of J�germeister into a shot glass. When ready to drink, drop the shot into the collins glass and drink.

name: Upper Cut
instructions: Just like an irish coffey. Wait till it has cooled a bit. Drink all in one move.

name: Urban Violence
instructions: Use strawberry, orange or banana tropicana. Put some ice in your favorite glass. Add liquor. Fill up remainder with the tropicana, stir, and serve.

name: Urine Sample #2
instructions: Strain over ice. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Urine Sample
instructions: Just pour it in.

name: The Usual
instructions: Stir.

name: Utar
instructions: Mix in glass and serve.

name: C-MOB
instructions: Two ice cubes, 2 oz of whisky, 1 shot of vodka, and fill the rest with coca cola.

name: CA Area 151
instructions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

name: Cabana Club
instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Cabaret
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, benedictine, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Cable Guide
instructions: Mix in a pitcher or individually: Pour 1 part vodka, 1 part mango juice, and top with 2 parts Fresca. Pour over ice in a tall/large glass.

name: Cablegram
instructions: Stir blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Cactus Berry
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into large salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass.

name: Cactus Bite
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cactus Juice
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order.

name: Cadalac Margarita
instructions: Combine first 3 ingredient into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cafe de Paris Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cafe Savoy
instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee. Add milk if desired, then triple sec and brandy. Stir.

name: Caffeine Attack
instructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Caipirinha
