instructions: Add vodka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.

name: Ekatherina Andreevna
instructions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

name: El Floridita
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: El Presidente Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: El Presidente Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.

name: Electric Banana
instructions: Pour ingredients in glass and shake vigorously.

name: Electric Fuzzy
instructions: Combine. Add ice. Stir.

name: Electric Lemonade
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Electric Marcucci
instructions: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

name: Electric Popsicle
instructions: Pour both the melon liqueur and blue curacao in the collins glass and fill with 7-up. Place the slice of lime on the top of the glass.

name: Electric Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the shots into a highball glass, fill with orange juice (to taste), and serve.

name: Electric Smurf
instructions: Put three ice cubes in a glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with Sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

name: Electric Storm
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a shot glass and slam it.

name: Electric Tea
instructions: Combine in a pint glass, shake and serve with a lemon wedge.

name: Electric Watermelon
instructions: Add equal parts vodka, rum, and melon liqueur in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour mix. Add a splash of 7-up and grenadine.

name: Elephant Lips
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Elephant Shake
instructions: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

name: Elmer Fuddpucker
instructions: The mixture is one large can (12 oz) of frozen limeade, that same can filled with any cheap vodka, and three cans of light beer.

name: Elmer Fuddpucker #2
instructions: Mix beer, soda, and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemonade container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.

name: Embolism
instructions: Add rum and grenadine to a glass. Fill with coke. Ice optional.

name: Emerald City
instructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Emerald Eye
instructions: Add each ingredient to the shot glass. Color should be a bright emerald green.

name: Emerald Forest
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Emerald Isle #2
instructions: Stir with ice, and serve.

name: Emerald Isle
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Emerald Vodka Martini
instructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

name: Emerson
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Emily Weir
instructions: Whack the liquid ingredients in a glass and give it a stir, then add the ice.

name: En Sann En
instructions: Fill long drinks glass with ice-cubes, add vodka and sour-mix. Top with coca-cola, stir.

name: Enchantress
instructions: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk, add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

name: End of the Road
instructions: Put all the ingredients in a shaker (except the nuts), add ice, and shake well. Pour in the glass, and add the nuts on top.

name: The End Of The World
instructions: Serve warm. Straight into the shot glass.

name: End Wrench
instructions: Add ice. Tastes remarkably like a screwdriver.

name: English Highball
instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water or ginger ale. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

name: English Rose Cocktail
instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Epidural
instructions: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or, if you have a test tube or beaker handy, go for it!

name: The Equator
instructions: Layer ingredients in the exact order. Grenadine should sit on top for a little bit before sliding down the inside of the shot glass.

name: Ersh (Russian)
instructions: Pour the vodka over the beer.

name: Ershammar Dream
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, and shake.

name: Esirnus
instructions: Pour midori and chambord over ice in a glass and stir. Partially fill the glass with Sprite. Stir in vodka and add the maraschino cherry.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.

name: Estonian Forest-Fire
instructions: Add vodka to a shot glass. Drop in the tabasco sauce, and chase with the kiwi.

name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ethiopian Camel Basher
instructions: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroughly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but not one nor the other.

name: Ethnic Sugar
instructions: Mix all ingredients together except for the surge and stir. Fill the rest up with surge and enjoy.

name: Etyk
instructions: Shake and serve with ice!

name: European
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sherry, dubonnet, vermouth, and grand marnier. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Evil Corona
instructions: Pour (drink) the first 2 oz. of corona, and add 2 oz. of Absolut Citron. Cap top of bottle and turn upside down for about 5 seconds. Serve with a lime wedge.

name: Evil Slider
instructions: Mix well and serve.

name: Evil Tea
instructions: Mix well, and pour over ice.

name: Evil Tongue
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker over ice. Shake and strain.

name: Executive Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the creme de cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Exotic Finn
instructions: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

name: Exotic Summernight
instructions: Mix vodka and juices, pour over ice in a glass, and layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Exploding Cherry
instructions: Pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

name: The Extinguisher
instructions: Combine all alcohol in 12 oz. glass with ice. Add Sour Mix. Add a splash of Cranberry Juice to form a layer of red at the top of the glass. Top with foam from draft beer tap.

name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in a highball glass. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

name: Extraterrestrial
instructions: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Layer the Irish Cream on top, then layer the Stoli Vodka. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then, light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!

name: Extremely Drunk
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Eye-Opener
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
instructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Tom Sweeney
instructions: Add ingredients to a chilled martini glass. Shake well. Garnish with a black raspberry.

name: Grand Fashion
instructions: Muddle a teaspoon of sugar, cherry and orange in a chilled martini glass. Add ice, bacardi barrel aged rum, and rouge aperitif wine. Shake well. Garnish with a blood orange wheel.

name: Shirley Temple #2
instructions: Combine all of these ingredients into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Pour into an iced tulip glass and garnish with a slice of orange speared through a cocktail sword with a maraschino cherry. Add a coloured straw.

name: Aberdeen Angus
instructions: Stir all but the drambuie into a coffee mug. Warm the drambuie, ignite it and pour the burning liqueur into the mug. Stir rapidly and drink.

name: Absolut Splash
instructions: Mix in a highball glass.

name: Absolut Salty Dog
instructions: Build in a salt rimmed highball glass and fill with grapefruit juice.

name: Absolut Redhead
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Acapulco Clam Digger
instructions: Mix over cracked ice in an lowball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon. Note: you can substitute Clamato juice (6 oz.) for the tomato juice and the clam juice.

name: Ace Ventura
instructions: Take a large chilled cocktail glass and fill it 1/4 full with ice, and top to 3/4 full with sprite. Add the vodka, rum and tequila. Fill the glass with the flavored sambucas in layers. Garnish with an umbrella and serve with a bendable straw.

name: Acid Trip
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Adam and Eve
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Admiral
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Admiral Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Afghan Monkey
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Air Gunner
instructions: Build in a collins glass.

name: Alabama Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and garnish with two sprigs of fresh mint.

name: Alaskan Polar Bear
instructions: Blend ingredients until of milkshake consistancy. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Albemarle Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda.

name: Alcoholic Sherbert Delight
instructions: Combine the ingredients, starting with the orange juice, in a highball glass. Serve.

name: Alcudla
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of grapefruit peel.

name: Alexander The Great
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Alfonso
instructions: In a wine glass, add the bitters to the sugar. Then add the dubonnet and a tsp. of ice. Fill the glass with champagne, stir gently and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Alfonso Special
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Algonquin Bloody Mary
instructions: Add vodka, juices and sauce to a shaker with ice, adding salt and pepper to taste. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice cubes into a highball glass and add a lime wedge.

name: Alhambra Royale
instructions: Fill a mug with hot chocolate almost to the brim. Twist an orange peel over the mug and add it to the chocolate. Using a ladle, warm the cognac over hot water, ignite and while still flaming, pour into the mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Alhoa Bubbly
instructions: Pour the last 3 ingredients in a tall glass and stir well. Add crushed ice and the white wine. Add some more club soda and stir again. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Alize Martini
instructions: Mix in a martini glass.

name: Allen Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: All White Frappe
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Almond Cocktail
instructions: Warm the gin up in a mixing glass and add the brandy, the sugar syrup and 6 almond slivers. Chill. When needed, pour the chilled mixture over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the remaining ingredients.

name: Almond Grove
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Almond Hot Chocolate
instructions: Mix in pousse cafe glass.

name: Aloha
instructions: Shake with ice cubes and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Alzheimers
instructions: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

name: Amaretto Heartwarmer
instructions: Warm the southern comfort and add the almonds, peach and sugar. Stir. Allow to cool and add the vermouth and amaretto. Stir again and strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Amaretto Sombrero
instructions: Mix in lowball glass.

name: Ambassador
instructions: Stir and serve in a collins glass over ice. Garnish with the slice of orange.

name: Amber Amour
instructions: Pour amaretto and sour mix over ice in a collins glass. Top with club soda and garnish with a cherry.

name: Amer Biere
instructions: Pour amer picon and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill the mug with beer and stir.

name: Americana
instructions: Stir the whiskey, the bitters and the sugar in a collins glass until the sugar is dissolved. Fill up with champagne and garnish with a slice of peach.

name: American Flag Pousse Cafe
instructions: Layer in order in a pousse cafe glass.

name: American Flyer
instructions: Shake the rum, the juice and the syrup with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled white wine glass and fill with sparkling wine.

name: American Grog
instructions: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot water. Stir.

name: American Leroy
instructions: Mix in a blender and pour into a highball glass.

name: Americano Highball
instructions: Build campari and sweet vermouth in highball glass and fill with seltzer water. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: American Rose
instructions: Shake ingredients (except champagne) and strain into a chilled white wine glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with a peach slice.

name: Fahrenheit 5000
instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with tabasco sauce and then fill with half firewater and half absolut peppar.

name: Fairy Belle Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Falix
instructions: Pour the bacardi into a shot glass. Add the margarita mix. Top it with the lemon juice and shoot it.

name: Fallen Angel
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Fancy Bourbon
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Fancy Brandy
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fancy Gin
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fancy Scotch
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the scotch, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Fancy Whiskey
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fantasio Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Farmer Giles
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Fart in the Ocean
instructions: Add almond-flavored tequila and chilled 7-up to a glass. Drop one sweet prune in each glass. Add ice if you wish.

name: Fastlap
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: The Fat Albert
instructions: In a blender, mix the chocolate milk, ice, and maple syrup for about 5 seconds. Then add the chocolate mint liqueur and kahlua, blending for another 2 seconds. Pour and top with whipped cream.

name: Fat Box
instructions: Mix ingredients in mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Fat Face
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Fat Hooker
instructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Favorite Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Feel Like Holiday
instructions: Stir vodka and grenadine with ice. Pour into a champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

name: Feel This
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Next add absolut, sloe gin, pineapple juice, southern comfort, and last midori. Add pineapple and cherry garnish.

name: Feliz Natal
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

name: Fernet Con Coca
instructions: Put some ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the fernet and then fill with coke. No mixing required.

name: Festrus
instructions: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

name: Fidel Castro
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Field of Hearts
instructions: In a cocktail glass, layer the strawberry liqueur onto the midori. Shake and strain frangelico, and layer onto the strawberry liqueur. On top of the creamy layer, add a couple of drops of red or pink food dye, run a toothpick through the center of each drop to create a heart shape. Garnish with an open strawberry.

name: Fiery Balls Of Death
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. Ignite, pray for your life and down it.

name: Fiery Blue Mustang
instructions: Mix ingredients and light on fire. Blow out flame, saddle up, and enjoy the ride!

name: Fifth Avenue
instructions: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

name: Fifty-Fifty
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cocktail olive.

name: Fig
instructions: Shake well, pour into shot glass and serve.

name: Finlandia Coffee
instructions: Pour vodka and lapponia lakka into an irish coffee cup. Fill with hot coffee and float fresh cream or whipped cream on top.

name: Finn Roses
instructions: Stir and serve.

name: The Finnely
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and pour over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.

name: Finnish Passion
instructions: Shake all ingredients, pour into a longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

name: Fino Martini
instructions: In a mixing glas half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Fire and Ice
instructions: Layer the rumple minze on top of the firewater. (as best as possible)

name: Fire And Torture
instructions: Pour all the contents into a shot glass at once.

name: Fire Engine
instructions: Pour it in a highball glass, w/ice if preferred. Should be served cold.

name: Fire in Heaven
instructions: Fill up shot glass with 151 proof rum. Add a dash of tabasco sauce. Allow a few seconds to settle. Drink fast and stand back.

name: Fire On Ice
instructions: Pour vodka in a highball glass. Fill balance of glass with cider, stir, and serve. Add ice cubes if you like.

name: Fireball
instructions: Mix the schnapps, southern comfort and tabasco sauce. Pour into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Fireball #2
instructions: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Add the sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce (or 2 - 3 coffee beans). Pour some sambuca all over the glass and ignite. Let it burn for approx. 10 to 20 seconds. Sip through a straw, or extinguish to drink.

name: Fireball Shooter
instructions: Mix the schnapps, rum and tabasco in a shooter glass. Stir briefly.

name: Fireball #3
instructions: Pour the cinnamon schnapps in shot glass and add the dash of tabasco sauce. Then shoot.

name: Firetruck
instructions: Serve in a shot glass, and toss it straight down.

name: Fish House Punch
instructions: Dissolve sugar in some of the water. Add juice and the rest of the water, and stir. Add liquor 2-3 hours before serving, and refridgerate. Serve in a punch bowl with ice.

name: Fishbone
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. Shake well. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Five in the Morning
instructions: Place ice in glass and pour in the five liquors. Next pour in the the orange juice and the sour mix. Finally shake and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Five Star General
instructions: Just put all of them in a shot glass, and put it down.

name: Fizzy Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour schnapps and orange juice over 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir gently.

name: Fjellbekk (Mountain Stream)
instructions: Mix everything in a glass with ice.

name: Fjellfinn
instructions: Mix the two ingredients. Garnish with a birch leaf.

name: Flageln
instructions: Pour the vodka into the glass first, then pour the red bull slowly into it. Add ice.

name: Flaming Ale
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, pour in vodka, midori and triple-sec. Fill to top with ginger ale and spoon in (do not mix) grenadine.

name: Flaming Anus
instructions: Combine all ingredients in mug. Let stand until room temperature. Enjoy!

name: Flaming Asshole
instructions: Layer in this order: grenadine, creme de menthe, banana liqueur, white rum. Ignite rum before serving. Server with a straw.

name: Flaming Blue Jesus
instructions: Layer with 151 proof rum on top. Light on fire - burn for 5 seconds - blow it out and drink.

name: Flaming Blue
instructions: Mix into a shot glass, and splash the bacardi on the very top. Be careful not to mix it into the rest of the drink. Then carefully light the rum on fire with a match. Blow out the flame and drink it fast before the rim gets too hot.

name: Flaming Citrus Action
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an ordinary glass.

name: Flaming Cocaine
instructions: Chill the shot glass until a frost has developed on it. All ingredients should be chilled. Add the aftershock and several small crystals, then add the vodka, and finally the cranberry juice.

name: Flaming D
instructions: Pour amaretto and whiskey in a shot glass. Top with everclear. Light shot on fire, and drop into glass of beer.

name: Flaming Dr.
instructions: Pour both into a pint glass, mix and drink.

name: Flaming Dragon
instructions: Mix together. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction for about 20 secs. Blow out fire (optional). Swallow quickly (take care).

name: Flaming Fruit Trees
instructions: Light on fire for five seconds, blow out and suck through a straw.

name: Flaming Giraffe
instructions: Pour kahlua first into a double shot glass. Add one ounce of butterscotch schnapps. Float 151 proof rum on top and set on fire. Blow out before drinking.

name: Flaming Gorilla
instructions: Pour into shot glass, layering ingredients, from top to bottom. Light on fire and extinguish after 15 seconds.

name: Flaming Hurley
instructions: Add one shot of southern comfort and a splash of dr. pepper in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Flaming Jesus
instructions: Pour vodka, lime juice, and grenadine into shot glass. Then layer 151 proof rum on top from the back of a spoon. Light the 151 and shoot it while lit if you dare. If you are worried about shooting a lit drink, just blow out the flame and then shoot the drink.

name: Flaming Kevin
instructions: Just mix and stir.

name: Flaming Lemon Drop
instructions: Pour absolut citron into a shot glass and top off with a splash of galliano. Place one half lemon slice flat on the rim of the shot glass, put some sugar on the slice and soak the sugar with 151 proof rum. -- Just before drinking, ignite the sugar. Blow the flame out when it seems to caramelize the sugar. Lick the sugar off the lemon slice, down the vodka mixture, then either suck the juices or bite the pulp of the lemon.

name: Flaming Nazi
instructions: Make sure the hot damn and the jagermeister are both cold before serving.

name: Flaming Rasta
instructions: Take a tall shot glass, a straw and a lighter. When the drink is poured make sure your 151 is on top. Take your straw and lick it so it is wet. Light the drink (run the lighter over top), put your straw in and drink it fast.

name: Flaming Russian
instructions: Pour vodka in shot glass, carefully layer rum on top. Ignite rum and serve.

name: Flaming Soda
instructions: Serve over rocks if desired.

name: Flaming Spanish Fly
instructions: Moisten rim of glass with cherry juice or water. Dip rim into coarse sugar to coat heavily. Pour tequila and coffee liquor into glass. Gently float 151 proof rum on top. Carefully ignite rum and swirl glass to lightly melt sugar with flame. Immediately pour in coffee to extinguish flames and fill cup. Top with whipped cream and cherry.

name: Flaming Yager
instructions: Light the jagermeister on fire and drop it in the glass of guinness. Now pound it quick. There you go!

name: Flamingo Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flaming Gorilla Titties
instructions: Add the kahlua and then add bacardi 151 rum to the shot glass. Place a small sipping straw in the mixture and then light on fire. The straw is so you do not burn your eyebrows off. Once lit suck the shot through the straw till empty. Tastes like chocolate milk. I have made this drink quite often at parties and it goes over very well with everyone. Try it a few times it does take a little practice to get it right.

name: Flat Tire
instructions: Shake tequila and sambuca over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Flatliner
instructions: Layer the tequila over sambuca. Add tabasco sauce.

name: Fleet Street
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Flip Juice
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.

name: Flirting with the Sandpiper
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Floaty
instructions: First pour in the pear soda. Then take the fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim, as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly.

name: Florida Pina Colada
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Florida Rum Runner
instructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

name: Florida Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fluorescent Dream
instructions: Pour into a glass half filled with ice. Stir well.

name: Fluxuation Cocktail
instructions: Pour mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass, and stir. Slowly add the blue curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles; as fun to look at as it is tasty to drink.

name: Flying Dutchman
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

name: Flying Masturbator
instructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Add OJ until the cup is about half full, add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full, add ice to fill the cup, and shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

name: Flying Moose
instructions: Pour liquors into a highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

name: Flying Scotsman
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flying Teetsie Fly
instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

name: Flying Tiger
instructions: Fill glass with ice: add galliano, creme de menthe and vodka. Top glass off with orange juice.

name: Flugel
instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!

name: Fog Cutter
instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.

name: Foggy Morning
instructions: Serve on ice - peach juice to taste.

name: Fong Juice
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add malibu, then add pineapple juice. Stir.

name: Fontainebleau Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fontainebleau Sidecar
instructions: Mix or shake all ingredients, except grand marnier, with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float grand marnier on top.

name: Foreplay on the Neutral Ground
instructions: Fill glasses with ice. Mix absolut, midori, pineapple juice and cranberry juice in a decanter. Pour over ice and serve. Makes several.

name: Foreplay
instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!

name: Forest Funk
instructions: Moisten the rim of the collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

name: Formula 3
instructions: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.

name: Fort Lauderdale
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Forza FCK
instructions: Mix the tequila, vodka, banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice, and put it in an glass. Last, pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sinks to bottom of the glass.

name: Four Horsemen
instructions: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.

name: Four Roses Cocktail
instructions: Shake well in cracked ice, strain into cocktail glasses, serve with twists of lemon peel. Serves four.

name: Four Twenty
instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass.

name: Fourth of July
instructions: Layer in a shot glass, banded red/white/blue shot is perfect for the fourth of july.

name: Fox And Hounds
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fox Poison
instructions: Begin with vodka, then blue curacao. After that, add the lime liqueur. Mix in the grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with sprite and put in some ice cubes.

name: Fox River Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Frad
instructions: Add ice, put in sprite, then add pineapple juice, followed by the coconut rum and peach schnapps. Serve very cold.

name: Frangelico Float
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Frankenjack Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: Franziska
instructions: Heat and stir until the honey is dissolved.

name: Frappe (Plain)
instructions: Mix together. Blend at full power for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold. If you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

name: Fraustadt
instructions: Fill the boston shaker with all the ingredients and a lot of ice cubes, then shake untill your hand goes cold. Pour up in a highball glass and put a lemon slice on the edge.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the galliano on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Freddy Kruger
instructions: Make it an ample size shot!

name: Free Silver
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: French 75
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: French 125
instructions: Pour brandy and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: French 75 (Cognac)
instructions: Combine cognac, sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concoction. Garnish with lemon curl.

name: French Afternoon
instructions: Served on ice in a rocks glass. May be served with a little whipped cream on top.

name: French Connection #2
instructions: Combine ingredients into a snifter and serve neat, or add a small amount of ice if desired.

name: French Connection
instructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice, stir, and serve.

name: French Sailor
instructions: Mix warm cointreau and vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved.

name: French Whore
instructions: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Frenchie
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

name: Fresh Mint Liqueur
instructions: Wash leaves in cold water several times. Shake or pat dry gently. Snip each leaf in half or thirds. Discard stems. Measure cut mint leaves, packing lightly. Combine mint leaves and vodka in aging container. Cap and let stand in a cool place for 2 weeks, shaking occasionally. -- After initial aging, strain leaves from liqueur, discard leaves. In a saucepan, combine sugar and water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Let cool. Add cooled syrup to liqueur base, stirring to combine. Add glycerine and food color, pour into aging container for secondary aging of 1-3 more months.

name: Freson
instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Fria Cafe Italiano
instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

name: Friar Tuck
instructions: Shake and pour into a v-shape, and garnish with cinnamon.

name: Friday Freeze
instructions: Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be "semi - thick:" not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix, but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin, add sherbet, if too thick , add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

name: Frisco Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Frisco Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Frisky Steve
instructions: Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.

name: Frisky Witch
instructions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

name: Frisky
instructions: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

name: Frizzy Punch
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients in a trash can or large cooler. Stir until completely mixed.

name: Frog in a Blender
instructions: Blend orange juice, blue maui and vodka, and pour in glass. Splash grenadine on top, but do not stir in.

name: Frogster
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add the blue curacao, add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color, fill the glass with the orange juice.

name: From Russia With Love
instructions: Pour over ice.

name: Froth Blower Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frothy Redhead
instructions: Add in said order. Do not shake, soda will mix. Garnish with 2-3 grapes and sprinkle with sugar. Named after a friend who demanded a new drink.

name: Frozen Apple
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Berkeley
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Bird
instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Frozen Blue Daiquiri
instructions: Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Frozen Brandy And Rum
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Girl Scout
instructions: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

name: Frozen Grasshopper
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Frozen Margarita
instructions: Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. Pour tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Frozen Margarita #2
instructions: In a blender, add the can of limeade. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend, adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves 4.

name: Frozen Matador
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Mudslide #2
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients into mixer. Add vanilla ice cream and mix. Add more ice cream till desired texture.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Fruit a La La
instructions: Put all together in blender, and blend until smooth.

name: Fruit And Sherbet Punch
instructions: Mix the carbonated soft drink (like 7-Up) with different flavored fruit juices, and float the sherbet on top before serving.

name: Fruit Basket
instructions: Mix appropriate amounts in a pitcher or bowl. Pour into glass filled with ice. Garnish with the fruit of your choice.

name: Fruit Cooler
instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

name: Fruit Flip-Flop
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fruit Fly
instructions: Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit and cinnamon with 4 ice cubes in a blender. Add whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1/2 minutes at high setting.

name: Fruit Hippy
instructions: Pour the liquor. Fill with juice to taste.

name: Fruit Loop #2
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Fruit Loop
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

name: Fruit Lush
instructions: Mix ingredients in order, stir, enjoy.

name: Fruit of the Loom
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in shaker glass. Shake well, and strain into shot glass.

name: Fruit Pastille
instructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of gin, followed by the dry vermouth. Fill to desired level with orange juice. Gently pour in dashes of blue curacao so that about 2/3 of the orange turns green. Pour the dashes of grenadine to turn bottom of the drink red. Serve with a straw.

name: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
instructions: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 full with ice and add strawberries, pieces of watermelon, and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

name: Fruit Sensation
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add all the ingredients - mix well. Add straw and garnish if required.

name: Fruit Shake
instructions: Blend until smooth.

name: Fruit Tingle #2
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

name: Fruit Tingles
instructions: Place ice cubes in shaker, add all other ingredients and shake. Pour into shot glasses to drink.

name: Fruit Tingle
instructions: Pour curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add raspberry cordial and lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Tastes like the lollies called Fruit Tingles.

name: Fruitloops
instructions: Stir all ingredients and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Fruitopia
instructions: Pour ingredients, shake with ice and serve with a straw. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Fruity Pebbles
instructions: Mix all the ingredients to taste in any kind of container.

name: Fruity Pebble
instructions: Shake with ice. Drink as a shooter or pour over rocks.

name: Fruity Screaming Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour orange juice and peach schnapps in a punch bowl. Add the vodka. Pour the bottles of strawberry daiquiri mix in after. Stir a little. Serve.

name: Fruity Vodka Beverage
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.

name: Fu** Me Like A Beast
instructions: Combine all ingredients except 151, shake well with ice, pour into highball glass and top it off with bacardi 151.

name: FU2
instructions: Layer from top to bottom.

name: Fubar Kool-Aid
instructions: Mix in shaker over cracked ice, pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

name: Fuck in the Graveyard
instructions: Shake well, serve cold.

name: Fuck Me Up
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, shake and strain into shooter glass. Shoot drink!

name: Fucked Up Float
instructions: Mix together kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

name: Fuka
instructions: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

name: Funky Chicken
instructions: Mix in shot glass. Serve.

name: Funky Cold Medina
instructions: Pour over ice and top off with cranberry juice.

name: Funky Filly
instructions: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.

name: Funky Monkey
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

name: Funnel Cloud
instructions: Pour beer, ginger ale, vodka, light rum, and amaretto in a funnel. Turn the funnel while you drink it.

name: Fuquay Friday Night
instructions: Add absolut kurant and sprite to a cocktail glass. Mix in the grenadine syrup, and add the cherry cola. Serve. Add a dash of lime for a slightly different taste.

name: Fury
instructions: In a whiskey glass with ice, add equal parts vodka and spiced rum, a splash of sour mix, then top off with orange juice.

name: Fuzzball
instructions: Fill a cup 2/3 with sprite, 1/3 with peach schnapps, and add ice.

name: Fuzzless Navel
instructions: Pour peach nectar and orange juice into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Fuzzy Asshole
instructions: Fill coffee mug half full with coffee. Fill the other half full of peach schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

name: Fuzzy Ass
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar.

name: Fuzzy Astronaut
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Fuzzy Balls
instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.

name: Fuzzy Banana
instructions: Mix all parts together in a glass, or pitcher, depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.

name: Fuzzy Blue Gobbler
instructions: Start at the top and work your way down.

name: Fuzzy Bullet
instructions: Just mix it and drink it.

name: Fuzzy Chartreuse
instructions: Fill glass half full with crushed ice. Add midori, then fill glass the rest of the way full with ginger ale. This should result in a chartreuse colored drink. Add more midori to your taste.

name: Fuzzy Comfort
instructions: Carefully pour the rum or vodka, then other ingredients. Stir.

name: Fuzzy Cooter
instructions: Add the shots, and fill the rest with ginger ale, lemonade, and orange juice to taste.

name: Fuzzy F**ker
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass. Serve over ice.

name: Fuzzy Faser
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

name: Fuzzy Logic #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Logic
instructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

name: The Fuzzy Magnum
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass. Squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

name: Fuzzy Martini
instructions: Combine vodka and schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

name: Fuzzy Melonberry
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Fuzzy Monkey
instructions: Shooter. Shake ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

name: Fuzzy Navel #2
instructions: Orange juice last, stir, and enjoy!

name: Fuzzy Navel #3
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice (to taste) and stir to combine.

name: Fuzzy Nipple
instructions: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into highball glass and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

name: Fuzzy Peachclari
instructions: Pour vodka, then orange juice, then peach schnapps. Drink.

name: Fuzzy Pierced Navel
instructions: Pour over ice, stir.

name: The Fuzzy Pissbomb
instructions: Pour all ingredients in rocks glass. (with silver polka dots on it if possible) Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds. Drink it fast.

name: Fuzzy Russian
instructions: Mix both ingredients in a shot glass. Tilt head back. Swallow.

name: Fuzzy Screw Shot
instructions: Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka. Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter. Pour the triple sec in the remaining quarter. Stir and shoot.

name: Fuzzy Screw
instructions: Fill glass half with ice, add vodka, peach schnapps, and then orange juice. Stir.

name: Fuzzyberry
instructions: Mix ingredients together and top with ice.

name: G Bomb
instructions: Chill both ingredients by placing the bottles in the freezer for at least 1 hour. You should also chill the shot glasses you will be using the same way. Pour both ingredients into a chilled shot glass and enjoy.

name: G. T. O.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!

name: G4
instructions: Layer irish cream on top of amaretto.

name: Gagliardo
instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

name: Gailwarning
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Galliano Hotshot #2
instructions: Pour galliano into a shot glass, float hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.

name: Galliano Hotshot
instructions: Layer galliano, then hot coffee, then cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.

name: Galliano Island Iced Tea
instructions: Serve with ice. Stir vigorously until it has the consistency and appearance of iced tea.

name: Galliano Liqueur
instructions: Boil water, corn syrup and sugar for 5 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let stand 1 month.

name: Gangbuster Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a suitable glass.

name: Gareth Glowworm
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

name: Gates of Hell
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the cherry brandy over the top.

name: Gator Piss
instructions: Pour midori and rum over ice, and top off with sweet and sour mix.

name: Gator Wizz
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall glass, stir and serve.

name: Gauguin
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cherry) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Gayley Avenue Margarita
instructions: In a blender, pour in ice first, then the sweet and sour mix, followed by the strawberry margarita mix, followed by the tequila and triple sec. Blend until you have a nice mix, pour into chilled glass or mug, top with the cherry.

name: Geisha
instructions: Mix first two ingredients: fill with pineapple juice.

name: General Lee
instructions: Combine the lime juice, club soda, and sugar into a collins glass. Stir, then add ice cubes, anisette, and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

name: Generation X
instructions: Pour liquors in first, then add zima.

name: Generic Kamikaze
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice. Fill with sprite.

name: Gent Of The Jury
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the onions.

name: Gentle Ben
instructions: Mix together in a highball glass, add some ice and a straw. Serve.

name: Genuine Singapore Sling
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

name: George and Ginger
instructions: Pour george dickel over ice into a tall glass. Add ginger ale, and stir.

name: Georgia Peach #2
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, add southern comfort, peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Georgia Peach Iced Tea
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add vodka, gin, and rum. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Pour peach schnapps on top.

name: Georgia Pie
instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Georgia Tea
instructions: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.

name: Georgian Sunrise
instructions: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

name: German Hooker (Die Deutsche Nutte)
instructions: In a shaker, half filled with crushed ice, combine tequila and apfelkorn. Shake well. Strain into a high-ball glass filled with a few ice cubes. Fill up with orange juice. Serve with salt and lemon as a usual tequila shot.

name: Get Laid
instructions: Mix raspberry liqueur, vodka, and pineapple juice in the mixer, shake, strain, pour into glass, then add splash of cranberry juice.

name: Geting
instructions: Start with the ice, add the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale.

name: GG
instructions: Pour the galliano liqueur over ice cubes. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Gibson
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.

name: Gila Monster
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, top with orange juice.

name: Gilroy Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gin and Bitter Lemon
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

name: Gin and It
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink)

name: Gin and Pink
instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, tonic water, and bitters. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Gin and Sin
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Gin Balalajka
instructions: Mix the gin and juice and fill up with schweppes russian. The gin and juice may be shaken for better taste.

name: Gin Blossam
instructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of sprite. Pour in the schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

name: Gin Buck
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Cobbler
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Gin Cooler
instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

name: Gin Daisy
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Gin Fix
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Highball
instructions: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

name: Gin Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Gin Rickey
instructions: Pour juice of lime and gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Gin Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Gin Sling
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Gin Smash
instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

name: Gin Sour
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Gin Squirt
instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

name: Gin Swizzle
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Gin Toddy
instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Gin-Dew-It
instructions: Pour 1 shot of your favorite gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add mountain dew till glass is almost filled, then give it a splash of sprite. Stir well, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Ginger Swing
instructions: Pour curacao over ice in a highball glass, then fill the rest of the way up with ginger ale.

name: Irish Kiss
instructions: Pour the irish mist into a shot glass. Add a splash of green creme de menthe.

name: All Night Hunter
instructions: Pour equal amounts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hummingbird
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

name: Hummingbird #2
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: O Martini Cocktail
instructions: Serve in a rocks glass over ice, or straight up in a martini glass.

name: O & Tonic
instructions: Serve in a tall glass with ice.

name: O Cosmopolitan
instructions: Serve on the rocks. Garnish with a wedge of orange.

name: O & Cranberry
instructions: Stir together in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Sunset Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed martini glass.

name: Super O Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake and serve in a chillled glass with an orange garnish.

name: Bacardi O Tini
instructions: Shake bacardi O and pineapple juice, and pour into a chilled glass. Float raspberry liqueur on top.

name: Fruit Blast Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a martini glass and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Orange Rush
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Punch In The Pants
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice and serve.

name: Ooh La La Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain and serve in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: O Circle Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain and serve into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Chicago View
instructions: Shake with ice and serve over ice.

name: Sophisticate
instructions: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with melon, strawberry and sugar-coated orange.

name: O Look Martini Cocktail
instructions: Serve together in a sugar-rimmed glass garnished with a slice of grapefruit.

name: Tango Martini Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Squeeze orange juice into the bottom of the glass, and garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Bacardi Yeah Martini Cocktail
instructions: Serve in a chilled glass garnished with a lime and maraschino cherry.

name: Orangesicle
instructions: Blend ingredients and serve in a powdered sugar rimmed glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: The Leap Frog
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime and two maraschino cherries on both ends of the lime.

name: Satin Rouge
instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Sake O Martini
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: O My Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with grenadine.

name: O Madras
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: O & Cream
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and serve in a rocks glass over ice.

name: Bacardi O Coffee
instructions: Add bacardi O and coffee to a cup. Top with irish cream and green creme de menthe.

name: China Girl
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

name: Chinese Mary
instructions: Make like a Bloody Mary, improvising with ingredients until you find your preferred taste and texture. Try adding extra vodka to thin out the sauce a little. When heated, this also makes a great sauce for food.

name: Shanghai
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: African Breeze
instructions: Cover rim of glass with brown sugar. Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour cointreau over ice, followed by amarula cream. Add garnish.

name: El Salvador
instructions: Mix, shake, stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Panama Cocktail
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Panama Red
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Panama
instructions: Shake ingredients well and serve over ice.

name: Blow My Skull Off (Almost)
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass or cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well to combine, and chill. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Wildfire
instructions: Put the tabasco sauce in a shot glass. This is the firestarter. The tequila shot is the propellant which spreads the fire. The peppermint schnapps shot brings the fire under control, and finally, the beer puts out the last of the flames.

name: Ginelico
instructions: Stir gin and frangelico hazelnut liqueur with ice, strain into a cold cocktail glass, and garnish with some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Ginger Syllabub
instructions: 1. Put the sherry, sugar, spices, and lemon juice into a large mixing bowl, and stir until well-blended. Leave to soak for at least half an hour. 2. Beat the cream until it is stiff. Fold in the chopped ginger. Chill thoroughly. 3. Before serving, divide into four serving bowls and top with crumbs of crystallized ginger and a shake of nutmeg.

name: Giraffe
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur into a hurricane glass over ice. Add vodka and pineapple juice, then float the cranberry juice.

name: Girl Scout Thin Mint Cookie
instructions: Fill a mug with hot chocolate, add a shot of creme de menthe, stir and enjoy.

name: Girlie Martini
instructions: Coat the inside of a chilled cocktail glass with dry vermouth. In a mixing glass filled half way with crushed ice, combine vodka, champagne and maraschino liqueur. Stir and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and a maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer.

name: Gladiator
instructions: Mix the amaretto and southern comfort. Drop this mixture into a glass with the orange juice mixed with the 7-up.

name: Glam Trash
instructions: Fill 3/4 of a shot glass with chilled goldschlager then add 1/4 glass of bud light. Splash grenadine on top for color. Allow the beer to suspend the gold flakes in the glass. Serve immediately.

name: Glaucoma
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into glass.

name: Glitch
instructions: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored, which is lovely.

name: Glogg #2
instructions: 1. Combine all the non-alcoholic ingredients in a heavy enamel or stainless steel saucepan, bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. 2. Add the red wine and the port and bring to a boil again. Remove from heat and let steep, covered, for at least 2 hours. 3. Bring back to a simmer, add the brandy, and heat for 1 minute. If you want to be fancy you can put it into a warmed metal bowl, turn down the lights and ignite it before serving. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Gloom Raiser
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

name: Glow-Worm
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix. Float blue curacao on top.

name: Gluehwein
instructions: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Go Girl!
instructions: Mix ingredients together on ice.

name: Godchild
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Godfather
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. *Bourbon may be substituted for scotch, if preferred.

name: Godhead
instructions: Pour rum, vodka, raspberry liqueur and lime juice into a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 rum will lower the alcoholic content.)

name: Godiva Peppermint Patty
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into a brandy snifter. Add peppermint schnapps (rumple minze) and godiva, then stir. Top with whipped cream.

name: Godmother
instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Gold Baron
instructions: Float goldschlager on top of rumple minze and enjoy.

name: Gold Driver
instructions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour jose cuervo gold tequila into the glass until about half full (or more to taste). Top off with the orange juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink, and serve.

name: Gold Record
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Golden Apple
instructions: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Golden Blizzard
instructions: Add the shots of goldschlager and peppermint schnapps to a mason jar, then fill with eggnog.

name: Golden Bronx
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass.

name: Golden Cadillac #2
instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.

name: Golden Cadillac
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Golden Coke
instructions: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.

name: Golden Cola
instructions: Fill a highball glass halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

name: Golden Comfort
instructions: Mix, then pour into shot glass.

name: Golden Daze
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Golden Dream
instructions: Fill shaker glass one third full of ice cubes. Add galliano, cream de cacao, triple sec, orange juice (non pulp), and light cream. Shake vigorously until creamy and strain into a champagne flute, or use a blender and blend until creamy. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

name: Golden Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: Golden Furnace
instructions: Pour goldschlager into a shot glass. Add a splash of tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.

name: Golden Glow Punch
instructions: Pour the concentrate and the apple juice into the punch bowl. Stir the ginger ale into the bowl. Spoon in sherbet or add an ice ring. Serve immediately.

name: Golden Miller
instructions: Mix above ingredients together with lots of crushed ice. Enjoy!

name: Golden Shower
instructions: Stir rum and banana liqueur with ice. Fill with sprite, and serve.

name: Golden Sip
instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

name: Golden Slipper
instructions: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

name: Golden Sunrise
instructions: Pour amaretto, rum, and liqueurs into a mixing glass with/without ice. Top as desired with equal amounts of orange and pineapple juice, and shake well. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Goldfish
instructions: Mix peach schnapps with plain or citrus vodka. Add mandarin oranges.

name: Goldschlager Lemondrop
instructions: Shake with ice, serve straight up.

name: Good Fortune
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Good Morning To You My Love
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a mixer with ice. Serve in a small bowl garnished with strawberries or grapes and a straw.

name: Goombay Smash #2
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice, add all ingredients and shake well.

name: Goombay Smash
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and shake. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Gorilla Fart #2
instructions: Just add the 2 ingredients, and shoot it.

name: Gorilla Fart #5
instructions: Pour yukon jack into a shot glass. Add the bacardi 151 proof rum.

name: Gorilla Milk #2
instructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

name: Gorilla Milk
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka and dark creme de cacao. Fill with milk, shake and serve.

name: Gorilla Smile
instructions: Combine all in a blender with 8-12 oz of ice, blend. Garnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

name: Gorilla Snot #2
instructions: Layer the creme de banane over the melon liqueur. Then drop the advocaat into the middle of the creme de banane. The advocaat should hang in the middle if poured correctly.

name: Gorilla Sweat
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cinnamon stick) and heat gently until butter is melted. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Gorilla Cocktail
instructions: Add ingredients together and serve.

name: The Graduate
instructions: Shake over ice, strain.

name: Grainslide
instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Grand Blue
instructions: Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Grand Gold Margarita
instructions: Pour the the margarita mix, tequila, cointreau, grand marnier, and beer into a blender. For frozen margaritas, fill the blender with ice cubes and blend until the ice is crushed. (For margaritas on the rocks, use less ice and blend until the ingredients are thoroughly mixed.) The beer will create a frothy texture for the margarita. Dip the rim of the margarita glass in lime juice and then salt the rim with margarita salt.

name: Grand Marnier
instructions: Mix to dissolve sugar.

name: Grand Master
instructions: Pour the scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Grand Mimosa
instructions: Pour grand marnier into a champagne flute. Fill almost to the top with champagne and top off with fresh orange juice.

name: Grand Orange-Cognac Liqueur
instructions: Place zest and sugar in a small bowl. Mash and mix together with the back of a wooden spoon or a pestle. Continue mashing until sugar is absorbed into the orange zest and is no longer distinct. Place into aging container. Add cognac. Stir, cap and let age in a cool dark place 2 to 3 months, shaking monthly. After initial aging, pour through fine mesh strainer placed over medium bowl. Rinse out aging container. Pour glycerine into aging container and place cloth bag inside strainer. Pour liqueur through cloth bag. Stir with a wooden spoon to combine. Cap and age 3 more months before serving.

name: Granny Apple Blossom
instructions: Mix apple schnapps, gold tequila and daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to the top with 7-up.

name: Grape Ape
instructions: Mix ingredients as above in a tall glass.

name: Grape Crush
instructions: Add ingredients to a small shaker with ice. Stir and strain into shot glass.

name: Grape Flip
instructions: Shake or blend very well, serving ice cold in a burgundy glass. If you wish to garnish, use grapes.

name: Grape-Lemon-Pineapple Smoothie
instructions: Place ingredients into a blender and liquify.

name: Grape Nehi
instructions: Crush ice with lemon (or orange) and alcohols in a large glass. Use a strainer and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge or salt on the glass.

name: Grapefruit Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Grapefruit Lemonade
instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler, add grenadine syrup and grapefruit juice, top up with soda water. Stir a little and serve with a drinking straw.

name: Grapefruit Nog
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Grapes of Wrath
instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into the glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thoroughly.

name: Grapeschlager
instructions: Pour goldschlager over ice, then add the grape soda. Stir slightly, and enjoy.

name: Grapple
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Grass Skirt
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Grateful Dead #3
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add each liquor, fill with sour mix and stir. Add a splash of 7-up or sprite, and serve.

name: Gravedigger
instructions: Fill a shot glass half and half with bacardi 151 and jim beam whiskey in any order you want.

name: Greasy Swede
instructions: Mix together and serve. Do not chill or add ice.

name: Great Grapes
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Greazy Deigo
instructions: Empty zima into a glass. Add the bacardi, followed by the kool-aid. Mix until a light froth is achieved, and serve.

name: Greek Lightning
instructions: Pour into a mixing cup with 2 or 3 ice cubes, and chill to make a shooter. Strain into a shot glass or test tube.

name: Greek Sex On The Beach
instructions: Put all ingredients in together, and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

name: Greek Tycoon
instructions: Add the tanqueray "malacca" gin, followed by the metaxa brandy, and serve.

name: Green Angel
instructions: Blend pisang ambon, peachtree schnapps, malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in a collins glass and pour the mix over. Fill up with sprite, and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.

name: Green Apple
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Green Apple #2
instructions: Place all ingredients (minus 7-up) in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Pour a splash of 7-up into an old-fashioned glass and add the contents of the shaker.

name: Green Beret
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a shaker over ice. Shake well. Pour into a shot glass.

name: Green Bomber
instructions: Combine melon liqueur, gin, lime juice, and sweet vermouth into a shot glass. Drop the shot into a pint of beer. Drink both the shot and the beer at the same time.

name: Green Casa Noble
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, except lime twist, then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

name: Green Cookie Monster
instructions: Pour ingredients in a shot glass in the order listed.

name: Green Cow #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together and serve.

name: Green Cow
instructions: Blend the two ingredients together in roughly equal parts.

name: Green Creeper
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice.

name: Green Delight
instructions: Mix all the ingredients together, and serve cold.

name: Green Demon
