instructions: Shake vodka, rum, and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Green Dinosaur
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Green Dinosaur #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

name: Green Dinosaur #3
instructions: Stir ingredients in ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Dinosaur #4
instructions: Add all ingredients and shake.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Ferrit
instructions: Fill 3/4 of a pint glass with cider. Add the blue curacao and fill the glass with cider.

name: Green Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Green Froggy
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir.

name: Green Frog
instructions: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a highball glass. Add the sprite, a few drops of lime juice and ice cubes. Serve with a straw.

name: Green Gulf
instructions: Shake with ice. Add creme de menthe.

name: Green Hell #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice and add orange juice. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Green Hope
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and garnish with red cherries.

name: Green Iguana Margarita
instructions: Blend and pour into a salted glass.

name: Green Iguana
instructions: Mix tequila, midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix in a blender. Add ice. Serve in a margarita/coupette glass.

name: Green Jolly Rancher
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Green Lantern
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in order, shake once and pour into a glass.

name: Green Meanie
instructions: Fill the bottom of a highball glass with a shot of sour apple pucker and fill with lemon-lime soda.

name: The Green Mile
instructions: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Green Milkshake
instructions: Pour grenadine onto the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Finally, pour the contents of the shaker into a highball glass.

name: Green Monster #2
instructions: Pour 151 rum, lime juice, and food coloring into a glass with several ice cubes. Shake, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Monster Party Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients (in any order) in a large tub, which can hold several gallons. Stir so that the sherbert is completely dissolved. With the exception of the kool-aid and sherbert, as much or little of the other ingredients may be used.

name: Green Monster
instructions: Pour vodka over four ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

name: Green Motherfucker
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass.

name: Green Ocean
instructions: Blend quickly and serve.

name: The Green One
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and pour into a glass.

name: Green Opal
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Poison
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Green Puma
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a glass, stir, and serve.

name: Green Quencher
instructions: In tall glass, mix midori, lime juice, sweet and sour, and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.

name: Green Russian
instructions: Mix both ingredients together and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Green Sneaker
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Spider
instructions: Add the bacardi 151 to a shot glass, then add creme de menthe.

name: Green Summer
instructions: Take an ordinary glass, and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or coco ribe will work nicely. Then pour in cold/chilled mountain dew, and stir. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.

name: Green Tea
instructions: Mix chartreuse and sour mix on top of ice in a collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

name: Green Thing
instructions: Shake well until it is a cream color and is frothing.

name: Green Tree Frog
instructions: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink. Allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity, so the limes may "take effect."

name: Green Voodoo
instructions: Add ingredients and ice to a mixing tin. Shake 3 to 5 times and strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Wave
instructions: Pour alcohols into a hurricane glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix. Add ice and serve.

name: The Green Wave
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Chill and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Serve immediately.

name: Green Weenie
instructions: Take a swig of corona, then fill the bottle the rest of the way with margarita mix.

name: Green Whale
instructions: Place blue curacao, vodka and sugar into a blender. Fill to desired level with pineapple juice and orange juice at a ratio of 1:2 - (ie. 1 oz pineapple, 2 oz orange). Shake well, and strain into collins glass(es).

name: Green Widow
instructions: Pour blue curacao into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice over it. Stir and serve cold.

name: Green Zone
instructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.

name: Greenback
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Grendel
instructions: Shake ingredients (minus lemonade) with ice and pour into a pint glass. Top with lemonade.

name: Greven
instructions: Pour vodka, passoa and orange juice over ice in the glass. Add the blue curacao and the lime. Do not stir.

name: Greyhound
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Grim Reaper
instructions: Mix kahlua and 151 proof rum in an old-fashioned glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over the top to give an ice red tint.

name: Grinch #2
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and pour in the four alcohols. Add the sweet and sour, and the same amount with a touch more of 7-up. Float the blue curacao on top to finish.

name: Grinch
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour over ice and let chill. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Grog #2
instructions: Pour beer, vodka, and orange juice in a pitcher. Stir well.

name: Grog
instructions: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Ground Zero
instructions: Mix the ingredients together in equal parts and serve.

name: Grumpier Old Man
instructions: Pack a rocks or old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon (high proof bourbon, similar to wild turkey), lime juice, and top with sour mix. Serve with a sip stick, no garnish.

name: Grumpy Old Man
instructions: Pack an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon, lime juice and top with ginger ale. Serve with a sip stick, no garnish.

name: Grungeist
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour contents of the blender into a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

name: GSM
instructions: Stir it all together and serve.

name: GTV
instructions: The ingredients are best preserved cold for this purpose. To mix, just pour the ingredients into a glass. Add an ice cube, if you like.

name: Guinness Float
instructions: Put the ice cream in first, then add the Guinness carefully. Wait for the head to go down then fill to top. Blend if you want a milkshake.

name: Guinness Shandy
instructions: Mix lemonade with Guinness in a pint glass.

name: Gulyuz
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half-filled with cracked ice and shake for 1 minute. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gumball Hummer
instructions: Combine ingredients in equal parts over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain, and serve.

name: Gumby Dammit
instructions: Half-fill a pint beer mug with ice cubes. Add vodka and midori. Fill with cider. Sip.

name: Gunfire
instructions: Pour one cup of strong black tea, add rum and stir.

name: Gypsy Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Gaawanger
instructions: Mix over ice in a highball glass and fill the rest of the glass with equal parts pineapple juice and ginger ale.

name: Gables Collins
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with a slice of lemon and a pineapple chunk.

name: Gaelic Coffee
instructions: Blend until smooth and pour into an irish coffee cup. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with green creme de menthe for color.

name: Gandy Dancer
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass.

name: Gasoline
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gator Booger
instructions: Mix in a tall glass with ice (or a frosted mug) and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Gayhound
instructions: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

name: Gene Splice
instructions: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Genoa
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Georgia Mint Julep
instructions: Build in a collins glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Georgio
instructions: Frappe in a parfait glass and garnish with mint leaves, whipped cream and a light dusting of cocoa.

name: Gerbil
instructions: Mix and serve over ice in a lowball glass.

name: German Band
instructions: Stir with plenty of ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Gibbs
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and stir well.

name: Gimto
instructions: Mix in a chilled lowball glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Gin and Fresca
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gin and Bitters
instructions: Put Bitters into a cocktail glass and revolve the glass until it is entirely coated. Fill with gin.

name: Gin Cassis
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass.

name: Gin Cassis Fizz
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the centre of the drink.

name: Gin Crusta
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass rimmed with lemon juice and sugar. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

name: Gin Thing
instructions: Build gin and lime juice in a highball glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Ginza Strip
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Gipsy
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Glacier Mist
instructions: Build into a cocktail glass over ice.

name: Glad Eye
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Glass Tower
instructions: Build in a collins glass and fill with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Glitter and Trash
instructions: Pour gin into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with sprite. Top up with a splash of vodka.

name: Gloom Chaser
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Gloom Lifter
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Godiva Peppermint Kiss
instructions: Stir over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Golden Dawn
instructions: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with grenadine.

name: Golden Friendship
instructions: Mix amaretto, sweet vermouth and white rum in a collins glass with ice, and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with an orange spiral and a cherry.

name: Golden Nugget
instructions: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Nugget #2
instructions: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Oldie
instructions: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Golden Panther
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Golden Tang
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Gold Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gold Margarita #2
instructions: Build in a lowball or margarita glass, and serve.

name: Gold Standard
instructions: Shake and serve in a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Golf Cocktail
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Golf Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Gone Tomorrow
instructions: Build in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with just the stem of a cherry.

name: Goober
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Good Coffee
instructions: Mix in a coffee mug.

name: Gorgeous
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Gorky Park Cooler
instructions: Shake or blend over ice and pour into a large, chilled wine goblet. Add ice cubes if necessary and garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Graham Cracker Smasher
instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Grampa Doogin
instructions: Layer Yukon Jack on the bottom of an old-fashioned glass, add the blueberry then the orange juice. Top with cranberry juice.

name: Grand Quetsch
instructions: Stir without ice and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Grand Royal Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and stir.

name: Grape Coconut
instructions: Build over ice into a highball glass.

name: Grapefruit Splash
instructions: Mix vodka with grapefruit soda to desired strength. Serve with ice in a rocks glass.

name: Grape Rape
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a white grape.

name: Grape Rocket
instructions: Mix ingredients in a large old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Grappa Strega
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Great Gatsby
instructions: Combine gin and vodka in a martini glass. Splash with sweet vermouth and add fresh lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Great Head
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Greek Buck
instructions: Shake brandy and lemon juice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale and float ouzo.

name: Greek Iced Coffee
instructions: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice and pour into a coffee mug.

name: Green Ant
instructions: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Green Dream
instructions: Blend on low speed with ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Green Fairy
instructions: Shake thoroughly with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Fantasy
instructions: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with kiwi fruit slices.

name: Green Gables
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Green Headache
instructions: Mix in a cocktail glass, and slam it! Be prepared for a five-alarm headache if you do too many of these.

name: Green Hornet
instructions: Chill ingredients, pour lemon juice over pisco in a lowball glass and top off with tonic water. Serve with a slice of lime.

name: Green Island
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a parfait glass and top with creme de menthe. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Green Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

name: Green Mexican
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add tequila and midori, fill rest of glass with sour mix, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Green Mist
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi fruit and a mint.

name: Green Pussy
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Green Room
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Slime
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Green Stinger
instructions: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Green Vodka
instructions: Mix and drink.

name: Guadka
instructions: Pour both ingredients chilled into a glass and enjoy.

name: Babyface Martini
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Baby Fingers Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Baby V.O.X.
instructions: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Bacardi Pina Colada
instructions: Frappe and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Bacardi Special
instructions: Shake all but rum with ice until cold. Add rum and shake again. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Backfire On The Freeway
instructions: Drop a double shot of 151 into a beer mug of guinness and chug immediately.

name: Backyard Dawg
instructions: Add all liquors and grenadine to a shaker with crushed ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into a tall glass with cubed ice. Add the ginger ale and garnish with a cherry.

name: Bad Attitude
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with equal parts of each juice and pour into a tall glass.

name: Baha Fog
instructions: Open a corona and fill it to the top with tequila. Squeeze a 1/4 lime on top. Chug immediately.

name: Bahamas Highball
instructions: Stir in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Bahia Cooler
instructions: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Balalaika
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bald Taco
instructions: Combine in a cocktail glass.

name: Bali Hai
instructions: Shake ingredients (except champagne) with cracked ice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with champagne.

name: Ball Banger
instructions: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

name: Ballet Russe Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ball Or Head
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Ballylickey Bait
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the honey and a little water until it dissolves. Add ice cubes and whiskey and fill with sparkling water. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Bamboo Cocktail
instructions: Stir in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Banana Banshee
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Banana Berry
instructions: Pour creme de banane over ice in a highball glass. Fill to the top with milk and add grenadine.

name: Banana Bird
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Bliss
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Di Amore
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a red wine glass. Garnish with orange and banana slices.

name: Banana Foster
instructions: Blend until smooth and pour into a large brandy snifter. Sprinkle cinnamon on top.

name: Banana Italiano
instructions: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bananalyzer
instructions: Pour the liquors, ice and coca-cola into a collins glass to make it 3/4 full. Fill to the top with milk.

name: Banana Popsicle
instructions: Pour over ice in a shaker adding equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice to the spirits. Shake and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass.

name: Banana Rum Frappe
instructions: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Banana Sandwich
instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Slip
instructions: Layer in a cordial glass.

name: Banana Slushee
instructions: Blend ingredients in a pitcher until the mixture is slushy. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Banff Cocktail
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bannockburn
instructions: Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Barbados Punch
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime slice and a pineapple wedge.

name: Barbara
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Barbarella
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Barbed Wire
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Barbican
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Barking Spider
instructions: Serve over ice in a collins glass, or blend for a frozen version of this drink.

name: Barn Door
instructions: Pour into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Float the cranberry juice.

name: Barn Door #2
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Barnum
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Baronial
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Basin Street
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bastardo
instructions: Build in a highball glass and fill with club soda.

name: Batida Abaci
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

name: Batida de Pina
instructions: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Bayard Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: H-Bomb
instructions: Dump out six ounces of beer, add alcohol, fill up the rest of the beer can with water, mix and let settle.

name: H.P.W. Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: H2O
instructions: Pour in vodka, pineapple, orange, lemonade, and fresca, then mix.

name: Ha Ha Tonka
instructions: Fill a 16 oz cup with ice, pour in alcohol, then top with orange juice.

name: Haacker Special
instructions: Pour vodka into a glass. Add sugar and a suitable amount of crushed ice with the lime cubes. Stir until all sugar is dissolved.

name: Haidin-Haidin
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Hair Raiser
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hairy Happy Trail
instructions: Mix with whatever is available.

name: Hairy Sunrise
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender except grenadine. Pour into a collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Hakkespett
instructions: Layer cointreau and chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match, lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it. Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside, shoot the entire contents, put two fingers in your mouth, inhale sharply and deeply, and then try to say: "Hakkespett!" (In English: "Woodpecker!") Good luck!

name: Half and Half
instructions: Fill 1/2 a pint glass with harp. Slowly fill the remainder of the glass with guinness, pouring it slowly over the back side of a spoon as to layer it nicely on top.

name: Halfway Special
instructions: Combine with ice, strain, and serve in a hollowed-out pineapple.

name: Margarita Cocktail #3
instructions: Use a large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake ingredients well, and pour them through a strainer into a margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.

name: Harakiri Shot
instructions: Mix the ingredients in a shot glass and serve with a pint of beer on the side.

name: Hard Core
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the cola last. Hang orange on rim of glass.

name: Hard Eight
instructions: Add rum, lime juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon spiral.

name: Hard Green Bricaki
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and add liquors. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Shake well and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

name: Harlem Cocktail
instructions: Shake gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino liqueur with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Harlem Mugger
instructions: Build ingredients in order over ice in a collins glass.

name: Harlem World Seven
instructions: Mix over ice cubes, pour into a suitable glass and consume immediately. NOTE: It might taste funny because of the prune juice but you should get an effect out of it.

name: Harley Davidson #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Harry Alligator
instructions: Layer ingredients in order listed above. Squeeze a wedge of lemon over layered ingredients. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

name: Harry Boy
instructions: Mix with ice and serve cool.

name: Harry Denton Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Harsh
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Harvard Cooler
instructions: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Harvest Moon
instructions: Pour first 4 ingredients over ice into a collins glass, slowly adding grenadine as you stir.

name: Harvey Cowpuncher
instructions: Mix together.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions: In a glass with ice, add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and orange juice. Stir and float liqueur on top. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Hashi Bashi
instructions: Pour gin and campari over a couple of ice cubes. Fill up with schweppes russian.

name: Hasty Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hat Trick
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the dark rum, light rum, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hat Trick #2
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Haus Special
instructions: Serve cold, with or without ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Havana Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hawaii Five-O
instructions: Add all ingredients on top of ice in a highball glass.

name: Hawaiian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Shooter
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a tall shot glass.

name: Hawaiian Sunset
instructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Shake vodka, orange juice and cranberry juice in a shaker. Pour into glass. Top off with soda water. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice (optional).

name: Hawaiian Volcano #2
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Hawaiian Volcano
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Hawaiian Punch From Hell
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice, shake and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Haywire
instructions: Serve over ice. Regular 7-up and amaretto can be used if cherry 7-Up is not available. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Headcrack
instructions: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

name: Headcrush
instructions: Fill the glass with tequila and add tabasco sauce. Carefully layer the whipped cream on top and add some salt to taste.

name: Headhunter
instructions: Mix liquors (except beer) in a tall tumbler. Stir in the juices, and shake with ice. Slowly add the beer and stir to blend. Serve in a tall glass or a 1/2 coconut shell with the meat intact.

name: Headless Horseman
instructions: Put vodka and bitters into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with ginger ale, and stir. Add the orange slice and serve.

name: The Head
instructions: Place ice in a glass upto the rim. Add alcohol followed by cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: Heilig
instructions: Pour vodka and then blueberry schnapps into a shot glass. Top off with the cranberry juice.

name: Heliuva Rootbeer
instructions: Pour into a glass and serve.

name: Hell Mary
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker, fill with V8 juice and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste. Serve in a collins glass filled with ice, and garnish with celery and a lemon wedge.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hennyville Slugger
instructions: Pour the cognac into a highball glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite. Squeeze 1/2 of a medium size lemon into the drink and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

name: Herbal Flame
instructions: Pour hot damn 100 into the bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with a spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

name: Hershey Squirts
instructions: Make cocoa in the traditional method, and add whiskey liberally.

name: Highball Cocktail
instructions: Fill a medium glass most of the way with 4 - 5 ice cubes. Add the whiskey, and fill the rest up of the way with ginger ale.

name: Highland Fling Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Highland Sling
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Hillinator
instructions: Mix the captain morgans, mountain dew and sugar in one glass. Pour the fire water into a shot glass. Take the shot, then follow it with the mixed drink. Make sure to drink the mixed drink quickly.

name: Hina Blast
instructions: Heat wine, add raisins and boil. Mix coca-cola, tequila, orange juice and add to boiled wine with raisins. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour champagne over the bananas. Mix everything together and store in a glass jar. Place in a fridge for 8 hours. Served chilled with fresh cherries.

name: Hispaniola
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice and a cherry. Stir.

name: Hokkaido Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hole-In-One
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Holiday Cheer
instructions: Mix champagne and frozen cranberry juice (undiluted). Slice lime and garnish each wine glass. Serve with breakfast to start the day right. Note: Mix right before serving to retain the bubbles. You may use non-alcoholic champagne.

name: The Hollywood
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Hologram
instructions: Place ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Holy Doodle
instructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

name: Holy Water
instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add one dash of grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

name: Honey Lemonade
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Honey Liquor
instructions: Dissolve honey in hot water. The water should not be hotter than 45 degrees celsius. Let the mixture cool down, then add spirit of wine (alcohol). You may exchange the spirit of wine with spirits like whisky, brandy or a similar strong liquor, to get a lighter liquor.

name: Honey-Dew-Me
instructions: Serve as a chilled shot.

name: Honeymoon Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Honolulu Cocktail #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Honolulu Cooler
instructions: Pack a tall glass with crushed ice, add lime juice and southern comfort. Fill with pineapple juice and stir.

name: Hoo Doo
instructions: Mix southern Comfort, finlandia vodka, orange juice, and lime juice over ice. Top with a splash of peppermint schnapps and sprite.

name: Hoots Mon
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hop Toad
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked #2
instructions: Empty a bag of ice into a large cooler. Add the cans of limeade and lemonade, then the 2 liter bottle of sprite. Add 1/2 gallon of vodka and 20-24 cans of beer.

name: Hornet
instructions: Combine gin and peppermint schnapps over ice, add cola, and top with a lime slice.

name: Hornpipe
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Horny Bull
instructions: Pour and slug back.

name: Horny Bull #2
instructions: Pour and slug back.

name: Horny Bull #3
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Kamikaze
instructions: Add lime juice, triple sec and Smirnoff No.21 Vodka. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Rob Roy
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Old-Fashioned Cocktail
instructions: Combine the sugar cube, bitters, and 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Muddle well, add blended whiskey, and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel and ice cubes. Add slices of orange and lemon and top with the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Madras
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except lime wedge) into a highball glass over ice. Add the lime wedge and serve.

name: Orgasm
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Pour the scotch and drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Rum Runner
instructions: Alcohol Content 0.497

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Dirty Tuaca
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a short glass.

name: Horny Girlscout
instructions: Chill ingredients. Add the coffee liqueur to a shot glass first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.

name: Horse And Jockey
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Horse Jizz
instructions: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.

name: Hot Afternoon
instructions: Add ingredients to a shot glass and drink.

name: Hot Apple Pie
instructions: Mix tuaca and cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high power for 2 1/2 minutes. Stir again, and serve.

name: Hot Bitch
instructions: Add all the alcoholic measures into the glass without stirring, then add the dash of tabasco and serve.

name: Hot Brown Lizard
instructions: Mix midori with cinnamon schnapps until the desired tone of brown is achieved.

name: Hot Buttered Cranberry Punch
instructions: Crush cranberry sauce with a fork. Mix with sugar, spices and salt. Add water and pineapple juice. Cover and simmer 2 hours. Ladle into mugs and float a pat of butter in each serving.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #2
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
instructions: Mix ingredients in coffee mug, and top with whipped cream.

name: Hot Chocolate
instructions: Combine sugar and cocoa, add milk and a dash of salt. Makes 8 servings. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in a coffee mug, add boiling water and stir.

name: Hot Chocolate #2
instructions: Mix milk, cocoa, sugar and coffeemate. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in coffee mug, add boiling water and stir.

name: Hot Chocolate To Die For
instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream. Serve in the smallest coffee mugs you can find to all your friends. Top with freshly whipped cream, made from left over cream, and a mini-marshmellow.

name: The Hot Churchill
instructions: Let crushed ginger sit in the rum for as long as possible, preferably overnight. Add honey to the glass. Top with hot water.

name: Hot Damn Shooter
instructions: Shake all ingredients adding orange juice to taste. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Hot Devilish Daiquiri
instructions: In 2 qt. microproof casserole, combine hot water, sugar, spices, and concentrated juices. Stir, then cook on HI 5-6 minutes or until mixture boils. Heat rum in microproof container on HI for 30 seconds. Ignite and pour over hot beverage. Ladle into punch cups for serving.

name: Hot Georgia Peach
instructions: Chill and pour into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Hot Gold
instructions: Pour orange juice into a red wine glass and add amaretto. Garnish with the stick of cinnamon as a stirrer and serve.

name: Hot Jose
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and enjoy.

name: Hot Lemonade
instructions: Squeeze the juice of the lemon into a 10-oz. glass. Add maple syrup and a dash of cayenne pepper. Fill with ice water. Stir. Drink.

name: Hot Lunch
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.

name: Hot Mulled Cider
instructions: Dump cider, cinnamon sticks and a couple of teaspoons of nutmeg into a pot over very low heat. Wash and slice oranges, and stick whole cloves into the rind, then float in cider as it warms. Serve when warm.

name: Hot Mulled Cider #2
instructions: Combine apple cider/juice, brown sugar, and nutmeg in a large saucepan. Place cinnamon, allspice, and cloves in a cheesecloth and tie. Add to cider mixture, and bring to the boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove spice bag and discard. Serve mixture in mugs with a clove-studded orange wedge in each.

name: Hot Nun
instructions: Pour frangelico into a brandy snifter glass. Add honey, lemon peel and cloves and fill snifter with hot water.

name: Hot Pants
instructions: Shake with ice cubes and pour into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate
instructions: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.

name: Hot Scotch
instructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps (buttershots) into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Hot Scott
instructions: Pour together to ensure a good mix.

name: Hot Shot #2
instructions: Mix vodka and peppermint schnapps in a shot glass. Add a dash of tabasco sauce.

name: Hot Shot
instructions: Pour hot coffee into a shot glass and gently add the galliano, so it floats on the coffee. Then add some lightly whipped cream over it.

name: Hot Spiced Cider
instructions: Add allspice, clove and cinnamon stick to the apple cider and let simmer for 1 hour (or longer). This may not look like much spice, but it really does make a pleasantly spicey cider.

name: Hot Spiced Cider #2
instructions: Combine the cider, sugar and spices in a large saucepan. Heat slowly to boiling. Boil for 3-5 minutes, remove spices, and serve hot. Garnish with orange slices, lemon slices, or rings of unpared red apple with whole cloves forced through peel. 16 servings. If desired, chill spiced cider and serve over ice cubes made from apple juice.

name: Hot Springs Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hot Summer Breeze
instructions: Soak several slices of habanero pepper in the bottle of vodka for 3 months before using. It will give you that feeling of a summer hot breeze.

name: Hot Toddy
instructions: Brew tea and fill a tall glass 3/4 full. Mix in honey. Mix in brandy shots. Add lemon slice and enjoy.

name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the crushed slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Howell Says So
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Hudson Bay
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hudson
instructions: Pour together and stir as required.

name: Hummer
instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Hunch Punch
instructions: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.

name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

name: Hurlyburly
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with dried cranberries.

name: Hurricane #2
instructions: Pour gin, rums, amaretto, and triple sec into a hurricane glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

name: Hurricane Flint
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hurricane Hugo
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice in large shaker. Add more juice to taste for the lightweights. Shake well and strain into shot glass. This recipe may be doubled or quadrupled. We strongly encourage this.

name: Hurricane Laura
instructions: Stir and pour in shot glasses.

name: Hurricane Leah
instructions: Pour over ice into a hurricane glass, and stir. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Hurricane, New Orleans Style
instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in hurricane glass. Best enjoyed through a small straw. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired.

name: The Hurtado
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass with a lot of ice, shake well and serve.

name: Hurts You Right Here
instructions: Mix together in a double shot glass. Shoot.

name: Hybris
instructions: Build in a highball glass, on ice. Decorate with lime.

name: Hyper-Active Apple
instructions: In an irish coffee cup pour chilled caramel, then slowly pour one shot of chilled apple schnapps over caramel. Slowly add steamed milk, pour espresso through steamed milk exceedingly slowly, and top with whipped cream or foam. It should come out to be a 4 layer happily alcoholic latte.

name: Ice Bolts
instructions: Mix kahlua and tonic water with crushed ice, and strain into a glass with ice.

name: Ice Cappuccino
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into a poco grande glass.

name: Ice Cream Genius
instructions: Blend all ingredients together in a blender.

name: Ice Palace
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

name: Ice Pick
instructions: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

name: Ice Pick #2
instructions: In a large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

name: Ice-Cream Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Ice-T
instructions: Shake or stir. Serve with ice cubes.

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water #2
instructions: Add ice-cream last. Enjoy!

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water
instructions: Place all drinks into a glass and add ice-cream at the end.

name: Iceberg
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a blender, blend, and pour into a frozen highball glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

name: Iced Coffee Fillip
instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

name: Iced Coffee
instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in a coffee mug.

name: Iced Velvet
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour black velvet canadian whisky over the top. Fill with iced tea. Stir with a straw.

name: The Icelandic Way
instructions: Mix a normal glass of vodka and fanta lemon, drink down to half and fill up with equal parts of beer and coke.

name: Ideal Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Iguana #2
instructions: Mix vodka and tequila over ice in a shaker. Add Kahlua. Shake and pour into a shot glass.

name: Iguana
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the lime slice and serve.

name: Illusion
instructions: Pour all spirits into a shaker and top with a splash of pineapple juice.

name: Imagination
instructions: Pour rye whiskey into a highball glass. Add the desired amount of ice. Fill to the top with ginger ale and add a splash of lime. Stir until well mixed.

name: Immaculata
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Imperial Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Imperial Moka
instructions: Shake and serve.

name: In and Out Martini
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, and add a splash of dry vermouth. While glass chills, add 4 fingers of gin in a mixer of ice. Throw away ice/vermouth in cocktail glass then strain in gin.

name: Indian Summer
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and drink as a shot.

name: Indigo Blues
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Inferno
instructions: Add tabasco sauce into the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts absolut peppar and everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

name: Insomniac
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into a poco grande glass. Sprinkle some optional nutmeg or cinnamon on top.

name: Instant Death
instructions: Put in all alcoholic ingredients first, water last, then salt.

name: Inverted Pyramid Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with an orange twist.

name: Inverted Traffic Light
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Pour in peach schnapps, then add orange juice 3/4 to the top and shake. Slowly add and sink the grenadine to the bottom. In a mixer, mix the blue curacao with vodka and slowly strain that into the cocktail glass.

name: Irish Cactus
instructions: Pour irish cream and tequila over ice and stir.

name: Irish Coffee #3
instructions: 1. Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. 2. Pour the irish whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. 3. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Irish Coffee (Simple)
instructions: Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey, followed by the coffee. Stir until sugar is dissolved, and let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top and serve.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Combine whiskey, sugar and coffee in a mug and stir to dissolve. Float cold cream gently on top. Do not mix.

name: Irish Comfort
instructions: Combine southern comfort and blue curacao in a highball glass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue curacao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

name: Irish Cream #2
instructions: Put everything into a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

name: Irish Cream #1
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend on lowest setting until frothy or well blended. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Cream #2
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for no longer than 2 mins. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Store in the refrigerator for up to one month.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur #2
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender, blend well. Bottle and let mellow in refrigerator at least one week befor serving. this has been found to be best after 1-2 weeks. Store in a refrigerator. Liqueur at room temperature by removing from refrigerator 1-2 hours before serving.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur #3
instructions: Blend (use blender) all ingredients until smooth. Store tightly covered in refrigerator. Shake before serving. Keeps up to one month.

name: Irish Cream, Home Made #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well stirred. Consume within two weeks. Some ingredients are perishable. Store in an airtight container so you can shake it before each use. The chocolate settles at the bottom.

name: Irish Cream, Home Made
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a blender or mix in a bowl with a whisk until fully blended.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add syrups, and serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Griep
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

name: Irish Highball
instructions: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Irish Pirate
instructions: Combine in a shot glass.

name: Irish Pride
instructions: Layer in a highball glass and mix.

name: Irish Rickey
instructions: Pour irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Irish Russian
instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do not add ice.

name: Irish Spring
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Iron Butterfly
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add kahlua and irish cream, and stir. Garnish with 1 - 3 optional filbert nuts.

name: Ironlung
instructions: Pour yukon jack into a shot glass. Top with a small float of bacardi 151 rum. Add a small topping of whipped cream.

name: The Irresistible Manhattan
instructions: Combine the ingredients in a small pitcher and add 1 tsp of juice from your jar of maraschino cherries. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry or slice of orange.

name: Is Paris Burning
instructions: Stirred, not shaken. Rocks acceptable. Fresh raspberry optional.

name: Italian Delight
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Italian Heather
instructions: Pour the scotch and galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: The Italian Job
instructions: Whisk with a fork, until all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.

name: Italian Limoncello
instructions: 1. Wash the lemons with a vegetable brush and hot water to remove any reside of pesticides or wax. Carefully zest the lemons with a zester or vegetable peeler so there is no white pith on the peel. In a 1-gallon glass jar, add one fifth vodka and the lemon zest. Cover the jar and let sit at room temperature for at least 10 days, and up to 40 days in a cool dark place. 3. In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and water and cook until thickened, appx. 5 to 7 minutes. Let the syrup cool before adding it to the limoncello mixture. Add the additional fifth of vodka. Allow to rest for another 10 to 40 days. 4. After the rest period, strain and bottle, discarding the lemon zest. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.

name: Italian Margarita
instructions: Pour into a margarita/coupette glass and stir. Add ice cubes.

name: Italian Nut
instructions: Shake. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Italian Screw
instructions: Add to a highball glass. Add vodka, galliano, and fill with pulpless orange juice.

name: Italian Soda #2
instructions: Pour chambord into bottom of the glass. Top with soda water. Do not stir. Serve with straw.

name: Italian Soda
instructions: Pour vodka over ice and fill with ginger ale.

name: Italian Sombrero
instructions: Shake amaretto and cream well, pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Italian Stallion
instructions: Place the ingredients in the order above into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Italian Stinger
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add brandy and galliano. Stir and garnish with wedge of lime.

name: Italian Sunrise #2
instructions: Blend until slushy, pour and enjoy.

name: Italian Sunset
instructions: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Italian Surfer
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled glass. Stir to mix.

name: Izayoi
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve. Izayoi means the 16th moon in japanese.

name: Jack Rose Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jack Rose
instructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jack-In-The-Box
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jackson 5
instructions: Mix the shots of rum, vodka, amaretto over ice, add a dash of sour mix, then fill the rest with cranberry juice.

name: Jacobs Haze
instructions: Mix vodka, jagermeister and red bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

name: Jade Isle
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) in a shaker cup. Strain into a hurricane glass 1/2 filled with chipped ice. Garnish with a cherry and a long straw.

name: Jade
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Jager Tonic
instructions: Add jagermeister to a highball glass with three ice cubes. Fill with tonic water and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Jager Vacation
instructions: Add all three ingredients in a shaker or blender, and mix with ice.

name: Jagerbeer Bomb
instructions: Pour the beer into a glass, then drop the shot of jagermeister into it (shot glass optional)

name: Jagershock
instructions: Chill the two ingredients then pour into a chilled shot glass (the order you put them in does not matter).

name: Jagnog
instructions: Mix in a punchbowl or make individual drinks.

name: Jaguar
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Add ice if desired.

name: Jamaica Glow
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Hop
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Kiss
instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of tia maria and a shot of jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Jamaica Me Crazy
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in rum and tia maria. Add pineapple juice.

name: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
instructions: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

name: Jamaican Banana
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, top with a whole strawberry, and serve.

name: Jamaican Beer
instructions: Pour vermouths, gin and whisky into a glass. Add the beer, and finish with a drop of both blue curacao and vodka.

name: Jamaican Bum
instructions: Pour the shots into a glass over ice, fill with 7-up, add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

name: Jamaican Cabdriver
instructions: Put ice into a glass. Add orange juice and coconut rum. Lastly add cranberry juice to taste and stir well.

name: Jamaican Coffee
instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

name: Jamaican Dust-Buster
instructions: Mix ingredients in a glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Dust
instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Green Sunrise
instructions: Start with the ice cubes. Pour rum and orange juice. Carefully add blue curacao, making sure it falls to the bottom. Layer pineapple vodka on top.

name: Jamaican Jambaylaya
instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill to the top with fruit punch.

name: Jamaican Juice
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a mason jar. Using the exact amounts as above, pour the rum and juice into the masor jar and mix.

name: Jamaican Me Crazy
instructions: Mix in a shaker glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Screw
instructions: Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.

name: Jamaican Sunrise
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps, and orange juice in a glass and be sure to mix them well. Add the cranberry juice and let it sit at the top of the glass.

name: Jamaican Sunset #2
instructions: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with orange juice and add a splash of grenadine. Shake or stir.

name: Jamaican Ten Speed
instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

name: James D
instructions: Combine ingredients. Stir.

name: The James Robert Dean
instructions: Mix to make a large punch.

name: James The Second Comes First
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Japanese Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Japanese Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lime peel and serve.

name: Jasmine
instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: The Jaw
instructions: Mix them all together in a tall glass, and serve.

name: Jay In Your Tummy
instructions: Shake all the above ingredients in a tin with ice.

name: Jealous Queen
instructions: Mix together in a glass.

name: Jell-o Jiggler Shots
instructions: Mix jell-o and unflavored gellatin in a bowl. Add the boiling water. Wait a few minutes to cool and add vodka. Pour into a pan and refrigerate until solidified. Cut into squares and enjoy!

name: Jello Shot
instructions: Mix hot water and jello. Add rum. Pour into 2 ounce cups. Serve after the jello has set.

name: Jello-Shot Supreme
instructions: Bring water to a boil. Mix with a large package of black cherry jello. Then add peachtree schnapps, mix well. Pour into small plastic shots or 2 oz. containers. Chill and enjoy.

name: Jens Special
instructions: Pour bacardi lim�n into a glass, add the sprite and the red bull, then stir to mix.

name: Jeremiah
instructions: Mix all ingredients except milk in a mixing glass. Add ice, then fill the glass with milk. Shake vigorously, pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Jersey Cherry
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Jersey Devil
instructions: Put cranberry juice in a punch bowl. Add apple cider/juice and apple juice brandy to taste. Slice apple in 3/16th.

name: Jersey Lightning
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
instructions: Add sugar, vodka, and sour mix over ice and shake. Fill with sprite/7-up, and top with grenadine or cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge.

name: Jesus is Here
instructions: Pour the vodka and then the russian. Stir gently. Drink.

name: Jet Black
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jet Pilot
instructions: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour in the rums, followed by the juices. Add the grenadine. Top with a double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preferred.

name: Jetstream
instructions: Shake the spirits with crushed ice in a shaker and pour in the cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

name: Jewel Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Jewel of the Nile
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jeyplak Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Jillionaire
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jilly
instructions: In a rocks glass, pour the vodka over ice. Fill 3/4 with tonic water, add a splash of cranberry juice, then squeeze the lime wedge in.

name: Jo Jo
instructions: Stir with a butter knife.

name: Jo-Jo Cool-Aid
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add southern comfort and amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Jock Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the scotch, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Jock-In-A-Box
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes.

name: Jocose Julep
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except carbonated water) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: Joe Blow
instructions: Add vodka to fresca in a glass.

name: Joe Collins
instructions: Pour scotch and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola and stir lightly. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Jogeir
instructions: Mix lime vodka, absolut citron and juice together and put it in a shot glass. Add galliano right before serving. Shoot it.

name: John Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: John Daly
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with equal parts lemonade/iced tea. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Johnnie Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Johnny Cat
instructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice into a shaker. Shake well and pour into a red wine glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.

name: Johnny K8
instructions: Pour the first 3 ingredients into a shaker and shake. Pour over ice and top up with tonic. Layer with blue curacao.

name: Johnny on the Beach
instructions: Mix over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Jolly Green Giant
instructions: Mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute with lime vodka.

name: Jolly Jumper
instructions: Put together, fill with orange juice, add ice and drink.

name: Jolly Rancher #2
instructions: Mix and serve chilled in an old-fashioned glass.

name: The Jolly Rancher
instructions: Shake ingredients and serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Jolly Rancher
instructions: Shake melon liqueur and blueberry schnapps with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour, add grenadine for color, and stir. Add cherry on top and serve.

name: Jon Lee Hooker
instructions: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice in a highball glass, add 7-up and enjoy.

name: Jonesey
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and creme de cacao. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jose Flame-O
instructions: Add tequila to a shot glass, and add firewater.

name: Joulouville
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Journalist Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Joy Ride
instructions: Muddle lemon and sugar in a mixing glass. Add ice, absolut citron, campari and sweet and sour. Shake well and dump into a hurricane glass. Spritz with soda.

name: Joy-To-The-World
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: JT Delight
instructions: Add the vodka, tropical schnapps, orange juice and the cranberry juice in that order into a collins glass and serve.

name: Judgette Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Jufu Cocktail
instructions: Shake. Serve on the rocks.

name: The Juice
instructions: Pour into a five gallon pitcher, the canister of lemonade, water, everclear and mix. Serve on ice.

name: Juicy Guiness Premier
instructions: Mix in the shots of blue curacao, taboo and vodka. Add the guinness to the spirits up to 3cm below the rim of the pint glass. Allow the guinness to settle before adding the carling premier. Allow to settle again before consuming.

name: Juicy Lucy #2
instructions: Mix all above, pour over ice, and enjoy.

name: Juicy Tiger
instructions: Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon and a straw.

name: Juicy Volkheimer
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Jump Starter
instructions: Mix in a chilled glass.

name: Jumper Cable
instructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with jolt cola, and stir.

name: Jungle Juice #4
instructions: Place orange juice and ginger into a blender jar. Break the banana into chunks and add it in. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Jungle Juice #2
instructions: Mix all equal parts, shake, and strain. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Jungle Juice #3
instructions: Mix everything except orange juice. Shake well and add the orange juice. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Juniata Juice
instructions: Add the rum to the beer, and stir in frozen lime juice concentrate.

name: Junior Mint
instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, and strain into old-fashioned glass.

name: Just A Moonmint
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Just Peachy
instructions: Mix together the peach schnapps and the iced tea and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Jagermonster
instructions: Pour Jagermeister over ice in a 12 oz highball or old-fashioned glass. Add a dash of grenadine, add orange juice, and serve.

name: K.G.B.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Kahlodster
instructions: Pour each shot into a cup filled with ice cubes. Shake three times and serve.

name: Kahlua Coffee
instructions: Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. Let cool and add vanilla and either a pint or fifth of vodka. Drink and enjoy.

name: Kahlua Coffee #2
instructions: Simmer water, sugar, and coffee until the sugar dissolves. Put vanilla bean and bourbon in a gallon jug and add the coffee syrup you just prepared. Cover and let sit for a month.

name: Kahlua Coffee #4
instructions: Mix 3 cups water with 4 cups sugar, bring to boil and boil for 20 minutes. Set aside, add 1 whole vanilla bean split. Let mixture cool. Add 2 oz instant coffee to 1 cup boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Set aside and cool. When above are cool (important) put into a half gallon container and add the vodka. Let age for at least 3 weeks.

name: Kahlua and Cream
instructions: Pour kahlua into a glass over ice. Add cream and shake.

name: Kahlua and Iced Cream
instructions: Mix in a blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then add the kahlua. Blend until smooth.

name: Kahlua Bomb
instructions: Mix all of the ingredients well. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua Fudge Shake
instructions: Just like making a milk shake, but add the kahlua and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Kahlua Madness
instructions: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add vodka and tonic water. Drink from the bottom with two straws.

name: Kahlua Twist
instructions: Pour tequila and kahlua into a hurricane glass. Fill the rest with chocolate milk. Stir well.

name: Kalabreeze
instructions: Pour into a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Kalimocho
instructions: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of coke. Then simply pour red wine, cheap or not, into the bottle slowly, until full. Do not shake the bottle, but simply turn it over a couple of times.

name: Kalimotxo
instructions: Best served cold in a highball glass, but without ice.

name: Kamakazie #2
instructions: Pour absolut and cointreau over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Squeeze and drop in lime wedge to taste.

name: Kamikaze #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Kamikaze Version
instructions: Add vodka and mixers to a cocktail glass with ice. Fill with sour mix and shake.

name: Karma Chameleon
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps, sprite, and lastly grenadine to taste. Mix well. Serve over ice.

name: Karsk
instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffee-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

name: Kavorkien
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. Can be served over ice or up.

name: Keith Jackson
instructions: Mix, chill, strain, and shoot.

name: Kenny
instructions: Mix the peach vodka with the sprite and some ice cubes.

name: Kentucky B And B
instructions: Pour the bourbon and benedictine into a brandy snifter.

name: Kentucky Colonel
instructions: Stir bourbon and benedictine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Kentucky Hot Tub
instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a shot glass. Voila!

name: Keoke Coffee
instructions: Mix alcohols, add coffee, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Keremiki
instructions: Mix and shoot.

name: Kermit The Frog Piss
instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass and serve.

name: Kermit
instructions: Add ice and shake. Top up with orange juice.

name: Key Largo Kooler
instructions: Mix juices and alcohol in a mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.

name: Key Largo OJ
instructions: Add ice and then equal parts of key largo and orange juice. Mix and enjoy.

name: Key West Lemonade
instructions: Mix vodka and sweet and sour mix proportionally in any size batch, then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly, a dash each per serving. Directions are for single, regular bar size servings.

name: Kiba
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Kick Yer Ass Sas
instructions: Pour shots and soda over ice in a mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

name: Kickstand
instructions: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a highball glass, and layer kahlua and irish cream.

name: Kiddie Cocktail
instructions: Build in a highball glass. Add 7-up or sprite over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Kill Me Now
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass.

name: Killer Bee
instructions: Pour both liquors into a shot glass.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
instructions: Shake and strain, then pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a flag, or a flag and a pineapple wedge, if carried by your bar.

name: Kim Special
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: Kinda Tasty
instructions: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

name: King Cole Cocktail
instructions: Muddle orange slice, pineapple slice, and powdered sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Add blended whiskey and 2 ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

name: King of Denmark
instructions: Stir the pernod and black, and add several big ice cubes.

name: King of Poland
instructions: Pour the scotch, add lemon juice, add crushed ice, then top off with the vodka. Serve in a highball glass, drink as a shot.

name: King Willy
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur onto two ice cubes in a highball glass. Add a few drops of green curacao, and fill with 7-up or sprite. Pour a few drops of grenadine in a way that will look like its shaping a stripe down the drink.

name: Kioki Coffee
instructions: Stir, and add whipped cream to the top.

name: Kir Royale
instructions: Pour creme de cassis into a glass and gently pour champagne on top.

name: Kir
instructions: Combine ingredients in a large white wine glass. Twist the lemon peel to release the oil and drop it into the glass.

name: Kiss From Rudy
instructions: Pour alcohols into a cocktail glass, add juices, then grenadine and cream, and garnish with a cherry or pineapple wedge.

name: Kiss Me Quick
instructions: Mix in a highball glass.

name: Kiss in the Dark
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kiwi Lemon
instructions: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.

name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Klingon Disrupter
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together. Shoot.

name: Klondike Cooler
instructions: Mix powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add blended whiskey. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add twist of lemon peel and orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Knacky
instructions: Pour apfelkorn into a highball glass. Add peach juice and fill with iced tea.

name: Knickerbocker Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Knockout Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Knockout Punch
instructions: Pour all three together, and mix well.

name: Kokopa
instructions: Layer. Peppermint schnapps first, then the kahlua on top.

name: Kona Village Mai Tai
instructions: Mix first 6 ingredients in a pitcher. Fill highball glasses with ice. Pour the mixture over. Garnish with pineapple wedges, if desired.

name: Kongepjolter
instructions: Pour the cognac into the mug, and mix in the champagne.

name: Kool First Aid
instructions: Add kool aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

name: Kool-Aid (Boulder Style)
instructions: Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.

name: Kool-Aid Shot
instructions: Just put all ingredients in a large glass with ice and shake it up. Add cranberry juice to taste.

name: KoolShock
instructions: Place a few ice cubes into the glass, add the aftershock, then the kool-aid. Stir to mix. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Kordulas Special
instructions: Pour in the ingredients. Add a dash of angostura on the cube, and place it in the champagne by using a tong.

name: Kotikalja
instructions: Put rye malt and sugar in a bucket. Boil water and pour it in the bucket. Let the mixture cool down and drain filter it. Dissolve yeast in a bit of kotikalja and add it to kotikalja. Leave the bucket until next day in room temperature (20 C). Cool down the drink. Kotikalja stays drinkable 3-4 days stored in closed bucket or bottles in a cold place.

name: Krazee Keith
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, anisette, cherry brandy and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the cola and stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Kretchma Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kretchma
instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Kris Kringle
