instructions: Combine creme de almond and root beer schnapps in a shot glass. Layer the half-and-half on the top.

name: Kristi GreenEye
instructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: The Kristy #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail glass. Add ice. If frozen drink is preferred, use more ice and mix in blender.

name: The Kristy
instructions: Put all together in a glass and stir. May put ice cubes in after mixed, or put in blender to make frozen drink.

name: The Kruzewski
instructions: Put a couple ice cubes into a coffee mug then add juices and mix a great morning drink.

name: Krypto Kami
instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass.

name: Kryptonite Kooler
instructions: Mix the rum, maui, and pineapple juice together. Add ice, and enjoy.

name: Kurant Collins
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the absolut kurant, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda.

name: Kurant Shot
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a glass and fill up with sprite and ice.

name: Kurant Tea
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add hot/very warm apple tea and, if you like, some sugar.

name: Kurant
instructions: Put some ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour absolut kurant into the glass and fill up with schweppes russian. Serve with a straw.

name: Kursk
instructions: Pour vodka and curacao into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill it up with battery.

name: L&C
instructions: Put pineapple chunks in the blender and blend until smooth. Add vodka, rum, and enough ice to raise the level to five cups. Blend until the ice gets all smashed up. Pour into tall glasses, garnished with the cherries.

name: L.A.P.D. Nightshift
instructions: Layer into a shot glass.

name: La Bomba
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except grenadine) with ice 3 times. Pour into sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add grenadine and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: La Cafe
instructions: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: La Jolla
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: La Mamila
instructions: Empty the beers into a large container, add the lemons, tabasco and the salt, and mix in. Add the tequila and clamato, then swirl.

name: La Stephanique
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ladder
instructions: Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ladies Cocktail #2
instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into glass. Serve with a piece of pineapple on top.

name: Ladies Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the pineapple stick on top and serve.

name: Ladies Sidecar
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Lady Be Good
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lady Finger
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lady Godiva
instructions: Shake sugar, triple sec, lime and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass and fill with brandy.

name: The Lady In Red
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. Let stand for 30 seconds and slam it back.

name: Lady Love Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Lady L
instructions: Shake with 7-up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice. Color the top with a splash of cherry syrup, and add a cherry for garnish.

name: Lady Killer
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in shaker, strain into a champagne flute or longdrink glass over some ice cubes. Decorate with mint and a cherry.

name: Lamb Brothers
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lambada
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour over crushed ice in a fancy glass.

name: Landed Gentry
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lanette
instructions: Pour vodka, ice, and cranberry juice into a cocktail glass. Fill with orange juice.

name: Lani
instructions: Pour passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

name: Laser Beam
instructions: Combine all liquors in a collins glass filled with ice. Shake well. Garnish with an orange and a cherry.

name: Lash
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vodka and amaretto. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Lasky Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lassi
instructions: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Serve cold. Lassi is a south indian drink, and one of the easiest things to make. There are many ways of making it, but essentially it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest.

name: Lassi - Mango
instructions: Add to a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

name: Lassi - Sweet #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Adjust ingredients to taste, ensuring the right amount of ice is added.

name: Lassi - Sweet
instructions: Mix ingredients in a blender until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

name: Lassi Khara
instructions: Blend (frappe) in a blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

name: Lassi Raita
instructions: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Add a dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

name: Latin Manhattan
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass, add the lemon and serve.

name: Lava Flow
instructions: Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in a blender and set aside. In the bottom of a hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix slowly into the glass. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

name: Lava Lamp
instructions: Pour grenadine over ice in a highball glass. Add absolut citron, and fill with apple juice.

name: Lava Shot
instructions: Add all three ingredients to a shot glass and serve.

name: Lawhill Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lay Down and Shut Up
instructions: Shake over ice, strain and pour into a shot glass.

name: Leaning Tower
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Leap Frog Highball
instructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Leap Year
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

name: Leatherneck
instructions: Pour 1/4 to one inch tabasco sauce into a shot glass. Pour rum over the top and shoot.

name: Leave It To Me
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Leche de Monja
instructions: Place whole eggs, in shell, (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.

name: LeFreak
instructions: Fill 1/2 highball glass with ice, and add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

name: Legspreader
instructions: Mix in glass and enjoy.

name: Lemon Celebration
instructions: Shake gently with ice (the champagne will fizz). Strain into a martini glass.

name: Lemon Drop #2
instructions: Place sugar on lemon, place in mouth and take shot, then bite down on lemon.

name: Lemon Drop #3
instructions: Mix equal parts absolut citron and sweet and sour mix over ice then strain into a shot glass. Sprinkle sugar on lemon slice. Drink shot, then suck the lemon.

name: Lemon Drop #4
instructions: Fill a shot glass with rum. Dip lemon wedge in sugar, bite and hold the juice in your mouth. Shoot the rum and lick your lips.

name: Lemon Drop #5
instructions: Pour over cracked ice, and strain into a cocktail glass with sugar around its rim.

name: Lemon Drop #6
instructions: Put the vodka and cointreau into a shaker. Squeeze the lemon juice into the shaker. Put a good amount of ice in the shaker, close and shake until cold. Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass and then dip the rim in the sugar. Strain the contents of the shaker into the glass. Garnish with lemon zest for a decorative touch.

name: Lemon Drop #7
instructions: Fill a mug half way with bacardi, then top off with lemon kool-aid or lemonade.

name: Lemon Highlander
instructions: Pour into a scotch glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Lemon Lift
instructions: Serve chilled straight or on the rocks.

name: Lemon Lightning
instructions: Add equal parts everclear and lemon juice to a shot glass. Place the shot into the freezer for 30 minutes to completely chill it. Drink it ice cold.

name: Lemon Sherbert Punch
instructions: Mix lemonade concentrate in a very large punch bowl. Add soda and frozen fruit. Open sherbet and dump the entire package of it into the punch (it will float on the top). Due to the frozen fruit and sherbet, there is really no need for ice until later, or unless it it very hot.

name: Lemon Shooters
instructions: Cover lemon slice with sugar. Shoot vodka, then suck lemon.

name: Lemon Shot
instructions: Mix galliano and absolut citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour rum over the wedge and glass. Ignite rum and allow to burn for a moment. Extinguish, shoot quickly, and suck on the lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

name: Lemon Splash Martini
instructions: Mix vodka, amaretto, triple sec and a 1/2 squeeze of lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Lemon Squash
instructions: Mix lemon juice with sugar syrup in a highball glass, stir well and fill up with soda water. Serve with drinking straw.

name: Lemon Twister
instructions: Shake together, stirring bruises the vodka.

name: Lemouroudji
instructions: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

name: Lennart #2
instructions: Pour pear brandy over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a slice of lime.

name: Lesbian Lover
instructions: Pour zima into a frozen pilsner. Add a shot of coconut rum and enjoy.

name: Lethal Weapon
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option, use two cans of mountain dew if the drink seems too strong for you.

name: Lewd Lewinsky
instructions: Layer in order.

name: Lewie
instructions: Fill a pilsner glass with ice. Add rum, amaretto and orange juice. Shake. Top with a splash of grenadine. Adjust rum and amaretto to taste.

name: Liberace
instructions: Pour in the kahlua, layer the milk on top, and the bacardi 151 on top of the milk. Ignite, let burn for about 10 seconds, blow out and shoot.

name: Liberty Blue Champagne
instructions: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain into a sugar rimmed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

name: Lifesaver
instructions: Place liquors and juice into a shaker and mix well. Serve in a rocks glass.

name: Light Sangria With Pineapple
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the apple juice. Add pineapple (you can also add the liquid from the pineapple tin). Peel and cut the apple. Mix all the ingredients except the ale and the ice which you add before serving.

name: Wa-Hoo-Wa
instructions: Combine vodka and curacao in a collins glass over ice. Fill with orange juice. Stir and serve.

name: Waborita
instructions: In a shaker over ice combine the ingredients, pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Rattlesnake Shot
instructions: Serve in a shot glass. Adjust amounts to taste if desired.

name: Lil Naue
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a red wine glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Lime Lizard
instructions: Pour vodka into a shot glass and mix in the other ingredients. Count to three and drink.

name: Lime Vodka Collins
instructions: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add vodka, lemon juice and sugar. Top with club soda.

name: Limelight
instructions: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Limelon
instructions: Mix all liquids then fill with ice. Finally cap with powdered sugar.

name: LimLer
instructions: Squeeze the 8 parts of a lime and the brown sugar with a wooden muddler, fill up with apple juice and crushed ice.

name: Limon Delight
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass with ice. Add one shot bacardi limon, and fill with sunny delight or orange juice.

name: Limona Corona
instructions: Open the corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

name: Limonaide
instructions: Take a tall or short glass and fill with ice. Mix in the bacardi and the lemonade in equal parts.

name: Limoncello Liqueur
instructions: Soak skin of 7 lemons in alcohol for 2 days. Strain. Boil water and sugar and chill. Mix with alcohol. Store in the fridge.

name: Limoncillo
instructions: Get a empty gallon container. Then put in the 3/4 gallons of water. Put the two cases of crystal light and add the rum. Mix.

name: Lina
instructions: Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass and serve.

name: The Lindy
instructions: Put the 2 shots of jaigermister into the bottom of a tall beer mug and pour in the surge.

name: Linstead Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Liqiud Mintaero
instructions: Mix creme de cacoa, creme de menthe, midori, kahlua and ice into a shaker. Give a small shake, then add milk and shake well to foam up milk.

name: Liquid After-Eight
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a highball glass. Fill the glass with cold chocolate-milk.

name: Liquid Asphault
instructions: Layer jagermeister on top of sambuca and serve in a shot glass.

name: Liquid Bubble Gum
instructions: Stir all ingredients into a glass.

name: Liquid Cocaine #2
instructions: Combine 4 alcohols and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixer with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine #3
instructions: Chill over ice and pour.

name: Liquid Cocaine #4
instructions: Mix all ingredients into a shot glass. Shoot it all at once.

name: Liquid Cocaine #6
instructions: Mix together in a champagne flute and drink.

name: Liquid Cocaine 8-Ball
instructions: Mix together and wait for the effects.

name: Liquid Courage
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and liquify until shake-like consistancy. Serve in beer mugs.

name: Liquid Crack
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Liquid Ecstasy
instructions: Build bacardi, midori, blue curacao, lemon juice and pineapple juice in that order over ice in a highball glass, or shake and strain into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to either the highball glass or the rim of the martini glass. Serve with two straws.

name: Liquid Heroine
instructions: Mix rumple minze and jagermeister in an iced shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: Liquid Jello
instructions: Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.

name: Liquid Rocher
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cordial glass. Enjoy.

name: Liquid Sex
instructions: Add marshmallow to a shot glass, pour over vodka and add red food coloring. Mix it together with a wire whisk.

name: Liquid Snickers
instructions: Pour creme de cacao, irish cream and frangelico liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Top with light cream, stir and serve.

name: Liquid Sword
instructions: Mix liquors in a tall glass with ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Liquid Valium
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, pour liquors and fill with equal parts orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with an orange and cherry garnish.

name: Little Black Devil
instructions: Pour into shot glass and serve.

name: Little Brother
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into blender. If preferred add an ice cube. Mix thoroughly and pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Little Green Frog
instructions: Prepare lemon-lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients. Pour over ice into hurricane glasses.

name: Little Princess Cocktail
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Liver Transplant
instructions: Pour over ice. Stir, dont shake.

name: Livingston
instructions: Mix ingredients over ice and stir, add an optional lime.

name: Loch Lomond
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the scotch, drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Lombomba
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a normal drink glass with a few ice-cubes. Stir.

name: London Buck
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: London Fog #2
instructions: Frappe in a highball glass.

name: London Fog
instructions: Shake gin and pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

name: London Town
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lone Tree Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lone Tree Cooler
instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over the rim of the glass.

name: Long Beach Ice Tea
instructions: Garnish with fresh lime cuts.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
instructions: In a tall glass, pour shots over ice and top off with cranberry juice and lemon wedge (squeeze if you like). Give the drink a little shake (if you like) and drink up!

name: Long Beach Cocktail
instructions: Mix as a long island ice tea.

name: Long Island Milkshake
instructions: In a large blender cup, add ice, sugar cubes, creme de cacao, vanilla extract (optional), and the cream. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order, then hit the "frappe" or "whip" button on the blender for 15-20 seconds, or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended, but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a pre-chilled collins glass. No garnish required, serve with a large-diameter straw.

name: Long Island Sunset
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass, shake, and strain into a highball glass. Add a cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Long Island Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Long Island Cocktail
instructions: Combine and mix all ingredients in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Long Iver Iced Tea
instructions: Pour liquor over ice. Fill 3/4 full with sour mix. Shake. Top with cola and add a lemon wedge.

name: Long Kiss Goodnight Martini
instructions: Freeze a martini glass with shaved chocolate on rim. In a shaker put ice, stoli vanilla, stoli vodka, and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into the martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

name: Long Vodka
instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Pour on the vodka, add a slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and serve.

name: Longaberger Lemonade
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Loopy Lemonade
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add absolut citron, squeeze two lemon wedges and add three packages of sugar. Fill remainder of glass with 7-up and sweet and sour mix.

name: Lord And Lady
instructions: Pour the rum and tia maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Los Angeles Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Los Cabos Clout
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a margarita glass. Do not strain.

name: Louie Louie
instructions: Stir and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Love For Toby
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Love Game
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add batida de coco and then slowly add the passoa. Slowly add the grenadine, so it goes under the batida. You should get three layers: red, white, red. Serve orange juice, but let the customer mix it, because the colors will mix.

name: Love Juice
instructions: First add rum, followed by other ingredients, and mix well. Serve on the rocks with an orange slice in a collins glass (approx. 14 oz.).

name: Love Potion
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Love Potion #9
instructions: Pour kool-aid into a jug, add vodka and rum, 1 pouch of kool-aid (cherry or orange), cover and shake.

name: Love Potion #2
instructions: Chill all ingredients over ice, strain into a chilled shot glass, serve, and enjoy.

name: Low Lattitude Lust
instructions: In a mixing tin, combine the vodka, southern comfort, and pineapple juice. Add the cherry juice from a jar of maraschino cherries. Shake well and pour over crushed or cubed ice.

name: The Lowee
instructions: Stir it up, and serve.

name: Lucky Driver
instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice, and one lemon slice. Use only freshly squeezed juice for best results.

name: Lucky Lemon
instructions: Mix all ingredients into a glass, stir and enjoy!

name: Lucky Lindeman
instructions: Empty one can of tropicana strawberry/orange/banana into a blender and 1/4 gallon vodka. Mix well. Pour half of this into a pitcher and set aside for later use, leaving the other half in the blender. Fill the blender with ice and blend until it resembles a slurpy. Drink up and start mixing the other half.

name: Lucky Stud
instructions: Combine with ice in a mixing glass and pour into shot glasses.

name: Ludvika Walker
instructions: Mix and add some ice.

name: Ludwig And The Gang
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice.

name: Luftschlange
instructions: Shake all ingredients. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Luftwaffe
instructions: Put 1/3 chocolate syrup, then 1/3 jagermeister, and then 1/3 butterscotch of the glass.

name: Lugger
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lui Lui
instructions: Mix with ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Lumberjack
instructions: Pour into shot glass, no particular order. Add small dash of hot sauce.

name: Lunch Box #2
instructions: Mix the beer and orange juice in a beer mug, drop the shot of amaretto in, and down it.

name: Lunch Box
instructions: Fill a glass almost full with beer. Fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of amaretto and drop it into the cup with the beer and orange juice.

name: The Lunchbox
instructions: Chill and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lusty Lisa
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and pour into a shot glass.

name: Luxor Boom-Boom
instructions: Add all alcohols to a shaker with ice. Fill remaining space with 1/3 apple juice and 2/3 orange juice. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass and serve. The most popular cocktail of Luxor Plaza. (a disco in Deventer - the Netherlands)

name: The Lynchmob
instructions: Pour in the sweet and sour mix, then the amaretto and then orange soda, and stir.

name: Lyndy
instructions: Shake with ice and serve.

name: Lachler
instructions: Pour into a whiskey sour glass in the order listed and serve.

name: Wahoo
instructions: Pour 151 proof rum and amaretto over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top off with pineapple juice (to taste), and serve.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Walk the Plank
instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Wallick Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ward Eight
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Warm and Fuzzy
instructions: Pour southern comfort, triple sec, and then cherry brandy into a shot glass.

name: Warm Woolly Sheep
instructions: Mix scotch and drambuie, then top with warm milk.

name: Warped Thursday
instructions: Empty half a can of cherry coke, pour the vodka into the can, then pour in the kool-aid. Alternatively, use a 12oz glass. Stir. A kabob stick works well in the can.

name: Warsaw Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Warsaw Waffle
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass. Stir until syrup is dissolved.

name: Washington Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wassail
instructions: 1. Heat the water to boiling. Cut the lemons and oranges (and lime if using) in half and squeeze the juice into a separate bowl to save, throw the skins and pulp into the boiling water. Add spices and simmer for one hour. 2. Remove the cinnamon sticks, a few cloves, allspice and save to one side. Using a slotted spoon or strainer remove the citrus peels and pulp and the remaining spices. Return the cinnamon sticks and saved spices to the water. Add the apple juice or cider and return to heat. 3. When boiling remove from heat and add the citrus juice and sugar. Simmer very lightly for another 10 minutes and serve. Delicious!

name: Wassail #2
instructions: Simmer the nonalcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours, then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).

name: Water Your Melon
instructions: Pour the mountain dew into any kind of ordinary glass. Then, add the watermelon schnapps and stir.

name: Watercolour
instructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice to taste. Garnish with a cherry or a pineapple chunk.

name: Watermelon Crawl # 2
instructions: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with mountain dew.

name: Watermelon Crawl
instructions: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice, pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

name: Watermelon Margarita
instructions: Cut up a watermelon, removing seeds. Liquify in a blender until you have about 16 oz. Add remaining ingredients, top with ice and blend until smooth. Taste and add sugar if watermelon is not sweet enough. Serve in a margarita glass with a sugar-coated rim.

name: Watermelon Shooter #5
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass 1/4 of the way full with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into a rocks glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter
instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain and pour into a glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients in any order into a sifting glass filled with ice. Shake for 5 seconds and pour the chilled contents into your cocktail glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #4
instructions: Add ingredients in a shaker tin with ice, stir and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Watermelon Shot
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into a shot glass.

name: Watermelon Slice
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine, then vodka, rum, gin and triple sec. Fill with half orange juice and half cranberry juice. Float with midori. Drink should be presented as is but stirred before drinking.

name: Watermelon
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Wave Runner
instructions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

name: Waverunner
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Top with champagne. Squeeze and drop another wedge of lemon into the drink. (the other two should still be in the tin).

name: Weakness
instructions: Pour all four shots into a low ball glass, chill if you care.

name: Webster Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wedding Anniversary
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Wedge
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Weekend On The Beach
instructions: Mix the crown royal, apple and peach schnapps, and sweet and sour mix with ice cubes in a shaker and shake until well blended. Strain into a shot glass. Makes one serving.

name: Weep-No-More Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Welcome Delight
instructions: Pour ingredients into a bowl, and mix them together.

name: Wembly Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Western Rose
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Westwood Ice Tea
instructions: In a beer mug full of ice, pour in the tequila, gin, light rum and stir. Stir in the cinnamon schnapps, then stir in the vanilla vodka. Splash the high proof rum on top.

name: Wet Back
instructions: Mix and shoot.

name: Wet Dream
instructions: Mix all ingredients except chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float chambord to the bottom of the glass.

name: Wet Kiss
instructions: Layer the ingredients in the order listed into a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

name: Wet Pussy
instructions: Pour the chambord, irish cream, and milk or cream into a shaker with ice. Shake, strain and pour into a champagne saucer.

name: Wet Snatch
instructions: Add blue raspberry to ice, add vanilla, pineapple, and coconut, then blend. Add tequila, and blend again. Add whipped cream on top if desired.

name: The Whammie
instructions: Fill a 20 ounce glass with ice. Add the 7 shots. Finish off with with equal parts orange and pineapple juice. Add grenadine until it turns pink. Top with cherries.

name: What The Hell
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Whip Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Whippersnapper
instructions: Add rum, fresca, and 1 or 2 ice cubes to a highball glass and serve.

name: Whippet
instructions: Made as in a normal vodka and orange, with raspberry cordial added last.

name: Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Whiskey Collins
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slices of orange, lemon, and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Fix
instructions: Shake juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended whiskey and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Highball
instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Whiskey Manhattan
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Orange The Jesperian Way
instructions: Mix together in a whiskey sour glass.

name: Whiskey Rickey
instructions: Pour blended whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Sour Old Fashioned
instructions: Mix whiskey, bitters, and cherry juice in a ice-filled cocktail glass, and fill the remainder of the glass with sour mix. Garnish with olives or mushrooms and use a stir stick to mix.

name: Whisky Mac
instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

name: Whisky Martini
instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass with chipped ice.

name: Whisky Melba
instructions: Muddle a small piece of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice, add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

name: White Bull
instructions: Pour ice into a glass, add tequila and kahlua, fill with cream, shake and serve.

name: White Carnation
instructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: White Dove
instructions: Pour amaretto and cream de cacao into a blender cup with the ice cream. Blend until smooth like a shake. Line the inside of a snifter glass with chocolate syrup. Pour drink into a cup and top with whipped cream. Add cherry to top.

name: White Heart
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: White Lady 1910
instructions: Shake vigourously with plenty of ice.

name: White Lady
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: White Lightning
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a blender. Vary the amount of vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember, it must have at least 2 oz. of vodka in order to be called white lightning. Serve in a tall glass.

name: White Lily Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: White Lion Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: White Mess
instructions: In a mixing tin, combine all ingredients with ice and shake. Strain into a double shot glass. Can also be made tall (add a little soda water to cut down on the cream)

name: White Out
instructions: Build over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: White Russian
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: White Russian #2
instructions: Serve over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: White Russian #3
instructions: Pour vanilla vodka and kahlua over ice. Top off with light cream and enjoy.

name: White Spider
instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

name: White Spider #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass.

name: White Splash
instructions: Add the cola slowly to the pina colada mix.

name: White Tornado
instructions: The trick to getting the look of the tornado is to pour the tequila rose slowly on the side of the shooter glass on top of the sambuca.

name: White Trash
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge. Ingredients can be varied to taste.

name: White Way Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: White Witch
instructions: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Whitecap Margarita
instructions: Place all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Whiting Sunset
instructions: Pour vodka, tequila and orange juice into a cocktail glass. Finally, add a dash of grenadine.

name: Whitney
instructions: Add ingredients chilled for better flavor. Avoid ice cubes to prevent watered down taste. Mix rum first (must be a white rum), add a dark type of wine (blush or red is fine), and finally a touch of lemon juice. Get ready to have fun!

name: The Whole Maryann
instructions: Layer over ice and serve.

name: Whoop Juice
instructions: Combine all together. If too strong, add more soda. For more kick, add more everclear.

name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
instructions: Best in a large mason jar. Blue going down, blue coming up.

name: Why Not?
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Widow Maker
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass half full with ice. Add first three ingredients into the glass and sway lightly to mix them together. Add the 2 drops of grenadine for the red hour glass on the bottom of the widow maker spider.

name: Wiggle Worm
instructions: Pour vodka in first. Put cherry in last. Add ice if needed. Mix well and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Wild Ass Indian
instructions: Shake.

name: Wild Berry Pop-Tart
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shot glass, slam it on the table and shoot it, followed promptly with a beer.

name: Wild Peppertini
instructions: Combine, chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.

name: Wild Sex
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, pour in malibu, peach schnapps and 151. Pour juices on top followed by a splash of grenadine. Use a shaker tin to cover the glass and give a couple of good shakes.

name: Wild Squirrel Sex
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. cup with ice. Add shots and almost-fill with equal parts of sour mix and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Wild Thing #2
instructions: Place all ingredients into blender with ice and blend until slushy. Adjust amount of ice to achieve proper consistency. Rim of glass can be salted if desired.

name: Wild Thing
instructions: Pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Wild Wendy
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shaker. Shake well. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Wile E Coyote
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass.

name: Will Rogers
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Windjammer
instructions: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top with a maraschino cherry.

name: Windy Beach
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

name: Wine Cooler
instructions: Mix wine and lemon-lime soda. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Wine Punch
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Hal Ligon
instructions: Add the vodka and orange juice to a collins glass filled with ice. Top with 7-Up.

name: Creamsicle Screwdriver
instructions: Combine vanilla vodka, orange juice and some ice cubes in a highball glass and stir.

name: Bronx Martini
instructions: Mix contents in a martini shaker with ice and serve in a chilled martini glass.

name: Negroni Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Add a splash of soda water if desired. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

name: Montgomery
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon.

name: Abracadabra
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Absent Friend
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Acapulco Gold
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass with cracked ice.

name: Acapulcoco
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Agent Provocateur
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime or cherry.

name: Albert 2000
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked/broken ice. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Alaskan Orange
instructions: Blend briefly with a half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a goblet with grated orange zest, chocolate and nutmeg.

name: Alexandra #2
instructions: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Algonquin Bar Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with cracked ice. Add an orange slice or a cherry.

name: Alhambra
instructions: Make the cocoa in an irish coffee cup and add the cognac.

name: Amaretto Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple slice or cherry, add straws, and serve in a pina colada glass.

name: Amaretto Frappe
instructions: Add to a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with short straws and a cherry.

name: Ambience
instructions: Rim a collins glass with lime juice and dip in caster sugar. Fill with broken ice. Shake all ingredients in a shaker and strain into the collins glass. Add a slice of lime or a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: American Glory
instructions: Add ingredients to a frosted ice-filled highball glass.

name: Amigo
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Amsterdam
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour, unstrained, into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Andalusian Smile
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass, three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Anisette Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Apple a la Mode
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double cocktail glass with a sprig of mint.

name: Apple Buck
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass with the spent shell of the lemon.

name: Apple Comfort
instructions: Add ingredients to a heatproof cup.

name: Apple Of My Eye
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and serve in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Apple Swizzle
instructions: Shake apple brandy, dark rum, lime juice and syrup in a shaker and strain into a frosted collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Swizzle briefly to frost the glass. Add the apple juice, and serve with a swizzle stick and straws.

name: Apres Ski
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Serve with a slice of lime or mint sprig.

name: Apricot Cooler
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass. Add a lemon spiral to finish.

name: Apricot Crush
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Apricot Tree
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Aqua Marina
instructions: Shake vodka, green creme de menthe and lemon juice, and strain into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: Arago
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Arctic Summer
instructions: Add ingredients to an ice-filled highball glass. Serve with a cherry and lemon slice.

name: Arrowhead
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass, three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Australian Virgin
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve with a cherry.

name: AWOL
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Serve with a wedge of orange on the rim.

name: Aztec
instructions: Pour ingredients into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Aztec Surfboard
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Azzuro
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and garnish with fruit.

name: B2 C2
instructions: Pour into a glass. Alternatively multiply the amounts and use a large jug with chopped fruit.

name: B&B Collins
instructions: Pour brandy, lemon juice, sugar syrup and soda water into a frosted glass two-thirds filled with ice. Sprinkle benedictine on top. Serve with straws, and garnish with a cherry and slices of orange and lemon.

name: Bacardi Buck
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the spent shell of the lemon quarter.

name: Bacardi Champagne Punch
instructions: Combine ingredients (except champagne and water) in a punch bowl, cover and chill for 2 hours. Add champagne and water, with a little ice. Add 5-10 frozen strawberries. Serve in wine glasses (30 servings).

name: Bacardi Martini
instructions: Stir and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Serve with a green olive.

name: Bacardi Orange
instructions: Add to an ice-filled collins glass. Serve with a slice of orange and straws.

name: Bacchanalian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the lemonade, and serve with seedless grapes.

name: Bacchus
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Serve with a twist of lime.

name: Balearic Coffee
instructions: Add coffee and liquor to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Bali Punch
instructions: Shake rums, juices and syrup and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the orangeade, and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Banana Margarita
instructions: Apply lemon juice to the rim of a frosted double-cocktail glass, and dip into caster sugar. Fill the glass with crushed ice, add the ingredients and blend briefly. Serve with a lemon juice-dipped slice of banana.

name: Banana Nutbread
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Bar Bandit
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass, and garnish with a cherry and slice of lime.

name: Barcelona
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of seville orange speared with a cherry, and paper parasol.

name: Barcelona Fizz
instructions: Shake the sherry, gin, lemon juice and syrup in a shaker. Strain into a frosted highball glass half filled with ice, then add chilled soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry, and serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Bavarian Coffee
instructions: Add coffee and liquors to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Bazooka
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass, and garnish with two halves of a cherry.

name: Beach Peach
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Beef On Rye
instructions: Shake the gin, whisky and syrup in a shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the lemon.

name: Beef Salad
instructions: Add to an ice-filled highball glass, and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Belmont
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Bennet Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice.

name: Bird of Paradise Fizz
instructions: Shake ingredients (except soda) well and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda, and garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Biscay
instructions: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange twist.

name: Bitter Experience
instructions: Add to a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Serve with short straws.

name: Black Tie
instructions: Pour into a wine glass and garnish with a black grape.

name: Blackberry Cola
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Blackberry Fizz
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain ingredients (except lemonade) into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the lemonade, and garnish with a cherry and orange slice. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Blackout
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a shot glass.

name: Blue Star
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Bluebeard
instructions: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter glass.

name: Blueberry Rumba
instructions: Shake liquors, syrup and juice in a shaker, and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Blushing Barmaid
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Brandy Mocha Almond
instructions: Pour into a heatproof cup, and sweeten to taste with sugar.

name: Boca Chica
instructions: Shake and strain. Serve with a cherry or orange slice.

name: Bombay Punch
instructions: Add to punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Serve with sliced fruit.

name: Bonaparte
instructions: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Bonaparte Velvet
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve with straws.

name: Bonny Prince
instructions: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Bordij
instructions: Stir and strain into an ice-filled wine glass.

name: Boston Punch
instructions: Dissolve sugar and combine ingredients in a punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Add thin wedges of apple. Serve in wine glasses. (16 servings.)

name: Bourbon Collins
instructions: Pour ingredients into a frosted collins glass, two-thirds filled with ice. Serve with straws and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Bourbon Triple Sour
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve with a twist of lemon.

name: Brain Blender
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and serve in a wine goblet with fruit and straws.

name: Brandied Apricot Frappe
instructions: Mix ingredients and add to a double cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a cherry, serve with straws.

name: Brandy Buck
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, adding the spent shell of the lemon quarter.

name: Brandy Champarelle
instructions: Stir ingredients and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Brandy Fino
instructions: Stir ingredients and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Brandy Puff
instructions: Shake the brandy and milk in a shaker, strain into a wine goblet, and add the soda.

name: Brandy Punch
instructions: Combine all but ginger ale in a punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Add ginger ale when ready to serve, and pour out into wine glasses.

name: Brandy Punch Cocktail
instructions: Add to a goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and some fruit.

name: Brandy Scaffa
instructions: Add to a cocktail glass in the order listed.

name: Brazilian Monk
instructions: Pour into a collins glass and blend briefly. Garnish with a mint leaf and cherry, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Breakfast
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Bridesmaid Cooler
instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and a lemon spiral.

name: Butter Pecan
instructions: Pour frangelico into a double-cocktail glass and add the ice-cream. Coarsely chop the pecan nuts and put them in.

name: Brontosaurus
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass, add the lemonade and garnish with a celery stick.

name: Brown Derby
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, or serve straight-up.

name: Brute
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Bumpo
instructions: Add to heatproof cup and allow the sugar to dissolve. Dust with nutmeg.

name: Bury Me Deep
instructions: Shake all but lemonade in a shaker and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Butterscotch Milk Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Buttock Clencher
instructions: Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade and garnish with a cherry and pineapple chunk on stick.

name: M&M
instructions: Serve straight up in a shot glass.

name: M.V.P.
instructions: Pour vodka, midori, and malibu into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

name: Ma Bonnie Wee Hen
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ma Wee Hen
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: MacAttack
instructions: Add gin and midori to a shaker with ice, and fill with equal parts of grape juice and club soda. Shake and strain over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Machine
instructions: 1. Pour the orange juice into a shot glass, take a napkin and place it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. (As far as it can go without touching the juice.) 2. Slowly pour the vodka so that it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice. Remove the napkin and drink.

name: Mad Cow
instructions: Mix in a shaker one-quarter filled with ice and pour into a liberal shot glass.

name: Mad Hatter
instructions: Shake and strain, serving straight up in a shot glass.

name: The Mad Hungarian
instructions: Serve on the rocks.

name: Mad Scientist #2
instructions: Mix melon liqueur, sour mix, and soda water with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Top with rum and carefully ignite. Extinguish before serving.

name: Maestro
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, sherry, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice and top with the ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Magic Dew
instructions: Mix equal parts blue maui and mountain dew in a hurricane glass.

name: Magic Punch
instructions: Add ingredients to an ice-filled collins glass and shake.

name: Magic Star
instructions: Shake in a cocktail glass. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a crystalized fruit star-shape.

name: Magic Woman
instructions: Pour blue curacao, rum and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Blend briefly, fill with sprite and add a splash of lemon juice.

name: Mahwah Iced Tea
instructions: Add the whiskey and southern comfort to a highball glass. Fill with iced tea, and drop in a couple of ice cubes.

name: Maiden Head
instructions: Mix chilled ingredients; cherry brandy, 7-up and snapple with a stirring stick. Top with whipped cream and a cherry in a white wine glass.

name: Maiden-No-More
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Malaria Killer
instructions: Pour campari into highball glass over ice, add the tonic water and stir with a spoon. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Malibu and Soda
instructions: Mix in a cup with ice.

name: Malibu Bay Breeze
instructions: Blend ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Malibu Dreams
instructions: Combine the malibu and grenadine. Fill with 7-up or lemon-lime soda.

name: Malibu Express
instructions: Blend and serve on ice.

name: Malibu Jane
instructions: In a mason jar, pour in the coconut rum. Add milk, three teaspoons of cocoa powder, and let stand for one minute.

name: Malibu Jello
instructions: Boil the water and add to peach passion fruit jello. Allow to dissolve for 2 minutes. Add the malibu rum and pour into shot glasses or one-ounce cups found in party stores. Chill for four hours before serving.

name: Malibu Juice
instructions: Pour the malibu rum into a glass and fill with fruit juice; orange, pineapple or banana.

name: Malibu Massage
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker glass over ice. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Malibu Milk Shake
instructions: Add malibu rum, sugar and your desired amount of ice to a blender. Fill with milk, and blend until smooth with a frothy head. Serve in glasses immediately.

name: Malibu Mocha Milkshake
instructions: Add malibu rum and sugar to a hurricane glass. Fill to three-quarters full with milk, and whip to blend. Add creme de cacao, stir, and drop in 3 - 4 ice cubes.

name: Malibu Pink Panther
instructions: Crush a hand full or two of ice into a blender, add the frozen pink lemonade and malibu rum, and blend for 30 seconds or until smooth-like consistensy. Add in your desired amount of whipped cream and blend further until smooth. Serve.

name: Malibu Pop
instructions: Shake malibu rum and blue curacao in a cocktail shaker. Add the juices, and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Malibu Punch
instructions: Pour malibu rum into an ice-filled collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and a splash of 7-up.

name: Malibu Screw
instructions: Add chilled orange juice to vodka and malibu rum over ice (if desired).

name: Malibu Seven
instructions: Mix the 7-up and rum together in a cup of ice.

name: Malibu Snapper
instructions: Fill one-quarter of a cocktail glass with malibu rum, and fill the rest with snapple.

name: Malibu Tequichi
instructions: Shake with ice and serve in a champagne flute.

name: Malibu Twister
instructions: Pour malibu rum into a glass, and add tropicana; orange, strawberry or pineapple. Add cranberry juice, and stir.

name: Malibu Wave
instructions: Shake all but the lime with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Malihini Punch
instructions: Combine orange juice, lilikoi syrup and guava syrup, blend well. Chill. Serve over ice cubes.

name: Mallelieu
instructions: Pour the rum, grand marnier and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Mamacita
instructions: Pour malibu rum, passoa and cointreau into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple chunk.

name: Mamie Gilroy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Man of the Moment
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Manchurian Candidate
instructions: Pour vodka into a shot glass, and add a dash of soy sauce.

name: Mandarin Crush
instructions: Add absolut mandrin to an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with orange soda.

name: Mandarin Dream
instructions: Pour vodka and splash juices in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously so when poured, a thin layer of ice crystals is visible. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mandarin Split
instructions: Shake once, and strain into a collins glass.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
instructions: Combine absolut mandrin, peach schnapps and juices in a shaker with ice. Pour into a collins glass, fill with 7-up and stir. Sink the grenadine and garnish with a twist of lime.

name: Mandarine Bourbon
instructions: Stir and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mandarine Passion
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with passion fruit juice. Add two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Mandarine Summertime
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Add a touch of grenadine, two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Mandeville
instructions: Combine the rums, anisette, lemon juice and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the cola and stir well.

name: Mandy Sea
instructions: Blend the amaretto, triple sec, sour mix and juices in a mixing cup. Pour over ice in a collins glass and top with grenadine and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a flag or two cherries.

name: Mango Bellini
instructions: Fill a champagne flute one-third full with mango juice. Top with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of mango.

name: Mango Orange Smoothie
instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Mango Mint
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Manhasset
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Manhattan Bella
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Dry Manhattan #2
instructions: Stir vermouth and blended whiskey with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with the olive as garnish.

name: Dry Manhattan
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Sweet Manhattan #2
instructions: Serve on the rocks.

name: Sweet Manhattan
instructions: Stir well in an ice-filled mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Manila Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mansion Margarita
instructions: Blend ingredients in a shaker and serve on the rocks in a margarita glass.

name: Maple Lake Irish Shock
instructions: Bring to the boil; aftershock, cinnamon schnapps and apple cider. Stir in the cinnamon sticks, stirring frequently. Add apple slices and let cool for 2 minutes. Add the apple pucker and serve.

name: Mardee Mine
instructions: Combine the rum and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Margaret In The Marketplace
instructions: Combine the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Margarita Cocktail #2
instructions: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with lemon juice, and dip in salt. Shake ingredients with ice, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail
instructions: Rum the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice, and dip in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Maria Theresa
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a glass over ice.

name: Marianne
instructions: 1. Blend strawberries, raspberries and apple juice until slushy. 2. Fill champagne flutes half way with the fruit mix. Fill the remainder of the glasses with champagne, and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed. 3. Top each off with whipped cream (optional).

name: Martian Martini
instructions: Combine gin and midori in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass.

name: Martina Mandarina
instructions: Pour juice, vodka and a splash of grand marnier in a shaker. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange peel curl.

name: Martinet
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Martini, Patton
instructions: Combine gin, vermouth and olive juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with onions and olives on a toothpick.

name: Marvellaid
instructions: Combine equal parts of orange vodka and cointreau in a shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled, and strain into a chilled martini (cocktail) glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mary Garden Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
instructions: Combine the rum, pineapple juice, maraschino liqueur, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Masala Chai #2
instructions: 1. Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover, turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. 2. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves, cover, and turn off the heat. Sit for 2 minutes. 3. Strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

name: Masala Chai
instructions: 1. Bring two cups of water to the boil. Add all the ingredients (except milk and sugar) and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for one minute. 2. Warm milk in a pot. Filter the above tea into cups. Add milk and sugar and serve.

name: Massacre
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Max The Silent
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Maxim
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: May Blossum Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Mazerati
instructions: Pour the absolut citron into a highball glass, balance with cranberry juice and top with a little 7-up. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Maeek
instructions: Combine in a glass, add orange peel and serve.

name: Mcclelland Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: McDuff
instructions: Combine the scotch, triple sec and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: McTavish
instructions: Serve in a shot glass or on the rocks.

name: Mean Green Love Making Machine
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake, and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mean Green Machine
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Medd
instructions: 1. Spread the yeast on a piece of bread. 2. Boil the water, honey and sugar. Stand in an earthenware pot. Skim off any scum. Add lemon juice, cloves and ginger. Leave to cool. When just warm, float the bread and yeast on the top. Cover with a clean cloth. Leave for about 6-8 days. 3. Strain and bottle. Corks should be loose to start with. Leave for at least 5-6 months.

name: Meiner
instructions: Pour the gin into a cocktail glass, almost fill with orange juice, and stir briefly. Add a slice of orange, and pour the campari gently onto the slice.

name: Meister Mind Meld
instructions: Pour the coca-cola into a highball glass. Add the amaretto, and drop in an ice cube.

name: Mekong
instructions: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu, peach, strawberry, banana, melon, blue, orange juice, pineapple juice, pina mix, 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass, then top with cream. Serve with fresh fruit (except lime), and some filberts if desired.

name: Melberry
instructions: Pour midori, chambord and raspberry juice into a shaker. Add a squeeze of lemon and lime juice. Shake, and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Mellow Hiker
instructions: Combine alcohol over ice and add mountain dew. Stir and garnish with a melon ball if desired.

name: Melon Jones
instructions: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Melon Margarita
instructions: Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass or blend with ice.

name: Melon Pousse Cafe
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients in a cordial glass.

name: Melon Tonic
instructions: Add vodka, melon liqueur, and lemon juice over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake 3-4 times, then add tonic water or club soda and shake once. Strain into cocktail glass or pour over ice into a highball glass.

name: Spanish Melonball
instructions: Shake midori, malibu, and pineapple juice and strain into a highball glass. Add orange juice.

name: Melonball
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur and vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice, or orange juice.

name: Melonoma
instructions: Shake ice, vodka and melon liqueur. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Melzinho
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a pousse cafe glass with ice.

name: Memachau
instructions: Pour the lager into a beer mug or pint glass. Add kahlua and stir.

name: Menage A Trois
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Merete
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the cherry, and serve.

name: Merry Widow Cocktail
instructions: Stir maraschino and cherry brandy with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: Merry Widow Fizz
instructions: Shake ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Metropolitan
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mexican Cappuccino
instructions: In a large coffee mug, pour the kahlua and tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill the cup with espresso, top with the frothed milk and serve.

name: Mexican Cherry
instructions: Pour into a shot glass.

name: Mexican Coffee Liqueur
instructions: 1. Heat water in a medium saucepan. When hot, add coffee and stir until dissolved. Add sugar and vanilla bean, stirring well to combine. Bring to boil, stirring constantly. Immediately reduce heat so that a very low boil is maintained for one minute. Remove from heat and cool to lukewarm. 2. Pour vodka and brandy into aging container. Add the cooled coffee mixture and the chocolate extract. Stir well. Cap and let age in a cool dark place for 3 weeks. 3. After initial aging, strain liqueur through a cloth-lined wire-mesh strainer over a large bowl. Repeat until desired clairity is reached. Stir in food coloring. Bottle, cap and let age an additional 1-3 months.

name: Mexican Flag
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients into a highball glass (using a spoon), in the order given; grenadine, creme de menthe, tequila. The layers form the mexican flag.

name: Mexican Madras
instructions: Pour juices and tequila into a shaker 1/2 filled with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mexican Mountie
instructions: Pour each part into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with a wedge of lime.

name: Mexican Mouthwash
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice, and gently swirl together. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Mudslide
instructions: Combine the kahlua, amaretto, and ice-cream in a glass. Swirl chocolate into the glass and add whipped cream on top.

name: Mexican Rose
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a double-shot glass.

name: Mexican Stand-Off
instructions: Carefully layer into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Mexican Surfer
instructions: Pour the malibu rum into an old-fashioned glass, and add tequila and pineapple juice. Add ice and stir.

name: Mexican Virgin
instructions: Pour into a mixing glass and stir. Serve in an 8 oz. glass over ice.

name: Mexicana
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mexicola
instructions: Pour tequila and juice of lime over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with cola, stir, and serve.

name: Miami Beach Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Miami Hurricane
instructions: Mix with ice cubes in a hurricane glass.

name: Michelada Regular
instructions: Add lemon juice to 4 ice cubes in a beer mug. Add salt and stir to blend. Add tequila and again, stir to blend. Fill with corona and serve.

name: Michelada
instructions: Mix ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer, mix, and serve.

name: Mickey Mouse
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Microwave Hot Cocoa
instructions: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at high (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, stir and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

name: Midnight Cowboy
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Midnight Flight to Malibu
instructions: Build with ice. Can be shaken, or left layered.

name: Midnight Lemonade
instructions: Combine berry tattoo schnapps and lemonade in a collins glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of 7-up, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Midnight Oil
instructions: Mix in the shot glass. (Ingredients should not be chilled.)

name: Midori 2000
instructions: Build over ice and garnish with a pineapple wedge, three pineapple leaves, and two cherries.

name: Midori Chan
instructions: Add ingredients to a blender with ice and mix until desired consistency is achieved. Strain into a highball glass with/without ice.

name: Midori Green Russian
instructions: Pour midori and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste.

name: Midori Hack
instructions: Shake midori, vodka, and sweet and sour over ice in a tin. Prepare a large rocks glass by juicing lime garnish into the glass half filled with ice. Strain in the chilled cocktail, add a splash of pineapple juice (upto half an ounce), and serve.

name: Midori Jello Shots
instructions: 1. Warm the bottle of midori so that it is hot to the touch, by first loosening the cap half way, then set the entire bottle in a saucepan half full of water on high heat. 2. Bring 1 cup of water to a rolling boil then stir in the jello and gelatin until dissolved. Stir in hot midori. Pour mixture into a flat bottom pan and slice into cubes when cooled, or place in small cups.

name: Midori Margarita
instructions: Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into a glass filled with crushed ice. Optional: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in a blender for a smooth, "granita" type drink.

name: Midori Mimosa
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: Midori Sour #2
instructions: Pour midori into a highball glass, add sweet and sour until three-quarters full, and fill with sprite. Stir.

name: Frozen Midori Sour
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish.

name: Midori Sour Ultra
instructions: Mix ingredients in a boston shaker with cracked ice. In a highball glass or champagne flute (optional), fill glass three quarters full with ice. Pour one tablespoon of cherry juice into the glass before pouring in mixed ingredients. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and lemon wedge. Drink through a straw.

name: Midori Splice
instructions: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

name: Midori Sunrise
instructions: Mix one part of midori (or equivalent melon liqueur) with one part orange juice. Add a splash of grenadine syrup, and serve.

name: Mikado
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Mike Tyson
instructions: Mix and serve with ice.

name: Mikey Mike
instructions: Mix ingredients in a tumbler and shake thoroughly. Pour over ice in a tall glass.

name: The Miki
instructions: Pour the campari into a highball glass with ice. Add the grapefruit juice, then the soda. Stir once.

name: Milk Punch
instructions: Shake liquors and milk with cracked ice and sugar syrup and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Milk Shake 43
instructions: Pour licor 43 over ice, shake and strain into a highball glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

name: Milky Way Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix, and serve in a cocktail glass without ice.

name: Milky Way
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake, and serve with cut apple, lemon, and pineapple-leaves.

name: Million-Dollar Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Milpsi
instructions: Pour milk into a highball glass, add the pepsi and drink before seperation occurs.

name: Milwaukee Stop Light
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a collins glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir very gently, and serve.

name: Mind Eraser #2
instructions: Place three to four ice cubes in a small, narrow glass. Carefully layer the kahlua, vodka and finally the sprite. (Sprite should be about half of the shot, or to taste.) Serve unstirred with a wide straw.

name: Mind Eraser #3
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, and carefully layer in each ingredient; kalhua, vodka, butterscotch schnapps, then 7-up.

name: Mind Eraser
instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and tonic water into a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Mind Game
instructions: Shake the ricard, blue curacao and milk (2% fat) with ice in a shot glass.

name: Mind Over Marny
instructions: Pour vodka into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add the juices, and top with club soda.

name: Mint Collins
