instructions: Shake gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add slices of orange and lemon, top with a cherry, and serve with a straw.

name: Mint Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill the glass with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Mint Martini
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and creme de menthe. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Mint Russki
instructions: Place twisted or crushed fresh mint leaves into a medium sized cocktail glass. Add frozen vodka, and ice if desired. Stir briefly.

name: Mint Tea
instructions: Pour white creme de menthe over ice in a cocktail glass and add iced tea to taste.

name: Minttini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Mirage
instructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Miss Belle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Miss V
instructions: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Mississippi Planters Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Missle Pop
instructions: Pour vodka, pineapple juice and fruit punch into an ice-filled glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Mister Christian
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mister Wu
instructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and one ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve.

name: Mistletoe
instructions: Combine creme de almond, white creme de cacao, swiss mocha cream and grenadine in an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with half-and-half, and top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Mistolin
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the orange juice, and pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

name: Mithering Bastard
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Moana Sands
instructions: Pour chambord and peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup, fill the other half with orange juice, and stir. Garnish with a paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge. After a few minutes the juice and syrup should separate from the alcohol giving it a sand-like look. (But it tastes much better.)

name: The Moby
instructions: Pour surge into a highball glass, and add vodka.

name: Mocha Martini
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Mocha Mint Cappuccino
instructions: Pour chocolate syrup, creme de menthe, creme de cacao and irish cream to an irish coffee cup. Add the espresso, and then the steamed milk. Stir well.

name: Mocha Mint
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mocha Mudslide Milkshake
instructions: Place the milk, banana, sugar and coffee granules in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in a blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container, add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

name: Mocha-Berry
instructions: Pour coffee into an irish coffee cup. Add cocoa mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

name: Mock Pink Champagne
instructions: Boil sugar and water until the sugar dissolves, and allow to cool. Stir cranberry, pineapple, and orange juice, and chill. Prior to serving, add carbonated beverage.

name: Modern Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mogadon
instructions: Pour absolut citron into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up, add a splash of fruit juice, and stir.

name: Mogul Masher
instructions: Mix hot chocolate as per usual (in a 12 oz. glass or larger) and add liquors. Top with whipped cream.

name: Moilanen
instructions: 1. Slice half a lemon into small slices. Extract the juice from the other half. 2. Add ice to a beer mug, and pour in the lemon juice. Fill the rest of the glass with vodka and schweppes, at a ratio of 1:2 respectively. Blend briefly.

name: Mojambo Punch
instructions: Mix in a large container. Chill with bags of ice. Add sugar (to taste) if desired.

name: Mojo
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large container. Keep stirred.

name: Molotov Cocktail
instructions: Pour a shot of vodka (preferably russian) into a shot glass. Float the 151, ignite, blow out, and shoot.

name: Mona-Lisa
instructions: Stir ingredients and pour into a highball glass.

name: Monaco
instructions: Pour grenadine syrup into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the beer and 7-up, and stir well.

name: Mongolian Motherfucker
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, over ice. Shake, and serve.

name: Monk on Coke
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Monkey Gland #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Monkey In a Tree
instructions: Add rum, creme de banane and grenadine to a collins glass. Almost fill with pineapple juice, and mix. Float midori on top, and serve.

name: Monkey La La
instructions: Blend until smooth and frothy.

name: Monkey Wrench
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Monster Slime Juice
instructions: Mix orange juice concentrate and kool-aid, and add water. Stir, and watch it turn green.

name: Montana
instructions: Stir all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Monte Cristo
instructions: Moisten the rim of an irish coffee cup with lemon juice, and dip into sugar. Pour the kahlua and grand marnier into the cup, and fill (almost to the top) with coffee. Top with whipped cream and grated chocolate.

name: Montezuma
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly, with half a cup of crushed ice, in a blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Montmartre Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Montreal Club Bouncer
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Montreal Gin Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Moon Quake Shake
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moonlight Serenade
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir, and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Moonlight
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Moranguito
instructions: Pour the absinthe into a shot glass, add the tequila, then add the grenadine syrup.

name: Mormon Surprise
instructions: Add the vodka and grape juice to a collins glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Morning Dew
instructions: Pour ingredients into a punch bowl and stir. Add cherries or grenadine.

name: Morning Glory Fizz #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Morning Milk
instructions: Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Morro
instructions: Rub the rim of old-fashioned glass with lime juice, and dip into powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mortini
instructions: Pour grenadine and amaretto into a chilled cocktail glass. Add chilled vodka.

name: Mortuary Mix
instructions: Fill a pitcher with one bottle of tom collins mix. Add everclear as above or "to taste". (Caution: everclear is extremely potent.) Add ice and serve.

name: Mosstrooper
instructions: Almost fill a glass half-filled with ice with root beer. Add a little 7-up, and stir with a straw.

name: Mostly Mal
instructions: Combine the rum, vermouth, triple sec and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass garnished with a cherry.

name: Mother Moo
instructions: Pour the licor 43 into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with milk, and add a stirring pin.

name: Mother Pucker
instructions: Pour appropriate amounts into a mixing container to your liking. Serve in highball glasses.

name: Motor Oil
instructions: Pour jagermeister into a triple shot glass. Add, in order; peppermint schnapps, goldshlager, and malibu rum.

name: Mounds
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add rum, creme de cacao, and fill with cream.

name: Mount Red
instructions: Add the vodka, rum, gin and schnapps to a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve with a lime slice.

name: Mountain Cider High
instructions: Add the vodka, cider and mountain dew to a glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Mountain Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mountain Dang
instructions: Fill a glass (ice optional) three-quarters full with mountain dew. Add tang to taste.

name: Mountain Dew
instructions: Fill a beer glass half-way with beer. Fill the other half with 7-up. (If you have the patience, pour a little of one, then a little of the other, until the glass is full.) Fill a shot glass with melon liqueur. Drop the entire shot glass into the glass of beer. Immediately consume the entire pint of beer with the shot glass still inside.

name: Mountain Sunrise
instructions: Shake and serve over crushed ice.

name: Mountaineer On Acid
instructions: Mix in shaker, and serve chilled.

name: Mozart Cocktail
instructions: Combine the rum, vermouth, triple sec and orange bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve with a lemon twist.

name: Mr G
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Mudskipper
instructions: Pour gin and ginger ale over ice in a collins glass. Add chocolate syrup and let settle in the bottom. Stir very lightly. Drink should appear dark brown on the bottom and gradate to clear on top.

name: Mudslinger
instructions: Add ingredients to a large jug or punch bowl and stir well.

name: Muff Diver
instructions: Mix all the alcohol in a shaker with ice, and strain into a shot glass. Place shot glass into a wide-mouth rocks or old-fashioned glass, fill with whipped cream, and add a cherry if desired. Shoot without hands.

name: Mule
instructions: Pour smirnoff vodka into a glass. Fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze in the lime juice.

name: Mulled Madeira
instructions: Combine madeira, honey, juice, peel, cloves and cinnamon in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs, leaving peel and spices in pan.

name: Mulled Wine
instructions: Simmer water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and peel of one lemon in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Pour in the wine, heat to a "coffee temperature" (do not boil) and add brandy.

name: Mullens Mai Tai
instructions: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

name: Multi-Colored Smurf
instructions: Shake the orange juice, vodka, and mango syrup with ice in a shaker. Carefully layer the apricot liqueur and blueberry schnapps into a highball glass. Float the pre-shaken mixture of vodka and juices on top, and serve.

name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Mumbo Jumbo
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: The Mummy
instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and lemon juice in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice. Top off with club soda. Stir.

name: Mumsicle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, bourbon, and bitters. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Mundo Fine
instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough). Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

name: Muppet
instructions: Pour equal parts tequila and 7-up into a shot glass. Place palm over the glass, hit it on the table (to stir), and shoot.

name: Mussaka
instructions: Pour ouzo and drambuie into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Mussolini
instructions: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).

name: Mutiny
instructions: Combine the rum, dubonnet, and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Mutual Orgasm
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes.

name: My Antonella
instructions: In a highball glass, combine gin and chambord over ice. Stir, add two italian green olives, and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Mach 1
instructions: Add to a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mach 6
instructions: Blend ingredients in a highball glass until smooth. Add three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a cherry, and serve with straws.

name: Mackinnon Spice
instructions: Pour into a rocks or old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Maggie May
instructions: Pour into a frosted champagne flute.

name: Major Bailey
instructions: Pour gin, lemon and lime juice into a double-cocktail glass. Add the sugar. Gently crush the mint, and add to the glass. Fill with crushed ice, and serve with a cherry and fresh mint sprig.

name: Malayan Gold
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Man Overboard
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Maragato Special
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled double-cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime.

name: Marimba
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange and pineapple slices.

name: Martian Cherry
instructions: Shake and strain into a glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Mayfair
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Melonade
instructions: Add to an ice filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a green cherry.

name: Melon Tree
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Mexican Strawberry
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: Millionaire
instructions: Shake well and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice.

name: Magic Island
instructions: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with in-season fruit and serve with short straws.

name: Mandate
instructions: Add to an ice filled wine goblet.

name: Mock Daisy Crusta
instructions: Rim a wine glass with lime/caster sugar, add a spiral of lime, and fill with crushed ice. Stir lime juice and syrups together, and strain into the glass. Add the soda and sprinkle the grenadine on top.

name: Marrakech Express
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a collins glass.

name: Mean Machine
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Melon Ball
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a melon ball and a slice of lime on a stick, and serve with straws.

name: Mexican Chocolate
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve with short straws.

name: Mississippi Magic
instructions: Blend briefly in a wine goblet filled with crushed ice, and serve with straws.

name: Molokai Mike
instructions: 1. Shake white rum, brandy, juices and almond syrup together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice and mix. 2. Combine dark rum and grenadine with sufficient crushed ice to produce a sorbet/sherbet, and gently add to the top of the cocktail. 3. Garnish with in-season fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Moon River
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Add the curacao streaked across the top.

name: Munchausen
instructions: Shake all but lemonade and strain into a collins glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the lemonade and serve with straws.

name: Missile Rider
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Missile Stopper
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Monkey Gland
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange wrapped around a cherry.

name: Monkey Tree
instructions: Rim a frosted cocktail glass with grenadine/caster sugar. Shake ingredients and strain into the glass.

name: Moon Drops
instructions: Pour into a wine glass and serve with two melon balls.

name: Morticia
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mulata
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Mandarin
instructions: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass garnished with a slice of orange speared with a cherry.

name: Maria Mia
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a twist of lemon, slice of banana and a cherry.

name: Mexican Bliss
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with half a slice of orange.

name: Mohican
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with a straight line of grated chocolate.

name: Moira
instructions: Shake and strain into a liqueur or cordial glass.

name: Motel Wrecker
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Mistress
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle with campari, and serve with a cherry.

name: Mozart Eiskaffee
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass topped with whipped cream, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Martian Sex Monster
instructions: Blend the galliano, cognac, and ice cream briefly in a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle the melon liqueur on top, and serve with straws.

name: Mandarine Imperiale
instructions: Shake mandarine, egg white, lemon juice and syrup well and strain into a wine glass. Pour in the champagne.

name: Marilyn Monroe
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve with two cherries on a stick.

name: Mustique Whammy
instructions: Shake all but champagne, and strain into a wine glass. Add the champagne.

name: Mulled Red Wine
instructions: Heat in a small saucepan and strain into a heatproof cup. Do not boil.

name: Mandarin Daiquiri
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Mocha Flip
instructions: Shake well and strain into a wine glass three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
instructions: Add scotch, lemon juice, sugar, egg and bitters to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda water, and serve with a slice of orange and a muddler.

name: Mile Highball
instructions: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add lemon twist and serve.

name: Mandeville-Polar
instructions: Funnel the rums, pernod, lemon juice and grenadine into one small cola bottle (185-200ml), roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard, stein or british pint), and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle.

name: Melon Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a pina colada glass with a slice of pineapple, cherry and straws.

name: Mexican Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and kahlua into an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Nagel Nectar
instructions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Naked Girl Scout
instructions: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

name: The Naked Lady
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: Naked Navel
instructions: Both vodka and schnapps should be kept in the freezer prior to making. Pour vodka into a shot glass, and add the schnapps, forming a ball in the bottom of the glass.

name: Naked Shake
instructions: Add the vanilla schnapps, swiss mocha cream liqueur and a few ounces of half-and-half to an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with a splash of coca-cola, and garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Naked Surfer
instructions: Pour vodka half-way up an ice-filled beer mug. Add roughly a shot of grenadine. Fill with orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Naked Yellow Bird
instructions: Mix equal parts over ice. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Nalgaa
instructions: Pour cherry liqueur over four ice cubes in a highball glass, and add the campari. Fill with 7-up, or sprite, and serve.

name: Napalm
instructions: Pour into a shot glass in order; aftershock, schnapps, rum. Ignite the rum, allow to burn for a few seconds, extinguish, and serve.

name: Napoleon
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Napotonic
instructions: Pour mandarine napoleon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, and garnish with orange peels.

name: Nappy Dugout
instructions: Build ingredients over two ice cubes in a highball glass, and stir.

name: Narragansett
instructions: Combine the bourbon, vermouth, and anisette in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Nasty Bitch
instructions: Serve chilled tequila and cointreau straight up in a shot glass.

name: Nasty Pablo
instructions: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into an ice-filled pint glass. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

name: National Aquarium
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well, and serve on the rocks.

name: Navel Caribbean Love
instructions: Pour malibu into a hurricane glass, and slowly add the orange juice.

name: Navy Grog
instructions: Pour liquors into an ice-filled collins glass. Add juices, shake, and garnish with an orange wedge and pineapple chunk.

name: Nazi Cola
instructions: Combine jagermeister and rumple minze over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with cola, and serve.

name: Nazi Helmet
instructions: Combine in a shot glass.

name: Nazi Surfer
instructions: Chill, shake, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Nazi Taco
instructions: Mix ingredients together and pour into a shot glass.

name: Negroni - Zimbabwe Style
instructions: Coat the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar. Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and pour into the glass over plenty of ice.

name: Nelson Special
instructions: Pour gin into a cocktail glass with ice cubes, and fill one-quarter full with cranberry juice. Fill with tonic water. Blend briefly with a small stick and drop in a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Neon Iguana
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Neon Nightmare
instructions: Combine ingredients into a mixing tin full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange flag.

name: Neon Voodoo
instructions: Combine the vodka, apple juice, and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes, and blend on high for about 10 seconds. Add more vodka if desired.

name: Neon-Geek
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with one cup of crushed ice. Strain into a margarita glass and serve immediately.

name: Nerds
instructions: Pour midori and blue curacao into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Fill with lemonade.

name: Nestle
instructions: Combine in a shot glass and serve.

name: Net Surfer
instructions: Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

name: Netherland
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Neuralizer
instructions: Mix in a highball glass, and add ice if desired.

name: Nevada Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nevins
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: New Orleans Buck
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: New Orleans Salty Dog
instructions: Coat the rim of a highball glass with salt. Mix vodka and grapefruit juice in another glass with ice and pour into glass with salted rim.

name: New York Lemonade
instructions: Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a frosted rim (lemon and sugar).

name: New York Sour
instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret red wine on top, and serve with a half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: Nicky Finn
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

name: The Nick
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Nicolalas
instructions: Mix absolut mandrin and passoa in a highball glass. Add ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Nightboat to Recife
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a tumbler with crushed ice.

name: Nightcap
instructions: Heat the milk. Add sugar and kahlua, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Nightmare
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nikki Delight
instructions: Pour ingredients over 4 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass, and stir briefly.

name: Nipple On Fire
instructions: Pour in order into a shot glass; butterscotch, firewater, and float the irish cream.

name: Nitro
instructions: Mix together in a shot glass.

name: No Pressure
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass one-third full with frozen strawberry daiquiri mix. Carefully layer the frozen pina colada mix until two-thirds full. Add a splash of blue curacao on top, and insert a straw. Fill with 151 proof rum.

name: No Problem
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass.

name: Noah
instructions: Pour amaretto into an ice-filled glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Noche de Phoof
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Drink should be frothy on top. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: The Nog
instructions: Pour midori, triple sec and rum into a 12-ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice, stir, and serve.

name: Nolan
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly in a highball glass.

name: The Nomad
instructions: Mix vodka, lemonade and fresca and serve over ice. Add a dash of grenadine.

name: Nord-Norsk Depresjon
instructions: Pour cointreau, aquavit, gin and lime juice over ice in a small highball glass. Stir, top with sprite or 7-up, and serve.

name: Norling Special
instructions: Pour midori and bacardi limon into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with equal parts 7-up and cranberry juice.

name: North Pole Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except whipped cream) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Norwegian Hunting Mixture Bowl
instructions: 1. Fill a a large clean mixing bowl with approx. 2 gallon pure alcohol and 5 gallon lemonade. 2. Add approx. 10 kg. fresh fruits; lemon, grapefruit and oranges. Mix the items together for approx. 2 minutes with a 4 HP outboard-motor with cooling - and exhaust system modified to not interfere with the mixture. 3. Can be served in all kind of glasses but preferably a jar called "Norges-glass".

name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up
instructions: Add all items to a whiskey sour glass. Mix well with a bar spoon.

name: Novebuche
instructions: Stir with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nuclear Rainbow
instructions: Carefully layer, in order, into a glass.

name: Nuclear Waste #2
instructions: Shake well and serve in a highball glass.

name: Nudge
instructions: Pour liquors into a coffee mug, and fill with coffee.

name: Null and Void Punch
instructions: Mix with ice in a tupperware dish pan. Serve in 16 oz glasses (with caution). Tastes great, but potent.

name: Nummer 10
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass one-third full with raspberry vodka. Sprinkle a few drops of kahlua on top and mix. Fill with schweppes russian and serve.

name: Nurse
instructions: Pour vodka and licor 43 over 2 - 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir and fill with with root beer. Serve with a straw.

name: Nuthugger
instructions: Pour in liquors, add lime juice, and fill with beer. Serve unstirred.

name: Nutty Banana
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Nutty Belgian
instructions: Serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Nutty Ginger
instructions: Add the amaretto and frangelico to a cocktail glass. Fill with ginger ale, and add ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Mix well over ice and serve.

name: NyQuil
instructions: Add vodka and jagermeister to a shot glass. Add a few drops of green food coloring, mix, and serve.

name: Nagermeister
instructions: Pour kahlua into an irish coffee cup. Add jagermeister, fill with coffee and serve with cream on top.

name: Oasis
instructions: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Oaxaca Jim
instructions: Combine the gin, orange juice, grapefruit juice and bitters in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

name: Obadoba
instructions: Heat the milk, and add it to the salt and cocoa powder in a tall glass. Place some whipped cream on top and serve.

name: Occhi Blu
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Mix, pour into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Octapussy
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a cocktail glass.

name: Odwits
instructions: Mix tequila, vodka and southern comfort in a highball glass. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

name: Ogre Drink
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a beer mug.

name: Oil Slick #2
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Using a teaspoon, carefully float the black sambuca on top. Shoot.

name: Oil Slick
instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Oil Spill
instructions: Carefully layer jagermeister on top of the goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
instructions: 1. Place both cans of cream of coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. 2. Pour the pineapple juice, orange juice, cream of coconut, and grenadine into a large punch bowl. Add the rum (to taste), or add it seperately to each drink later. (1 1/2 ounce per 12 ounce serving, kids will enjoy it without rum.) Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. 3. Serve in glasses over crushed ice. Garnish each drink with a pineapple and orange wedge, and a maraschino cherry on a tooth pick.

name: Old Fashioned (Sweet)
instructions: Pour bourbon over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add the bitters, soda and juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon twist.

name: Old Fashioned Hot Buttered Rum
instructions: 1. Combine sugar, brown sugar and butter in a 2-quart saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until butter is melted (6-8 min). 2. Combine cooked mixture with ice-cream in a large mixing bowl, and beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often until smooth (1-2 min). Store refrigerated up to 2 weeks or frozen up to one month. 3. For each serving, fill one-quarter of a mug with mixture, add one ounce rum and three-quarters of a cup of boiling water. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Old Pal Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Old-Fashioned Rum and Coke
instructions: Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Olive in an Olive
instructions: Pour equal parts tequila and sweet vermouth into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the curacao, and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and drop in an olive.

name: Olle Goop
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and add a few drops of lime juice. Add schweppes russian, to taste, and serve.

name: Olsen Driver
instructions: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

name: Olympia-Flip
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with fine cracked almonds.

name: Olympia
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Once-Upon-A-Time
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ooo
instructions: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Opal Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Opening Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Opera Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Orancio Royal
instructions: Pour orancio into a champagne flute and fill with brut champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orangatang
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender jar, cover, and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Orange 43
instructions: Pour over ice and stir to mix.

name: Orange Bitters
instructions: 1. Chop the orange peel finely and mix it with the herbs and alcohol. Let it stand for 15-20 days in a sealed jar, agitating it every day. 2. Pour off spirits through a cloth, and seal again. 3. Put the strained off seeds and peel in a saucepan, crush it, cover with boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into another jar, cover and let stand for 2 days. Strain this off and add it to the spirits. Add caramel coloring, filter again and let it rest until it settles perfectly clear.

name: Orange Bliss
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Orange Blossom
instructions: Combine the gin, orange juice, and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Orange Buck
instructions: Shake gin, orange juice, and lime juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orange Crisis
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and pour into shot glasses.

name: Orange Crush
instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler, and pour as a shot.

name: Orange Demon
instructions: Pour the orange juice into a cocktail glass. Mix in the everclear and the cointreau, and serve.

name: Orange Flamingo
instructions: Fill a highball glass four-fifths with orange soda. Add grenadine, and top with whipped cream.

name: Orange Julius
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender with ten ice cubes for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

name: Orange Kiss
instructions: Mix vodka, orancio, and sprite in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orange Lion
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Orange Mule
instructions: Pour vodka and cointreau into a highball glass over ice. Fill with ginger ale, and mix well. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Orange Oasis
instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orange Push-Up
instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Serve in a hurricane glass, and garnish with an orange and cherry flag.

name: Orange Safari
instructions: Build over ice in highball glass. Stir.

name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
instructions: 1. Combine milk, chocolate (chopped bittersweet or semi-sweet ), orange peel, espresso (instant coffee), and nutmeg in a heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts, increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk until frothy. 2. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. 3. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

name: Orange Squash
instructions: Pour lemon juice and orange juice into a large tumbler over one ice cube. Stir well. Serve with sugar and cold water on the side, a drinking straw, and a spoon.

name: Orange Surfboard
instructions: Combine liquors in a tall glass with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and add a splash of cranberry juice. Shake to mix and serve.

name: Orange Surprise
instructions: Shake the peachtree schnapps, vodka and sour mix in a shaker. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with orange fanta. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orange Velvet
instructions: Shake cream, pineapple juice and orange juice with some ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Orange Warthog
instructions: Add kool-aid powder (sweetened), southern comfort and coke to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Orangeade
instructions: Pour lemon juice, orange juice, and sugar syrup into a large tumbler or highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well, and top up with cold soda water. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Orchard Downs
instructions: Pour dry gin into an old-fashioned glass and fill with apple cider or apple juice. Add grenadine (optional) to taste.

name: Organ Grinder
instructions: Blend and pour over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with coconut shavings and serve.

name: Orgeat Lemonade
instructions: Mix together the lemon juice and orgeat syrup in a tumbler with 2 or 3 small ice cubes. Fill with soda water, stir, and serve.

name: Oriental Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Original Margarita
instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass, and garnish with a lime or lemon slice.

name: The Original Singapore Sling
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, benedictine, and cherry brandy. Stir well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda and stir again.

name: Original Terminator
instructions: Half-fill a chilled shot glass with rumple minze, and top with black sambuca.

name: Orlando Amethyst
instructions: Stir the gin and chambord raspberry liqueur together in a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Ortensia
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: The Other Half
instructions: Carefully layer the triple sec, amaretto, and rum into a shot glass. Turn off the lights, ignite the rum (use caution) to warm rim of glass, and carefully blow out the flame. Serve immediately.

name: Otter Pop #2
instructions: Add liquors and sweet and sour mix to a cocktail shaker. Fill with 7-up or sprite, and top with grenadine. Shake, and strain into a pint glass over ice.

name: Otter Pop
instructions: Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled shaker, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Outrigger
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Owen Moore
instructions: Combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the curacao into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Oxymoron
instructions: Maintain the vodka and juice at room temperature. Mix in an old-fashioned glass, and add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

name: Ozone
instructions: Add amaretto, a splash of beer and sweet and sour mix to an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Top with sprite, stir lightly, and serve.

name: P.S.U. Victory Dance
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a blender. Pour contents into a beer mug filled with cracked ice. Note: Add crushed ice to the blending process for a Frozen Victory Dance.

name: Pacific Sunshine
instructions: Mix with cracked ice and pour, with ice, into a chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Paisano
instructions: Pour vodka and frangelico into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with milk, and shake.

name: Paisley Martini
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Pajala Sunrise
instructions: Fill a glass with vodka and place a slice of sausage on the edge.

name: Palm Beach Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palmer Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palmetto Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pamoyo
instructions: Combine equal parts of gin, sprite, and grape juice in a large container. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
instructions: Pour the tia maria, vodka and cherry brandy together into a pint glass. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill with equal amounts of dry cider and 7-up, and add ice cubes.

name: Panama Deluxe
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, and serve in a tumbler over ice.

name: Panther Sweat
instructions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice, and strain into a whiskey-sour glass. Add crushed salt to the rim of the glass if desired.

name: Panther
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Panty Dropper
instructions: Pour kahlua and sloe gin into a tall, ice-filled glass. Fill with half and half, and serve.

name: Papaya Driver
instructions: Pour rum into a collins glass. Add papaya juice, and serve.

name: Papaya Milk Splash
instructions: Clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Add to a blender with the milk, sugar and ice, and blend at medium to high speed for one or two minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Papaya Sling
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water and pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
instructions: Pour shots over ice, add coke and strain into a collins glass.

name: Parisette
instructions: Pour grenadine syrup over ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir, fill with cold milk, and stir again. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Parisian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Park Avenue
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Parrot Perch
instructions: Pour liquor, juice and syrup into a blender. Add a sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Party Girl
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve over ice, and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Party Slush Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and freeze. Serve when slushy; add 7-up if desired.

name: Pascal
instructions: Pour licor 43 and midori into a cocktail glass. Fill with milk, add ice, and serve.

name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an iced shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Passion Beach
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve with fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

name: Passion Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Passion Mimosa
instructions: Pour passion fruit juice into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne, decorate with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
instructions: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Pat Quinn
instructions: Pour the orange pop into a highball glass. Add the scotch whiskey, stir, and serve.

name: Patagonian Black Bush
instructions: Pour genever into a shot glass. Add fernet branca, and a dash of sour mix.

name: Patat�s
instructions: Blend amaretto, rum and curacao. Pour into a glass with ice, add orange juice, and splash with grenadine.

name: Patriotic Blow
instructions: Layer the blue curacao and whipped cream over gin in a shot glass.

name: Patsy Mix
instructions: Pour brandy into a glass over ice. Add babycham pear cider, and serve.

name: Pat Cocktail
instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour equal parts of each ingredient into the glass, and serve with a straw.

name: Paul Raspberry
instructions: Pour vodka into a shot glass, ice optional. Add milk, and a drop or two of grenadine.

name: Peach 200
instructions: Pour koskenkorva peach vodka into a glass, and fill with coca-cola. Stir, and serve cold.

name: Peach Blow Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Peach Bowl
instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Peach Bunny
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Peach Death
instructions: Serve on the rocks.

name: Peach Fuzz
instructions: Add limeade to a blender half-filled with ice cubes. Pit and slice to medium ripe peaches, and add, with the vodka, to the blender. Blend, pour into a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Peach Harpoon
instructions: Stir together in an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Peach May Cocktail
instructions: Mix together in a hurricane glass.

name: Peach Nehi
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a double-shot glass.

name: Peach Passion
instructions: Pour vodka into a mixer/glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec, schnapps and pink lemonade. Stir and pour into a highball glass.

name: Peach Punch
instructions: Add wine, liqueur, brandy, sugar, cloves and chopped fruit to a large, 40-litre bowl. Mix until the sugar dissolves, and let rest for 12 hours. Serve with added sugar or brandy if desired.

name: Peach Tart
instructions: Shake and serve in a shot glass.

name: Peach Tea Cooler
instructions: Mix and serve on the rocks.

name: Peach Tequila
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lime juice, stir and drop lime slice into drink.

name: Peach Treat
instructions: Shake brandy and orange juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Top with chilled champagne, add the peach slice, and serve.

name: Peaches and Cream
instructions: Pour kahlua and schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with milk, shake, and serve.

name: Peachy Comfort
instructions: Pour southern comfort and peach schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Pear Martini
instructions: Garnish with a slice of pear, and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Pearl Diver
instructions: Mix all ingredients together, shake, and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Pearl Harbour Revisited
instructions: Add a splash of vanilla essence to an otherwise standard scotch and coke.

name: Pearl Harbour
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and maraschino cherry on a stick. Serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Pearl Necklace #2
instructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass and add kahlua. Use a dropper to add rum cream drop by drop on the outside edge of the shot to form a ring or "Pearl Necklace."

name: Pedro Collins
instructions: Pour bacardi limon into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sweet and sour mix, and fill with equal parts of club soda and 7-up.

name: Peekaboo
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a cocktail glass, and fill with orange juice.

name: Peggy Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pegu
instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Peg
instructions: Add bourbon to a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with coke and add lime juice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Peltikatto
instructions: Squeeze juice from a fresh lemon. Mix with koskenkorva vodka.

name: Penalty Shot
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and mix.

name: Pendennis
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in a few drops of water, in an old-fashioned glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice, add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Penguino
instructions: Add light rum and cointreau to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water, and serve with a cherry.

name: Penguin
instructions: Pour the vodka, blue curacao and lemon-lime mix into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill almost with sprite, floating the banana liqueur on top.

name: Pensacola Bushwacker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender (ice cream optional) with two cups of ice, and blend until mixed. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Pentecostal
instructions: Pour the bourbon into a whiskey sour glass. Add vodka and 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Penthouse
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass, and shoot. Chase with a lime wedge.

name: Pepper Slammer
instructions: Add southern comfort to an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with dr pepper and serve.

name: Peppermint Aztec
instructions: Pour milk and liquors into a coffee mug, and add a peppermint stick or candy cane.

name: Peppermint Beach
instructions: Mix with ice. Serve cold.

name: Peppermint Crisp
instructions: Blend the creme de menthe and kahlua together. Fill with ice cold milk, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Peppermint Pattie
instructions: Pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Peppermint Patty
instructions: Keep a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth, and squirt chocolate syrup in. Shake head vigorously and swallow.

name: Peppermint Stick
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Perfect Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper
instructions: 1. Pour amaretto, kahlua, and root beer schnapps into a shot glass. Float rum on top. 2. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire, drop into a beer mug and slam as fast as you can.

name: Perfect Manhattan
instructions: Swirl with ice to chill, pour into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Perfect Rob Roy
instructions: Combine the scotch, sweet vermouth and dry vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a maraschino cherry or a lemon twist.

name: The Perfect Ten
instructions: Pour the liquors into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with equal parts of lemon juice and sprite.

name: The Pernod Demon
instructions: Coat the lemon wedge with sugar, and douse with tabasco sauce. Suck the lemon, and shoot the pernod.

name: Peter Pan Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Petit Zinc
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or orange slice.

name: Petite Fleur
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Petticoat Lane
instructions: Combine the gin, vermouth and campari in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: PEZ
instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a tumbler. Shake well, and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Adjust sour mix ratio to taste.

name: Phantom
instructions: Pour licor 43 into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add absolut vodka, fill with milk, and mix.

name: Phi Psycho Psycho
instructions: Mix in a large punch bowl.

name: Phillips Screwdriver
instructions: Place 2 - 3 ice cubes into a glass. Add vodka and sunny delight (more or less to taste), stir and serve.

name: Photon Torpedo
instructions: Mix the aftershock with vodka in a shot glass.

name: Phreaker Cocktail
instructions: Fill a fifth of a bottle with equal parts of vodka and water. Add the egg white. Shake well until egg is thoroughly mixed, and pour into a punch bowl with the triple sec, juice, and sugar.

name: Pic-Walsh
instructions: Swirl all ingredients together in a blender, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Picasso 1
instructions: Combine ingredients, in order, in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass with ice cubes. Top with schweppes russian. Garnish with a slice of lime, a mint leaf and a straw.

name: Piccadilly Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pick Me Up Jose
instructions: Lay a shot glass in a clean ash tray right side up, and start to pour the drinks into the glass until they overflow into the ash tray. Ignite the liquor, blow it out, take the shot from the shot glass, then drink out of the ash tray.

name: Picon Biere
instructions: Mix amer picon and beer in a pilsner.

name: Picon Whiskey
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

name: Piedra Putamadre
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cordial glass and serve. A mexican party-hangover cure.

name: Piggelin
instructions: Mix in a glass one-quarter filled with ice.

name: Piggelin #2
instructions: Mix in a glass one-quarter filled with ice.

name: Piledriver
instructions: Add rum and vodka to a beer mug. Top with coca-cola and orange juice, and add ice if possible.

name: Pimp & Hoe
instructions: Pour the liquor into a cocktail glass. Add the orange and lemon juice, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Pimp Punch
instructions: Mix and pour over ice.

name: Pimp Cocktail #2
instructions: Add jagermeister to a highball glass half-filled with ice. Fill with battery, and serve.

name: Pina Colada Punch
instructions: 1. Blend pineapple juice, coconut syrup, coconut cream and cinnamon in a blender until creamy. Place in refridgerator if desired or continue immediately to next step. 2. Add mixture from previous step to a punch bowl. Add ice-cream and allow to mostly dissolve. Add pineapple soda, an ice ring, and thin orange slices.

name: Pine Cone
instructions: Pour southern comfort on the rocks in a tall glass. Add amaretto, fill with pineapple juice, and stir.

name: Pine Needle
instructions: Pour ingredients, in the order listed, into an ice-filled highball glass. Vary to taste.

name: Pine-Sol Shooter
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass almost-filled with ice. Stir, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Pineapple Bomb
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Add a splash of 7-up or sprite if desired. Shake until condensated and strain into shot glasses.

name: Pineapple Cocktail
instructions: Pour rum, pineapple juice, grenadine and lemon juice into a collins glass. Fill with club soda, or to taste. Serve with ice.

name: Pineapple Cooler
instructions: Pour white wine, pineapple juice, powdered sugar and two-ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and an orange spiral over the rim.

name: Pineapple Drink
instructions: Pour rum over pineapple chunks in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Top with sprite, stir, and serve.

name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
instructions: Add to a blender and liquify.

name: Pineapple Lemonade
instructions: Mix juice and sugar syrup in a large tumbler with several ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold soda water. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Pineapple Liqueur
instructions: 1. Crush pineapple pieces very finely and add, with the sugar, to pineapple juice in a pan. Leave to stand overnight. 2. Drain syrup and strain pineapple pieces through a cheese cloth or in a food processor. Mix juice with rum and vodka, and add lemon juice to taste. Pour into a 0.7 litre bottle and fill with pineapple juice or water. Leave for one week.

name: Pineapple Monyca
instructions: Pour pineapple juice, triple sec and schnapps into a collins glass. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Pineapple Power
instructions: Place the can of sliced pineapple, with juice, into a blender jar. Add the water, honey and ginger, and blend on medium speed until well mixed. Pour into one tall, two medium, or three small glass.

name: Pineapple Punch
instructions: Place the pineapple pieces in a punch bowl and pour the sherry over them. Chill for 2 hours. Place tea and sugar in a pot, add red wine, lemon juice and rum. Heat but do not boil the mixture. Pour over the pineapple pieces and sherry.

name: Pineapple Tea
instructions: Add liquors and sour mix to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with pineapple juice (to taste) and serve.

name: Pineappleless Pineapple Juice
instructions: Pour southern comfort to the first line of a 16 oz. solo brand plastic cup. Add bacardi 151 rum, 7-up, orange juice, and coca-cola. Swirl briefly around in the cup and serve.

name: Pineberry
instructions: Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into two seperate shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.

name: Ping-Pong Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pink Banana
instructions: Pour creme de banane into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the pink lemonade, and serve.

name: Pink Beaner
instructions: Add tequila, pineapple-coconut juice and grenadine to a beer mug three-quartes filled with crushed ice. Stir until pink in color.

name: Pink California Sunshine
instructions: Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the orange juice and creme de cassis.

name: Pink Clyt
instructions: Shake in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Pink Cotton Candy
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Pink Cream Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and stir well.

name: Pink Drink
instructions: Pour vodka, galliano, cointreau, grenadine and milk into a cocktail shaker, shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a squirt of cream on top, and serve.

name: Pink Elephant Ears
instructions: Mix pink lemonade per instructions on can. Add vodka, slices of lime, and lots of ice. Mix well.

name: Pink Elephants On Parade
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Pink Elephant
instructions: Pour grenadine into a brandy snifter, and swirl so that it coats most of the surface of the glass. Pour out the grenadine briskly, and add gin.

name: Pink Fix
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake vigorously, and pour into a lowball glass. Garnish to taste.

name: Pink Fizzy
instructions: Pour watermelon schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass until half-full. Fill with sprite or 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Pink Flamingo #2
instructions: Add crushed ice, vanilla schnapps, and grenadine to a hurricane glass. Add a few splashes of orange juice and fill with cream. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Pink Flamingo
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and serve in a tall glass.

name: Pink Floyd
instructions: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a shaker glass over ice. Top with equal parts orange and pinapple juice, and a splash of grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Pink Gin #2
instructions: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into a shot glass.

name: Pink Gin Tonic
instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, top with campari (to add more colour and taste), and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Pink Gin
instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

name: Pink Heart
instructions: Pour the chambord and creme de cacao into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with cream or milk.

name: Pink Lady
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pink Lemonade #2
instructions: Add ice, vodka, sour mix, cranberry and lime juice to a shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass with a garnish of lemon.

name: Pink Lemonade
instructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Pink Limon
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Pink Millenium
instructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup, and pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

name: Pink Panther
instructions: Mix strawberry-kiwi crystal light, add your favorite brand of vodka, and serve over ice.

name: Pink Panther Shake
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh or frozen berries.

name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
instructions: Pour maraschino cherries and their juice into a two-gallon jug. Add vodka, and let soak for a few minutes. Add the lemon juice and fill with sprite. Pour mixture into a serving container and strain out cherries. Serve over ice, with cherries dropped in.

name: Pink Passion
instructions: Build in a highball glass, in order, with ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

name: Pink Penocha
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl. Keep chilled, and stir frequently.

name: Pink Pillow
instructions: Pour the vodka into a beer mug, and add grenadine until pink. Add equal parts of sour mix and ginger ale until full.

name: Pink Pitch
instructions: Mix in a blender on low speed and serve in a chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Pink Police
instructions: Pour one can of beer into a pitcher. Add one can of frozen pink lemonade. Add vodka (in place of the water), stir and serve.

name: Pink Poontang
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a mixing tin, and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Pink Ranger
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker, chill, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Pink Russian
instructions: Pour liquor into a highball glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream, and shake.

name: Pink Squirrel #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass, and shake or stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Pink Squirrel
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pinky
instructions: Pour rumple minze into a shot glass, add firewater, and serve.

name: Piper At Arms
instructions: Combine the scotch and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Piper At The Gates Of Dawn
instructions: Combine the scotch, kahlua, and maraschino liqueur in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink.

name: Pirate Float
instructions: Add all ingredients, in order, into a highball glass. Stir if desired.

name: Pisang Cold
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with two to three ice cubes, shake, and serve.

name: Pisang Garuda
instructions: Add pisang ambon and rum to a margarita glass with ice cubes. Fill with bitter lemon. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve with two straws.

name: Pisang Pistace
instructions: Shake well with five or six ice cubes and serve in a cocktail glass with two ice cubes.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixer with ice. Shake well (until ice is melted), and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Pisco-Rita
instructions: Add frozen limeade concentrate, pisco, and triple sec to a blender. Fill with ice, and blend on high speed (keep topping with water until full). When done, serve in a margarita glass rimmed with salt.

name: Piscola
instructions: Pour pisco over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with coca-cola or other soft drink, stir, and serve.

name: Piss in the Snow
instructions: Pour mountain dew into a large glass with ice cubes. Add vodka and avalanche schnapps, both pre-chilled. Stir and serve.

name: Pistachio Cream
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly at low speed. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Pit Bull On Crack #2
instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Pit Bull On Crack
instructions: Combine ingredients, all pre-chilled, in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Pixie Stix
instructions: Pour southern comfort and amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix, top with sprite, and float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Pina Rita
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice, and strain into a sugar-rimmed margarita glass with shaved ice. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

name: Platina Blonde
instructions: Pour tequila into a cocktail glass, fill with cream, and stir.

name: Platinum Grand Margarita
instructions: Salt the rim of a margarita glass and pour in freshly squeezed lime juice. Add margarita mix, tequila, grand marnier, cointreau, triple sec, irish mist, and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into the margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel, and a maraschino cherry if desired.

name: Plaza Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

name: Plead The 5th
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice cubes in a shot glass. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Plum Liqueur
instructions: 1. Wash plums and pat dry, cut in half or smaller, and pit. Place in an aging container, pour sugar over, and stir. Add vodka and brandy, stirring to partly dissolve sugar. Cap container and place in a cool, dark place for 2 months, stir occasionally. 2. Place a strainer over a large bowl and strain liqueur. Press the liquid from the plums with the back of a wooden spoon, and discard plum pulp. Re-strain liqueur through cloth until clear, and bottle as desired. 3. Plum liqueur is ready for drinking or cooking, however for best results, age for another month.

name: PMS Special
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Pocima
instructions: Pour beer into a punch bowl. Add vodka, orange juice and plenty of ice cubes. Stir, and serve cold.

name: Poire Fantastic
instructions: Pour poire au cognac pear liqueur into a highball glass. Add sprite, and ice if desired.

name: Poison Apple
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Poison Ivy
instructions: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass, either layered in order, or mixed together.

name: Swedish Polar Bear
instructions: Mix absolut vodka and blue curacao in a glass with ice cubes. Fill with sprite, and serve.

name: Polish Professor
instructions: Pour vodka and pineapple juice into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Polkagris
instructions: Mix ingredients in a highball glass. Add one or two ice cubes and cherries. Serve with a thick, red and white striped straw.

name: Polo Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Polonaise
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Polynesian Cocktail
instructions: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka, cherry brandy, and juice of lime with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Ponche de Pina
instructions: 1. Peel pineapples, chop and shread. Add water and let stand overnight. 2. Add pineapple to a large saucepan with spices, sugar, and coconut milk. Boil for 5 minutes, and strain into a large pitcher. Add rum and serve hot.

name: Pond Water
instructions: Pour beer into a beer mug. Top with coke, and serve.

name: Pooky and Chooky
instructions: Shake with ice, and pour into a cocktail glass without ice.

name: Poontang
instructions: Mix vodka and triple sec in a hurricane glass. Add tang, to taste, and serve.

name: Popped Cherry
instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry.

name: Popper
instructions: Pour tequila into a shot glass, and fill with 7-up. Slam on hard surface, and serve immediately.

name: Poppy Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Porch Climber
instructions: Pour over ice in a large cooler.

name: Porch Crawlers
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Porky Bone
instructions: Let maple syrup collect at the bottom of a highball glass, and lightly mix the other ingredients, with a few ice cubes, over the top.

name: Port And Starboard
instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse cafe glass, so that the creme de menthe floats on top of the grenadine. Serve without mixing.

name: Port Wine Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Port Wine Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Portland Coffee
instructions: Dip the rim of an irish coffee cup into a puddle of triple sec, then a plate of sugar. Pour in the rum, kahlua, and one splash of triple sec. Light with a match to crystalize the sugar-rim. Add cinnamon and nutmeg, and pour in the coffee (and extinguish flame) until three-quarters full. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Postman
instructions: Chill, shake, and pour over ice cubes in a shot glass.

name: Power Drill
instructions: Almost fill a shot glass with equal parts of orange juice and vodka. Add a splash of beer, and serve.

name: The Power Of Milk
instructions: Stir sugar and vodka together in a cordial glass. Add milk, and serve cold with a straw.

name: Power Screwdriver
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass with three or four ice cubes. Add orange juice, and coca-cola to taste.

name: Prairie Chicken
instructions: Open an egg without breaking the yolk and pour into a red wine glass. Pour gin on top, add salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

name: Prairie Dog
instructions: Build ingredients in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Presbyterian
instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and ginger ale and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Presidential Margarita
instructions: Pour each ingredent into a large glass and add ice. Rim a margarita glass with lime and salt, fill with ice and garnish with a lime slice. Carefully pour contents of large glass into the salted margarita glass, leaving salt undisturbed.

name: Presticles Spectacles Wallet and Watch
instructions: Add all four ingredients to a small cup over ice.

name: Prickly Pear
instructions: Pour chilled cactus juice schnapps into a chilled shot glass. Float cuervo tequila on top, and serve.

name: Prince of Norway
instructions: Pour vodka, brandy and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sprite, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Princeton Cocktail
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Protein Smoothie
instructions: Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass. Shoot.

name: Psycho Joe
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass, shake, and pour into a coffee mug. Add sugar and cream if desired, and serve.

name: Psycho
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice, pineapple chunk and maraschino cherry.

name: Pucker Sucker
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Puckerita
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake well in a tall glass with ice.

name: Pucker
instructions: Pour whiskey generously over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add unsweetened grapefruit juice, 7-up (optional), and serve.

name: Puerto Apple
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Puerto Rican Punch
instructions: Serve straight up in a hurricane glass. Float the grenadine on top.

name: Puffer
instructions: Pour the rum, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost fillled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Pulp Vega
instructions: Crush the cherries in a whiskey sour glass. Mix with vodka, tropicana, crystal light and margarita mix. Serve.

name: Pumpkin Eater
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a blender and blend well. Serve in a house glass and garnish with a orange wedge and cherry.

name: Pure Pleasure
instructions: Shake ingredients with lots of ice cubes. Stir into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Pure White Evil
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a pitcher.

name: Purple Crayon
instructions: Pour chambord and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and garnish with a purple grape and pineapple slice.

name: Purple Devil
instructions: Shake liquors with ice. Strain or pour over ice in a highball glass. Almost fill with cranberry juice, and add a splash of 7-up.

name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck
instructions: Chill, shake, and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Purple Fantasy
instructions: Pour vodka and rum over ice in a highball glass. Top with grape soda and a splash of 7-up.

name: Purple Gecko
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Purple Haze #2
instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass and strain into shot glass.

name: Purple Haze #3
instructions: Add liquors to an ice-filled margarita glass. Add sour mix, top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Purple Haze #4
instructions: Mix vodka and orange juice togeher in an old-fashioned glass. Add blackberry schnapps, ice cubes, and serve.

name: Purple Heart
instructions: Pour both shots into a cordial glass. Add ice, stir, and serve.

name: Purple Jesus
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Purple Lei
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake, and strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Purple Lobster
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Strain into a rocks/shot glass, and serve.

name: Purple Love
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, for about 25 seconds, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes.

name: Purple Mask
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Purple Mexican
instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into highball glass. Shoot.

name: Purple Motherfucker
instructions: Combine vodka, southern comfort, amaretto, razzmatazz and sour mix in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake, and pour into a collins glass. Top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Purple Motherfucker #2
