instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Queen Bee
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Queen Charlotte
instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: Queen Elizabeth
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Queen Soda
instructions: Stir and serve in a highball glass with three or four ice cubes.

name: Quentin
instructions: Combine the rum, kahlua and cream in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Quick-Sand
instructions: Pour the orange juice (with the fruit pulp) over the sambuca in a highball glass.

name: Queen Charlie
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit, and serve with a straw.

name: Quick Thrill
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

name: Quilt Lifter
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass. Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: R.B. Winter
instructions: Pour southern comfort and amaretto into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with apple juice, and shake briefly. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: The Race
instructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.

name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass.

name: Radler
instructions: Pour beer into a large mug. Slowly add 7-up or sprite, and serve.

name: Rafu Eighteen
instructions: Pour vodka and pisang ambon into a glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Squeeze in a twist or two of lemon, and serve.

name: Raggae Sunsplash
instructions: Pour gin and pineapple juice into a shaker and shake well. Pour into a glass over ice, and add the strawberry syrup. Add a small amount of food coloring to the froth, and serve.

name: Ragged Company
instructions: Combine bourbon, vermouth, benedictine, and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Raging Bull #2
instructions: Pour vodka and tequila into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with red bull. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Raging Bull
instructions: Layer in a shot glass; in order.

name: Raging Indian
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Ragnar
instructions: Pour absolut kurant into a tall, highball glass. Add a few drops of lime juice, and fill with 7-up.

name: Ragnar #3
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass. Fill with ice cubes, and add sprite.

name: Rain Man
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, pour into a hurricane glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Rainbow Brew
instructions: Pour slowly into a hurricane glass, in order.

name: Rambo Shot
instructions: Chill both liquors and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Ramcooler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a 10 oz old-fashioned glass, fill with crushed ice and shake. Garnish with a red cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Rangers Rocker
instructions: Pour ingredients into mason jar. Stir, and serve.

name: Raspberry Cooler
instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Raspberry Cordial
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir until sugar is dissolved. Store in large bottles for 22 days. Pour into gift bottles and seal.

name: Raspberry Cream
instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Raspberry Kamikaze
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass. Add ice and serve.

name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker, and shake three to four times. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Raspberry Punch
instructions: Pour pink grapefruit juice and ginger ale into a punch bowl. Add raspberry juice or 12 oz frozen raspberries (stir to un-thaw). Add sherbet and stir until melted.

name: Raspberry Release
instructions: Pour ingredients into a brandy snifter. Stir, and serve.

name: Raspberry Russian
instructions: Pour equal parts raspberry vodka and kahlua into a glass over ice cubes. Fill with milk, shake until frothy, and serve.

name: Raspberry Sex
instructions: Combine vodka and cranberry juice over ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a shot glass. Top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

name: Raspberry Sherbet Punch
instructions: Combine ingredients in a large punch bowl and serve.

name: Raspberry Stupid
instructions: Mix well in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rattlesnake Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Raw Sewage #2
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and pour into a glass.

name: Raw Sewage
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Razberi Kicker
instructions: Add stolichnaya razberi vodka, cranberry juice and sprite to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Razberi Sunsplash
instructions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add juice and grenadine, and shake well. Garnish with a flag, and serve.

name: Razzberi Kazi
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Razzleberry
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Real Romulan Ale
instructions: Combine ingredients in a (just over) one-liter bottle. Chill in freezer for two hours. Serve in shot glasses.

name: The Real Windex
instructions: Shake vodka and liqueur with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Reality Twist
instructions: Almost fill a shot glass with amaretto. Carefully pour the blue curacao into the middle to create a blue "twist".

name: Rebel Russian
instructions: Mix ingredients well and pour over ice cubes.

name: Rebel Yell Cocktail
instructions: Combine bourbon, cointreau, lemon juice, and egg white in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Red Alert
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: The Red and Black
instructions: Pour the kahlua into a shot glass. Carefully layer the grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Red Apple
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Red Baron #2
instructions: Shake over ice, pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Red Baron
instructions: Carefully layer or float schnapps on top of rumple minze in a shot glass.

name: Red Cloud
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Red Dragons Breath
instructions: Mix in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Red Drink
instructions: Thaw strawberries. Add to a blender with bananas, rum and banana liqueur. Top with ice. Blend until smooth, and pour into hurricane glasses.

name: Red Eisentrout
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a collins glass, and almost fill with surge soda. Top off with cherry juice, and shake. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Red Eye a la Cocktail
instructions: Pour refrigerated tomato juice into a large frosted mug. Over tomato juice, pour cold beer. Do not stir. Crack egg, drop contents into mug. Do not stir. Discard eggshell, and serve.

name: Red Eyed Hell
instructions: Mix together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Red Eye
instructions: Pour vodka into a beer glass one half to three-quarters filled with beer. Top with tomato juice, and serve.

name: Red Frog
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Red Gin
instructions: Combine the gin and cherry heering in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Red Hope
instructions: Blend, pour into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Red Hot Lover
instructions: Shake briefly, pour into an ice-filled hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Red Hot
instructions: Mix, and serve in a whiskey sour glass.

name: Red Hurricane
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Red Lobster
instructions: Shake with ice, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Red Melon
instructions: Pour vodka, watermelon and peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with sprite, stir well, add grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime), or a piece of melon.

name: Red Mosquito
instructions: Combine vodka and hot damn in a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Red Nail
instructions: Mix the vodka and the campari in a cocktail glass, and add four ice cubes. Rest for seven minutes, and serve.

name: Red Orange
instructions: Shake vodka, cinzano orancio and orange zest in a jigger with ice. Pour into a martini / cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Red Ox
instructions: Pour rums and juices into a pint glass one-quarter filled with ice. Almost fill with sweet and sour, top with grenadine, and mix.

name: Red Raider
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Red Rasputin
instructions: Stir, add ice, and serve.

name: Red Rooster
instructions: Build drink in a collins glass.

name: Red Royal Shot
instructions: Pour crown royal into a shot glass, add amaretto, and serve.

name: Red Ruby
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Red Rudolph
instructions: Heat and pour into an irish coffee cup. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a tall cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Red Snapper #2
instructions: Mix over ice, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Red Snapper
instructions: Shake, pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Red Square
instructions: Mix vodka, sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce in a shot glass.

name: Red Tequila
instructions: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Add tabasco sauce until a strong red color. Serve with a half-slice of lemon on the rim.

name: Red Velvet
instructions: Build gin, pisang ambon, sprite and lime juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine, garnish with a lime boat, and serve.

name: Red Vodkatini
instructions: Mix vodka, vermouth and creme de cassis and pour over a scoop of crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Red Wine Punch
instructions: Mix large parts of icing sugar with red wine in a punch bowl, and stir well. Add the soda, plenty of ice, and drop in a few orange (or lemon) slices. Serve immediately.

name: Red Zalo
instructions: Pour pisang ambon, lemon squash and ice cubes into a blender and mix. Pour into a tall glass, add sprite and strawberry syrup, and serve.

name: Red, White and Blue
instructions: Carefully layer, in order, into a shot glass; aftershock, goldschlager, then schnapps.

name: Redcoat
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Reform Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Reggae Ambassador
instructions: Fill one-quarter of a blender (half-filled with ice) with vodka. Almost fill completely with pine-orange-banana fruit juice. Add fresh strawberries and sugar, blend, and pour into glasses. Serve with an orange slice.

name: Remsen Cooler
instructions: Pour two ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass, add sugar and stir. Add ice cubes, gin, and fill with carbonated water. Stir again, and garnish with a twist of lemon and a spiral of orange on the rim.

name: Rensselaer Slam
instructions: Mix liquors with the coffee in an irish coffee cup, and serve.

name: Reptile
instructions: Add ingredients, chilled, to a glass in order: whiskey, orange juice, and mountain dew. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Resolute Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Reynolds Special
instructions: Pour gin and grapefruit juice into a highball glass. Add four or five ice cubes, and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Rhino
instructions: Layer ingredients, in order, into a shot glass. Ignite, burn for a few seconds, and extinguish. Serve.

name: Rhubarb Syrup
instructions: 1. Remove strings from rhubarb, wash, and cut into 1/2" pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. 2. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth, squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean, dry bottle and cork tightly. 3. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.

name: Richie 50
instructions: Pour orange juice into a 16-ounce glass half-filled with vodka. Stir, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Rick
instructions: Pour sambuca into a shot glass and slowly add orange juice. Serve.

name: Rieber Red Margarita
instructions: Add strawberry margarita mix, tequila, and triple sec to a blender with crushed ice. Blend, and serve with a straw in a chilled glass or mug.

name: Riedinger
instructions: Mix rum, midori, and lime juice in a highball glass with crushed ice. Fill with cola, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Riley
instructions: Shake first six ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a dash of raspberry syrup, garnish with a lime slice, and serve.

name: Ringo
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a hurricane glass with four ice cubes.

name: Rising Skirt
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake well. Pour into a whiskey sour glass with ice and top with an orange slice.

name: Ritz Fizz
instructions: Pour blue curacao, amaretto and lemon juice into a champagne flute filled with champagne. Stir, add a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Roadkill
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Roadrunner Punch
instructions: Mix equal parts of each liquor in a tall glass. Top with fruit punch (berry flavored recommended), and serve with ice.

name: Rob Love
instructions: Pour the vodka, curacao and vermouth over ice cubes in a glass. Add desired amount of lemon juice, and half as much in sprite. Add a few drops of syrup, stir, and serve.

name: Robicheaux
instructions: Pour bourbon, lime and cherry juice into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with cola, stir gently and garnish with a cherry. Serve.

name: Robitussin
instructions: Stir, without ice, and serve.

name: Robson Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Robyn
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add schweppes until half-filled, and fill with fruit soda. Top with lime juice, and serve.

name: Rocha-Gil
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Rock and Rye Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rock and Rye Cooler
instructions: Shake vodka, rock and rye, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass, top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Rock Lobster
instructions: Pour razzmatazz and crown royal into an ice-filled glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Rock-and-Rye Toddy
instructions: Pour rock and rye and bitters into a coffee mug. Add lemon slice, boiling water and cinnamon stick. Stir, sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Rocket Fuel #2
instructions: Mix champagne, non-sparkling white wine, vodka, gin, and juice in a 10 liter punch bowl.

name: Rocket Fuel #3
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Rocket Fuel
instructions: Combine in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Rococo
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rod on the Rocks
instructions: Pour peach schnapps over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Fill with apple cider, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Roffsing
instructions: Pour passoa, vodka, lime juice and pear soda into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, top with cream, and serve.

name: Roll Me Over
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a cocktail glass with ice. Serve.

name: Rollercoaster
instructions: Pour into a cocktail glass glass with ice, shake vigourously, and serve.

name: Rolling Green Elixer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, strain into a hurricane glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Rolls-Royce
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Romona Banana
instructions: Shake ingredients, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Romulan Ale
instructions: Pour rum and curacao into a tall, narrow glass. Fill (almost) with sprite, and add tabasco sauce. Add a grain of salt, and serve.

name: Roni
instructions: Mix ingredients in a beer mug, and serve.

name: Rontini
instructions: Pour together over ice in a glass, and serve.

name: Rooster Tail
instructions: Lick hand, add salt, and lick salt. Consume quickly as shots, in order; jose cuervo, orange juice, and tomate juice.

name: Root Beer Barrel
instructions: 1. Place a shot glass filled with root beer schnapps into a tumbler three-quarters filled with beer. (Beer should be just short of shot glass rim.) 2. Place hand over top of drink and slam on the bar. Serve immediately.

name: Root Beer Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer, stir well, and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Root Beer Float
instructions: Pour vodka, galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Root Beer
instructions: Pour vodka into a large, ice-filled glass. Fill with pepsi (do not substitute coke), swirl a splash of galliano on top, and serve.

name: Root Canal
instructions: Combine peppermint and root beer schnapps in a hurricane glass with ice. Fill with dr pepper, or root beer, and stir. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Rootbeer Floatie
instructions: Float cream on top rootbeer schnapps in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Rose Cocktail
instructions: Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vermouth, gin, brandy, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: French Rose Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
instructions: Combine pineapple juice, raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes in a shaker. Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Roselyn Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Rosita
instructions: Stir ingredients in an old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve with short straws.

name: Rotten Pussy
instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve as a shot.

name: Rouge Martini
instructions: Combine the gin and chambord in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Royal Bitch
instructions: Pour frangelico into a shot glass, carefully layer the crown royal on top, and serve.

name: Royal Butt
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Royal Caribbean Fuck
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker over, shake well, and strain into a highball glass.

name: Royal Clover Club Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Royal Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Royal Crown Royal
instructions: Pour whiskey into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add cola, stir, and serve.

name: Royal Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Royal Flush #2
instructions: Mix crown and peachtree schnapps together in a shot glass, and add juices. Mix again, and serve.

name: Royal Flush
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tumbler over ice, strain into a glass, and serve.

name: Royal Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Royal Laundry
instructions: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker, and rest until ice cold. Serve in a martini glass.

name: Royal Peaches and Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into a mason jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach, if desired.

name: Royal Peach
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into a shot glass.

name: Royal Scandal
instructions: Add liquors and mixers into a shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass over ice, and serve.

name: Royal Smile Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Royal Temptation
instructions: Blend ingredients in a cocktail glass rimmed with white and brown chocolate flakes. Serve.

name: Royalty Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, Curacao, sugar, and egg in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Rubbermeister
instructions: Pour coke into a highball glass, add jagermeister, and serve.

name: Ruby Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Ruby in the Rough
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ruby Relaxer
instructions: Combine peach schnapps, vodka and malibu rum in a cocktail glass. Almost fill with pineapple juice, add a splash of cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Ruby Slipper
instructions: Fill a shot glass three-quarters full with whiskey, and with grenadine. Fill any large glass with 7-up. Drop the shot glass into the 7-up and drink everything.

name: Ruby Tuesday
instructions: Pour gin and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine, stir and serve.

name: Rugburn
instructions: Stir and shake ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Rum Aid
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a margarita glass. Add a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Rum Cobbler
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in club soda in an old-fashioned glass. Fill almost completely with crushed ice, and add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, an orange and a lemon slice. Serve.

name: Rum Coke Float
instructions: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream into a hurricane glass, add rum and fill with coke. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Rum Collins
instructions: Shake rum, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Rum Cooler
instructions: Pour rum and soda into a collins glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Rum Daisy
instructions: Combine the rum, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice, and serve.

name: Rum Dubonnet
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rum Fix
instructions: Stir juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Fill glass with ice, add rum, and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Rum Highball
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes, fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Rum Martini
instructions: Combine rum and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive, and serve.

name: Rum Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rum Old-Fashioned
instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved, add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

name: Rum Rickey
instructions: Pour light rum, lime juice and sugar syrup into an ice-filled mixing glass. Shake, strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and fill with club soda. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Rum Runner #2
instructions: Blend with crushed ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rum Sazerac
instructions: Soak one sugar cube in angostura bitters - in an old-fashioned glass, and crush with a pestle. Add ice cubes, pour in rum, add a few dashed of pernod and fill with water. Serve.

name: Rum Screwdriver
instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Rum Shrub
instructions: 1. Pare oranges very thinly and place the rinds into a gallon jar. Add their juice, one pint of cold water, and close the jar. Stand for three days, stirring occasionally. 2. Strain into an enamel dish, add two - three pounds of sugar, and bring to the boil. Add pint of orange juice, and strain again. Add rum, and bottle.

name: Rum Sour
instructions: Combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Rum Swizzle
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in a mixture of carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill with ice, stir, and add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Rum Toddy
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum, one ice cube, and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Rum Bubble
instructions: Combine liquors over ice in a collins glass, and stir. Add club soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Rumka
instructions: Mix equal parts of vodka and rum, pour over ice in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Rummple
instructions: Mix all ingredients with ice, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Rumple Shock
instructions: Pour aftershock into a shot glass. Add rumple minze, and serve.

name: Russian Comfort
instructions: Pour southern comfort in an old-fashioned glass with ice, and fill with schweppes. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Russian Apple
instructions: Mix all three ingredients with ice, shake, and strain into a shot glass.

name: Russian Bloody Mary
instructions: Pour chilled vodka into a shot glass, and carefully add chilled tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Add tabasco sauce, and serve.

name: Russian Boilermaker
instructions: Pour cold beer into a large glass, and drop a whole shot glass full of vodka into the beer. Down immediately.

name: Russian Brunch
instructions: Mix vodka and orange juice in a blender with ice, and pour into a large container. Add champagne, stir, and serve.

name: Russian Candy
instructions: Fill a shot glass with vodka and peach schnapps. Add a dash of grenadine (do not stir). Allow grenadine to settle at the bottom of the glass, and serve.

name: Russian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Russian Funk
instructions: Blend vodka, lime and sugar in a highball glass. Fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Russian Iceberg
instructions: Lean an ice-filled tumbler to a 45 degree angle and pour creme de menthe down the side of the glass to fill bottom. Repeat with rumple minze and vodka, as to layer the liquors like an iceberg. Do not stir. Place a straw through the middle of the drink and serve immediately.

name: Russian Monster Tom Collins
instructions: Mix vodka and sour mix (to taste) over ice in a glass. Add grenadine (to taste), and serve.

name: Russian Qualude
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream or milk, stir, and serve.

name: Russian Qualude #2
instructions: Pour over ice, shake vigorously, and strain into a martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert, and serve.

name: Russian Roulette
instructions: 1. Fill two or more shot glasses with the kahlua and vodka and place a slice of orange on the top of each glass. 2. Pour sambuca seperately into a wine glass and ignite. Pour onto the shots and allow to burn briefly. Extinguish, shoot the drink, and chase with a bite of the sambuca-soaked orange slice.

name: Russian Sarin
instructions: Pour vodka and liqueur into a highball glass over one or two ice cubes. Fill with schweppes russian, and serve.

name: Russian Shamrock
instructions: Pour vodka into a shot glass and add the creme de menthe on top. Swirl lightly with a swizzle stick, and serve.

name: Russian Sunset
instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and sour mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled collins glass, add a dash of grenadine to the top, and swirl slightly. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice if desired, and serve.

name: Russian Tea
instructions: Make tea in the water, and add rest of ingredients. Simmer for at least half an hour, and serve.

name: Rusty Mist
instructions: Pour drambuie over two ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add irish mist, and serve.

name: Rusty Screw
instructions: Combine scotch and grand marnier in a brandy snifter. Add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Rye and Ginger
instructions: Mix in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Rye and Pepper
instructions: Pour whiskey into a glass with ice. Add dr. pepper, stir, and serve.

name: Rye Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Vaina
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Serve in a red wine glass and sprinkle powdered cinnamon on top.

name: Vaitkus
instructions: Shake ingredients, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Valencia Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Valentine
instructions: Shake banana liqueur, vodka, and cranberry juice with ice cubes and strain into a red wine glass.

name: The Valentine
instructions: Mix ingredients in a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Vampire Juice
instructions: Pour coconut rum, curacao and bacardi into a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass, fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Van Vleet
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour southern comfort and vanilla liqueur over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke, and serve.

name: Vanilla Creamsicle
instructions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add cold milk, stir, and serve immediately.

name: Vanilla Vargas
instructions: Pour liquors, in order, into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Top with pepsi, stir well with a barspoon, and serve.

name: Vaughn Purple Haze
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and add razzmatazz. Fill with cranberry juice, mix, and serve.

name: Velvet Crush
instructions: Pour gin into a glass with ice. Add flavored kool aid (to taste), and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #2
instructions: Pour creme de cacao, vodka and cream into a blender. Add ice, half a sliced banana, and sugar to taste. Blend until smooth and pureed, and pour into a glass. Serve.

name: Velvet Kilt
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice until chilled, and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or small butterscotch candy.

name: Velvet Presley
instructions: Pour bourbon over ice, add chocolate milk until creamy, and serve.

name: Velvet Tongue
instructions: Pour southern comfort and canadian club whisky over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Venezia
instructions: Mix, and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest, and serve.

name: Venom
instructions: Pour gin into a malt shaker or similar. Stir in the cocoa and sugar, mix together and shake. Pour into a champagne flute glass, and serve.

name: Venus on the Rocks
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass with five ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Verboten
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Vermont Maple Blaster
instructions: Pour vodka into an ice-filled collins glass, add vodka and syrup, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis #2
instructions: Pour vermouth and creme de cassis into an old-fashioned glass. Add three or four ice cubes, fill with soda, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis
instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

name: Vernal Equinox
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Verno
instructions: Pour into a beer pilsner, and serve.

name: Very Berry Tonic
instructions: Pour vodka and chambord into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water, garnish with two fresh raspberries, and serve.

name: Vesuvio
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Veteran
instructions: Pour rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Veterinary
instructions: Pour alcohol over ice cubes in a tall glass. Add lime juice and sprite or 7-up. Stir well.

name: Vibrator
instructions: Pour liquors into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and cranberru juice. Shake, garnish with two cherries, and serve.

name: Vicious Kiss
instructions: Pour into a cordial glass, stir gently, and serve.

name: Vicious Sid
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Victory Collins
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Victor
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Viking Blood
instructions: Pour aquavit and tia maria over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sprite or 7-up, stir, and serve.

name: Villa Park
instructions: Combine bourbon, orange juice and pineapple juice in a shaker, and shake well. Pour into a highball glass with ice, and serve.

name: Violent Fuck
instructions: Pour curacao and sloe gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and orange juice, and blend briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Virgin Manhattan
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and strain; either into a chilled cocktail glass, or on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Virgin Pussy
instructions: Pour both watermelon and cinnamon schnapps into a shot glass. Add sugar, and serve.

name: Virgin Sex On The Beach
instructions: Mix equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice, add nectar, and pour over ice. Sink the grenadine, garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Whore
instructions: Mix vodka, lime juice, kool-aid, coloring and cranberry juice in a shot glass. Slowly add apple juice around the side, add tequila, and serve.

name: Virulent Death
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shot glass, and stir.

name: Viscous Robert
instructions: Pour bitters over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and swirl in a dash of southern comfort. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, an umbrella, and serve.

name: Vit Ryss
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass, add ice, and mix.

name: Viva Villa
instructions: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon juice and dip into salt. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vodka "7"
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice cubes in a collins glass. Drop the lime wedge in and fill with lemon-lime soda. Stir well, and serve.

name: Vodka and Schweppes
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Vodka and Apple Juice
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over three or four ice cubes. Fill with apple juice, stir, and serve.

name: Vodka and Tonic
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes, and fill with tonic water. Stir, and serve.

name: Vodka Bitter Lemon
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, add bitter lemon to taste, and serve.

name: Vodka Collins
instructions: Shake vodka, lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon, and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Vodka Fizz
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except nutmeg), and pour into a large white wine glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Vodka Gimlet
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Vodka Grasshopper
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Vodka Martini
instructions: Shake vodka and vermouth together with several ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Vodka Orange
instructions: Pour vodka over three or four ice cubes in a highball glass, and add fresh orange juice.

name: Vodka Ricki
instructions: Pour vodka into a tall, ice-filled glass. Add sprite, and squeeze in the lime wedges.

name: Vodka Russian
instructions: Combine ingredients in a tall glass with ice cubes and serve.

name: Vodka Salty Dog
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

name: Vodka Sling
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and lemon juice. Add vodka, pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and stir. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Vodka Sonic
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of soda and tonic, to taste, and garnish with a wedge of lime. Serve.

name: Vodka Stinger
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Vodka Sunrise
instructions: Mix vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Vodkalenius
instructions: Stir pre-chilled ingredients with ice cubes in a grog-like glass. Add a straw if desired, and serve.

name: Volcano
instructions: Pour liquors into a champagne flute, and fill with ice-cold champagne. Add a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Volga Boatman
instructions: Combine the orange juice, vodka and kirsch in a mixing glass add ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Volvo
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a shot glass. Mix, and serve.

name: Voodoo Dew
instructions: Pour shots into a mason jar or large glass. Add mountain dew, mix well, and serve.

name: Voodoo Doll
instructions: Add vodka and chambord to a shaker. Add orange juice and cranberry juice until desired taste. Shake and serve with ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Voodoo Lady
instructions: Pour triple sec, cognac, and lemon juice over ice. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Voodoo Sunrise
instructions: Pour rum and vodka into a collins glass. Tilt the glass, and pour the grenadine down the inside. Fill with chilled orange juice, and serve.

name: Voodoo Tea
instructions: Pour rum and curacao into a highball glass. Fill with sweetened tea until black, and serve.

name: Voodoo
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Vulcan Mind-Probe
instructions: Mix and serve straight up in a shot glass.

name: Winky
instructions: Pour wink soda over gin in a glass, add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Winter Parker
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes, shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Winter Tropic
instructions: Pour vodka into a hurricane glass. Add cranberry juice and margarita mix simultaneously, and serve.

name: Wisconsin Lunchbucket
instructions: Combine the beer and orange juice in a large beer mug. Drop in a shot of amaretto, with shot glass, and slam.

name: Wobbler
instructions: Pour vodka into a glass one-quarter filled with ice. Fill until two-thirds full with grape juice, and fill completely with russian water. Add a touch of grenadine, and serve.

name: Wolfsbane
instructions: Rub the inside of a highball glass with lemon juice, and sprinkle with sugar. Frost in a freezer. Shake ingredients, pour into the frosted glass, and serve.

name: Wonder Woman
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Serve unstirred, garnished with a cherry.

name: Wong Tong Cocktail
instructions: Pour liquids into a strainer with 4 - 6 ice cubes, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries, and serve.

name: Woodpecker
instructions: Pour vodka over 4 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add peychaud bitters, and stir.

name: Woodward Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Woody Woodpecker
instructions: Shake cachaca and juice with ice, and pour into a collins glass. Add galliano, and serve.

name: Wookie
instructions: Mix schnapps and amaretto in a shot glass. Float cream on top, and serve.

name: Wrightsville Sunset
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain into a large white wine glass half-filled with crushed ice.

name: Wu Wu
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of orange and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Zool
instructions: Pour peach schnapps into a shot glass, and add vodka. Add amaretto until vodka turns to a light brown, and serve.

name: Zorbatini
instructions: Serve in a cocktail glass, and garnish with a green olive.

name: Danish Toddy
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof cup and serve immediately.

name: Davenport
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cola, garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry, and serve.

name: Diplomatic Answer
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve with straws.

name: Di Saronno Driver
instructions: Shake with a glassful of ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Dizzy Blonde
instructions: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Dundee Dream
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Add the ginger ale, garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Easy Money
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except grenadine) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle grenadine on top, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Escape Route
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Even Pair
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add tonic water, and serve.

name: Eye of the Tiger
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle dark rum on top, and garnish with an orange slice. Serve with straws.

name: Five Hundred Proof
instructions: Shake and strain into a pilsner filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Dawn Chorus
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add cola, and serve.

name: Derby Cocktail
instructions: Stir gin and peach bitters (or peach brandy) in a cordial glass. Add an olive and a mint leaf, and serve.

name: Devon Air
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Devon Gin
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

name: Downhill Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Duck Soup
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Duke of Cornwall
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: East West Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain over two ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Easy Action
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Eclipse
instructions: Shake and strain the sloe gin and gin into a cordial glass containing the cherry. Gently sink the grenadine until just covering the cherry. Garnish with half a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Eden Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add a short straw, and serve.

name: Egril
instructions: Cut a lime into eight seperate segments and place into an old-fashioned glass. Add sugar and crush until the juice is released. Add remaining ingredients, ensure sugar has dissolved, and fill with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Add a short straw, and serve.

name: Emerald Star
instructions: Shake ingredients, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Evergreen
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Exterminator
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a green cherry, and serve.

name: Federal Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Firebird
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Fantaisie
instructions: Pour into a frosted wine glass, and serve.

name: Dizzy Dame
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, add short straws, and serve.

name: Flapjack Shooter
instructions: Shake and strain into a cordial glass, and serve.

name: Fluffy F
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: French Kiss
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a speared cherry or raspberry, and serve.

name: Gardenia
instructions: Shake and strain into a saucer. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Goat Herder
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: Golden Sunset
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Hairy Coconut
instructions: Rim a champagne saucer with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients and strain into the saucer. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: Heart Throb
instructions: Make pousse-cafe in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Highland Cream
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Di Saronno Mimosa
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fiddlers Toast
instructions: Pour champagne, grand marnier and juices into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add a slice of orange, and float a curacao-soaked sugar cube on top. Serve with short straws.

name: Fireworks
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Fraise de Champagne
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Gagarin
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except babycham) and strain into a cocktail glass. Add babycham, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Gold Velvet
instructions: Half-fill a beer pilsner with lager. Add pineapple juice, and gently top with champagne.

name: Good Old Days
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Great Idea
instructions: Dissolve syrup in juices, add champagne, and serve.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Happy Hollander
instructions: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Horn of Plenty
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Hotel California
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add champagne, straws, and serve.

name: June Sparkle
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Keep it Up
instructions: Pour champagne, cognac and orange juice into a champagne flute. Add one sugar cube, saturated in angostura bitters, and a twist of orange. Serve with a muddler.

name: Kiwi Sparkle
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: La Panthere Rose
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add champagne, garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: London Bus
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Gluhwein
instructions: Simmer gently for 30 seconds and strain into a heat-proof goblet.

name: Hot Egg Nogg
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except milk) until smooth and pour into a heat-proof goblet. Add boiling milk, sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Hot Gin
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof goblet, and serve.

name: Hot Irish
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof goblet, sweeten with brown sugar (to taste), and serve.

name: Hot Jamaican
instructions: Heat gently in a saucepan, pour unstrained into a heat-proof goblet, and serve.

name: Hot Lemon
instructions: Pour juice and water into a heat-proof cup, dissolve sugar, and serve.

name: Hot Scotch Nightcap
instructions: Pour into a heat-proof cup, and serve.

name: Dutch Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Dutch Coffee (USA)
instructions: Pour coffee, vandermint and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, add amaretto, and serve.

name: English Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee, gin, triple sec and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, add a teaspoon of triple sec, and serve.

name: French Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee, cointreau and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, add a teaspoon of cointreau, and serve.

name: German Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, garnish with a black cherry, and serve.

name: Irish Mist Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Italian Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Italian Coffee (USA)
instructions: Pour coffee, amaretto and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, add a teaspoon of amaretto, and serve.

name: Lagos Coffee
instructions: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top, add amaretto, and serve.

name: Egg Sour
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral, and serve.

name: El Grito
instructions: Add ingredients to a punch bowl with sufficient crushed ice to slush. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Fruit Juice Cup
instructions: Add all ingredients, with slices of orange and lemon, to a punch bowl. Add sufficient ice to chill, and serve in wine glasses. Add white rum if desired.

name: Ginger Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except ginger ale) in a large jug and chill for two hours. Add ginger ale, and serve into wine glasses.

name: Fast Buck
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemon-quarter shell, and serve.

name: Key Punch
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime speared with a cherry, and serve.

name: Fireside Tea
instructions: Pour tea into a heat-proof goblet, and sweeten to taste. Add rum, wedge-shaped slice of lemon, and a cinnamon stick. Serve.

name: Hot-T
instructions: Combine in a heat-proof cup, and sweeten to taste. Add a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Indian Tea
instructions: Gently simmer tea and peel in a small saucepan for 1 - 2 minutes. Add liquors and pour, with peel, into a cup. Serve.

name: Galliano Toddy
instructions: Pour into a hot cup, sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: First Avenue
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Flame Thrower
instructions: Pour grappa and southern comfort into a shot glass. Heat and ignite rum in a spoon, and add to the glass. Extinguish flame, and serve.

name: Flamenco
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Fly Swatter
instructions: Pour into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add a sprig of mint, straws, and serve.

name: Formula 1
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Frosty Amour
instructions: Rim a collins glass with lemon and caster sugar, and fill with ice. Shake ingredients, strain into the glass, and add 7-up. Garnish with a slice of orange and a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Gang Up
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass. Garnish with fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Gin Lollipop
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass, and add water. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Goldilocks
instructions: Shake and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Graffiti
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass, garnish with a seedless grape, and serve.

name: Gremlin Fixer
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Grocery Boy
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Haitian Gold
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Half-Man Half-Wit
instructions: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Add grenadine, garnish with fruit, and serve unstirred with a straw.

name: Hell Bender
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass, and serve.

name: Hell Hole
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass, and serve.

name: High Moon
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and a half-slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hobart
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Hyatt Club
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve.

name: Indycar
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Jug Wobbler
instructions: Serve in an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Jungle Wild
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add lemonade, and garnish with fruit. Serve with straws.

name: Kismet Hardy
instructions: Blend ingredients briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet, garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Kitten Cuddler
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except sprite) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sprite. Garnish with a cherry, slices of orange and lemon, and serve.

name: Lady in Green
instructions: Shake, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Lark
instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a cherry, slices of orange and lemon, and serve.

name: Larney
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade, garnish with an orange slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Lemon Tree
instructions: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Lesbian Joy
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve with straws.

name: Lutteur
instructions: Pour into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Hemingway Special
instructions: Squeeze lime juice into a shaker, add remaining ingredients and shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a frosted cocktail glass.

name: La Floridita Daiquiri
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and pour unstrained into a frosted cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Flying Grasshopper
instructions: Shake briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve with a short straw in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Fondaudege
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Forget-Me-Not
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Francine
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar-dipped raspberry, and serve.

name: Fruit Frappe
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass, and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: French Bite
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: French Horn
instructions: Stir and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Aquavit
instructions: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer heaped with crushed ice.

name: Frozen Melon Ball
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared melon ball and lime slice, and serve with a short straw.

name: Frozen Southern Comfort
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Fruits of the Desert
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Garden Fresh
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Gemini
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: German Bight
instructions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Golden Russian
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Goodbye Sigh
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Add a cherry, and serve.

name: Goodness Gracious

name: Grand Pear

name: Grapevine

name: Greek Manhatten
instructions: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry, and serve.

name: Grimaldi
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Guesswork Cocktail
instructions: Shake, strain into a frosted cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Hara Kiwi
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of kiwi and a cherry, and servev.

name: Harbor Light

name: Hard Case
instructions: Stir, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Hayfever Remedy
instructions: Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hell Frozen Over
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Hen Night Zipper-Ripper
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: High Road

name: Hollywood Nuts
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add 7-up, and serve.

name: Honolulu Shooter
instructions: Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hopeless Case
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Hustler
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Incredible Cocktail
instructions: Stir, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Inedible Cocktail
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Irish Shillelagh
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Sunday

name: Jerez Cocktail
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Jockey Club
instructions: Shake, strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Josephine
instructions: Serve in a brandy snifter.

name: Juliet
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry. Serve.

name: July Passion
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add lemonade, garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Jungle Frost
instructions: Shake, strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Jungle Spice
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Kahlua Cognac
instructions: Serve in a brandy snifter.

name: Katinka
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Kentucky Kernel
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Killarney
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Kiss and Tell
instructions: Shake with three-quarters of a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Kiss Class
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and garnish with a speared cherry.

name: Last Chance
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice, and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Last Goodbye
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Laugh a Minute
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: Lawnmower
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Lazy Lover
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Le 333
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne flute three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, a cherry, and a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Le Saintongeais
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Lemon Lady

name: Liberator
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Lime Passion
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add soda, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Little Red Riding Hood
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with berries, a short straw, and serve.

name: Little White Lie
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Lost Bikini
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Luigi
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: La Paz
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Friesian
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass, and garnish with a cherry.

name: Frozen Coconut
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, add straws, and serve.

name: Frozen Irish Coffee
instructions: Shake briefly in a highball glass with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Top with ice cream, and sprinkle with grated chocolate. Serve with straws.

name: Frozen Key Lime
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry, and serve.

name: Gamble
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet.

name: Hammer Horror
instructions: Blend briefly in a highball glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate. Serve with straws.

name: Island Affair
instructions: Shake melon liqueur, cointreau and juices and strain into a pina colada glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add curacao, and float cream on top. Garnish with fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Island Delight
instructions: Blend vodka, rums and ice cream briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Top with whipped cream, sprinkle grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Jamaican Iced Coffee

name: Kahlua Cream Soda

name: Las Vegas

name: Lazy Daze
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade and float cream on top. Garnish with a cherry and mint sprig, and serve.

name: Love in the Afternoon
instructions: Blend ingredients in a pina colada glass until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a strawberry, add straws, and serve.

name: Fruit Cocktail
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a wine goblet. Garnish with fruit, add straws, and serve.

name: Fruit Fairy
instructions: Blend briefly in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of banana and a cherry.

name: Fruit Fantasy
instructions: Blend until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice, and blend again briefly. Pour into a pina colada glass, and garnish with fruit. Serve with straws.

name: Galliano Daiquiri
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Gin Alexander

name: Gin Lollipop

name: Hong Kong Fizz

name: Grape Juice Rickey
instructions: Pour into a highball glass filled with broken ice.

name: Grapefruit Crush
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve with a straw.

name: Hawaiian Island Surfer
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Lemon Ice-Cream Soda
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add soda and mix gently. Add straws, and serve.

name: Holiday Egg Nogg
instructions: Mix ingredients in a punch bowl until sugar dissolves. Chill for five hours, mix, and sprinkle with grated nutmeg. Serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Mint
instructions: Combine schnapps and cocoa in an irish coffee cup. Sweeten, to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve. Also known as Snuggler.

name: Hot Rum Chocolate
instructions: Combine rum and cocoa in an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Kahlua Hot Chocolate
instructions: Combine kahlua and cocoa in an irish coffee cup, and sweeten to taste. Top with cream, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Iron Bar Sling
instructions: Shake, strain into an ice-filled highball glass, and serve.

name: Julia
instructions: Blend briefly in a cocktail glass with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Justine
instructions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kick in the Balls
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with melon balls, and serve.

name: Kika
instructions: Shake ingredients together and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Kis-Kesay

name: Lost Cherry
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Kirsch Cuba Libre

name: Aperol Sour
instructions: Shake well over ice in a shaker. Strain into a sour glass, and serve.

name: Apothecary
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Car

name: Apple Sunrise

name: Applejack Highball

name: April Shower
instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Attaboy
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Brandy Benedictine Cream
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: B & P
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Babylove

name: Batida de Banana

name: Batida de Maracuja
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Batida de Brazil
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Batida de Carneval
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Bellevue
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Bitter Sweet
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Bitters Highball

name: Black and Fall
instructions: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Black Jack
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Black Marie
instructions: Shake well with crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass, and serve.

name: Blanche
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blood and Sand Cocktail
instructions: Shake over ice cubes, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bloody Virgin Bull

name: Blue Champagne
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Boina Roja

name: Brandy Eggnog
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Stinger
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Breakfast Eggnog
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brighton Punch
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Western Rose
instructions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cosmobellini

name: Brigitte Bardot
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brooklyn
instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brown Fox
instructions: Stir ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Bunueloni

name: Campari Champagne
instructions: Pour campari into a champagne flute, and fill with champagne. Twist the lemon peel over the drink, and serve.

name: Cafe Brulot

name: Cafe Caen

name: Cafe de Paris
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cafe Pucci

name: Cafe San Juan

name: Caledonia
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Campari Cocktail
instructions: Shake well over ice in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Coco Choco
instructions: Shake liquids well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Coconut Banana
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Coconut Dream
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Coconut Kiss
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, garnish with an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Coconut Lips
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, add a pineapple chunk and an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Colada Brazil

name: Copacabana
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass. Fill with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Corpse Reviver #2

name: Corpse Reviver #3
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve with a glass of ice water.

name: Cuban Hot Coffee
instructions: Heat liquors in a heat-resistant glass, add sugar, and fill with coffee. Stir, and serve.

name: Cuban Island
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Manhattan
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Special
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cynar Cocktail
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in an aperitif or cordial glass, and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.

name: Daiquiri Natural
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Deep-Sea Diver
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Devil Cocktail
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Due Campari
instructions: Shake lemon juice and campari well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with prosecco, and serve.

name: Duke of Marlboro
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: East Indian
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Eastwind
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in aperitif glass. Add a slice of orange and lemon, and serve.

name: Fallen Leaves
instructions: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Ferrari
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass, and serve.

name: Fiesta
instructions: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fish House Punch #2
instructions: Heat water. Stir in sugar, tea, and honey, and allow to boil. Add liquors, stir well, and simmer. Stir in lime juice and peels. Serve hot in heat-resistant cups or glasses, or cool, seal and bottle.

name: Florida Daiquiri
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Florida Sling
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Florida Special
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flying Kangaroo
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass with crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: Foggy Day
instructions: Pour gin and pernod into an aperitif glass, fill with cold water, add a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: French Colada
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: French Daiquiri
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: French 68
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, slowly fill with champagne, and serve.

name: French 76
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Friday
