name: Mango Chimp
instructions: Pour mango juice and milk into a highball glass. Stir, add rum, and serve.

name: Martini Bovine
instructions: Place Martini & Rossi vermouth and white wine into a beer mug. Mix the two together, add vodka and top off with Strongbow. Serve.

name: Marvin Hagler
instructions: Combine cognac, tuaca and pineapple juice with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain and serve.

name: Matteress
instructions: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a highball glass, followed by orange juice. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Melon Cooler
instructions: Build melon liqueur and dark rum in a medium-sized cocktail glass. Add cranberry juice and orange juice, stir, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Melon Sour
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir and serve.

name: Mexican Kelman
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Miami Sunset
instructions: A recipe with quite a bit of bite, found in a 1975 issue of Playboy magazine. Miami Sunset tastes like a Tequila Sunrise with more kick.

name: Midori Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Midwest Stop Light
instructions: Pour the liquors into seperate shot glasses, and line them up red, yellow and green. Go through and drink each shot, in order, in quick succession.

name: Mint Melt-Away
instructions: Tastes distinctly like a Mint Melt-Away chocolate. Popular at Northern Illinois University.

name: Mint Russian
instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add creme de menthe, top with cream and serve.

name: Miss Money Penny
instructions: A drink for chocolate lovers everywhere. The first appearance of a Miss Money Penny is rusty brown but soon darkens to a rich dark almost translucent brown. Created by Jason Wright at No.10 Cafe Bar, Bridport, UK.

name: Mob Witnesses
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall collins glass filled with ice. Stir, and serve.

name: Mocha Freeze
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice. Blend until the chunks of ice are small, and serve into two tall glasses.

name: Moneyshot
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients on top of one another in a shot glass, in order; gin bottom, advocaat middle, cherry brandy top.

name: Motherfucker
instructions: Motherfucker, pardon the French, combines two extremely potent liquors, a brand of 160 proof rum and absinthe which is between 100 and 140 proof.

name: Mountain Breeze
instructions: A drink courtesy of Myles from the Switzerland Inn in the Mountains of Little Switzerland, North Carolina.

name: Mountain Melon
instructions: Pour Mountain Dew into a highball glass. Add watermelon pucker, and stir. Add more pucker to taste, if desired.

name: Mowed Lawn
instructions: Pour Crown Royal and DeKuyper sour apple pucker over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add 7-up, to taste, shake and strain over ice in a collins glass.

name: Nagle
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort and Goldshlager in equal parts into a shot glass. Add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Naval Destroyer
instructions: Thaw limeade concentrate and put in pitcher. Pour Bacardi rum into the empty limeade can until full, then transfer to pitcher. Add 3 beers to pitcher, and serve over ice in glasses.

name: Nebraska Bull Dog
instructions: Pour coconut rum and Dr. Pepper into a tall shot glass, stir, and serve.

name: New Hampshire Bulldog
instructions: Pour Alize VSOP white lable cognac over ice in a tall collins glass. Add Fanta blueberry soda. Garnish with a slice of tangerine, stir, and serve.

name: Niagra
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao over ice in a highball glass. Top with Red Bull until pale green, and serve.

name: On the Green
instructions: A popular golf-themed cocktail.

name: One Cock and Two Balls
instructions: A good pick-me-up for the evening after the hard day at work. Popular even, with the stockmarket hotshots in downtown New York City.

name: Oompa Loompa
instructions: Pour Bacardi Razz raspberry-flavored rum and Stoli Razberi raspberry-flavored vodka into a shot glass, in equal parts, and serve.

name: Orange Hawaiian
instructions: Pour the Bacardi O orange-flavored rum into a blender. Add ice, enough so that it will be slushy when you drink it. Pour in as much Hawaiian punch as you can, and blend. Pour into a pitcher, make a glass for yourself, and store the rest in the fridge.

name: Orange Rita
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker, and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh orange and lime slices.

name: Orange Soda
instructions: Pour Bacardi O over ice in a highball glass. Add cranberry juice, and top off with soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the glass, and serve.

name: Panty Dropper
instructions: Pour Stoli raspberry vodka and blueberry schnapps into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake, pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Paradise #2
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan and Malibu rum into an ice-filled beer pilsner. Fill the rest of the way with the pine-orange-banana juice, and serve. Blend the above together with a banana in a blender for another great tasting drink.

name: Paris Hilton Cocktail
instructions: Pour vodka over ice cubes or crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add a splash of UV orange vodka, top with mountain dew, and serve.

name: Party Boy
instructions: Rub a lemon slice on the edge of a whiskey sour glass. Dip the edge of the glass in sugar. Add pink lemonade and a dash of sour mix. Then add Bacardi, triple sec and Absolut Citron. Stir. Lick around the edge of the glass then take the shot.

name: Peach House
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, shake, and strain into shot glasses.

name: Peapicker
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add lemonade, a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: Pearl Jam
instructions: Pour orange vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Add club soda, top with orange juice, and serve.

name: Pedialite
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Peppermint Mocha
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, add straw, and serve.

name: Piece of Heaven
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice, pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Pierce Clit
instructions: Pour at least half a shot of each ingredient into a cocktail glass, stir and serve.

name: Piledriver
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Pimp Juice
instructions: Pimp Juice was inspired by the song of the same name. It is popular at Kappa Sigma Fraternity in San Luis Obispo, California, near where a Mr David McAninch first created it.

name: Pineapple Snap
instructions: Pour Ketel One vodka, triple sec and Absolut Mandrin into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Pineapple Fuck-Me-Up
instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 into a cocktail glass. Add pineapple juice, a splash of triple sec, and serve.

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
instructions: Pour vanilla vodka and pineapple juice into a shot glass. Add a drop of grenadine, and serve.

name: Pinesol
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal amounts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Pink Panther #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Malibu Peach
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Pink Pantie Pulldown
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade, followed by Sprite, and serve.

name: Pink Panties #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cream) together in a blender, adjusting unspecified amounts to your own taste. Pour into a pitcher, and serve into margarita glasses topped with a sliced strawberry and whipped cream.

name: Pink Panty Dropper
instructions: First add all 18 cans of beer to a large container. Add bottles of Everclear and tequila and last but not least add the pink lemonade. Place lemon slices in the mixture for extra flavor. Let sit for a few hours, then serve.

name: Pleasant Surprise
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a tall shot glass, and serve.

name: Polish Butterfly
instructions: Pour Polish vodka and blue curacao into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Powder Keg
instructions: Pour one twelve ounce Heineken Special Dark lager into a chilled pint glass. Fill a one ounce shot glass with Kahlua Especial. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink all of it at once.

name: Purple Fuck
instructions: Sip the sambuca through a straw while somebody else slowly keeps the glass full with the shot of tequila. It turns from very sweet to very nasty.

name: Purple Heaven
instructions: Pour blue curacao and Malibu into an old-fashioned glass. Add Sprite or 7-up, and grenadine to taste. Place a raspberry in the drink and allow to settle to the bottom.

name: Purple Helmeted Warrior #2
instructions: Pour Chambord, vodka and sweet and sour mix into a highball glass over ice. Add Sprite, more if desired, and serve.

name: Purple Hooter #2
instructions: Pour raspberry liqueur and vodka over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add pineapple juice, and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Purple Jesus #2
instructions: Pour Southern Comfort and blackberry brandy into a shot glass. Add a few drops of peppermint schnapps on top, and serve.

name: Purple Jesus #3
instructions: Mix one part Wild Irish Rose with two parts Faygo Grape Pop over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Purple Nurple #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Purple Nurple #1
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Purple Passion #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Adjust amounts if needed until drink is a purple color, and serve.

name: Purple People Eater #2
instructions: Fill half a shot glass with raspberry schnapps and the other half with Smirnoff vodka. Serve.

name: Pussy Charger
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan rum into a collins glass filled with ice. Add peach schapps and fill with pineapple juice. Add just a dash of grenadine, garnish with a cherry and orange wedge, and serve.

name: Queerwig
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass, and stir well. Consume quickly.

name: Quick Puck
instructions: Pour gatorade into a highball glass. Add DeKuyper sour apple pucker, stir, and serve.

name: Ramshanked
instructions: Place the lemon slice at the bottom of a highball glass. Add ice, and pour the rum and southern comfort. Finally, add the bottle of Bacardi. Stir and serve.

name: Raspberry Remix
instructions: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a collins glass. Add Sprite Remix, stir gently, and serve.

name: Raspberry Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail/martini glass, and serve.

name: Red Apple Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with cracked ice, cover and shake. Served in a chilled martini cocktail glass, rimmed with sugar and garnished with a red apple slice. To rim the glass with sugar: pour a small amount of grenadine onto a small plate. Set the rim of the chilled martini glass into the grenadine and carefully rotate the glass for even coverage. Then, to rim with the sugar: using sugar on a seperate plate after the glass has been rimmed with the grenadine, gently sit the rim of the glass into the sugar and remove. Immediatly after, strain the chilled martini mixture into the sugar rimmed glass and garnish with a thinly sliced, red apple slice.

name: Red Dog
instructions: Pour vodka and whiskey into a cocktail shaker. Add orange and cranberry juice, and shake vigorously. Pour over ice in a frozen or chilled collins glass or tumbler. Slowly add the ginger ale, garnish with a maraschino cherry or orange wedge, and serve.

name: Red Headed Stepchild
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Red Headed Stepchild #2
instructions: Pour Bacardi into a collins glass filled with ice. Add Code red mountain dew, and serve.

name: Red Headed Pimp
instructions: The Red Headed Pimp is similar in comparison to a Red Headed Slut.

name: Red Headed Woodpecker
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cranberry juice) together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add sufficient cranberry juice to turn the drink red, and serve.

name: Rigori
instructions: Blend all ingredients together by stirring in an old-fashioned glass, Add ice, and serve.

name: Roadkill Toaster Oven
instructions: Shake rum, tequila, lime juice, juice of 1/2 can pears, and a pinch of red pepper flakes in a mason jar. Garnish with 1 pineapple ring and 2 cherries arranged to form face.

name: Rocky Point Bomber
instructions: Drop a shot of vodka into a half a highball glass of milk, or half and half, and shoot.

name: Rolling Rock and Roll
instructions: Drop a shot glass filled with R&R (Rich & Rare) canadian whisky into a pint glass filled with Rolling Rock pale lager, and serve.

name: Root Beer Float #2
instructions: Pour the vodka, tequila, galliano and kahlua into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of cream, top with coke, and serve.

name: Rum Punch
instructions: Open frozen juice and put concentrate in a one gallon pitcher. Do not add water. Add entire liter of dark rum, then add coconut rum. Mix until frozen juice concentrate dissolves into rum, and add entire 2-liter of Tahitian Treat. Pour into hurricane glasses, and serve.

name: Rumage
instructions: Pour Bacardi Superior rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass. Add Malibu coconut rum, and juices. Stir and serve.

name: Run for Your Money
instructions: Pour the strawberry schnapps into a shot glass. Add the sour apple pucker, and serve.

name: Ruptured Duck
instructions: Pour ingredients into a medium-sized cocktail glass, stir gently and serve.

name: Russian Kelman
instructions: Pour vodka into a 12 oz highball glass. Add pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Schnapp Bomb
instructions: Pour a whole bottle of Archers peach schnapps into a medium sized saucepan. Heat until hot, but do not boil. Gradually add the sugar until saturation point (about 1 - 1.5 Kgs). Serve in shot glasses and knock back in one go whilst still hot.

name: School Bus
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Scooby Snack #4
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake until blended, pour into a rocks or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Screw The City
instructions: Pour vodka and Cointreau over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add cranberry juice and a splash of orange juice. Shake vigorously and pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Take an orange peel (about 1 in.) squeeze it over a match on top of the cocktail. Place orange peel in cocktail, and serve.

name: Sex on The Beach #13
instructions: Pour peach schnapps, Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum into a hurricane glass. Add juices, add a straw, and serve.

name: Sex on the Sofa
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps, WKD and Reef into a jug. Add orange juice to taste. Stir well, and serve into tall glasses.

name: SG03
instructions: Pour rum over ice cubes in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine, and pour in a can of MC2 berry blue energy drink Serve.

name: Shagger
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sherbert Delight
instructions: Add lime sherbert to a punch bowl. Pour the ginger ale, and stir.

name: Shetty Classic
instructions: Pour Ricard, Bacardi rum and Absolut vodka into a bowl filled with sugar. Set on fire (use extreme caution) and let the sugar dissolve. Allow the drink to cool, and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Shirley Temple #3
instructions: Pour Sprite over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add grenadine, and serve.

name: Short Bus
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass, stir, and serve.

name: Silent Sam Mix
instructions: Add all ingredients to a punch bowl. The more ice tea, the sweeter the drink. Serve into punch cups or equivalent.

name: Skin and Bones
instructions: Pour rum into an old-fashioned glass, and add coke (in the same fashion as a rum and coke). Add a squeeze of lime juice, and serve.

name: Skip Morrison
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall shot glass, and serve.

name: Skittles
instructions: A drink that tastes curiously like Skittles (the red bag of different colored M&M-sized candy sweets). Created by Kyle Guinn, Puyallup, Washington.

name: Skunk Teas
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large pitcher with ice. Stir, and serve in tall glasses.

name: Skyy Bomb
instructions: Drop a shot of Skyy vodka into half a pint of Skyy Blue and chug.

name: Slapper
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients in a shot glass, in equal parts, and serve.

name: Slippery Dick #2
instructions: Pour Sprite and orange juice into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add triple sec, Smirnoff vodka and peach schnapps. Add a dash of sweet and sour mix if desired, and serve.

name: Slippery Todd
instructions: Pour banana schnapps and vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange tangerine juice, and serve.

name: Sloppy Pussy
instructions: Pour Everclear, red gatorade and a fruit punch over ice in a large pitcher. Stir, pour into hurricane glasses, and serve.

name: Slow Fuck
instructions: Pour blue curacao and gin into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with equal parts sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Slurpee From Hell
instructions: Make frozen orange juice concentrate according to instructions on can. Keep frozen, and blend Everclear into the juice. Serve.

name: Slut Tits
instructions: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with white cranberry strawberry juice, and stir. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Kinky
instructions: Pour ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Smurf Juice
instructions: Add all ingredients to a gallon jug, mix well and fill the rest with water. Serve in hurricane glasses.

name: Smurf Piss #2
instructions: Pour vodka and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade, and serve.

name: Snake Bite Bites Back
instructions: Pour lager and cider (otherwise known as a Snake Bite) into a pint glass, and stir. Seperately prepare a Double Pernod and Black (Pernod and Creme de Cassis blackcurrant liqueur) in a 3 oz tall shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass, and serve.

name: Snow Shoe
instructions: Snow Shoe is popular in the Dover, Delaware area. Invented in the west coast and brought to the east.

name: Snowballs
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed completely. Pour into a collins glass, and serve into two highball glasses or one very tall glass.

name: Sobo
instructions: Pour Sobe Energy into a collins glass. Add Bacardi O, and serve.

name: Soulard Cordial
instructions: Mix vodka, vermouth, grenadine, and cherry juice in a shaker with lots of ice. Shake very thoroughly, and then strain into a cordial or cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Southern Bacardi
instructions: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in a hurricane glass, stir and serve.

name: Southern Bahama Mama
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass with ice, and stir. Add a maraschino cherry and pineapple rings for garnish, and serve.

name: Southern Kiss
instructions: Pour all ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Soviet Holiday
instructions: Pour vodka, baja rosa and Malibu into a whiskey sour glass. Stir, top with fruit punch, and serve.

name: Spanish Gentlemen
instructions: Pour grain alcohol into a cup. Add espresso, sweetened to taste. Add Ron Barcelo Imperial rum, mix with a spoon, and serve.

name: Sand in Your Shorts
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake and strain over ice in a tall glass.

name: Sparkley Spritz
instructions: Pour ingredients over 4 ice cubes in a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Squirting Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Steel Vomit
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir and shoot.

name: Steele Frost
instructions: Pour everclear over 1/4 of a glass of crushed ice. Add lemon-lime soda, orange juice, a wedge of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Strap-O-Nilla Juice
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass, and shake well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Strawberry Lemon Drop Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, and shake. Place the rim of a chilled cocktail/martini glass in a bowl of lemon juice, then transfer to a bowl of sugar in order to coat the rim. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker into the cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sunset Shooter
instructions: Sunset Shooter is a refreshing lemonade-tasting shot drink.

name: Super Slice
instructions: Pour Bacardi O into a highball glass. Fill with Orange Slice, and serve.

name: Surfer on Ecstasy
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass, and shoot.

name: Sweating Colombian
instructions: Sweating Colombian is essentially a White Russian with added cinnamon schnapps, and it tastes great.

name: Sweaty Shooter
instructions: Pour rum into a shot glass. Top with tabasco sauce, and serve.

name: Sweaty Mexican
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir, and shoot.

name: Sweet Heart
instructions: Pour DeKuyper Razzmatazz raspberry schnapps, vodka, and sweet and sour mix into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Sweet Tight Pussy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Swiss Alps
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice, strain and pour into a cocktail glass. For more desired effect: place in chilled glass for silky delicately warm touch with hint of eroticism.

name: Syberian Sunrise
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass with ice, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish with a stirrer, straw, maraschino cherry and an orange slice.

name: Tabletop Iron Man
instructions: Pour Cuervo Gold into shot glass and serve with lime and salt. Take salt and snort it up your nose, take shot, squirt lime in your eye. Use a napkin to clean up.

name: Tanker
instructions: Pour a full can of Keystone Light into a beer mug. Add Grey Goose vodka (or any vodka that you might have), and serve.

name: Gator Juice
instructions: Drain fruit (if using canned fruit) or use fresh fruit if desired, and set juice aside. Place fruit in a bowl or container, add half of each bottle of alcohol, and allow to soak for as long as possible (overnight works best). The following day, or whenever ready, add the fruit juice you saved to the marinated fruit. Add hawaiian punch to strength of your liking, then add ice. Serve in punch cups or suitable glasses.

name: Tatanka
instructions: Pour Zubrowka vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add apple juice and a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Ten More Minutes
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with/without ice as desired. Blend until smooth. Coat the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar, and garnish with a slice of citrus fruit. Pour mixture from blender into glass, and serve. Should serve two or three.

name: Tequila Bang Bang
instructions: The Tequila Bang Bang is akin to most slammers in that the holding technique difficult to grasp at first. But as with everything in life, practice makes perfect.

name: Tequila Boom
instructions: Before drinking, put a napkin on top of the glass and your hand over that. Bang it on the table (so that the gases rise to the top) and shoot.

name: Tequila Cosmo
instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, fresh lime juice and cranberry juice together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and squeeze a further wedge of lime on top. Discard lime, and serve.

name: Tequila Pop
instructions: Pour ingredients into a tall shot glass. Cover the glass with a coaster or hand and slam the glass hard onto the table. Shoot immediately.

name: Tequila Stone Sour
instructions: Pour tequila into a cocktail glass. Add a splash of triple sec, and fill with swee and sour mix and orange juice. Serve.

name: Texas Lightning Bolt
instructions: Add ingredients to a shot glass, and serve with a straw.

name: Aftershock Surprise
instructions: Add Aftershock and sambuca to a pint glass almost filled with Carlsberg, and serve.

name: Continental #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Motherfucker #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: The Big Johnson #2
instructions: Cut a lime into slices and coat in sugar. Pour Ketel One vodka, Southern Comfort and White Lightning into a pitcher filled with ice. Pour cranberry juice into the pitcher last and allow to mingle with the spirits. Do not stir, since this weakens it. Pour through a strainer into a tall glass, and chug. The lime should stay at the bottom of the glass as you chug, forcing you to finish the shot in one gulp before you can retrieve the lime, and you *want* to get the lime before the air hits your tongue.

name: Bitch Slap #2
instructions: Pour ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bling Bling
instructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps and raspberry vodka in equal parts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Popper #2
instructions: Pour irish cream and tequila rose into a shot glass in equal parts, and serve.

name: The Crypt
instructions: Pour all ingredients except 151 rum into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain over ice in a tall glass. Float the 151 rum on the top, and serve.

name: Fatass
instructions: Pour Stoli raspberry vodka and Bacardi Limon into a shot glass in equal parts, and serve.

name: FDU Spanish
instructions: Pour Hpnotiq into a shot glass. Add an equal amount of Bacardi Limon rum, stir, and serve.

name: Fizzy Green Hunnit
instructions: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Red Bull, stir, and serve.

name: Flatliner #2
instructions: Shake goldschlager and grand marnier well in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail/martini glass, top with bacardi 151 rum, and serve. (Can ignite rum if desired for optimal effect.)

name: The Force
instructions: Begin by pouring in six cans of Bush Light, mixing in 1/4 of the total Everclear as you pour. Next add one can Red Bull and one can of lemon concentrate. Continue this process three more times until all ingredients are mixed into the punch. Stir the entire time to ensure thorough mixing. Finished batch should taste mostly of Red Bull, but be advised that it is fairly powerful, hence the name. Serve in the standard sized party cup, but be prepared to make several batches because one batch is only enough to feed the smallest of parties. Large amounts of Aristocrat Vodka or other vodka can be substituted for Everclear if you want to be a cheapass about it; but in order to maintain the kick you have to use at least twice the ammount.

name: Ghetto Booty
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass, in equal parts, and serve.

name: Grateful Dead Punch
instructions: A tasty party-punch recipe enjoyed heavily by Hiaasen House students at Eckerd College, St. Petersburg, Florida.

name: Groti
instructions: A pretty distasteful shot drink which makes a good revenge shot.

name: The Hague
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hot Mess
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass in this order: Goldschlager bottom, Bacardi 151 middle, Caramel top. For the Caramel, heat in a microwave to the point where its almost liquid. And add to the shot. Light the shot on fire, blow out flames and serve.

name: The Kelman
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a cup, and serve.

name: Marshall
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass with/without ice, and stir. Sip or shoot.

name: McGorgan
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass, and serve. Add more orange juice to taste, if desired.

name: Strawberry Splash
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Swirl around gently, and serve.

name: Motherfucker Shot
instructions: Pour the cranberry juice into a shot glass. Add maple syrup, vodka, and serve.

name: Nutty Italian
instructions: Nutty Italian is a popular after-dinner cocktail. It was created by Patricia Richards, a bartender at Fiamma Trattoria, MGM Grand Hotel, Las Vegas.

name: The Pickle Barrel
instructions: Pour ingredients together over ice in a tall glass. Pour into a cocktail shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into glass. Garnish with a lemon. Add sugar to taste, and serve.

name: The Quickening
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a sugar-frosted-rimmed or cinnamon-frosted-rimmed collins glass, and serve.

name: The Sri Thug
instructions: Pour Everclear into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add mountain dew, enough to mask the taste of everclear or to personal preference. Then twist a slice of lime into the glass. Add or discard shell, and serve.

name: The Stein
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass. Stir, and serve.

name: The Talking Cow
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: The Thingy
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass, stir, and serve.

name: Thirsty Marine
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Twitcher
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir, and serve.

name: WOP
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Zack Attack
instructions: Pour ingredients over lots of ice in a blue-tinted collins glass. Garnish with blueberries, and serve.

name: Throw Me Down and Fuck Me
instructions: Place the two liquors into the bottom of a shot glas. Add pineapple juice and grenadine, mix well, and serve.

name: Tie Dye
instructions: Pour sambuca into a shot glass. Drop tequila rose into the center of the glass, and serve.

name: Tiki Lemonade
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice into a collins glass, and top with soda to taste. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Tender Loving Care
instructions: Pour a premium tequila over a handful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add cola. Garnish with a thick slice of lime, and serve.

name: Tokyo Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a small highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Tomboy
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a beer mug, stir, and serve.

name: Touchdown
instructions: When you are done downing this energy shot, throw your hands in the air and yell "Touchdown". Now see how many points you can score.

name: Triple Threat
instructions: Pour Absolut Citron into a highball glass filled with ice. Add peach schnapps and triple sec. Top off with orange juice and 7-up, to taste, and serve.

name: Tropical Bliss
instructions: Pour Malibu rum and Smirnoff Orange Twist vodka into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill glass 3/4 full with equal amounts of orange juice and pineapple juice; fill rest of way with milk; shake and serve.

name: Tropical Breeze
instructions: Pour raspberry and watermelon schnapps into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with mountain dew, and serve.

name: Tropical Suicide
instructions: Pour Bacardi rum into a collins glass. Add Malibu rum, Jose Cuervo tequila, pineapple juice, cranberry juice and orange juice. Stir, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mexican Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a large cocktail/martini glass (8+ ounces) with a salt rim. Add two olives on a spear, and serve.

name: Tuaca Lemon Drop
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake. Strain into a double-shot glass, and serve.

name: Tucker Death Mix
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a jug, and serve into highball glasses.

name: Turbo Shandy
instructions: Pour half a pint of a strong lager (ie. Stella Artois) into a pint glass. Fill with Smirnoff Ice, and serve.

name: Southern Rose
instructions: Pour tequila rose and southern comfort in equal parts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour vanilla vodka into a cocktail glass. Top with coke or diet coke, add ice cubes if desired, and serve.

name: Vanilla Pig
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Varadero Sunrise
instructions: Varadero Sunrise is a very popular drink in the hotels and resort locations around Cuba. Looks great for the colors.

name: Washington Apple Cocktail
instructions: Pour DeKuyper sour apple pucker and Crown Royal canadian whisky into a highball glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice, more to taste if desired, and serve.

name: Washington Apple Shot
instructions: Pour Crown Royal canadian whisky, DeKuyper sour apple pucker and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-Up if desired, and serve.

name: Rat Fuck
instructions: Add the kool-aid mix to a punch bowl and add one cup of sugar. Add vodka, coconut rum, spiced rum, and gin. Fill remainder of punch bowl with water, and stir. Add more sugar if desired, and serve into mugs, punch cups or old-fashioned glasses.

name: Velvet Hammer #3
instructions: Pour a regular Guinness into a beer pilsner. Wait for head to settle, then add vodka, and serve.

name: Vodka Amp
instructions: Add ice to a pitcher. Pour in vodka, Amp, and top off with sweet and sour mix. Pour into highball glasses, and serve.

name: Vodka and Coke
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Coca-cola, add a straw, and serve.

name: Vokter Pepper
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Volga Boatsman
instructions: Volga Boatman is a Russian recipe makes use of a chilled copper cup, which is the customary way to serve this recipe. It also uses Kamchatka vodka, the best-selling liquor in Ohio.

name: Warm Apple Pie
instructions: Carefully layer the liquors on top of one another in a shot glass. Top with a dollop of whipped cream, and serve.

name: Wasabi Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine lime juice and wasabi with a whisk, until wasabi dissolves. Pour into a pitcher, and add veggie juice, worcestershire sauce, pepper sauce and salt. Chill. Stir in vodka and serve over ice, with a stalk of celery or pickled asparagus. Serves 8.

name: Washoe Peel
instructions: Pour all ingredients intoa cocktail shaker. Shake and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: White Cotton Panties
instructions: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: White Man
instructions: Pour Gentleman Jack whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add 3 ice cubes, top with Vanilla Coke, and serve.

name: White Romanian
instructions: Pour Stoli vodka, kahlua and banana liqueur into a highball glass or cup with ice. Top off with milk, followed by two slices of thinly cut bananas. Stir and serve.

name: Wicked Apple
instructions: Pour jagermeister into a highball glass filled with ice. Add vodka, and almost fill completely with apple juice. Add just a splash of ginger ale, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Wild Sacramento
instructions: Add everything but the bitters and lemon juice to a blender with four ice cubes. Blend for less than a half minute (the ice cubes should not be totally disintegrated). Pour into a highball glass, add the bitters and lemon juice, and serve.

name: Wiper Fluid
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Yes!
instructions: Pour rum, passoa, orange vodka and cherry liqueur into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Fill with Red Bull, and serve.

name: Bourbon Crusta
instructions: Place the sugar in a saucer. Rub the rim of a wine goblet with a lemon wedge, and dip into the sugar to coat the rim thoroughly; discard lemon. Peel a spiral of orange peel and place inside the glass, draped over one side. Fill with crushed ice. Combine the bourbon whiskey, Cointreau, maraschino and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Bourbon Sangaree
instructions: Pour bourbon whiskey and water into a highball glass. Add sugar, allow to dissolve. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and club soda. Float the tawny port on top. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, sprinkle with nutmeg and cinnamon, and serve.

name: Strain the Rein
instructions: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime wedge and dip into a flat bowl of sugar (2 tsp) in order to thoroughly coat the rim. Discard the lime shell. Pour the rum, raspberry liqueur, Cointreau, lemon juice and a teaspoon of sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into the cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sue Riding High
instructions: Pour the dark rum, dark creme de cacao and hot chocolate (room temperature) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cream into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Suffragette City
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Texas Pink Cloud
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender, add 3 - 4 cups of ice and blend until all ice is chopped fine. Should be the consistentency of a daiquiri or colada. Pour into a pitcher ready to serve.

name: British Bulldog
instructions: Pour DeKuyper Buttershots, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in half-and-half until the glass is full. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, add a straw, and serve.

name: Porn Star
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Surrey Slider
instructions: Pour rum, peach schnapps and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Susan Littler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Three-Miler Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Trouble for Tina
instructions: Combine the rum, dark creme de cacao, white creme de cacao, coffee (cooled to room temperature) and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Waking to the Call of the Mockingbird
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Alleluia
instructions: Combine the tequila, blue curacao, maraschino liqueur, lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water, garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice, and serve.

name: Joumbaba
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Juan Blue
instructions: Pour tequila, orange juice, grapefruit juice, lemon juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Carefully float the curacao on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Jubilee
instructions: Pour tequila, gin, vodka, curacao, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Jumping Bean
instructions: Pour tequila and sambuca into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with coffee beans, and serve.

name: Leapfrog
instructions: Pour tequila, sloe gin and vermouth into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Moonraker
instructions: Pour the tequila and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Pink Paradise
instructions: Pour the tequila into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir. Pour the bitters into a brandy snifter and swirl around in order to coat the glass. Discard any excess bitters from the glass, then strain the tequila into the glass, and serve.

name: Piper
instructions: Pour tequila, lemon juice, dark creme de cacao and coffee (cooled to room temperature) into an irish coffee cup or irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Poker Face
instructions: Pour tequila, Cointreau and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Red Face
instructions: Pour tequila, cranberry liqueur and cranberry juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Scottie Was Beamed Up
instructions: Pour tequila and galliano into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Shaker Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Silk Stocking
instructions: Pour tequila, dark creme de cacao, heavy cream and Chambord into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Smiler
instructions: Pour tequila, lemon juice, sugar and port into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Tequila Cooler
instructions: Pour tequila and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a wedge of lemon, and serve.

name: Tequila Fizz #2
instructions: Pour tequila, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Tequila Martini
instructions: Pour tequila and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon or an olive, and serve.

name: Tequila Stinger
instructions: Pour tequila and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Tequila Suave
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Time Killer
instructions: Pour the tequila and beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and stir. Sprinkle the salt on top, garnish with lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Toreador #2
instructions: Pour tequila, dark creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cocoa powder dusted over the top, and serve.

name: Viva Villa #2
instructions: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime wedge, and dip into sugar in a saucer or flat bowl; discard lime. Pour the tequila and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Zultry Zoe
instructions: Pour tequila, galliano and Mexican hot chocolate (cooled to room temperature) into an Irish coffee cup or glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Aberfoyle

name: Lady Madonna
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Leo the Lion
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lillet Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Lillet and gin into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Magique
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin and creme de cassis into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Matinee
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, chartreuse, orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mayflower Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, Pernod, Cointreau and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mayor Billy
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mercenary
instructions: Pour the vermouth, Armagnac and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moi?
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and top with tonic water. Stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Much Fuss for the Conquering Hero
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, juices and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pammy Kay
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, brandy and fruit juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Phoebe Snow
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet, brandy and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Same Old Song
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, juices and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Seething Jealousy
instructions: Pour the vermouth, whisky, cherry brandy and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sweet Nan
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy and Benedictine into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Tannersworth
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet, gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Thanksgiving Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, apricot brandy, creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Triplet Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, peach brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: True Trixie
instructions: Pour the Campari, dry vermouth and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis Tall
instructions: Pour the vermouth and creme de cassis into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda, and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Warrior Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vermouth, brandy, Pernod and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Wedding Bell Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet, gin, cherry brandy, orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Westerman Sings the Blues
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Wysoosler
instructions: Pour the vermouth, gin, green chartreuse and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bocci Ball #2
instructions: Pour the amaretto and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Apricot Fizz
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Apricot Sour
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: On the Square
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, gin and Calvados brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: B & B Stinger
instructions: Pour the benedictine and white creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Silent Monk
instructions: Pour the benedictine, Cointreau and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Barrow Blues
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, light rum, anejo rum, pineapple juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Golden Fleece
instructions: Pour the yellow chartreuse and Danzig Goldwasser into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cherries from Heaven
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, lemon juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water, and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cherry Flash Cola
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, maraschino liqueur and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Duval
instructions: Pour the Cointreau and Sambuca into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bananarama
instructions: Pour the creme de bananes, Cointreau, bitters and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Slamdancer
instructions: Pour the creme de cacao, Kahlua, peppermint schnapps and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Diana Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white creme de menthe into a brandy snifter filled with crushed ice. Carefully pour the brandy over the back of a teaspoon in order to float it on top of the creme de menthe. Serve.

name: Roger Swims a Mile
instructions: Pour the Drambuie, whiskey and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: End of My Rope
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, creme de bananes, pineapple juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Friar Tuck #2
instructions: Pour the Frangelico, brandy, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Chunnel Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Grand Marnier, gin, vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Coffee Stick
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Sambuca and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Douglas Town
instructions: Pour the Kahlua, tequila and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: King Alphonse
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a pousse cafe glass. Carefully float the cream on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Focal Point
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, light rum, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Green Goddess
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, Scotch, dry vermouth and lemon-lime osda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Man in the Melon
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, vodka, Cointreau, lemon-lime soda and club soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Blue Glory
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps, blue curacao and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Peppermint Twist
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps, Kahlua coffee liqueur and dark creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pousse Cafe a la Francaise
instructions: Pour the chartreuse into a pousse-cafe glass. Carefully float the maraschino liqueur on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Do the same with the cherry brandy, and then again with the kummel. Serve.

name: Pousse Cafe Standish
instructions: Pour the grenadine into a pousse-cafe glass. Carefully float the white creme de menthe on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Do the same with the galliano, and then again with the kummel, and then lastly with the brandy.

name: Ferris Wheel
instructions: Pour the Sambuca and brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ce cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Samson Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Opal Nera black sambuca, blackberry brandy, amaretto and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sloehand Jackson
instructions: Pour the sloe gin, gin, vodka, orange juice, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: British Comfort
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort, gin, lemon juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Southern Comfort Manhattan
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort, sweet vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Champagne Julep
instructions: Combine 4 mint leaves with the sugar and a few drops of water, and muddle well. Add the bourbon, and stir well. Strain into a collins glass, add ice cubes and the champagne. Garnish with 2 mint leaves, and serve.

name: Champagne Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a champagne flute, add champagne, and serve.

name: Cream Sherry Cobbler
instructions: Add the sugar to an old-fashioned glass. Pour in the club soda, and stir to dissolve. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full, then add sherry, and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a slice of orange, and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Cream Sherry Flip
instructions: Combine the sherry, egg, sugar and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Cream Sherry Sangaree
instructions: Add the sugar to a highball glass. Add water and sherry, and stir to dissolve sugar. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice, and add club soda. Float the benedictine on top. Garnish with a lemon twist, a dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon, and serve.

name: Ferocious Flip
instructions: Pour the brandy, port, egg, sugar and cream into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: French Revolution
instructions: Pour the brandy and framboise into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and strain into a champagne flute. Add the champagne, and serve.

name: Drunken Superman
instructions: Drunken Superman, invented by Jarrod Brecht, is a popular drink in South Florida, South Carolina and New England.

name: Hillary Wallbanger
instructions: Pour the white wine and orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, float the galliano on top, and serve.

name: Port and Brandy
instructions: Pour the port and brandy into a brandy snifter. Stir well, and serve.

name: Portuguese Daisy
instructions: Pour the port, brandy, lemon juice, sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Port Wine Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the water and port in the bottom of a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice; add the soda. Float the brandy on top, and garnish with a lemon twist. Dust with nutmeg, then with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Red Wine Cooler
instructions: Pour the wine, lemon-lime soda and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Ruby Port Cobbler
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the club soda in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full, and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a slice of orange, and a slice of lemon.

name: Ale Flip
instructions: Heat the lemon juice with 2 ounces of ale, the ginger and the sugar in a saucepan over moderate heat until the sugar has dissolved. Beat the egg yolk into the brandy in a bowl. Beat the lemon juice mixture from the saucepan into the bowl with the egg, and beat together. Transfer to a beer mug. Add the rest of the ale, stir well, and serve.

name: Black Velveteen
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a large beer mug, and serve.

name: Ginger Beer Shandy
instructions: Pour the ginger beer into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Carefully add the ale, or lager, and serve.

name: Lager and Black
instructions: Pour Ribena blackcurrant syrup or similar into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add lager (well chilled), and serve.

name: Lemon Top
instructions: Pour the ale (or lager) into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Stout and Black
instructions: Pour Ribena blackcurrant syrup or similar into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add stout, and serve.

name: Stout Sangaree
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the water in the bottom of a beer mug. Carefully pour the stout to give a half-inch head. Float the port on top. Garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon, and serve.

name: Bedroom Farce
instructions: Pour the rum, bourbon whiskey, galliano and hot chocolate into an irish coffee cup or glass. Spoon the cream carefully so that it floats on top of the drink. Garnish with grated chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Candle in the Window
instructions: Pour the rum, bourbon whiskey, creme de cacao, cherry brandy and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top, and serve.

name: Chocolate Corvette
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de cacao and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top, and serve.

name: Chocolate Vice
instructions: Pour the rum, bourbon, creme de cacao and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Spoon the cream carefully on top, and serve.

name: Coffee Royale
instructions: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the sugar, and stir to dissolve. Add the brandy, stir again. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon over the top of the drink so that it floats, and serve.

name: Comforting Coffee
instructions: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee glass or cup. Add the Southern Comfort, bourbon whiskey, and creme de cacao, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon on top of the drink so that it floats, and serve.

name: Five Before Flying
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, Southern Comfort, creme de bananes, brandy, creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon, so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Good Golly
instructions: Pour the rum, Galliano, creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Gracious Enjee
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a coffee mug, stir well, and serve.

name: Hot Daring Dylan
instructions: Pour the tequila, Kahlua coffee liqueur and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass, and stir well. Float the cream on top of the drink by pouring across the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Hot Mollifier
instructions: Pour the rum, Tia Maria and coffee into an Irish coffee glass, and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink, and serve.

name: Hot Penny Rum
instructions: Pour the rum, bourbon whiskey, creme de cacao and coffe into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Float the cream on top by pouring it over the back of a teaspoon, and serve.

name: Hot Piper
instructions: Pour the tequila, lemon juice, dark creme de cacao and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Hot Zultry Zoe
instructions: Pour the tequila, Galliano and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass and stir well. Float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Monastery Cocktail
instructions: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the sugar; stir to dissolve. Add the benedictine and stir again. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon to float on top, and serve.

name: Squire Racine
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a coffee mug, stir, and serve.

name: Ritchie Ritchie
instructions: Pour the rum, dark creme de cacao, white creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink. Dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Southfork Coffee
instructions: Pour the coffee, bourbon and creme de cacao into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Stir well, then float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Whiskey All In
instructions: Pour the whiskey, sugar, lemon juice and hot water into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Stir well, garnish with a lemon twist and a whole clove, and serve.

name: Champagne Rum Punch
instructions: Combine the rums, wines and juices in a large punch bowl, and stir well. Add one large block of ice, and garnish with orange slices. Makes 30 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Cider Punch
instructions: Place the cider, Drambuie, sherry, lemon juice and club soda into a large punch bowl, and stir well. Add a large block of ice, then add the slices of apple. Sprinkle nutmeg across the top, and serve. Makes 18 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Brown Betty Punch
instructions: Add the sugar, lemon slices, cloves, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, ginger and water to a large nonreactive saucepan set over medium-high heat. Stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Let the mixture reach the boil, then turn the heat to medium, and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the brandy and ale and heat, but do not allow to boil. Serve in beer mugs, with a slice of lemon on each drink. Makes 8 (10-ounce) beer mugs.

name: Claret Punch
instructions: Stir the lemon juice and sugar togeher in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the claret, brandy, apricot brandy, bourbon whiskey, Cointreau, club soda and cold tea. Stir well. Add one large block of ice, then add orange slices. Makes 30 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Frank Davis Punch
instructions: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the tequila, champagne and sauternes, and stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with melon balls, cut out from a honeydew melon. Makes 36 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Hot Whiskey Punch
instructions: Peel and slice the lemons; place the peel into a large non-reactive saucepan. Add sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves and 3 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the water to reach the boil, then turn heat down to minimum. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add the whiskey and heat but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled lemon in each. Makes 8 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Orchard Punch
instructions: Combine the applejack, orange juice, grapefruit juice, grenadine and orange bitters in a large punch bowl, and stir well. Add lemon-lime soda and ginger ale; stir again. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange and apple slices. Makes 24 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Sunset Punch
instructions: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the champagne, maraschino liqueur, Cointreau, cherry brandy, brandy and cold tea. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange slices and maraschino cherries.

name: Tartan Champagne Punch
instructions: Stir the Drambuie and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the brandy, maraschino liqueur, Champagne and club soda. Stir well. Add one large block of ice, and garnish with peeled orange slices.

name: Mulled Port
instructions: Peel and slice the oranges, and place the peel in a large nonreactive saucepan. Add cloves, mace, nutmeg, allspice, cinnamon stick, sugar and 2 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the reach the boil and turn down to medium heat. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add port and heat, but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled orange in each. Makes 6 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Texas Bar Punch
instructions: Pour the port, ginger ale and soda into a large punch bowl, and stir well. Add one large block of ice. Add lemon and orange slices, and serve. Makes 20 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Wedding Bell Punch
instructions: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the bourbon, rum, creme de cacao, champagne, red wine, vermouth, club soda and ginger ale. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange slices and strawberries. Makes 32 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Elephant Charger
instructions: Peel and slice the peach, chop the banana; add to a blender. Add orange juice, milk, raspberrries and ice cream, and blend well. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Virgin Flamingo Cocktail
instructions: Pour the cranberry juice, pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with the club soda and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Flying Fairbrother
instructions: Combine the grapefruit juice, orange juice, cranberry juice and honey in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale, stir well, and serve.

name: Golden Nest
instructions: Combine the juices, egg and grenadine in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Peachy Hanes
instructions: Place the peach nectar into the bottom of a beer mug. Slowly stir in the ginger beer, and serve.

name: Penzance Cocktail
instructions: Pour the orange juice and ginger beer into a beer mug with a few ice cubes, and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Pomegranate Soda
instructions: Pour the lemon juice and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, and serve.

name: Pussyfoot
instructions: Combine the juices, grenadine and egg in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Roy Rogers
instructions: Pour the ginger ale, lemon-lime soda and grenadine into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Rose and Thistle
instructions: Slice the banana and add it to a blender with 6 ice cubes. Add the strawberries and milk, and blend well. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Russian Denim
instructions: Pour the orange juice, cranberry juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the egg yolk. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Safe Scrumpy
instructions: Pour the lemon juice, egg and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with apple cider, stir well, and serve.

name: Silver Nest
instructions: Pour the orange juice, cranberry juice, egg and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Tomato Lassi
instructions: Place the yogurt, tomato juice, water and salt in a blender; blend thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add celery salt/seed and stir thoroughly.

name: Virgin Banana Colada
instructions: Cut the banana into chunks, and add to a blender. Add the pineapple juice, coconut cream and crushed ice. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Bullshot
instructions: Combine the beef bouillon, black pepper, Worcestershire and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Clamato Cocktail
instructions: Combine the tomato juice, clam juice, black pepper, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Pina Colada
instructions: Add the pineapple juice, coconut cream and crushed ice to a blender; blend at high speed. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Virgin Strawberry Colada
instructions: Combine the strawberries, pineapple juice, coconut cream and crushed ice in a blender, and blend well at high speed. Pour into a collins glass, garnish with a cherry and pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Wavebender
instructions: Pour the orange juice, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale, stir well, and serve.

name: Yellowjacket
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: A1 Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, Grand Marnier, lemon juice and grenadine over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amore Ade
instructions: Pour the amaretto, triple sec and club soda into a large red wine glass. Add ice, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Anatole Coffee
instructions: Blend cognac, coffee liqueur, Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and iced coffee with a little cracked ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a chilled white wine glass. Add whipped cream, garnish with a sprinkling of chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Anchors Aweigh
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, triple sec, peach brandy, cherry brandy and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Andes Ratt
instructions: Make the Ovaltine as per usual. Add peppermint schnapps, stir well, and serve. Tastes like an Andes mint.

name: Anesthetic
instructions: Pour gin, vermouth, cognac and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add sugar to taste, garnish with lemon peel, and serve.

name: Anjorska
instructions: Pour the Bacardi, Passoa, sweet and sour mix, and juices into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Annabelle Special
instructions: Pour the ingredients over cracked ice in a mixing glass. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ann Sheridan Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, orange curacao and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Antibes
instructions: Pour the gin, benedictine and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Aperitivo
instructions: Pour gin, sambuca and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Apollo 13
instructions: Pour the white rum, cream, Grand Marnier, Galliano and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a 5 oz champagne saucer or glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Appetizer
instructions: Pour the Dubonnet and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Blow
instructions: Pour the brandy, lemon juice, egg white, sugar and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain over a few ice cubes in a collins glass. Add club soda, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Cocktail
instructions: Pour the apple brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Cooler
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a chilled collins glass. Float the dark rum on top. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Rickey
instructions: Pour the apple brandy and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir, and fill with club soda. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Apple Cart
instructions: Pour the apple brandy, Cointreau and lemon juice into an old-fashioned (preferably chilled) glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Apple Dubonnet
instructions: Pour the apple brandy and Dubonnet into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Apple Fizz
instructions: Pour the apple brandy, apple juice and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with soda water, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Applejack Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Applejack Collins
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy, lemon juice, sugar and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled collins glass. Top with soda water, to taste, and serve.

name: Apple Granny Crisp
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Add whipped cream, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Applejack Daisy
instructions: Pour Applejack brandy, lime juice, grenadine and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Applejack Manhattan
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy, vermouth and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Applejack Sour
instructions: Pour the brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with soda water, garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Apple Knocker
instructions: Pour the vodka, apple cider, lemon juice and strawberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #2
