instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir well, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #3
instructions: Build apple schnapps and cinnamon schnapps over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of apple, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Martini
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka, Calvados brandy and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin slice of apple, and serve.

name: Apple River
instructions: Combine the brandy, creme de cacao, ice cream and crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with half an apple ring, and serve.

name: Apple Sauce
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender, and blend until slushy. Pour into a tall glass; highball, hurricane, or collins, and serve.

name: Apple Soda
instructions: Pour vodka, Applejack brandy and apple schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add 7-up, and serve.

name: Apricot Brandy Rickey
instructions: Pour apricot brandy and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda, stir and serve.

name: Aquarius
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, cherry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Orangutan Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, banana liqueur, half-and-half, orange juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Arawak Cup
instructions: Pour the dark rum, passion-fruit syrup, pineapple juice, lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Arch de Triumph
instructions: Pour the brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Arctic Circle
instructions: Pour the vodka, lime juice and ginger ale into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with crushed mint leaves, and serve.

name: Arizona Aztec
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila, Bacardi Limon rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Stir well. Fill with Coca-cola, stir again, and serve.

name: Arcturian Sunrise
instructions: Pour blue curacao, blackberry liqueur and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add sparkling white wine, stir well, and serve.

name: Arizona Buttkicker
instructions: Pour both ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, stir, and serve.

name: Arkansas Avalanche
instructions: Pour Goldschlager, Sprite and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Armageddon
instructions: Pour amaretto, peach schnapps and raspberry sour puss into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add equal amounts of orange and cranberry juice, top with soda, stir and serve.

name: Armour Cocktail
instructions: Pour the sherry and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Around The World
instructions: Pour rum, cognac, orange juice, sour mix and creme de noyaux into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, pour into a wine goblet, and serve.

name: Arthur Tompkins
instructions: Pour gin, Grand Marnier and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Aruba Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, white curacao, egg white, lemon juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Armada Martini
instructions: Pour vodka and Amontillado sherry over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Aruba Smash
instructions: Pour rum, 7-Up, lemon juice, orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Asterix Cocktail
instructions: Pour vodka, pisang ambon, sprite and lemon juice over two ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Atomic Cherries
instructions: Drain the liquid from a standard tub, carton or bottle of maraschino cherries. Fill back up with Everclear, and let soak for a month. Use for garnishing cocktails.

name: Aunt Agatha
instructions: Pour the rum and orange juice into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Float the bitters on top, garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Aurum Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Aussie Mozzie
instructions: Pour the orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add green creme de menthe, and serve.

name: Austrian Hussar
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy into a highball glass. Fill with tonic water, garnish with a twist or spiral of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Authentic Pina Colada
instructions: Pour rum, cream of coconut and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Autumn In New York
instructions: Pour both the Remy Martin cognac and Zima into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake gently, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Awesome Chandler
instructions: Pour Absolut Mandrin, peach schnapps, amaretto, Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and cranberry juice, both to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Bayou Self
instructions: Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum, butterscotch schnapps and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Top with grenadine, and garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of pineapple.

name: Bazooka Bomber
instructions: Pour creme de bananes, triple sec and grenadine over ice in an old-fashioned glass or tumbler, and serve.

name: Butter Chocolate Bliss
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir, and serve.

name: Beachcomber #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Beachcomber #3
instructions: Pour white rum, triple sec, grenadine and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Beach Cruiser
instructions: Pour spiced rum, pineapple juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Beach Cooler
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Beam and 7
instructions: Pour whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add 7-up, and serve.

name: Bearded Clam
instructions: Pour all ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Beauty On The Beach
instructions: Pour white rum, Southern Comfort, Grand Marnier, lemon juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Beige Russian
instructions: Pour the vodka, Tia Maria and chocolate milk into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Bellamy Scotch Sour
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky, orange juice, lemon juice, honey and angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with ginger, and serve.

name: Bellinski
instructions: Puree ripe peaches by forcing them through a sieve and spoon into a large, chilled wine goblet. Sweeten to taste with maraschino liqueur. Add vodka, fill with chilled champagne, and serve.

name: Belmont Stakes
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Bend Me Over Slammer
instructions: Pour whisky, amaretto and sweet and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a small old-fashioned or rocks glass. Top with club soda, to taste. Slam on a hard surface, and shoot.

name: Benka on the Rocks
instructions: Pour the whiskey and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass. Fill with chilled ginger ale, and serve.

name: Bermuda Bouquet
instructions: Pour the gin, apricot brandy, triple sec, grenadine, sugar and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bermuda Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, peach brandy, grenadine and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a delmonico glass (whiskey sour glass), and serve.

name: Berrytini
instructions: Pour the vodka and framboise into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberries, and serve.

name: Better Than Sex
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, Haagen Dazs cream liqueur, Grand Marnier and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Float the cream on top, and serve.

name: Big Bird
instructions: Pour banana schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the way with pineapple and orange juice, and serve.

name: Big Chill #1
instructions: Pour the rum, coconut cream and juices into a cocktail shaker with one cup of ice (8 oz). Shake well, Strain into a pilsner glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Big Chill #2
instructions: Pour the dark rum, Kahlua, coffee, cream and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Top with vanilla ice cream, and serve.

name: Big Easy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Big Hug
instructions: Pour the irish cream into an Irish coffee cup or glass filled 3/4 with hot chocolate. Add creme de cacao. Add whipped cream and garnish with shaved chocolate on top.

name: Big Squeeze
instructions: Pour the vodka and berry punch into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Big Dog
instructions: Pour the Kahlua and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add chilled milk almost to the brim of the glass. Top with a splash of Pepsi cola. Stir, and serve.

name: Billy Hamilton
instructions: Pour the brandy, orange curacao and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise Cooler
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice, grenadine, superfine sugar and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda/sparkling water. Stir well, and serve.

name: Birth Control
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, swill and serve.

name: Biscayne Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, light rum, forbidden fruit liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bison Tonic
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Bite Me
instructions: Pour the rum, root beer and soda into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Bitter Bison
instructions: Pour vodka, vermouth and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bitter Christina
instructions: Pour Martini & Rossi Dry Vermouth into a highball glass filled with ice. Add sloe gin and Pisang Ambon. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon, and serve.

name: Bitter Evan
instructions: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into an old-fashioned or rocks glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add Campari, and serve.

name: Bitter Hitter
instructions: Place all the fruits in a blender and puree, add blue curacao and Cointreau then pulse until combined. Add water and ice and pulse until combined. Serve in tall glass with rim dipped in sugar and lemon juice and a slice of orange on side.

name: Black and White Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli vanilla vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with black and white licorice candy, and serve.

name: Blackberry Punch
instructions: Pour the rum, blackberry liqueur, sugar and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Blackberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine the vanilla ice cream and blackberry brandy in a blender. Blend until smooth, pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Blackberry Tequila
instructions: Pour tequila, creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour contents into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Black Bison
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Black Blood
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, jagermeister and Squirt into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Black Bottom
instructions: Pour the brandy, Cointreau, blackberry brandy, gin, lemon juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Black Bull
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Black Cat
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Black Cat #2
instructions: Pour the Kirschwasser, vodka and grenadine into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola to taste, and serve.

name: Black Death Wish
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 20 seconds, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Black Dog
instructions: Pour the light rum and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black pitted olive, and serve.

name: Black Licorice
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Black Stripe
instructions: Dissolve the molasses in a mug with some boiling water. Add the cinnamon, a lemon twist and the remaining water. Float rum on top and ignite. Let the flame burn for a few seconds then stir to extinguish it and sprinkle some nutmeg on top to garnish.

name: Black Stuff
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky and creme de menthe, into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add dark tea, to taste. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Black Suede
instructions: Prepare a double-shot glass filled with Tia Maria coffee liqueur. Prepare a pint of Guinness. Drop the shot glass into the beer, and chug.

name: Black Jew
instructions: Pour the Kahlua and Goldschlager into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain over a few ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Irish Blackthorn
instructions: Pour the Irish whiskey, vermouth, pernod and bitters into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Black Ukrainian
instructions: Pour the vodka, Tia Maria coffee liqueur, Southern Comfort and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bleeding Heart
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Blended Comfort
instructions: Skin a peach quarter and add to a blender. Add Southern Comfort, bourbon, vermouth and juices. Blend on low for 10 - 15 seconds. Strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of both peach and orange, and serve.

name: Blenheim
instructions: Pour the vodka, Tia Maria coffee liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blame It On Rio
instructions: Pour the vodka, rum, amaretto, peach schnapps, banana liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Top with soda water, to taste. Squeeze in the juice from a lime wedge and drop the shell into the glass. Serve.

name: Blessed Event
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blinker Cocktail
instructions: Pour the whiskey, grapefruit juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blizzard
instructions: Pour the brandy, irish cream, coffee liqueur, rum, ice cream and cream into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large brandy snifter, dust with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Bloody Matador
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until slushy. Strain into a cocktail glass or two, and serve.

name: Bloody Brew
instructions: Pour vodka, beer and tomato juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add salt to taste; stir again. Strain into a highball glass, garnish with a dill pickle spear, and serve.

name: Bloody Hurricane
instructions: Pour tequila into a collins glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Add 7-Up, and splash grenadine. Allow to chill for 10 seconds. Serve.

name: Bloody Maru
instructions: Pour sake, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, horseradish, salt and pepper into a old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add tomato juice, to taste. Stir again, and serve.

name: Bloody Nightmare
instructions: Pour the vodka, lime juice and cranberry juice into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Blue Angel
instructions: Pour the brandy, blue curacao, vanilla liqueur, half-and-half and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Angel #2
instructions: Pour the vodka and parfait amour into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with Sprite, to taste. Stir, and serve.

name: Blueberry Lemonade
instructions: Pour the vodka and blueberry schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice. Sweeten to taste with sugar. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Bloody Mariana
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, add a stick of celery, and serve.

name: Blue Angel #3
instructions: Pour the sparkling wine or champagne over two ice cubes in a champagne saucer. Add blue curacao, and serve.

name: Blueberry Martini
instructions: Pour the gin, Chambord raspberry liqueur and blue curacao into a chilled cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Blue Canary
instructions: Pour the gin, grapefruit juice and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
instructions: Pour the amaretto and blue curacao into a blender. Add vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Pour into a brandy snifter, and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Frog
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Blue Grass Cocktail
instructions: Pour the bourbon, pineapple juice, lemon juice and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Horizon
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Jacket
instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Lesbian
instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with blue Fruitopia fruit juice, stir, and add a dash of blue curacao. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve with a swizzler stick.

name: Blue Memphis
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except curacao) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Add blue curacao and shake again briefly. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Nuke
instructions: Pour vodka, Bacardi 151, gin, blue curacao and blueberry liqueur into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour mix, stir well, and serve.

name: Blue-on-Blue Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, curacao and angostura into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Blue Parrot
instructions: Pour the Maui blue hawaiian schnapps and Parrot Bay coconut rum over some ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice, or to taste, and serve.

name: Blue Passion
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, blue curacao and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple flag, and serve.

name: Blue Riband
instructions: Pour the gin, white curacao and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Sapphire
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Sex
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, tequila, Midori melon liqueur and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Sky
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Lightning
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with prepared lime mix, and serve.

name: Blue Sky #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass, stir, and serve.

name: Blue Squid
instructions: Pour the rum, blue curacao, creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bluetail Fly
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, white creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Temptation
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel, a maraschino cherry, and a sprig of mint.

name: Blue Velvet
instructions: Combine the black raspberry liqueur, melon liqueur and vanilla ice cream in a blender. Add a cup of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and top with whipped cream. Add blue curacao on top, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Watch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Boardwalk
instructions: Pour the vodka, dry vermouth, maraschino liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Bob Cocktail
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, amaretto, banana liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bob Dandy
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Sky #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour everything into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add an umbrella, and serve.

name: Bolli Stoli
instructions: Pour Bollinger champagne into a champagne flute. Add Stoli vodka, and serve.

name: Bolo Cocktail
instructions: Pour the dark rum, lemon juice, orange juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Bolshoi Punch
instructions: Pour the vodka, lemon juice, powdered sugar, rum and creme de cassis into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bombay Sling
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Bon Bini
instructions: Pour the rum, curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Bonehead
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add lemonade to taste, stir again, and serve.

name: Bongo Cola
instructions: Pour gold rum, coffee liqueur, kirsch, pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola, and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Bonny Doon
instructions: Pour Scotch whisky, vermouth and benedictine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Bocci Ball Jiggle Shots
instructions: Stir all ingredients together and pour into 2 oz shot glasses. Refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving.

name: Booga Booga
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with two ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Boomerang Martini
instructions: Stir well over ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a kiwi slice, and serve.

name: Bossa Nova
instructions: Pour dark rum, apricot brandy, galliano and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple fruit flag, and serve.

name: Boston Cooler
instructions: Stir lemon juice, sugar and 2 oz of club soda together in a collins glass. Fill the glass with cracked ice. Add rum. Top with club soda, and stir. Garnish with a spiral of orange or lemon peel, and serve.

name: Boston Freeze
instructions: Pour dark rum, cranberry juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well, until smooth. Pour all contents of the shaker into a wine glass. Garnish with 3 cranberries on a toothpick or a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Boston Gold
instructions: Pour the vodka and banana liqueur into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir well. Add orange juice, to taste, and stir again. Serve.

name: Boston Iced Coffee
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Boston Tea Hardy
instructions: Pour the rum, orange juice and iced tea into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Bourbon a la Creme
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey and brown creme de cacao over the vanilla bean in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a glass without ice, and chill in the refrigerator for at least one hour. Pour into a white wine glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Bourbon a la Kris
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bourbon and Water
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir, garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Bourbonella
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bourbon Satin
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, white creme de cacao and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bourbon Sidecar
instructions: Pour the whiskey, triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bourbon Sloe Gin Fizz
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, sloe gin and lemon juice over cracked ice in a chilled collins glass. Stir gently. Add 3 ice cubes, and fill with soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Bourbon Toddy
instructions: Soak one teaspoon or a cube of sugar with bitters in the bottom of a highball glass. Add a few ice cubes, and pour in the whiskey and water. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Brain Candy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass. Add a few ice cubes, stir well and serve.

name: Brain Pain Killer
instructions: Pour vodka, Jose Cuervo gold tequila, mezcal and creme de bananes into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brandied Apricot
instructions: Pour the brandy, apricot brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh apricot, and serve.

name: Brandied Ginger
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of preserved ginger. Sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Brandied Port
instructions: Pour brandy, port, lemon juice and maraschino into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Brandy Cassis
instructions: Pour the brandy, lemon juice and creme de cassis into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Brandy Gump
instructions: Pour brandy, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brandy Julep
instructions: Place sugar, mint leaves, and brandy in a collins glass and fill with finely shaved ice. Stir until mint rises to top, being careful not to bruise leaves. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, orange, or lemon and a cherry.

name: Brandy Melba
instructions: Pour the brandy, peach brandy, raspberry liqueur, lemon juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach, and serve.

name: Brandy-O
instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add a stirrer, and serve.

name: Brandy Old-Fashioned
instructions: Muddle the sugar with the bitters and the water in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the brandy and some ice cubes. Stir, garnish with a lemon peel, and serve.

name: Brandy Rickey
instructions: Pour brandy and lime juice into a highball glass. Fill with soda water, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Brandy Squirt
instructions: Pour brandy, sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a stick of pineapple and strawberries, and serve.

name: Brandy Water Press
instructions: Pour the brandy over ice cubes in a collins glass and fill almost to the top with water. Top off with the tonic water, and serve.

name: Brass Fiddle
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps, whiskey, pineapple juice and orange juice into a blender. Add one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Swirl the grenadine around the edge of a parfait glass. Add mixture from blender. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Breast Caresser
instructions: Pour the brandy, madeira and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Brief Encounter
instructions: Combine the sherbet, peach schnapps and coconut liqueur in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and drizzle with grenadine. Garnish with lemon slices, and serve.

name: Brittany Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, Amer Picon, orange juice, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Broadway Martini
instructions: Pour the gin and white creme de menthe into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Broken Leg
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a tall glass. Stir, garnish with a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Bronx Cheer
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and add the soda. Stir gently and garnish with some fresh raspberries and an orange peel.

name: Brooklynite
instructions: Pour the rum, honey and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brown Bear
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Blue Bruiser Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite, add curacao, and serve.

name: Red Bruiser Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite, add grenadine, and serve.

name: Bubble Gum #2
instructions: Build all ingredients in an old-fashioned or rocks glass. Fill mostly with milk, top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Bubblegum Shaker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bubblegum Sundae
instructions: Pour creme de bananes, peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with 6 oz of crushed ice. Shake vigorously until slushy. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Add the grenadine so that it sinks down the side of the glass, and serve.

name: Bubbly Martini
instructions: Stir gin and champagne gently in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with two olives, and serve. Note: the quality of the drink is proportional to the quality of the champagne used.

name: Bubbly Red Sex
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps and grenadine into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add tonic water, to taste, and serve.

name: Buckeye Martini
instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive, and serve.

name: Buddy Rich
instructions: Build the Stoli raspberry vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Chambord raspberry liqueur and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with half-and-half, and serve.

name: Bull and Bear
instructions: Pour the bourbon, curacao, lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Bulldog Cooler
instructions: Pour the gin, cointreau, orange juice and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with water, and serve.

name: Bumpy Grapefruit
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Bunky Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bunny Bonzana
instructions: Pour the tequila, apple brandy, triple sec, lemon juice and maple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Burgundy Bubbler
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with slices of lemon, lime and orange, and serve.

name: Buried Treasure
instructions: Pour the amaretto, kahlua coffee liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream, and serve.

name: Burnt Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir, and serve.

name: Buttered Brandy
instructions: Pour the brandy, bourbon whiskey, butterscotch schnapps and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add water if desired, and serve.

name: Buttered Pancakes
instructions: Pour peach schnapps, Captain Morgan spiced rum and Pepsi cola into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Butterflies Cocktail
instructions: Pour the applejack, gin, lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Buttermilk
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a highball glass. Add milk, to taste. Stir well, and serve.

name: Buttermint Delight
instructions: Combine the DeKuyper Buttershots and mint chocolate-chip ice cream in a blender. Add crushed ice if desired. Blend until smooth. Strain over ice cubes in a collins glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Eggnog
instructions: Pour the schnapps into a cocktail glass. Add eggnog, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Kiss
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Truffle Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, butterscotch schnapps and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Buzz Bomb
instructions: Pour the vodka, cognac, benedictine, Cointreau and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with champagne, either completely or to personal taste. Serve.

name: Buzzer
instructions: Pour the whisky, orange juice, raspberry liqueur, lemon juice and 7-Up into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Buzzsaw
instructions: Pour the vodka, citrus juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Byrrh Cassis
instructions: Pour Byrrh and creme de cassis into a wine glass. Add ice cubes, fill with pre-chilled soda water to taste, and serve.

name: Byrrh Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cabaret Martini
instructions: Pour the gin, Dubonnet, Angostura bitters and Pernod into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Cabernet Cobbler
instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water in a large wine glass. Add cracked ice and pour the Cabernet Sauvignon wine. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Cactus Cola
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cafe Antrim
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Byrrh Special
instructions: Stir both ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cafe Au Kirsch
instructions: Combine the kirsch, sugar and egg white in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a wine glass. Fill with coffee, stir, and serve.

name: Cafe Cabana
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cafe Romano
instructions: Pour the sambuca, coffee liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Caitian Tongue Tickler
instructions: Add the pineapple chunks to a highball glass. Pour in grenadine, fill with wine, and serve.

name: California Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, red wine, dark rum and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Calypso Cooler
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, peach schnapps, dark rum, orange juice, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange flag, and serve.

name: Camel Piss
instructions: Pour the beer, tequila, dark rum and ouzo into a highball glass. Top with mountain dew, to taste, and serve.

name: Campari Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka and Campari into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Campari Soda
instructions: Pour the Campari over ice cubes in a highball glass, then fill with sparkling/soda water. Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass, drop it in, and serve.

name: Canadian and Campari
instructions: Pour the whisky, Campari bitters and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Canadian Apple
instructions: Combine the whisky, apple brandy, lemon juice, sugar syrup and cinnamon in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: California Root Beer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Canadian Blackberry
instructions: Pour the whisky, brandy, juices and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Canadian Breeze
instructions: Pour the whisky, pineapple juice, lemon juice and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Canadian Daisy
instructions: Pour the whisky, lemon juice and raspberry syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sparkling water. Float the brandy on top. Garnish with a few raspberries, and serve.

name: Canadian Old-Fashioned
instructions: Shake the whisky, triple sec, angostura bitters and lemon juice with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists.

name: Canado Saludo
instructions: Pour the white rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, grenadine and bitters into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple slice, orange slice and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Canal Street Daisy
instructions: Pour the whisky, orange juice and lemon juice into a collins glass, and stir. Add club soda, to taste. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Candy Rider
instructions: Pour both ingredients over into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Candy Store
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, and pour into a highball glass.

name: Cane Toad
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Add a swizzle stick, and serve.

name: Canadian Cider
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a Irish coffee mug, and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick, and serve.

name: Canadian Killer Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour amaretto, melon liqueur and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add cranberry juice to taste, and stir again. Top with Sprite, to taste, and serve.

name: Cantaloupe Cup
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, garnish with a slice of melon, and serve.

name: Canyon Quake
instructions: Pour the Irish cream, brandy, amaretto and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake very well. Strain into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Cape Breeze
instructions: Pour the coconut rum, juices and sugar into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cape Cod Cooler
instructions: Pour the gins, cranberry juice, lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Sunrise
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum over ice cubes in a highball glass and fill with guava juice. Stir, drizzle grenadine on top, and serve.

name: Captain Al
instructions: Pour the amaretto, spiced rum, cranberry juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes.

name: Captain Pepsi
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Caribbean Champagne
instructions: Pour the white rum and creme de bananes into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and stir lightly. Garnish with a slice of banana, and serve.

name: Caribbean Chat
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de cacao and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add club soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Caribbean Cooler
instructions: Whirl all ingredients together in a blender at low speed for 10 - 15 seconds with 1 cup of crushed ice. Pour into a wine goblet. Garnish with grated coconut and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Caribbean Madras
instructions: Pour the dark rum, orange juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Caribbean Murder
instructions: Pour the Redrum, Malibu rum and Bacardi Limon rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juice, and top with grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Caribbean Romance
instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto, orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and float grenadine on top. Garnish with slices of orange, lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Caribbean Smuggler
instructions: Pour the dark rum, triple sec, orange juice, margarita mix and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda, and stir briefly. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange flag, and serve.

name: Caribe Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel, and serve.

name: Caribou Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli Kafya (a coffee-flavored vodka) into a cocktail glass. Top with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist, add a coffee bean, and serve.

name: Carpet Licker
instructions: Pour the Chardonnay, Midori melon liqueur, Southern Comfort and Dr. Pepper into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with whipped cream, and sprinkle with hundreds and thousands.

name: Caribbean Mist
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Midori melon liqueur, blue curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Top with 7-up, and stir briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple flag, and serve.

name: Carrot Top Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Stoli orange vodka, DeKuyper peach schnapps, triple sec, sour mix, orange juice and grenadine into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Casco Bay Lemonade
instructions: Pour the citrus vodka, sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda. Float a lemon slice on top, and serve.

name: Cave In
instructions: Pour the amaretto, Bacardi 151 and Southern Comfort into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add cranberry juice to taste, and stir again briefly. Add a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Cayman Climax
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice into a collins glass. Top with grenadine, little enough not to be able to taste it distinctly. Stir slightly.

name: Celeste Sunrise
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, strawberry liqueur, advocaat and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with lemonade until frothy. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Cast Away
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add juices, add crushed ice until full, and serve.

name: Centauri Sundown
instructions: Pour the vodka and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with sour mix, to taste, and serve.

name: Chachodaddy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chaise Lounge
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon, Malibu rum, creme de bananes and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chambord and Champagne
instructions: Pour the champagne into a champagne flute. Add a healthy splash of Chambord raspberry liqueur, and serve.

name: Chambord and Cognac
instructions: Heat both ingredients gently. Pour into a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Chambord Colada
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir vigorously, and serve.

name: Chambord Frost
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Chambord Royale
instructions: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur, vodka, pineapple and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sharp Hill Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila, triple sec, orange juice and lime juice into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add Squirt, and a dash of salt. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Chamborlada
instructions: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur, light rum, dark rum, pineapple juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur into a the bottom of a large wine glass. Slowly strain the contents of the cocktail shaker on top of the Chambord, by means of the back of a teaspoon or otherwise, in order to create a second layer. Float a small, further amount of Chambord on top, and serve.

name: Champagne Blitz
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute, stir, and serve.

name: Champagne Cooler
instructions: Pour the brandy and triple sec into a large wine glass. Fill with champagne, or simply add to taste. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Champagne Cup
instructions: Pour the white curacao and cognac into a white wine glass. Add an ice cube, and fill with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Champange Rita
instructions: Pour the tequila and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Add limeade and champagne, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Changuirongo
instructions: Pour the tequila and ginger ale into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Chanticleer
instructions: Pour the gin, lemon juice and raspberry syrup and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chapel Hill
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Champagne Cornucopia
instructions: Pour the cranberry juice into a large red wine glass and set aside. Combine sherbet, vodka, and peach schnapps in a cocktail shaker. Shake until smooth. Pour over cranberry juice to product a swirl effect. Layer champagne on top. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Charleston Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Mandarine Napoleon and cherry brandy into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with lemonade, to taste, and serve.

name: Chatham Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, ginger brandy, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger, and serve.

name: Chekhov Cooler
instructions: Pour the Stoli raspberry vodka, sloe gin, and cranberry-raspberry juice over several ice cubes in a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Add fresh raspberries, garnish with a mint sprig, and serve.

name: Chelsea Sidecar
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Blast
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cherry Gobbler
instructions: Pour the Wild Turkey bourbon whiskey and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Mello Yellow, and serve.

name: Cherry Pucker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of both lime and lemon, and serve.

name: Cherry Raspberry Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into a collins glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Cherry Lifesaver
instructions: Pour both ingredients over a small handful of crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Cherry Repair Kit
instructions: Combine all ingredients together with half a cup or less of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a medium-sized cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cherry Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Vanilla Dr. Pepper
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Chicago Cocktail
instructions: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon and dip in powdered sugar. Pour the brandy, bitters and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Pour into the prepared glass, and serve.

name: Chilly Chocolate Mint
instructions: Pour the dark rum, peppermint schnapps, coconut cream, chocolate syrup and heavy cream into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour as much of the mixture as you can into a hurricane glass, leaving a little room at the top. Top with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Chilly Irishman
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 4 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into parfait glasses, garnish with clover leafs, and serve.

name: Chinese Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chinese Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Choco Banana Smash
instructions: Combine the irish cream, vanilla extract, light cream, vanilla ice cream and banana in a blender with one small scoop of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a slice of banana on a cocktail pick and place across the top, and serve.

name: Chocodka
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir, and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Sherbet
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and freeze overnight. Before serving, break up the frozen mixture and blend until smooth with 2 tbsp. of cold water. Serve with a spoon in a frosted goblet, and serve.

name: Chocolate Almond Cream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Banshee
instructions: Pour the white creme de cacao, banana liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Barkchip
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Chocolate Cloud
instructions: Pour the creme de cacao into a cocktail glass. Carefully layer the blue curacao on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle chocolate shavings across the cream, and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a fresh strawberry, and serve.

name: Chocolate Hurricane
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Adjust amount of milk if desired. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chocolatier Cake
instructions: Chill all ingredients prior. Layer in order into a cocktail glass; creme de cacao first, brandy on top, followed by cream.

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry Daiquiri
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender, and blend well. Pour into a chilled daiquiri/margarita glass, garnish with a chocolate covered strawberry, and serve.

name: Dolly Iced Tea
instructions: Prepare iced tea as per usual or by instructions on can. Add grenadine and bitters to a cocktail glass, and pour in the iced tea mixture. Add vodka. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Fire in the Disco
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and shake vigorously. Ensure the red curry paste is thoroughly dissolved. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Green Demon #2
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a highball glass. Add green hawaiian punch. Stir well, and serve.

name: Green Elevator
instructions: Fill half of an glass an old-fashioned glass with peppermint liqueur. Fill with beer, stir, and serve.

name: Midori Ecstacy
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, rum, blue curacao and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with pineapple juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Rootbeer Piss
instructions: A very sweet tasting licorice and cinnamon flavored drink, good especially for those sugar-holics among us. Rootbeer Piss was found in Tampa, Florida, United States. For a bigger bite, add more Bacardi 151 as needed. Although be warned; adding more Aftershock tends to kill the taste of the rum.

name: Sledgehammer
instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice over into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with Sunny Delight, stir well, and serve.

name: Snake Bite Black GTI
instructions: Pour vodka into a pint glass. Add both cider and lager, and fill with blackcurrant squash. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Melon Roy
instructions: Add Midori melon liqueur to a regular bottle or can of premium lager poured into a pint glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Christina Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, vermouth and Pisang Ambon into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon, stir again, and serve.

name: Christmas Martini
instructions: Pour the gin, dry vermouth and peppermint schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a candy cane, and serve.

name: Chrysanthemum Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vermouth and benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the Pernod, garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Chuhai
instructions: Pour the shochu and soda water into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon juice, and serve. Add lime or orange juice as an optional extra.

name: Church Lady Martini
instructions: Pour the gin, vermouth and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon, lime and orange peels, and serve.

name: Ciao Baby
instructions: Combine all ingredients with two cups of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until slushy, and serve in an elegant glass; hurricane or otherwise.

name: Cider Cup
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan; bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Allow to cool. When cool, strain and chill for several hours. Re-heat one hour before serving, and serve lukewarm.

name: Cinnamon Toast
instructions: Rim an irish coffee cup or glass with sugar and cinnamon. Add hot cider and rum, and serve.

name: Chuck Pucker
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a tall glass. Stir and serve.

name: Citrus Cooler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large, ice-filled hurricane glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lime wheel, and serve.

name: Citrus Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Citrus Neon
instructions: Pour the citrus vodka, blue curacao, Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, top with 7-up, and serve.

name: Citrus Twist on Fire
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Clarity Cocktail
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Classic Cocktail
instructions: Prepare an old-fashioned glass by rubbing a slice of lemon around the rim and dipping it into powdered sugar. Pour the brandy, curacao, maraschino liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into the prepared glass, and serve.

name: Clear Cell
instructions: Pour the lemon vodka, lemon rum, tequila and gin into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Cloister
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Citrus Mist Colada
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender; blend until thick. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cloud 99
instructions: Mix the banana, peach, and strawberry schnapps. Shake and strain into a double shot glass. Add a drop of grenadine and let it sink to the bottom. Add a splash of orange juice and let it swirl. If done properly, it will look like a cloudy sunset, hence the name.

name: Club Haus
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Coco Amor
instructions: Pour the Cocoribe, amaretto almond liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Coco Loco
instructions: Pour the rums, vodka, creme de bananes, pineapple juice, coconut cream and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Coco Loco #2
instructions: Saw off the top of the coconut and pour the coconut water into a glass. Add one cup of crushed ice to the coconut and pour in all the other ingredients (including the coconut water). Squeeze in a half lime, and drop the shell in. Stir well. Add a straw and a paper umbrella, and serve.

name: Coco-Mocha Alexander
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Coconut Climber
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with toasted coconut, and serve.

name: Coconut Colada
instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well for 10-15 seconds. Pour into a pina colada glass, garnish with a pineapple spear, and serve.

name: Coconut Shell
instructions: Drain the coconuts and save the liquid. Scoop out the flesh and place in a blender. Add white rum, creme de bananes and milk. Add 3-4 oz. of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour back into the coconut shells. Add more milk (if needed) until a nice consistancy.

name: Coconut Tequila
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Pour into a medium-sized cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cognac Coupling
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashined glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Coke Sucker
instructions: Pour the rum into a beer mug half-filled with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur, half-and-half and Coca-Cola. Stir lightly, and serve.

name: Cold Deck Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cold Green Slime
instructions: Pour the Surge and vodka into a collins glass. Add a few ice cubes, and stir well. Add the sugar gradually while sitrring carefully, and serve.

name: Coffee Egg Nog
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a collins glass, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Coffee Old-Fashioned
instructions: Dissolve the instant coffee in the water in an old-fashioned glass. Gradually stir in the sugar, the bitters and the bourbon whiskey. Add ice, and top with club soda. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Cold Comfort Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Cold Kiss
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Colony Club Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Colorado Motherfucker
instructions: Pour the tequila, coffee liqueur and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk, and serve.

name: Colorado Skies
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Columbia Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Come to Me
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Comfortable Brother
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw
instructions: Pour the vodka, southern comfort and peach schnapps into a highball glass. Fill mostly with orange juice, and serve.

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
instructions: Pour the vodka, southern comfort, peach schnapps and galliano into a highball glass. Fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Comfortably Numb
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with/without a couple of ice cubes, and serve.

name: Commando Cocktail
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, triple sec, pernod and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Concoction Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Coney Island Baby
instructions: Pour the peppermint schnapps and brown creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, slowly fill with soda water, and serve.

name: Connie Cola
instructions: Pour the vodka and DeKuyper Cheri-Beri Pucker schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola, preferably chilled, and serve.

name: Cool Carlos
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except curacao) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and float curacao on top. Garnish with pineapple and orange slices and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cool Operator
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender half-filled with ice. Blend until thick. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a melon wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cool Yule Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Coronado Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cosmic Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass. Drop in two maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Cosmo
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cossack Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cotillion Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Count Currey
instructions: Pour gin and sugar together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and strain over ice cubes in a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Count Stroganoff
instructions: Pour the vodka, creme de cacao and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Country and Western Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Add half a cup of crushed ice, and blend well. Pour into a red wine glass, and serve.

name: Courage Cocktail
instructions: Pour the amaretto, Southern Comfort, Malibu rum and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add juices. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cowboy Cocktail
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cracked Chandelier
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of both lemon and lime, and serve.

name: Crackhead Slammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cranapple Cocktail
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Cranberry Kiss #2
instructions: Pour the rum, peppermint schnapps, collins mix and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cranberry Zambonee
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Cransoma
instructions: Pour DeKuyper wild strawberry liqueur, Finlandia cranberry vodka, Soho liqueur and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a hurricane glass. Fill with Schweppes Russian. Garnish with a stick of cucumber, a maraschino cherry, a slice of lemon and pineapple leaves.

name: Crapton
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Crazy Finn
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cosmotequila
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Crazy Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Crazy Parrot
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cream Puff
instructions: Pour the rum, light cream and powdered sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with club soda, and serve.

name: Creamy Sex on the Beach
instructions: Pour the vodka, Malibu rum, peach schnapps, pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the whipped cream, and shake vigorously until frothy. Pour into a small highball glass or equivalent, and serve.

name: Creamy Vodkanilla
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Creme de Cafe
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Creme de Gin
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Creole Lady
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with both a red and green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Crimson Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Float port on top, and serve.

name: Crimson Sunset
instructions: Pour the gin and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and float port on top. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cruiser Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Crusta
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuban Breeze
