instructions: Pour vodka and creme de almond into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Breeze #2
instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cuban Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cuban Screw
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Cuban Sour
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuff and Buttons
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Culloden
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute, stir, and serve.

name: Culross
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cum in a Blender
instructions: Pour the milk into a blender with some crushed ice. Add the white chocolate liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur, whiskey, Pepsi and banana. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Cum in your Mouth
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuntrat Supreme
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Curielle
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a slightly chilled red wine glass. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Currant Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cutty Cobbler
instructions: Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large wine glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, a slice of orange and a sprig of mint.

name: Cutty Collins
instructions: Combine the Cutty Sark whisky, lemon juice and sugar in a highball glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda, and stir again briefly. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Cutty Rickey
instructions: Pour the whisky and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda, and stir again briefly. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cyclone Attack
instructions: Layer both ingredients in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cynar Biere
instructions: Pour the Cynar and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill with beer, stir, and serve.

name: Czarina
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daffy Duck
instructions: Combine ingredients in a wine glass, and serve.

name: Daily Double C
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Daily Mail
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a lowball or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Blossom
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daiquiri Liberal
instructions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daisy Dueller
instructions: Shake the tennessee whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill to taste with club soda. Garnish with fruit slices, and serve.

name: Dalton
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes.

name: Dandy Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of both lemon and orange peel, and serve.

name: Danish Gin Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry heering, kirsch, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Gently stir in the soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Danish Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Daphrine Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, curacao and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda, to taste, and serve.

name: Darb Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dark Destroyer
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dark Lagoon
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and grenadine into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple-flavored wine, to taste, and stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: Datsun Cocktail
instructions: Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Tia Maria coffee liqueur, Cointreau and milk to a blender. Blend for 5 seconds, and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice. Layer whipped cream on top, garnish with a half-strawberry, and serve.

name: Daydream Martini
instructions: Stir ingredients together well in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Daytona Daydream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Daytona Rolling Thunder
instructions: As the name suggests, this cocktail is an ideal drink for sitting back and watching the Daytona 500.

name: Dead Budgie
instructions: Pour the coconut rum, banana liqueur, orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine around the inside edge of the glass, and serve.

name: Dead Hand
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Dead Pirate Seaspray
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Death by Chocolate
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Deceiver
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir briefly, and serve.

name: DeeDee Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, cranberry juice, maraschino liqueur, lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with gin-infused cranberries, and serve.

name: Deep Blue Something
instructions: Mix the vodka, peach schnapps and Red Bull together in a collins glass. Add a small amount of curacao until the mixture is a deep green. Add some ice, and pour the remainder of the curacao down the side of the glass to leave a blue layer at the base of the glass.

name: Deep Sea Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Deep Sea Martini
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Deep Sea Sex

name: Derby Special
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Desert Martini
instructions: The driest Martini cocktail in the world.

name: Detroit Daisy

name: Diamond Head

name: Diki-Diki

name: Dirty Apple

name: Dirty Vodka Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dolores
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Don Roberto

name: Douglas Martini

Shake the Stoli vodka with ice for at least 20 seconds. Pour into the chilled cocktail glass, garnish with two grapes, and serve.

instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Down Under
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Dreamsicle Delight

name: Dreamy Monkey

name: Drink of the Gods
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Drive Away
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dr. Pecker

instructions: Mix ingredients to taste in a highball glass.

instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Eager Beaver

name: Eagle Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a wine glass, and serve.

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Dutch Trade Winds
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Healthy Eggnog

name: El Bano
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and top with tonic water. Stir briefly. Garnish with half of a Twix chocolate bar.

name: Eldorado
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Electric Lizard
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Elf Tea
instructions: Pour the peppermint liqueur and iced tea into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and sweeten to taste. Squeeze the juice from half a lemon over the top, and serve.

name: Elixir de Menthe
instructions: Allow the mint sprigs to infuse for 2-3 minutes in a saucepan with the boiling water. Add the honey and stir well. Allow to cool. Once cooled, filter the mixture into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Embryo Cocktail
instructions: Pour the half-and-half into the middle of the peppermint schnapps in a chilled cocktail glass. Drop in the grenadine, and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Embassy Royal
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Empire Glory
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Endurance

name: English Bolo

name: Enigma
instructions: Pour the rum, vodka, triple sec, Southern Comfort and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of orange juice and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine. Stir well, and serve.

name: Everglade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Evil Blue Thing
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Excitabull

name: Exorcist Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Easy Creamsicle
instructions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain or pour completely into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Face First
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fair and Warmer Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, sweet vermouth and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Falcon Eddy
instructions: Pour the gin and vodka into a cocktail glass. Add sugar, and stir thoroughly. When dissolved, add the peppermint schnapps, and serve.

name: Fancy Free

name: Fare Thee Well
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fare Thee Well Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fat Titties

name: Fickle Pickle

name: Fiorenza

name: Fire Engine with Alarm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: Fire in the Sky

Do the same with the Tia Maria coffee liqueur, strawberry liqueur, and finally the cream. Add shaved ice. Fill a straw with grenadine and, after placing the straw on the base of the glass, release. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles, and serve.

name: Fire Starter
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: First Love
instructions: Pour the champagne, gin, sugar and cherry heering into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: First Nighter
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, and serve.

name: Five Green Brothers

name: Fucking Hot
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir briefly and serve.

name: Fuck Me Sideways

name: Flame of Love

name: Flaming Ferrari
instructions: Pour the rums into an old-fashioned glass. Seperately, pour the blue curacao into a double-shot glass. Ignite the rum mixture (use extreme caution) and suck with a straw; at the same time pour the blue curacao into the glass and finish.

name: Flaming Gay Morgan

Strain into a highball glass, and garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry. If desired, float the Bacardi 151 on top of the drink and ignite (use extreme caution). Extinguish before serving.

name: Flaming Layrnx
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Flamingo Rita
instructions: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Blend until frothy. Pour into a tall glass with a flamingo stirring stick or straw, and serve.

name: Flapper
instructions: Pour the rum and vermouth into a cocktail glass. Sweeten to taste. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Flashback
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Flip a Pack

name: Floradora Cooler

name: Florida Freeze

name: Florida Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Floyd Collins
instructions: Pour the vodka, coconut rum and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add soda. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Fluffy Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rums and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flying Bull
instructions: Pour the rums and Red Bull into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Top with orange juice, to taste. Stir well, and serve.

name: Flying Cow
instructions: Add liquors and banana to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Add cream to taste. Blend until smooth. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Flying Fortress
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flying Grapefruit
instructions: Pour the rum, vodka, cranberry juice and lemon juice into a sugar-frosted highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the cranberry juice, then the vermouth, and serve.

name: Flying Purple Squirrel
instructions: Combine the rums, curacao, grenadine and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime, and serve.

name: Foghorn
instructions: Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale. Add half a lime, first squeezed over then dropped in. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fondling Fool
instructions: Pour the brandy, madeira wine and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Four Wheeler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one scoop (half a cup) of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fraises Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, strawberry liqueur, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Add soda water, and garnish with a strawberry and a twist of lemon peel.

name: Frangelico and Chocolate
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a mug of hot chocolate, stir briefly and serve.

name: Franko Ra
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: FrazzleBerry
instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger beer, add a splash of lime juice, and serve.

name: French Fantasy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: French Foam
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Add a dusting of lemon or orange sherbet on top, and serve.

name: French Fry
instructions: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur, triple sec, lime juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: French Green Dragon
instructions: Pour the cognac and green chartreuse into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Orgasm
instructions: Pour the cognac into a brandy glass. Add irish cream, and serve unstirred.

name: French Style Pernod
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Fretful Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an olive, and serve.

name: Frigid Hairy Virgin
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frog Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Frosted Apple
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a frosted collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Frosty Dawn
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Frosty Lay
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cranberries and a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Frosty Nog
instructions: Combine the eggnog and sugar in a blender. Blend at medium speed, slowly adding 3 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and frosty. Pour into a parfait glass, and garnish with almond slivers and a dusting of nutmeg.

name: Frosty Noggin
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a few drops of green creme de menthe and a rolled cookie, and serve.

name: Froupe Cocktail
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail glass, stir and serve.

name: Frozen Cappuccino
instructions: Combine the liqueurs, ice cream and cream in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Frozen Citron Neon
instructions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur, blue curacao and lime juice into a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Domingo
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until puree-consistency. Pour into a parfait glass, garnish with a pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Frozen Fuzzy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/3 cup of crushed ice. Blend on low for 5 seconds then on high until firm. Pour into a cocktail glass, garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Frozen Martini
instructions: Place both ingredients, a cocktail shaker, a cocktail glass and 2 almond-stuffed olives in a freezer for approximately 4 hours. Remove when ready. Pour the gin and vermouth into the chilled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the 2 almond-stuffed olives, and serve.

name: Frozen Steppes
instructions: Pour ingredients over finely shaven ice in a parfait glass, and stir well. Garnish with a slices of fruit, and serve.

name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
instructions: Pour the rum and lemon juice and sugar into a champagne saucer with some shaved ice. Stir well. Garnish with 4 strawberries, sliced or otherwise, and serve.

name: Frozen Tequila Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with finely shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fruitbooty 69
instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir extremely well, and serve.

name: Fruit Daiquiri
instructions: Pour the rum, creme de cacao and one cup of crushed ice into a blender. Add the fruit liqueur and peeled fruit, to your choosing (use the same flavor for both) and blend well. Pour into an exotic glass; hurricane or equivalent, and serve.

name: Frozen Pine
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/4 cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth, and transfer to a tulip glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Fruit Explosion
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender, and blend well. Pour over finely shaven ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of banana, and serve.

name: Fruit Margarita
instructions: Add the tequila, triple sec, sour mix and fruit (choose one fruit) to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Fruit Milkshake
instructions: Pour the orange juice, grapefruit juice, milk, sugar and vanilla extract into a blender with 2 oz of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a highball glass, add a straw, and serve.

name: Fruitopia Snap
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper sour apple and watermelon pucker into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach schnapps and Malibu rum, and shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend at low speed. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with raspberries, and serve.

name: Fruity Fuck
instructions: Pour the banana liqueur, dark rum, Midori melon liqueur, peach schnapps, creme de cassis and grenadine into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice, garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Fruity Slut
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fruity Smash
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass. Garnish with maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Fruity Toad
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fudgesicle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Full House
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps, Kahlua coffee liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a 10-12 oz highball glass. Fill with 7-up. Stir, and serve.

name: Funky Garlic
instructions: Chill all ingredients prior to serving. Pour into a highball glass, and stir well.

name: Furry Purple Squirrel
instructions: Pour the rums, blue curacao, grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime with an almond embedded in it. Pour the dash of coconut rum to finish, and serve.

name: Futurity
instructions: Pour the gin and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the angostura bitters, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bear
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass with 1 1/2 oz of crushed ice. Pour the cola and milk simultaneously until full, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Charlie
instructions: Pour the dark rum, creme de bananes, coconut cream and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and top with ginger ale. Garnish with a pineapple spear, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Cola
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cola, stir well, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Evil
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well, strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Fruity Brain Blitzer
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, raspberry liqueur, triple sec and everclear into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-up, and stir well.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass, stir, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Melon
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

instructions: Pour both ingredients, in equal parts, into a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Electric Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Gangsta Colada
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass with/without crushed ice, and serve.

name: Grape Ape #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gummy Sharks
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff vanilla vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with Pepsi Blue, stir well, and serve.

name: Hallenbeck Punch
instructions: Leave the rainbow sorbet in a fridge for a few hours to allow to melt and add to a 5-gallon sports cooler container (the kind that stand up and have a spout on the bottom). Add all other ingredients. Shake it up good before serving to a healthy amount of party guests.

name: Hennessy and Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add vanilla coke, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Hennessy and Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add cherry coke, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Irish Redhead
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jackknife
instructions: Pour the Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with canned pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Ladybug
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Laurie Goes Hawaiian
instructions: Pour the Stoli flavored vodkas, Malibu rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of fresh pineapple, and serve.

name: Little Eva
instructions: Pour the Burgundy wine, triple sec, and lime (or lemon) juice over ice in a white wine glass. Stir, and add the soda. Stir again gently, and serve.

name: Lunchbox Lemonade
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes (or pre-chill ingredients), stir well, and serve.

name: Madison Lemonade
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher. Mix together. Serve into collins glasses.

name: Malibu Barbie
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Malibu Summer Splash
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Monkey Island
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nutty Club
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Old Sunkist
instructions: Pour both ingredients over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #4
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup, and serve.

name: Orange Rush Shots
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into 4 seperate shot glasses. Color should be light orange.

name: Puerto Rican Popper
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon and Passoa into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with cranberry juice, and stir well. Splash with champagne, and serve.

name: Rainbow Orgy
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, strawberry liqueur and banana liqueur into a cocktail shaker one-third filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour entire contents into a highball glass. Top with orange juice, and serve.

name: Raspberry Tiki Twist Punch
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Red Headed Leg Spreader
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Russian Mountain Dew
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass with 3 or 4 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Russian Rose
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Salt Lick
instructions: Pour ingredients into a white wine glass filled with ice cubes and rimmed with salt. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Shello
instructions: Word to the wise; this recipe requires a quality sherry in order to succeed and *not* cooking sherry.

name: Six Chicks
instructions: A quite refreshing cocktail for those hot, humid days. Six Chicks was invented in Richmond, Indiana at Earlham College (a dry campus) by Andrew Wardenaar.

name: Sweetheart
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Golden Trailer Martini
instructions: Shake the Skyy vodka and Goldschlager in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange peel, and serve.

name: Tijuana Bulldog
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vanilla Ale
instructions: Pour the ginger ale and vanilla drops over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vodka Amaretto Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: William Wallace
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Kampai Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, pineapple juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Kangaroo Kicker
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Karamozov Koffee
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or serve in a tall glass with iced coffee and with/without cream.

name: Karma Killer
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec and peach brandy into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juices, stir well, and serve.

name: Kelly-K
instructions: Pour the vodka and Campari into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with soda, stir well, and serve.

name: Kentucky Blizzard
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

name: Kentucky Cocktail
instructions: Shake both ingredients together with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Key Lime Quencher
instructions: Combine all ingredients with 12-oz. (1 1/2 cups) of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a 16-oz hurricane or specialty glass. Garnish with a lime wheel, sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs, and serve.

name: Key West Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the vodka into a frozen highball glass, and add the lime juice. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Kicking Cow
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Killer Kool-Aid
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Serve, unstirred.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add a straw, and serve.

name: Kim-Berry
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: King Cole Cocktail
instructions: Muddle the orange slice, pineapple slice and powdered sugar in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the Scotch whisky, 2 ice cubes, and stir.

name: Kingston
instructions: Shake ingredients together with crushed or shaved ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kinky Russian
instructions: Pour the coffee liqueur and the coconut rum over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with half and half cream, stir, and serve.

name: Kirsch and Cassis
instructions: Pour the creme de cassis and kirsch into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain over 2 ice cubes in a wine glass. Add soda water to taste, and serve.

name: Kiss Me Slow
instructions: Stir ingredients together into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Kiss on the Lips #2
instructions: Stir ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Kiwi-Berry Boat Drink
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker until ice cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Kleinfeld
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Klingon Koffee
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice, and serve.

name: Knickerbocker Special
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a small slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Kokomo Joe
instructions: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Kon Tiki
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, and serve.

name: Klingon Battlejuice
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Kooch
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion, and serve.

name: Kooky Boa
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Kremlin
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Kung Fu Kicker
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Indispensable Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Kyoto
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a melon ball, and serve.

name: La Brea Tar Pit
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or lowball glass, and serve.

name: Laguna
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Lake Breeze
instructions: Pour the coconut liqueur, cranberry juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda, garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: La Pussy
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: L.A. Sunrise
instructions: Pour the vodka, creme de bananes, orange juice and pineapple juice into a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Float rum on top. Garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry, and serve.

name: Leaning Tower
instructions: Pour the gin, vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Krazy Carl
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: La Bomba Negra
instructions: Pour the rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cubed or cracked ice. Add the sugar, and squeeze in the juice from the lime. Shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lebanese Snow
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice until smooth. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Left Handed Screwdriver
instructions: Pour the vodka and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Le Grand Sunset
instructions: Pour the vodka and grand marnier over ice cubes in a highball glass. Almost fill with orange juice. Dribble with grenadine. Shake gently to mix, and serve.

name: Lei Lani
instructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, pineapple juice, papaya juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine, and stir well. Top with soda water. Garnish with a fruit flag or pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Le Margarita des Artistes
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker without ice. Shake well to froth. Strain into a chilled and salted cocktail glass or small margarita glass, and serve.

name: Lemmings Leap
instructions: Pour the vodka, Malibu rum and gin into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Float orange juice on top, and serve.

name: Lemon Joe
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Absolut Citron vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Lemon Sherry Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange slice, and serve.

name: Lemon Twist
instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Lemony Summer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Lemon Mint
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Leviathan
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lychee Nut Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, and blend well. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Lickalotapuss
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper watermelon pucker and 7-up into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Lace with amaretto, and serve.

name: Lick and a Promise
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Cointreau, cranberry juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle Midori melon liqueur on top, and serve.

name: Licorice Mist
instructions: Combine the sambuca, coconut liqueur and cream with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a parfait glass. Use a black licorice stick, ends cut off, as a straw, and serve.

name: Licorice Stick
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lightning Rod
instructions: Pour both ingredients over a few ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Lilly Pad
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice, and stir well. Float the blue curacao on top. Cut a lime slice in the shape of a lilly pad and place on top, placing a small gummy frog candy on top of that to finish, and serve.

name: Lime Lambada
instructions: Pour the lime liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola, and serve.

name: Limestone Cocktail
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add collins mix, and stir well. Add lime juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Limey Cocktail
instructions: Blend ingredients together with 3-oz of crushed ice in a blender for 10-20 seconds. Strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sliver of lime, and serve.

name: Limon Collins
instructions: Stir the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and lemon juice together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Limongrad
instructions: Pour the lemon vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Limonita
instructions: Pour the Stoli Limonnaya vodka, triple sec and lemon juice into a mixing glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with salt, and serve.

name: Limon Sunrise
instructions: Pour the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and orange juice into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Slowly add grenadine, stir gently, and serve.

name: Linux Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, garnish with lime peel, and serve.

name: Lipstick Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a small frosted hurricane glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Lift
instructions: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur, Drambuie and Tia Maria into a coffee mug. Fill with coffee, and top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Liquid Kryptonite
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Liquid Lite
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lime flag, and serve.

name: Liquid Nerds
instructions: Add the Stoli raspberry vodka, 7-Up and Coca-cola to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Liquid Panty Remover
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Little Bastard
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Little Devil
instructions: Pour the gin, rum, triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Loco Lemonade
instructions: Pour in order; tequila, grenadine then lemonade into a highball glass with 4 ice cubes. Squeeze the lemon juice from roughly half a lemon over the top, and serve.

name: Loco Motion
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, DeKuyper Razzmatazz and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well, pour entire contents of the shaker into a highball glass, and serve.

name: London Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, orange bitters, simple syrup and maraschino liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Lonely Night

name: Long Walk off a Short Pier
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a tall 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Coca-cola, completely or to taste. Stir well, and serve.

name: Look Out Below
instructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum, lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Lorraine Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Kirschwasser, benedictine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Louisiana Lullaby
instructions: Stir the rum, Dubonnet and Grand Marnier together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a sliver of lemon, and serve.

name: Louisville Lady
instructions: Combine the bourbon whiskey, white creme de cacao and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Louisville Cooler
instructions: Pour the bourbon whiskey, orange juice, lime juice and powdered sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a half-slice of orange, and serve.

name: Lounge Lizard
instructions: Pour the rum and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with chilled cola, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Love Birds
instructions: Pour the vodka, sour mix, dark rum and grenadine into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Love Bite
instructions: Pour the cherry liqueur into a cocktail glass. Layer the parfait amour on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon. Top with cream, and serve.

name: Love in an Elevator
instructions: Pour the gin and green curacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass, Fill with soda, and serve.

name: Love Potion #69
instructions: Pour the coconut rum and peach schnapps into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice, and fill with cranberry juice. Splash rum on top, and serve.

name: Low Tide Martini
instructions: Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and clam juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with a smoked clam. Also add a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Lulu
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec, white rum, amaretto, peach schnapps, sour mix and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne saucer or medium-sized cocktail glass. Add a splash of grenadine, add a straw, and serve.

name: Lumpy Lime
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lumumba
instructions: Stir ingredients together briefly in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Lunar Landing
instructions: Stir ingredients together well in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Lunch Bucket
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a pint glass, and serve.

name: Macaroon
instructions: Pour the vodka, chocolate liqueur and amaretto into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: MacLaren F1
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mad Bomber
instructions: Pour the gin into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, stir well, and serve.

name: Maddress
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the juices, stir briefly, and serve.

name: Mad Melon Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Magic Mountain Dew
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with mountain dew, stir briefly and serve.

name: Magic Trick
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Magnolia Blossom
instructions: Pour the gin, cream and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Magnolia Maiden
instructions: Shake the bourbon, Grand Marnier and simple syrup together with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with soda, and serve.

name: Maier Special
instructions: Pour the vodka, blackberry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mainbrace
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: MacArthur Cocktail
instructions: Shake the rums, triple sec and egg white together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #2
instructions: Pour the white rum, orgeat syrup, triple sec and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #3
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass with a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #4
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and strain into a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mai Tai Mai
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, apricot liqueur, pineapple juice and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the soda, stir gently, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #5
instructions: Combine all ingredients (sugar to taste) in a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mai Tai #6
instructions: Pour the rums, orgeat and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Malibu Cherry
instructions: Stir ingredients together with 3 or 4 ice cubes in a highball glass. Add 2 or 3 maraschino cherries, and serve.

name: Malibu Heaven
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Malmaison
instructions: Pour the white rum, cream sherry and fresh lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with anisette, and serve.

name: Mamie Taylor
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Magic Spritzer
instructions: Stir ingredients over crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Make Believe
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a mint leaf, and serve.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mango Daiquiri
instructions: Combine the rum, orange curacao, mango pieces and sour mix in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Pour into a tall glass, garnish with a mango stick and serve.

name: Mango Margarita
instructions: Shake the tequila, mango liqueur and lime juice with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mango Sunrise
instructions: Pour the mango liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, and top with grenadine. Serve unstirred.

name: Mangotini
instructions: Pour the vodka, Cointreau and Snapple mango madness into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maraschino Cherry
instructions: Pour the rum, amaretto, peach schnapps, juices and grenadine into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass, and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mardi Gras Flasher
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with/without ice. Add more grenadine if desired, stir again and serve.

name: Maria-Rocker

name: Maraschino Collins
instructions: Pour the vodka, fresh lemon juice and sweetened maraschino juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a tall glass (12-16 oz) half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry. Add a teaspoon of sugar optional. Serve.

name: Mango Mosa
instructions: Pour the mango liqueur and mango juice into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, garnish with a slice of star-fruit, and serve.

name: Manila Flame
instructions: Pour the Manila dark rum, juices, passion-fruit nectar and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a pilsner glass, and serve.

name: Marionette
instructions: Pour the rum, cherry heering, apricot brandy and sake into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mariposa
instructions: Pour the rum, brandy, lemon juice, orange juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maritime Martini
instructions: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive, and serve.

name: Marmalade Highball
instructions: Pour the curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Martini Milano
instructions: Pour the gin, dry vermouth, dry white wine and Campari bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Martini Navratilova
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Martunia
instructions: Shake all three ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an edible flower, and serve.

name: Mary Elizabeth Wagoner
instructions: Shake the vodka, rum, everclear and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, add lime juice on top and serve.

name: Mashed Kermit
instructions: Prepare vodka jelly as on the packet of jello, however substitute vodka in place of the water (required additional vodka to above). Mix the above liquids; vodka, blue curacao and orange juice in a highball glass. Drop a lump of the prepared jelly into the glass, and down the entire drink.

name: Masterblaster
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Matador Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy, adding more ice if required. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Matti Nyknen
instructions: Shake the vodka, lemon juice and sugar with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Maui Breeze
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear, a cherry and an orchid, and serve.

name: Maui Eruption
instructions: Pour the Maui schnapps and Malibu rum into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Maurice Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ma Wee Hen
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Maxi-Pad
instructions: Stir all ingredients together over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Max the Silent
instructions: Pour the anejo rum, brandy, Applejack brandy and anisette into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mayan Whore
instructions: Pour the tequila into a cocktail glass. Add the pineapple juice, top with soda and float the grenadine on top. Serve unstirred, with a straw.

name: Mellow Yellow
instructions: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Melon Fever
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, triple sec and cream in order into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Melon Island
instructions: Combine the vodka, pisang ambon, passion-fruit liqueur, vanilla ice cream and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, slice of lemon and mint sprig, and serve.

name: Melon Patch
instructions: Stir the melon liqueur, triple sec and vodka together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda, garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Melon Spritz
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with soda, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Mexican Dew
instructions: Pour the tequila into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Mountain Dew, stir gently and serve.

name: Mexican Dream
instructions: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur, milk and ice cream in a blender. Blend until milk-like consistency. Pour into a hurricane glass, add straws, and serve.

name: Mexican Grasshopper
instructions: Shake the green creme de menthe, Kahlua coffee liqueur and light cream with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Midget
instructions: Pour the gin, tequila and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranapple juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Mexican Riptide
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mexican Screw
instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Miami Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white rum, creme de menthe and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Miami Meloni
instructions: Pour the white rum, melon liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Midnight Cocktail
instructions: Pour the apricot brandy, triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Midnight Express
instructions: Pour the dark rum, Cointreau, lime juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Midnight Liaison
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, parfait amour and lastly the lemonade into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Drop in the grenadine at the side of the glass so that it sinks to the bottom, and serve.

name: Mexican Iced Tea
instructions: Pour the tequila and Corono lager into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Midnight Sun
instructions: Pour the vodka, Cointreau, apricot brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne saucer or small wine glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Midori Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a champagne saucer. Top with champagne, and serve.

name: Midori Dream
instructions: Pour the vodka and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with chilled Sprite, stir gently and serve.

name: Midori Illusion
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur, vodka, Bacardi white rum, Cointeau, blue curacao and pineapple juice (to taste) into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Midori Mai Tai
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Midweek Tweak
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Mike Davis
instructions: Pour the gin into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Combine the grenadine, sugar and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into the collins glass. Add club soda, stir gently, and serve.

name: Milano Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, galliano and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Millennium Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Beefeater gin, cherry brandy, orange juice and ginger ale into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Minnesota Slammer
instructions: Layer the cherry brandy, peach schnapps and apple schnapps in a large hurricane glass. Add sour mix on top, fill the remainder with Sprite, and serve.

name: Mint Chip
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Mint Highball
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Mississippi Mud
instructions: Combine the Southern Comfort, coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend until smooth, and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings, and serve.

name: Miss Pastore
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Campari bitters, Angostura bitters, orange juice, superfine sugar and lemon juice into a highball glass rimmed with sugar and lemon. Stir vigorously, and serve.

name: Mind Bender
instructions: Pour the vodka, amaretto and Sprite into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, and stir. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Mist and Cola
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mist Cream
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mistea
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a glass mug. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Mist Iced Tea
instructions: Add the Canadian Mist whisky and lemon juice to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the iced tea, splash lemon-lime soda, and serve.

name: Mocha Blanca Martini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a chocolate curl, and serve.

name: Mofo Cocktail
instructions: Layer ingredients in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moles Juice
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Southern Comfort and blue curacao into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Add sour mix and pineapple juice according to personal tastes, and serve.

name: Molester Cocktail
instructions: Stir the rum, vodka, watermelon schnapps and hawaiian schnapps together in a wine goblet filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of 7-up and sour mix, and serve.

name: Moll Flanders Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, sloe gin, dry vermouth and Angostura bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mongolian
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mongolian Dingbat
instructions: Combine the Bacardi white rum, Tia Maria coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Monkey Cum
instructions: Combine the milk and half-banana in a blender for several seconds until only slightly lumpy. Add the vodka and blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass, add a straw and serve.

name: Monkey Doo
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Monkey Madness
instructions: Combine the Jose Cuervo gold tequila, rum, vodka, banana juice and 4 slices of banana (about 1/4) in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass, add the creme de cassis, and serve.

name: Moog Patrol Swisher
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum, Safari liqueur, Cointreau, blue curacao and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Fill with chilled pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Monongahela Cobbler
instructions: Place the icing sugar in a tumbler with some thin parings of orange and lemon peels. Fill 1/3 of the glass with shaved ice and add bourbon whiskey to taste. Stir and garnish with fruit and 2 straws.

name: More Sunshine
instructions: Stir the gin and creme de cassis together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, stir again and serve.

name: Morgan Madras
instructions: Pour the spiced rum, orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Morir Sonando
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Morning Cocktail
instructions: Pour the brandy, dry vermouth, triple sec, maraschino, anisette and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Morning Wood
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Sink the blackberry liqueur by pouring it at the side of the glass, thus forming a layer at the bottom. Serve.

name: Moscow Bobsled
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Moscow Chill
instructions: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) into a champagne saucer filled with shaved ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Moulin Rouge Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mozart Cocktail
instructions: Pour the anejo rum, sweet vermouth, triple sec and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a twist of lemon, and serve.

name: Mr. Manhattan Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, orange juice, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 4 sprigs of mint, and serve.

name: Mr. New Yorker
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mrs. Taylors
instructions: Pour the gin, Lillet and triple sec into a red wine glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a burnt orange peel, and serve unstirred.

name: Mt. Jack
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir and serve.

name: Muddy Water
instructions: Pour the amaretto, orange juice and lemon juice in order into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mud Fuck
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Muff Rider
instructions: Pour the sake, white rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with lemon soda, and serve.

name: Mount Fuji
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Mug Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Mulatto Russian
instructions: Pour the vodka and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with light cream, add chocolate syrup to taste, and serve.

name: Mumbai Bombshell
instructions: Pour the cherry brandy, Malibu rum, cognac and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Muscovy Martini
instructions: Pour the Stoli cinnamon vodka (Zinamon), Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj), triple sec and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel, first squeezing it over the drink then dropping it on top. Sprinkle a bit of ground cinnamon over the top, and serve.

name: Muskmelon
instructions: Combine the dark rum, pieces of cantaloupe melon, lime juice, orange juice and sugar with 1/3 cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend well until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of cantaloupe, and serve.

name: Mustang Ranch Freebie
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute filled with shaven ice, and serve.

name: Mutagen
instructions: Pour the dark rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Add cream to taste. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: My Pleasure
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Mulled Claret
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Pour into a mug, and serve.

name: Myrtle Bank Punch
instructions: Pour the dark rum, grenadine, lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with cherry brandy. Garnish with slice of lime, and serve.

name: My Sweet Midori
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, squeeze in the juice from 2 or 3 lime wedges, and serve.

name: Nadir Cocktail
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Nadir Blue
instructions: Pour the gin, cherry brandy, lemon juice, strawberry syrup, grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and fill with soda water. Pour the blue curacao into the middle. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Naked Lady
instructions: Pour the white rum, sweet vermouth, apricot brandy, grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Naked Pretzel
instructions: Pour the vodka, melon liqueur, creme de cassis and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Naked Sunburn
instructions: Pour the melon liqueur, Malibu rum and creme de noyaux into a hurricane glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the 7-Up and sour mix. Fill with equal parts of pineapple and cranberry juice, to taste, and serve.

name: Nappy Rash
instructions: Pour the rye whiskey, spiced rum, peach schnapps and grapefruit juice into a blender. Add the iced tea powder mix, and 1/4 of an orange (including peel and rind). Blend very well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nantucket Cocktail
instructions: Pour the white brandy, cranberry juice and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Blue Ninja
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Closure
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake gently, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Golden Goose
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Beer Rose
instructions: Stir ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Malibu Rum Rusher
instructions: Combine the Malibu coconut, pineapple and mango rum with the orange juice and grenadine in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy; add more ice if required. Pour into a pina-colada glass, and serve.

name: Maple Syrup Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with cracked ice. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Paloma
instructions: Pour the tequila into a salt-rimmed collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Splash lime juice on top, and serve.

name: Sailor Jerry Butter Rum
instructions: Pour the Sailor Jerry spiced rum, DeKuyper Buttershots liqueur, Smirnoff vanilla vodka and Jones cream soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Strawberry Ice
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Vegas Lemon Drop Martini
instructions: Slice the 1/4 lemon into two seperate wedges. Place in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour the Absolut Citron into the shaker, and add one teaspoon of sugar. Shake vigorously. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Nassau Paul
instructions: Combine the white rum, Cointreau, lemon juice, egg white and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: National Cocktail
instructions: Pour the rum, apricot brandy, pineapple juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nasty Cocktail
instructions: Pour the vodka, Kahlua coffee liqueur, Wild turkey whiskey, brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Necrophiliac
instructions: Pour the vodka, rums, melon liqueur and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Neon Neutron
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Neutered Purple Squirrel
instructions: Pour the light rum, dark rum, blue curacao, grenadine and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice. Add the club soda. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime, and serve.

name: Neva Cocktail
