instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass; add grenadine last. Serve and admire the sunset!

name: Captang Poontag
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add the Tang, and serve. It should taste akin to an orange dreamsicle.

name: Cherry Bomb #6
instructions: Pour the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky into a glass filled with a can of Red Bull, and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake Shot
instructions: Frost the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar and lemon. Add the vanilla vodka and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur; stir together. Lick the sugar rim, shoot the mixture, and bite a piece of lemon.

name: Cinnamon Toast #3
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cocky Motherfucker
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Confederate
instructions: 1. Pour the amaretto almond liqueur, peach schnapps, Southern Comfort, sour mix and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. 2. In a hurricane glass, add the grenadine then add ice. 3. Strain the mixture from the cocktail shaker into the hurricane glass, layering the two. Float the blue curacao on top, and serve. Colors, from bottom-to-top, will be as follows; red, clear, and blue.

name: Homemade Coquito Bueno
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, and blend well. Store in glass bottles, and place in refrigerator.

name: Divine
instructions: Pour the blue curacao, peach schynapps and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Add the Sierra Mist and Squirt (both chilled), stir lightly and serve.

name: Drunksimus Maximus
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a large shot glass or old-fashioned glass. Shoot.

name: Electric Ski-mask
instructions: Add vodka and triple sec to a highball glass or old-fashioned glass. Add Rockstar energy drink, then add cranberry juice and serve.

name: Energy Shot
instructions: Pour the vodka and the energy drink into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a shot glasses for serving.

name: Fruity as Fuck
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Raz and Stolichnaya raspberry vodka (Stoli Razberi) followed by the orange juice and Red Bull into a highball glass. Splash with cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of orange, with a cherry on a pick, and serve.

name: Fucked by a Rockstar
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Green Day
instructions: Fill a 2-oz shot glass half-way with citrus vodka, then add the lemon-lime soda of choice filling up the remaining portion of the shot glass. Shoot.

name: Green Eggs
instructions: Heather Drobnoek made and named this drink after her best cover band in Pennsylvania to use as a drink special when the band plays.

name: Green Spade #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Hershey Highway
instructions: Coat the bottom of a collins glass with chocolate syrup. Fill the glass half-way with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur, Irish cream and creme de cacao. Fill with chocolate milk and shake gently. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings if desired, and serve.

name: Hokkaido Highball
instructions: Pour the Bombay gin and sake into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec, swirl and leave briefly to chill before serving.

name: Hypnotic Martini #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ike Turner Cocktail
instructions: Invented by Markus D. formerly of Lewis Run, PA. This is black and blue with a punch in dishonor of Ike Turner. This is the drink of choice to calm the nerves after a barroom brawl.

name: Island Murder
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, add an umbrella and sword shaped tooth pick and serve.

name: Island Remix
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Blue Island Pucker schnapps into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Sprite Remix, stir and serve with a stirring straw.

name: J-Pop Idol
instructions: Pour the Alize Bleu liqueur down the side of an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Allow it to sit before adding the Gekkaikan sake. Add Sunny Delight orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Jackass Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: 100 Miles per Hour
instructions: Mix all ingredients together over ice in a highball glass. Shake up, then top with sprite and serve.

name: 187 Cocktail
instructions: Come all ingredients in a blender; add ice untill there is no funnel. Take out the middle of the blenders lid, and while still blending add a squirt of whipped cream. Serve with whipped cream on top and a maraschino cherry.

name: 2000 Flushes
instructions: Combine the Captain Morgan Original spiced rum and Parrot Bay mango rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao, shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add Sprite and lemonade, and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Watching a Sunrise
instructions: Cover the bottom of a highball glass with a thin layer of grenadine, then fill the glass with ice. Combine the 42 Degress vodka, Southern comfort liqueur and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain over the ice into the highball glass. Garnish with two cherries, and serve.

name: Alaine Cocktail
instructions: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum, amaretto and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alamo
instructions: Build ingredients with 1 - 2 ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Alex Trebek
instructions: Mix both shots together in a shot glass, reciting "... and now your double jeopardy categories ..." then toss back a good one!

name: Angry Pirate
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps, coconut rum, Maui Blue Hawaiian schnapps, Melloni and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with chilled 7-Up, garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Apple Coconut Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake and pour into an old fashioned glass over cracked ice and serve.

name: Appleton Skyy Soda
instructions: Add Skyy vodka and Appleton Estate rum to a hurricane glass over ice cubes. Peel and squeeze a segment or two of sweet Clementine, peeled. Drop in. Add Schweppes club soda, stir, and serve.

name: Applicious Quencher
instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour into a cocktail shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass, garnish with a lime, and serve.

name: Army Ranger
instructions: The idea behind this concoction was clear to the 2nd ranger bat. during a cold weather training exercise. The 151 was for warmth, the Red Bull was for the extra needed energy and the Jager was added as flavor. Created by Ranger Joe, 2nd Ranger Bat.

name: Atomic Orange Cream
instructions: Pour the milk and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao and orange juice. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Ba-dew-si
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bacardi Refresher
instructions: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Bacardi Vanilla Coke
instructions: Pour the Bacardi vanilla rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Bahama Mama #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well, pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Ballchain Blaster
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the Jameson Irish Whiskey, and top it off with Dr. Pepper. Serve,

name: Bargo
instructions: Pour the brandy and vodka into a mason jar. Add the root beer and a splash of red wine, and serve.

name: Bat Chain Puller
instructions: Pour the cherry vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper and orange juice, stir and serve.

name: Battery Charger
instructions: The contributor first came across this drink in a bar in Dorset, in the south of the UK, in Jan 2005. It was in the single shot format, but was still quite lethal. It has an aniseed smell and a liquorice taste, and it takes a while for the warming burn to make its way down your throat.

name: Battery Skydiver
instructions: Mix all ingredients together with an ice cube or two, shaking vigorously and pour into a highball glass over 3 - 5 ice cubes. Serve.

name: Beezer Punch
instructions: Stir the vodka, rum and orange juice together over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Belgian Waffle
instructions: Pour Blue Moon ale into a beer mug, filling it half way. Fill the other half with Guinness stout, pouring it over a spoon, and serve.

name: Bermuda Mai Tai
instructions: Fill a martini shaker about half full with ice cubes. Pour about a shot of tequila, triple sec, peach schnapps, and light rum. Fill with a roughly equal amount of pineapple juice (to taste), and shake well. Pour into a large glass with crushed ice. Top off with dark rum and stir a little. Garnish and serve.

name: Astronaut
instructions: Pour the vodka, light rum and dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and a splash of pineapple juice. Serve with a twist of lime (or lemon), and serve.

name: Berry Fusion Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with frozen blueberries placed inside the glass.

name: Bite Your Mama Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine all ingredients together with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker, and pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pickle spear, olives, and a lime slice.

name: Black and Amber
instructions: Abita Amber is a popular local beer in and around New Orleans. It only makes sense that this local favorite would merge with the classic Black & Tan.

name: Bizonkadonk Martini
instructions: Combine the Absolut Mandrin vodka, Tanqueray gin, Tuaca citrus liqueur, Grand Marnier orange liqueur and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, float Red Bull energy drink on top. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Black Lab
instructions: Pour Jagermeister liqueur into a rocks or old-fashioned glass or large shot glass. Top with a splash of cola, cover with bar napkin and slam on table top; shoot it immediately.

name: Black Sabbath
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Black Santa
instructions: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peppermint schnapps, and serve.

name: Blackberry 7
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: BlackBurst
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bloody Bruiser
instructions: Chill ingredients and layer in following order into a shot glass: Aftershock cinnamon schnapps, Blue Curacao liqueur, Jagermeister liqueur. Serve immediately.

name: Bloody Dragon
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or highball glass with cracked ice, and serve.

name: Bloody Smurf #2
instructions: Pour the vodka, blue Curacao liqueur and Chambord raspberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake briefly, strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Blue Coconut
instructions: Pour the coconut rum and blue curacao into a tall glass half-filled wtih ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with 7-up, stir lightly and serve.

name: Blue Dinosaurs
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a punch bowl and stir. Chill in refrigerator. Add sugar and fruit if desired. Chill over night if adding fruit. Serve in punch cups.

name: Blue Midnight
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Moon
instructions: Pour the Cointreau orange liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice, fill with lemonade and serve.

name: Blue Volcano
instructions: Add the vodka to a highball glass, then fill to the brim with pre-mixed Kool-Aid. Serve. Alternatively, use another variety of Kool-Aid and rename the drink to match.

name: Bluecheese Martini
instructions: Place all ingredients in a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with olives and serve.

name: Blushing Bride
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and grenadine syrup into the bottom of a Champagne flute. Fill with Champagne, and serve.

name: Booty Call
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice, strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Breeze of Saronno
instructions: Pour the Amaretto di Saronno, creme de menthe, vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a chilled rocks or old-fashioned glass. Garnish with mint leaves and almond powder, and serve.

name: Brisky Joe
instructions: Stir the Lipton iced tea and Everclear together in a large shot glass. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Brown and Beige
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Bruce Leroy
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and shoot.

name: Butt Plug
instructions: Butt Plug was invented by Prem Shah and Jason Borchers. The idea came from a similiar drink called Spark Plug, which uses Sparks as its main ingredient. The two mixtures will combine into a neon green immediately on contact for cool effects and awesome taste.

name: Buttery So-Co
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass with a little ice. Top with Coca-cola to taste, and serve.

name: Ca-Boom
instructions: This drink originates from the Island Nation of Ca. Ca-Boom is very popular with the locals. Originally it was made with vanilla extract and lime juice but the flavored beverages work just as well.

name: Cabin Cooler
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher and chill, preferably in ice. Pour into suitable glasses. Garnish rim of each glass with a lime slice, and serve.

name: Cabo Bomb
instructions: Pour the Cabo Wabo tequila into an old-fashioned glass. Add the Red Bull, and shoot.

name: Cactus Bat
instructions: Pour the batida de coco into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cactus fruit juice, stir and serve.

name: Canadian Princess
instructions: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps, melon liqueur and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass. Add a speared cherry, and serve.

name: Cancer
instructions: Dan Steele and Jeff Prebeg, both from Pittsburgh, a black cancerous town filled to the rafters with the shaded souls of the damned, created this drink out of their cursed souls.

name: Alexander Baby
instructions: Pour the dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the creme de cacao and double cream. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Apple Mojito
instructions: Add the lime, sugar and mint sprigs to a highball glass and muddle with a muddler. Add several ice cubes and pour in the Bacardi apple rum. Top with club soda (adjust to taste), and stir. Garnish with an apple slice and a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Banana Foster Martini
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except powdered cocoa) in a bender. Blend until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a dusting of powdered cocoa, and serve.

name: Blow Job #2
instructions: Stir together the Smirnoff Raspberry Twist vodka and Sprite lemon-lime soda in a highball glass. Serve straight up.

name: Candy Apple Martini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake firmly and pour into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Cape Cod Islander
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and Sprite soda. Top with the Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice in the center of the drink. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #2
instructions: Drop the cherries and some ice into a highball glass. Pour the Cabo Wabo anejo tequila, Captain Morgan Private Stock dark rum, Minute Maid limeade and 99 Oranges orange schnapps into the glass. Add a splash of maraschino cherry juice on top, and serve.

name: Blue Pucker Bomb
instructions: Pour the DeKuyper Raspberry Pucker schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Red Bull energy drink and shake well. Strain into a highball glass or old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Captain Plah
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, ice if preferred, and serve.

name: Carrot Cake Martini
instructions: Combine the vanilla vodka, toffee liqueur and Aftershock cinnamon schnapps in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cha Cha Unocha
instructions: Build ingredients in order in a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Cheeky Vimto
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a highball glass, stir and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #7
instructions: Pour the grenadine into a shot glass, then carefully pour the Bacardi 151 on top; the two should not mix. Light it on fire, blow out the flames and shoot.

name: Cherry Hooker
instructions: Pour ingredients, in order, into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cherry Lemon Drop
instructions: Combine equal parts of Absolut Citron vodka and sweet and sour mix over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well; add juice of one lemon slice and grenadine, then strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle sugar around the rim of the shot glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Vodka Greyhound
instructions: Pour vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up, stir, and serve.

name: Cherry Zinger
instructions: Place a single maraschino cherry into a shot glass. Add the mango rum and cherry brandy, then serve.

name: Chilcano de Pisco
instructions: Pour the Peruvian Pisco into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a spoonful of lemon juice, then fill with ginger ale. Serve.

name: Chocolate Boobie
instructions: Place all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Coke
instructions: Pour the Bacardi white rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Christina Ricci Cocktail
instructions: This drink is from an Oakland University graduate student (Mark Katakowski), who in a dream was taught how to make it by the actress Christina Ricci.

name: Christini Martini
instructions: Build ingredients in a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Citizen Cane
instructions: First take slices of pear and place them on a saucer, pour on raw sugar, douse in the overproof rum, and light. When caramelised this will become the drink garnish. Pour the rest of the ingredients into a shaker, shake hard and fast and strain over crushed ice into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Classic Sidecar
instructions: Take a lemon wedge, notch a slice into the middle and use it to moisten the rim of a chilled cocktail glass. Frost the moistened outer rim of the glass with superfine sugar. Shake ingredients together with cracked ice and strain into prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist, and serve.

name: Coconut Milk
instructions: Pour a shot of Malibu coconut rum into the bottom of a cordial glass. Top up with milk (the colder the better), stir, and serve.

name: Coconut Orange
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the orange juice, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange on the rim, and serve.

name: Coke Safari
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Commie Bastard
instructions: Pour the Stolichnaya Red Label vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew Code Red soda, and serve.

name: Confusion
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cool Paradise
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Coral Queensland
instructions: Add vodka to a Champagne flute, add a dash of limoncello (to taste), and a dash of blue curacao (to taste). Fill the glass with lemonade. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Cosmo Kurant
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge on the rim, and serve.

name: Cotton Candy #2
instructions: Pour the Phillips Butter Ripple schnapps into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk, add a touch of grenadine, and serve.

name: Country Apple
instructions: Combine and chill all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cranberry Gin
instructions: Shake gin and cran-raspberry juice with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker; pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Cranberry Vodka Slush
instructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and scoop and serve with ginger ale, if desired.

name: Crazy Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Cream Bomb
instructions: Shake the Malibu coconut rum, white rum, melon liqueur, orange juice and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the syrup last, and serve.

name: Crown the King
instructions: Pour a can of Budweiser B-to-the-EPour into a pint glass. Drop in a shot of Crown Royal Canadian whisky, and shoot.

name: Banana Split #2
instructions: Combine the 99 Bananas banana schnapps, Kahlua coffee liqueur and Godiva chocolate liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and pour into a shot glass. Drop a cherry into the glass, consume the liquid and eat the cherry.

name: Dali Lama
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle the chocolate syrup into an old-fashioned glass, coating the edges and leaving a pool of chocolate in the base of the glass. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker through a strainer into the chocolate-lined glass, and serve.

name: Dancing Dana
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add water to taste if required. Rim a margarita glass with sugar if desired. Pour the blended drink mixture into the margarita glass and serve.

name: Death by Shot
instructions: Pour white tequila into a shot glass and lay drops of Tabasco sauce on top. Do not mix, and allow the Tabasco sauce to settle. For decoration, place red pepper in glass. Eat the pepper as quickly as possible, immediately followed by shot.

name: Death Row
instructions: Pour the tequila and tabasco into a shot glass. Place salt on your hand, lick it, bite a lime wedge, count to 3 and slam the drink.

name: Deep Dark Love
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a couple of whole coffee beans, and serve.

name: Detox
instructions: Mix ingredients together in a pitcher. Serve into punch cups, and serve.

name: Diaper Stripes
instructions: Drink the Yoohoo down to the top of the label, fill with rum and shake. Chocolate will seperate out leaving a diaper stain appearance.

name: Diarrhea Bomb
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Disco Lemonade
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Country Time pink lemonade, and splash in some Gatorade fruit punch. Add a small glowstick for garnish, and serve with a straw.

name: Cosmo Killer
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bullfrog #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a beer pilsner. Fill with milk, add ice, and serve.

name: Crank and Vodka
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Donkey Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients together with a few ice cubes in a mixing glass; stir. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Double-O-Seven
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add Stoli O vodk, and almost fill the glass with 7-up. Top with a splash of orange juice, and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #7
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the amaretto, top with the Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Drambuie Cider
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, and serve with a cinnamon stick.

name: Drambuie Coffee
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Drambuie Espresso Martini
instructions: Combine all three ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dripping Wet Pink
instructions: Combine the vodka, creme de cacao, ice cubes, cherries and juice in a sherry glass. Stir, top with milk, stir again and serve.

name: Drop the Hammer on the Turkey
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old fashioned glass with or without ice cubes, and serve.

name: Drunken Rumsfeld
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Razz rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Rockstar energy drink, stir and serve.

name: Dry Brandy Manhattan
instructions: Pour the brandy and dry vermouth into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, garnish with 2 olives, and serve.

name: Dubonnet Kiss
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Add a thin slice of Red Delicious apple and serve.

name: Areola
instructions: Pour ingredients in order into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Eady Rider
instructions: Blend the rum and ice cream together in a shot glass or mixing glass, and serve.

name: Easter Egg
instructions: Pour blue curacao and creme de cacao over ice cubes in an old fashioned glass. Float half and half on top to taste, and serve.

name: Easy Rootbeer Float
instructions: Pour rootbeer schnapps and vanilla flavored schnapps into a cup. Pour in a can of rootbeer. Add ice or ice-cream if desired, and serve.

name: Eggnotini
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker 1/2 full with ice, add ingredients, shake, shake, shake until cold and frothy. Pour into a well chilled martini / cocktail glass. Top with a dusting of nutmeg, and serve.

name: El Mahon
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: El Negro
instructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum into a shot glass. Add the Southern Comfort and Captain Morgan spiced rum; the mixture should turn dark and obtain a fire smell. Serve; beware the delayed hard-hitting bite.

name: El Presidente Cocktail #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice; shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist. Grenadine and lemon juice are optional.

name: Electric Relaxation
instructions: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in the triple sec and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Elven Blood
instructions: Pour the cranberry-raspberry juice into a champagne saucer and stir in the Smirnoff Vanilla Twist vodka next. Add a splash of Malibu coconut rum on top and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #4
instructions: A vibrant, refreshing drink to celebrate St. Patrick�s Day in style.

name: Dr. Canadian
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Erictini
instructions: Created by Diana on a cold winter night. It was originated in Canada, though it has both South American and European influences. Named after a descendant of Austrian Royalty.

name: Eye Opening Bloody Mary
instructions: Add half amount of V8 juice to pitcher. Add all other ingredients, except vodka and stir vigorously. Add remaining amount of V8 juice and stir again. Add vodka; stir once more. Pour into ice-filled glasses, garnish with celery stalks and serve. (Serves 12-13)

name: Fainting Goat
instructions: Combine all of the rums into a tumbler with ice. Add enough cranberry to turn the drink a light red color. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass. Shoot.

name: Fallen Angel
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Fat Lighter
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Feni Highball
instructions: Pour the Kazkar Feni apple liqueur into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the fresh lime juice and fill with 7-Up. Stir, garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge, and serve.

name: Feni Mojito
instructions: Crush the apple slices with the sugar in the bottom of a highball glass. Stir thoroughly and top with ice. Add the Kazkar Feni cashew apple liqueur, top off with apple juice and stir. Garnish with an apple wheel and lime wedge, and serve.

name: Fiestafied
instructions: Fiestafied was invented in the party town of Tavstock in South Devon, by Joanne Solman with friends Alice and Jessica. The lime mix is a premade combination of lime juice and sugar. Adjust to taste.

name: Fijian Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well, pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Flagella
instructions: Pour the jello and vodka into a double-shot glass, and stir. Add Mountain Dew soda, stir again, and serve. (NOTE: Not all the jello will dissolve.)

name: Flaming Blue Fuck
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass. Ignite and drink through a straw, quickly.

name: Flaming Cock Smack
instructions: Combine ice cubes with the pineapple juice, banana schnapps, and peach schnapps in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a large collins glass then layer the Bacardi 151 on top with the back of a spoon. Ignite and allow to burn, extinguish and serve.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper #3
instructions: Pour the Devil Springs vodka into a shot glass, and seperately pour the Coca-Cola into an old-fashioned glass. Ignite the vodka in the shot glass and drop the glass into the old-fashioned glass of Coca-Cola. Down it all.

name: Flaming Nerd
instructions: Simply pour the ingredients into a double shot shot glass and serve.

name: Flaming Open Wound
instructions: Pour the grain alcohol into a shot glass, and drop the tabasco sauce on top. Ignite, extinguish and shoot.

name: Fluffy Pink Angel
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Frodka
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Frosted Coke
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-Cola, and serve.

name: Frostmark 5 on Ice
instructions: Stir together the absinthe and vodka in a mixing glass and strain into a highball glass half filled with ice. Fill the rest of the way up with Fresca soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Fruit Salad Slammer
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bacardi-ade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Camel Concoction
instructions: Mix vodka and Mountain Dew soda in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Add a small splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Cherry Popper #4
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Frutty Fuck-Me-Up
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Fucked Up Shark
instructions: Pour the Jeremiah Weed whiskey into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao, triple sec and Southern Comfort peach liqueur and add a can of tonic water. Shake vigorously, despite the building pressure. Shake until much of the carbonation from the tonic water subsides and creates a petillent, clear teal beverage. Pour over a minimal amount of ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Pussy
instructions: Combine the vodka, peach schnapps and grapefruit juice together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a cherry on top.

name: G-Drink
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Water from the River Ganges
instructions: Especially in northern parts of Denmark is this drink in vogue, invented by bartender Nikolaj Hyldig, working on the Esbjerg - Newcastle - Hamburg ferry-line. Water from the River Ganges gets its name from the appearance of the liquid, not from its taste!

name: Garbo Cocktail
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice and Swedish punsch in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gateraide
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Gay Marine
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedges with cane sugar and Grand Marnier orange liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Add crushed ice and pour in the Mount Gay Barbados rum. Using a swizzle stick, stir the ingredients together so that the rum, lime and mint layers through the drink. Top up with apple juice. Serve with a mint garnish.

name: German Chocolate Cake #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Ghetto Margarita
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a short glass, and serve.

name: Gin and Pear
instructions: When making the Gin and Pear, ensure you place the bottle of gin in the freezer an hour or two beforehand, and make sure the Looza is refrigerated. If this drink (or even straight Looza) is served too warm it can seem really sickly sweet.

name: Girl From Mars
instructions: Place the Archers peach schnapps, vodka and strawberry puree in a glass and shake well. Add several cubes of ice and then add half-and-half until near the top. Slowly pour the grenadine syrup around the edge of the glass (it should produce some odd red colors around the glass, hence the name); serve.

name: Go Go
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberry pieces, and serve.

name: Gold Bomb
instructions: Place a shot glass filled with Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps into the bottom of a wide glass, Fill the outer glass with Red Bull until it flows into the shot glass. Allow to mix for 20 seconds and then drink as fast as possible.

name: Goose Egg
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Gordon Freeman
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Granny Tequila
instructions: Pour the tequila and apple juice into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly, and serve.

name: Green Fairy Blood
instructions: This particular recipe is the brainchild of a slighty insane man named Dr Lyons. It became a good way for him to dispose of shoddy absinthe without pouring it down the drain.

name: Green Goddamn
instructions: Green Goddamn was invented by undergraduates at University of Texas Austin in 1960. Proportions vary with thirst of consumer.

name: Green Lantern #2
instructions: This recipe for a variation of Green Lantern tastes like a creamy caramel apple.

name: Gummi Worms
instructions: Gummi Worms is a very popular candy-tasting alcoholic drink in Bulgaria with Pushkin brand vodka. Try it here with Smirnoff Strawberry Twist vodka or Stoli Strasberi vodka.

name: Guttersnipe
instructions: Pour the Finlandia lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau orange liqueur then Kerns guava juice. Squeeze in a lime wedge, and serve.

name: H-Bomb Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: H2O Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with colored sugar. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Half Breed
instructions: Float the Stroh rum on top of peppermint liqueur in a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Hammerhead
instructions: Stir the black sambuca and amber rum together in a cocktail glass over crushed or shaven ice. Add Coca-cola to taste, and serve.

name: Happy Camper #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Passion
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a mixing glass with a few ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Punch in the Balls
instructions: Mix the Hawaiian punch and Everclear grain alcohol together in a punch bowl. Cyphen some off into a smaller bowl and freeze it, put the frozen mix into the punch bowl and serve.

name: Hennessy and Apple
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Home Alone
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hornless Unicorn
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hot Apple Pie with Sparks
instructions: Layer the Irish cream and Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass. Very gently, pour the Bacardi 151 on top. Carefully ignite the 151. Throw small handfuls of cinnamon powder on top 2 - 3 times to make sparks. Blow out and serve.

name: Hot Butter Scotch Toddy
instructions: Measure the Scotch whisky in a toddy glass. Place brown sugar or honey in a measuring cup or other heatproof small container. Spoon in butter, and pour on 2 oz (1/3) of the hot water; stir till butter and sugar are completely dissolved into a syrupy consistency (about 30 secs). Pour on the rest of the water, stir briefly, then pour the works on top of the Scotch. Stir gently; serve.

name: Atomic Submarine
instructions: Fill a beer glass with vodka, and fill a shot glass with beer. Drop the shot of beer into the glass of vodka, and chug.

name: Blue MotherFucker #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bo Jo
instructions: Pour the fruit punch into a shot glass. Add the Midori melon liqueur on top, and then follow with the Bacardi white rum, and serve.

name: Cabo Beach Party
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: German Wake-Up Call
instructions: Stir together equal amounts of orange juice and Tropicana Peach Orchard Punch juice. Add as much Jagermeister as desired, stir again, and serve.

name: Gummy Worm
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass, and serve; result should be neon blue.

name: Heste Pis
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with 3 - 4 ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hot Carl #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together with a couple ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hottness
instructions: Pour the Skyy spiced vodka and Vernors ginger ale into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq and 7
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Champagne
instructions: Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Add the Hpnotiq liqueur, and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Heaven
instructions: Pour the chilled Hpnotiq liqueur and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add Chambord raspberry liqueur. Garnish with cherries, and serve.

name: Tropicana Hurricane
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with crushed ice, add the light, dark, and coconut rum and fill with Tropicana Twister. Stir and serve with orange and cherry garnish.

name: Ice Bomb
instructions: As established at bars within the University of Illinois, USA. A popular student drink.

name: Idaho Dimetapp
instructions: Combine the vodka and rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the chilled grape soda and serve.

name: Indian Apple Martini
instructions: Shake the above ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a martini cocktail glass with a sour apple sugar rim. Garnish with an apple slice, and serve.

name: Indian Summer Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Irish Depth Charge
instructions: 1. Pour a double shot of vodka into a double shot glass. Holding a pint glass upside-down over the shot glass press the shot glass firmly to the bottom of the pint glass. Flip over. 2. Fill the pint glass 1/2 full of Bass Ale. Pour Guinness over a spoon until pint glass is full. Remove the double shot glass carefully from the drink, and serve.

name: Irish Energy
instructions: Pour both the Jameson Irish whiskey and Red Bull into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Irish Rootbeer
instructions: Fill a shot glass half with Kahlua, half with amaretto, and a splash of Bacardi 151 rum. Drop it into a pint of Guinness, and serve.

name: Island Milk
instructions: Blend the orange juice, milk, sugar and ice together for 30 seconds. Pour into collins glasses, and serve.

name: Italian Bulldog
instructions: Shake Galliano herbal liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur and milk together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add Coca-cola, and serve.

name: Italian Ice #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jade #2
instructions: A delicious, mellow and sensual cocktail mix created with the idea of men and women enjoying the same cocktail together. Contributed by Jeffrey Alcantara, originated in Vacaville, California, United States, 2004.

name: Javanese Sunrise
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir slowly, and serve.

name: Mind Bomb
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Jenny Great
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Cherrytini
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Flip Passion
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Iced Jim
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a big highball glass, almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Jager Punch
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a punch bowl, and serve.

name: Japanese Jim
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime, and serve.

name: Jet Fuel
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jim Beam and Coke
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with Coca-Cola, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jim Beam and Ginger
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with ginger ale, (any brand), stir lightly and serve.

name: Jim Frost
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Jim Pepper
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda, stir lightly and serve.

name: Jim Rogers
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with coke, and lace with grenadine, to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional) and serve.

name: Jimbull
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old fashioned glass over three ice cubes, mix and serve.

name: Johnny on the Spot
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Johnny Rev
instructions: Pour vodka and tonic water over a fair amount of ice in a highball glass. Squeeze juices from lime and mandarin slices and garnish. Make sure to use ripe, sweet limes to counterbalance the tonic water.

name: Jolly Rancher Jello Shots
instructions: Mix the boiling water with a package of green apple jell-o. Allow the jell-o to dissolve for 1 minute. Add chilled DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps; stir until well combined. Pour into 1-oz disposable shot glasses which can be found at most party and food supply stores. Refridgerate for several hours until jell-o sets. Makes about 20 shot-sized servings.

name: Juicy Fruit #2
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of banana, and serve.

name: Junior Mint #2
instructions: Gently pour ingredients into a 1.5-oz or 2-oz shot glass. When drinking, hold in mouth for a few seconds mixing ingredients with tongue to bring out the flavor. Swallow and feel the warmth of the brandy.

name: Junk It All
instructions: Mix the cherry jell-o with boiling water; add vodka and gin. Pour into paper shot cups and refrigerate for 3 hours before serving.

name: Brisky Jim
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large collins glass, fill with Lipton Brisk iced tea, stir and serve.

name: Buffalo Tea
instructions: Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach juice and iced tea. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Decorate with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Creamy Pflueger
instructions: Combine peach schnapps and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add half-and-half, and serve.

name: Jim and the Doctor
instructions: Stir both ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Kab-z Vanilla
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Vanil rum into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add the Pepsi vanilla cola and lime juice. Stir well. Add the lemon juice, and serve.

name: Kamikaze Wigglers
instructions: Dissolve the jell-o with hot water. Add vodka and triple sec. Pour in plastic shot glasses. Chill until formed, and serve.

name: Kazkar Kocktail
instructions: Shake the above ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon curl and speared cherry, and serve.

name: Kentucky Bullfrog
instructions: Pour out or consume the mountain dew until it reaches the top of the label. Add the Kool-aid and fill the rest up with vodka. Shake, and chill. Serve as is from the bottle, or into glasses.

name: Kevin on the Floor
instructions: Pour the rums over some crushed ice in a tall collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Key Lime Martini #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve. Optional: Coat rim of glass with crushed graham crakers and top with a squirt of whipped cream.

name: Kill Bill
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail (martini) glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with lemon and lime peel, and serve.

name: Killer Sniff
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a small rocks glass. Ignite, allow to burn momentarily, and extinguish before serving.

name: Kinky Sex
instructions: Pour the whiskey, Southern Comfort, ginger ale and lime juice into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add a slice of lime to the rim of the glass, and serve.

name: Kiwi Casa
instructions: Stir the rum and kiwi juice together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Add soda, garnish with a fresh slice of kiwi, and serve.

name: Knockout Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and shoot.

name: Kodi Odie
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass. Add ice if desired, and serve.

name: Koontaka Punch
instructions: Stir al ingredients together in a large punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

name: Kreeper
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into several shot glasses. Serve as individual shots.

name: Kryptonite #2
instructions: This recipe for Kryptonite, when stirred, becomes a cloudy green color.

name: L.I.E.
instructions: Pour all liquors into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a small splash of orange juice, top with Coca-cola (or equivalent), and serve.

name: La Mojita
instructions: Tear up the mint leaves and add them to an old-fashioned glass containing the lime juice and sugar. Press the laves with the back of a spoon against the glass to release the aroma. Add vodka. Fill the glass with ice cubes and top off with club soda. Add the raspberries. Mix it with a spoon so that mint leaves and raspberries get distributed throughout the glass. Serve.

name: Lack Affection
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple or twist of peel, and serve.

name: Lamasina
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a red wine glass, and serve.

name: Leaky Buttery Nipple
instructions: Pour the butterscotch schnapps and Kona coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass over ice. Top with a quick splash of cream, stir and serve.

name: Lemon Drop #8
instructions: Combine equal parts of each ingredient in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a double-shot glass, and serve.

name: Lemon Drop Martini #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes; shake well. Swirl half a lemon around the rim of a margarita glass and dip in sugar. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass, and serve.

name: Lemon Icetini
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Leon Trotsky
instructions: Originally invented as a method of disposing of very poor tequila. Named for the Russian communist exile who was murdered in Mexico City.

name: Lime Chiver
instructions: Muddle the fresh lime with the caster sugar, then add the liquors and shake with plenty of ice. Pour into a highball glass, add a dash of lemonade, and serve.

name: Lion Tamer #2
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass. Add Sprite and a splash of lemon juice. Add ice, and serve.

name: Liquid Panty Remover #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Skittles
instructions: Mix Gatorade Lemon-Lime energy drink and cherry limeade together in a cocktail glass. Stir continuously as you add the Malibu mango rum, and serve.

name: Liquid Uranium
instructions: Stir ingredients together with 3 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Lithium
instructions: Place the ice cubes in the bottom of a collins glass with the sugar. Add the vodka, followed by the milk. Stir and serve.

name: Little Black Devil
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lollishot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with a cherry-flavored lollipop with a plastic stick where possible.

name: Sweet Lollishot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with a pineapple-flavored lollipop with a plastic stick where possible.

name: Love Byte
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Garnish with a piece of pineapple and a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Lovely Lauren
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender with 1/2 - 1 cup of crushed ice. Blend well, pour into a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Lynyrd Skynyrd
instructions: PourJim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add orange soda and orange juice, and stir. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Machiavelli Pina Colada
instructions: Combine all ingredients togehter in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and empty contents into a pina-colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Machu Picchu
instructions: Invented in one of the many disco/bars in Cuzco, a beautifull city in Peru famous for having been tha capital of the Inca empire and very popular among tourists, as from there you can get to the lost city of Machu Picchu.

name: Mancran Cocktail
instructions: Shake or stir with ice cubes. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Mango Margarita #2
instructions: Combine in blender with about half a cup of crushed ice. Grind only to broken/crushed state. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with lime and/or mango slice, and serve.

name: MargaFeni
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Mariachi
instructions: Build all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass and serve with a chilli pepper or jalapeno pepper wedged onto the rim of the glass.

name: Marijuana Milkshake
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass (without allowing any curdling), and shoot.

name: Amaretto Seduction
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a blender, with/without ice. Blend well, pour over ice (if not already used) in a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Black Napkin
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and Captain Morgan spiced rum. Top with a healthy dose of Royal Crown cola. Serve unstirred topped with a lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

name: Blow Job #3
instructions: Float the whiskey on top of the irish cream in a shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Shoot without using your hands.

name: Blue Freezie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Canadian Skittle
instructions: Pour over a couple of ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Caribbean Blue Jello Shots
instructions: Mix the jello mix with the boiling water until powder is fully dissolved and then add the rest of the water and the alcohol. Pour the mixture into either shot glasses or paper cups, and chill as per usual.

name: Cherry Toozie
instructions: The Cherry Toozie came from the popular dessert which consisted of a fresh peeled banana being flanked by a set of two cherries connected by their stems. When taking this shot, say "Cherry Toozie" before consuming.

name: Crimson Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Flaming Asshole #2
instructions: Layer in a shot glass in this order; brandy, tequila then rum. Ignite. Extinguish within several seconds and serve.

name: CV Special
instructions: Pour the port into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the sambuca, followed by the WKD, and serve.

name: Hokey Pokey
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Killer Shots
instructions: Combine equal parts of each ingredient together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Mayflower Martini
instructions: Mix briefly over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lemon or orange twist if desired, and serve.

name: Melon Popper
instructions: Fill a shot glass 1/4 way full with your chosen flavor of Pop Rocks popping candy (preferably strawberry or watermelon). Add Midori melon liqueur and shoot.

name: Melonrita
instructions: Salt the rim of a margarita glass and add crushed ice. Pour all ingredients into the glass, stir and serve.

name: Metropolitan #2
instructions: Build ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain carefully into a sugar-rimmed 10-oz cocktail glass so as not to knock sugar off rim. Garnish with a large lemon twist, and serve.

name: Mexican Coffee #2
instructions: Pour the tequila and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a coffee mug; fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Mexican Martini #2
instructions: Add vodka, triple sec and lime juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake, strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Skirt
instructions: Pour the Scotch whisky and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass. Add the shot of the tequila, and serve.

name: Mexican Titty
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Wife Beater
instructions: Pour the lemon juice, gold tequila and triple into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a beer glass. Fill glass with Stella Artois lager, and serve.

name: Michealado
instructions: Pour desired amount of tequila into mug or glass. Add the juice of one lime. Fill the rest of the glass with beer (preferably corona or dos equis). Add the hot-sauce of your preference, and a dash of chili powder. Stir the contents of the drink and add ice if desired.

name: Mid-Summer Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, add orange juice and serve.

name: Midgetini
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Midland Mayham
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a beer mug / pint glass, stir well, and serve.

name: Anyie on the Beach
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec and peach schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill halfway with club soda, garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Bellatrix Ball
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: La Tamarinda
instructions: Make sun tea with the tamarinds, squishing them before putting them into the water. Add the tequila. Add ice if you have some. Serve in cups.

name: Midnight Kiss
instructions: Pour the vodka into a sugar-rimmed champagne flute and fill the rest of the glass with Champagne. Top with the Curacao, and serve.

name: Midnight Martini #2
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass, Garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Midori Sour #3
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Midtwinkle Martini
instructions: Combine spirits over ice in a cocktail shaker, shake, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a segment or two of peeled clementine or tangelo, and serve.

name: Migraine
instructions: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Milk Stiffy
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Mind Eraser #4
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Miss Tina
instructions: Stir ingredients together over crushed ice in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mitosis
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass up about halfway with ice. Pour the cognac and the sweet and sour mix into the glass. Top with the ginger ale. Serve stirred, with a straw.

name: Mock Beer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Model United Nations
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass with/without ice as desired, and serve.

name: Moheezy
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup, (ingredients pre-chilled or mixed with ice), and serve.

name: Mojito Tampa
instructions: Squeeze and add the lime slices into an old-fashioned glass. Add the mint leaves and decorate with mint leaves on the stem. Add the ice, sugar and soda water to make simple syrup. Use a large wooden spoon to crush and infuse the ingredients together. Add the rum last, and serve.

name: Monster Squad
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup with ice, and serve.

name: Moon Inn Cocktail
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black grape and lime twist, and serve.

name: Moose Juice #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a jug or pitcher, and serve.

name: Moose Juice
instructions: Stir nice and easy together in a punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

name: Mooselips
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Morbid Angel
instructions: Stir equal parts of each ingredient together in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Ginger Apple Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved ginger and a slice of apple.

name: Mott Street Manhattan
instructions: Mix all liquid ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lychee nut, and serve.

name: Mount Fuji #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Mr. Gerbik
instructions: Stir the gin together with the Dr. Pepper in a highball glass. Carefully layer the Bacardi 151 rum on top, ignite and serve.

name: Mr. T Whiskey
instructions: Put the frozen lemonade into a pitcher, then pour the beers over the lemonade, then pour the whiskey into the lemonade container, and pour into the pitcher. Mix and add ice as necessary before serving.

name: Muddy Puddle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a large punch bowl with plenty of ice. Stir vigorously, and serve into cups.

name: Nagshead Lemonade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Naked Twister Shots
instructions: Pour both ingredients into seperate shot glasses. Drink half the Pepsi, shoot the Bacardi Limon, then finish the Pepsi shot. Rinse and repeat.

name: Napalm Bomb
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass, and shoot.

name: Nasty Mexican
instructions: Pour the tequila into a shot glass; add the Kahlua coffee liqueur and serve.

name: Natural Right
instructions: Pour a can of Natural Ice lager into a pint glass, add cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Nectar of the Gods
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Negropolitan
instructions: Layer the Jagermeister on top of the sambuca in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nermish
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: New Dawn
instructions: Pour the jagermeister into the glass then the creme de bananes over it(using one of many common layering techniques). Serve as is.

name: Flaming Mouth Wash
instructions: Place the mint leaf in a shot glass. Pour the liquors into the glass, stir and serve.

name: New Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes or cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and drop in a maraschino cherry before serving.

name: New York Hot Chocolate
instructions: Brew a pot of strong black coffee. Add the coffee to a warmed coffee mug and add the Vandermint. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and top that with dark chocolate shavings. Serve.

name: New York Peppermint Patty Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake Martini
instructions: Fill two cocktail glasses with ice water; set aside. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, add vanilla vodka, creme de cacao, and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur. Shake vigorously. Empty glasses of ice water, and dip edges into a flat dish filled with sweetened cocoa powder. Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the 2 cocktail glasses, and add a twist of lemon to each before serving.

name: Flaming Mr. Fish
instructions: Add the vodka and white sambuca to a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with raspberry lemonade, stir gently and serve.

name: Nightwalker
instructions: Put high-quality instant coffee into a blender, and dissolve it using a minimal amount of boiling water. Add whole milk and vanilla ice cream (with chocolate chips where possible). Blend it all together. Add Amarula and stir well. Pour into a hurricane glass and freeze it for about 15-20 minutes. Garnish with whipped cream on top.

name: Nikipumpin Mix
instructions: Mix all the liquid ingredients in a small punch bowl or pitcher. Grate the nutmeg into it, leave for 10 mins then seive out the nutmeg. Add the diced cucumber. Chill before serving.

name: Nitrous Oxide
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a brandy snifter. Tilt glass and flame the liquor. When flamed cover it completely so no oxygen escapes (very important). You will feel a suction to the hand, pop your hand off, take the shot, and immediately cover the glass again so no oxygen escapes. Make a slight hole in between your index and thumb, and inhale as much as u can, and hold it. That is the Nitrous Oxide!

name: Nixon
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-Up, stir and serve.

name: No Fucking Idea
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes (on the rocks), and serve.

name: No Worries
instructions: Pour the brandy over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Noidish Pancake
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Novicain
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: NT Pucker Punch Fizz
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Nuclear Waste #3
instructions: Combine the orange juice, blue Curacao liqueur and vodka in a small punch bowl or large pitcher. Chill for about 3 hours until cold. Just before serving, add the ginger ale. Stir gently. Serve over ice. Makes about 8 cups.

name: Nut Buster
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.
Shake all ingredients briefly together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Asia 9.0
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Bacardi Geezer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a pint glass, and serve.

name: Baldini Blues
instructions: Pour vodka, blue cura�ao and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a champagne flute then top with Prosecco wine and serve.

name: Banilla Splash
instructions: Add all ingredients to a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, add a cherry and serve.

name: Blue Dolphin #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Fudgsicle
instructions: Stir the McGuinness Creme de Bananes liqueur and the chocolate milk together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with banana slice and serve.

name: Cream Samba
instructions: Combine all ingredients with some crushed ice in a blender. Blend for 2 minuets. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with dessicated coconut and fruit identical to the flavor of the ice-cream.

name: Devil Juice
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fruity Pebble #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Green Pussy #2
instructions: The contributor had this in a bar in Toronto, Ont. Canada in 1991, apparently no bartender has known of it since. Tastes like Scope brand mouthwash, and goes down really nice. An awesome end of night drink.

name: Hennessy, Apple and Red
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Lemony Crab Par-Tea Cooler
instructions: A refreshing and easy to drink drink recipes; great served at crab feasts or cookouts.

name: Marcelita
instructions: Assemble all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled margarita glass with a blend of salt and sugar (colored salt optional) on the rim of the glass. Garnish with fresh cranberries and lemon peel, and serve.

name: Nuttier Russian
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nutty Bartender
instructions: Pour the Merlot and Pinot Grigio and ginger ale (or sprite) into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Stolichnaya vodka, Amaretto Di Saronno liqueur and Alize cognac. Shake gently. Pour into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top off with Grand Marnier orange liqueur, and serve.

name: O Thing
instructions: Pour the can of Amp energy drink into a tall glass. Add the Bacardi O rum (more or less acccording to taste), and serve.

name: O-Brye
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Oasis #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: .46 Magnum
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a large shot glass or small rocks glass. Stir and serve.

name: Beef Curtains
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a champagne tulip glass, and serve.

name: Black Haze
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bloody Jim
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey over roughly 3 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-cola until the glass is nearly full, then add cherry grenadine. Mix together with a straw, and serve.

name: Cowboy Killer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Dr. Rum
instructions: Build ingredients in above order in a shot glass, and slam.

name: Fuzzy Monkey #2
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: GatorBeam
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Greenbrier Creek
instructions: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a frosted (note: important) brandy snifter glass. Add the gin, and mix well. Drizzle the hot melted chocolate over the drink, being sure to let it slightly drip onto the side of the glass. Do not mix. Serve.

name: Island Jim
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain over ice in a collins glass, top with cola, and serve.

name: Jim and Jill Went Up the Hill
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Jim the Destroyer
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass, and serve.

name: Johnny Puke
instructions: A nasty looking but nice-tasting orange highball.

name: Liquid Angel Dust
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a 1.5-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: The Marvin
instructions: Add all liquors and sour mix to a large cocktail glass filled with ice, stir and serve.

name: 3 for a Dollar Special
instructions: Boil the sugar and water in a bowl. Chill for 20 minutes. Add the chopped mangos, along vodka, triple sec and two limes to a blender with 40 ice cubes. Blend, add the water and sugar mixture, and blend again. Serve in your glass of choice.

name: A Tender Touch
instructions: First pour the Rumple Minze into a chilled shot glass. Now carefully add the Tabasco using a spoon. The idea is to form a even layer of Tabasco on the Rumple Minze without actually mixing them. Add the tequila on top and shoot.

name: Absolut Anti-freeze #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Adrenaline Rush
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall glass, stir and serve.

name: Alexander Young
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Alize Bleu Bling Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together with a few ice cubes and serve straight up with a twist of lemon in a cocktail glass.

name: Almond Amaretto Float
instructions: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur into a highball glass. Pour milk or cream into the glass until the glass is 2/3rds the way full. Top off the glass with Pepsi and serve.

name: An Orgy of Liquors
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an extremely large container or bucket. Mix together and serve at your nearest party.

name: Angel Piss
instructions: Shake ingredients with a couple ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Apple and Starfruit Juice
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender for 2 minutes, and serve.

name: Apple Bomb
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff Green Apple vodka into a highball glass. Add the Red Bull (pre-chilled), and serve.

name: Apple Jim
instructions: Blend ingredients together in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Martini #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Arctic Punch
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a large punch bowl and freeze until ready to serve.

name: Arizona Jim
instructions: Pour Jim Beam whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Arizona iced tea, and serve.

name: AsiaToo
instructions: Pour all ingredients except grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine, and serve.

name: Bacardi Pink
instructions: Pour Bacardi Limon rum straight into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Minute Maid pink lemonade. Stir with a straw, and serve.

name: Banana Lifesaver
instructions: Combine cocunut rum and melon liqueur together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Add the sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice to taste. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the banana schnapps, and serve.

name: Beam Me Up Jimmy
instructions: Combine all whiskies in a shot glass, top with grenadine last and stir.

name: Beast Juice
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Beergarita
instructions: Mix all ingredients except the lager in a blender with ice. Pour into a large pilsner/pint glass, then add the Corona (which should be chilled) over the top. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Bellini #3
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a blender with ice; blend well. Pour into a Champagne flute, and serve.

name: Bertiebreezer
instructions: Pour the Apfelkorn and Bacardi Breezer over 3 ice cubes in a whiskey sour glass, stir, and serve.

name: Big Comfy Couch
instructions: Stir ingredients with a few ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Big Hicky
instructions: The Big Hicky uses 100% cranberry juice, not the commercial kinds with sugar or other juice. This is pure cranberry and very bitter. It gives the cocktail a beautiful deep red with the grenadine, and is not as sweet as others.

name: Big Titty Ho on a Motorcycle
instructions: Add about 4 ice cubes to an old fashioned glass. Add the amaretto, tequila, and whiskey sour mix, then Pepsi. Garnish with an umbrella and serve.

name: Bighorn
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass on the rocks, and serve.

name: Bill Murray and The Ghostbusters
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a beer mug, stir lightly and serve.

name: Birch Beam
instructions: Pour Jim Beam whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with birch beer, stir lightly and serve.

name: Black Death #4
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake vigorously until chilled. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Black Rose #2
instructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 into a shot glass. Add the Chartreuse and softly pour the Frangelico liqueur on top for a cloudy efffect before serving.

name: Black Russian #4
instructions: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mixing glass with a few ice cubes and stir well. Pour that and the Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass, and stir. Pour Guinness on top from a height to create a creamy head, and serve.

name: Blackberry Lane
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Blood
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a Champagne flute filled with crushed or shaven ice. Add more syrup if necessary to obtain a blood red complexion, and serve.
