name: Bloody Demon From Hell
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large glass. Garnish with a radish or a celery stick, and serve.

name: Bloody Tampon #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bloomer Dropper
instructions: Add the vodka, peaches and pink lemonade to a blender. Fill the rest of the blender up with ice; blend well. Pour into cocktail glasses, and serve.

name: Blue Haze
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a large punch bowl with a large block of ice.

name: Bombeirinho
instructions: Pour the cachaca into a shot glass unchilled. Add the grenadine drops and serve.

name: Border Patrol
instructions: Combine all ingredients except cinnamon in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Sprinkle the top with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Brazilian Bitch
instructions: Build ingredients in order listed in a highball glass, Coca-cola on top, and serve.

name: Bullfrog #4
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a punch bowl, and serve.

name: Burberry Bulldog
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Pour in the vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur and Irish cream. Stir, then fill up the glass with equal portions of milk and Dr. Pepper soda. Stir again and serve.

name: Burning Demon Piss
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo tequila, Southern Comfort peach liqueur, Captain Morgan spiced rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a beer mug. Add hot sauce and an extremely hot cup of coffee, then top with Bacardi and serve.

name: Cactus Cooler
instructions: Fill a shot glass half with triple sec, half mandarin vodka; then drop into a pint glass half-filled with Rockstar energy drink, and serve.

name: Captain Defender
instructions: Fill a highball glass almost completely with ice cubes or cracked ice. Add the Captain Morgan spiced rum, Coca-cola and Sprite. Stir and serve.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #4
instructions: Mix Captain Morgan spiced rum, Yukon Jack whisky and Malibu coconut rum together in a whiskey sour glass over ice. Add a splash of lime juice, top with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Captain Nemo
instructions: Combine vodka, clamato juice, horseradish, lime juice, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with cracked black pepper, garnish with a squid and serve.

name: Captain Vita Coco
instructions: Make ice cubes using Vita Coco coconut water. Add to a glass of your favorite rum, and serve.

name: Caribbean Barefooted
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a parfait glass filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Carnival Apple
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass or shaker tin with some ice. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Carrie Special
instructions: Combine the 151 rum and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps together in a mixing glass. Add the cranberry juice and shake; serve shot glasses.

name: Celtic War Party
instructions: This drink finds its origins in British Columbia, Canada. The contributor (Dan) invented this recipe by tinkering with his own tastes slowly, trying to find something with a strong, complex flavour. Warning: this drink will sneak up on you fast.

name: Cemetary Cider
instructions: Combine the rums and whiskey over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Add the apple cider and stir lightly. Pour into a pint glass, and serve.

name: Champagne Bleu
instructions: Serve in a chilled Champagne flute.

name: Charles Bronson
instructions: Combine all whiskeys together in a 24 oz. mug glass with about 4-5 ice cubes. Fill the glass with any brand of birch beer, and serve.

name: Charley Town Beatdown
instructions: Stir Crown Royal whisky and butterscotch schnapps together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a large shot glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Corona
instructions: Pour the maraschino cherry juice into a bottle of Corona Extra lager, shake gently before drinking.

name: Chili Marnier
instructions: Muddle (crush) the chili pepper, lime wedges, and sugar in a chilled old fashioned glass. Add Grand Marnier. Add ice cubes to just over the top of the liquid, stir until sugar dissolves, and serve. Can substitute 1 oz lime juice and plain sugar for the brown sugar.

name: Chris Anders Shot
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Christmas In The Tropics
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay coconut rum into a cup, then pour in the eggnog after. Stir it around a bit to mix it together, and serve.

name: Cinnamon Apple Shooter
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Citrus Kiss
instructions: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Citrus Tequila Fizz
instructions: 1. Juice a lemon and a lime half; cut into wedges and add into a cocktail shaker along with the mint leaves and sugar (use superfine sugar or simple syrup if available). Muddle ingredients to release oils from the mint leaves. 2. Add the tequila, lemon and lime juices and club soda; stir and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Closed Coffin
instructions: Stir in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cold Hearted Threesome
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Commodore Highball
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add Coca-cola, squeeze in the lemon wedges and serve.

name: Cotton Candy
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a blender. Blend well, pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Counter Strike
instructions: Fill a highball glass half way with ice cubes, then combine all liquids and pour over the ice. The drink turns a nice unearthly green colour. You can add more or less Sobe if desired. Other energy drinks can be substituted; AMP is a good alternative.

name: Country Time
instructions: Mix vodkas, lemon juice, and raspberry schnapps together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake until very cold. Strain into a large shot glass. Top with a splash of sprite, and serve.

name: Bald Slut
instructions: Mix ingredients together with ice and serve in a rocks glass with or without ice.

name: Buttersweet Symphony
instructions: Almost fill a shot glass with butterscotch schnapps. Top with Angostura bitters forming a very thin layer across the top, and serve.

name: Cowgirl Quencher
instructions: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps into a margarita glass filled with crushed ice. Fill the rest of the glass with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine, top with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Crapple Juice
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass, and serve.

name: Creamsicle #8
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass with an orange and cherry garnish, and serve.

name: Cuban Immigrant
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Delaware Morning Breath
instructions: Add all ingredients to a large container with plenty of ice. Add pieces of fruit (lemons and oranges), stir well and serve in punch cups or glasses.

name: Dimple Cocktail
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry and orange juices. Garnish the drink with 2 cherries, and serve.

name: Dirty Rollie Fingers
instructions: Dirty Rollie Fingers was invented at the Douglass House Saloon in Houghton, Michigan

name: Dirty Shirley
instructions: Pour the vodka over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the glass the rest of the way with Sprite. Add grenadine, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Dirty South
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Dirty Volcano
instructions: This drink was mentioned in a recent episode of Desperate Housewives, contributed and invented by Casey Bleeker after a failed chemistry test.

name: Doggystyle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well, and serve.

name: El Chupacabras
instructions: Pour the mango juice and Dr. Pepper Vanilla to a cocktail glass. In two seperate mixing glasses, mix the Patron tequila with the lime juice, and the Agavero tequila with the lemon juice. Pour both into the cocktail glass. Top with Tapatio, and serve.

name: Antwoine
instructions: Layer ingredients in a shot glass (Kahlua at the bottom). Chill and serve as a shot.

name: Face Raper
instructions: Mix evenly in a shot glass and serve cold.

name: Fancy Panties
instructions: Stir the pink lemonade and vodka in a glass filled with ice. Add Brut champagne or sparkling wine until full, and serve.

name: Federal Law
instructions: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add the Absolut Kurant vodka, Chambord raspbery liqueur, sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir well. Splash tonic water; stir again. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Filthy Bitch
instructions: Mix drink ingredients together, shake for 5 seconds, serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Best enjoyed while bubbles are still "fizzing".

name: Final Exam Relief
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay coconut rum, amaretto almond liqueur and triple sec into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and fill up the rest of the glass with equal portions of pineapple juice and Sprite. Top with a little grenadine and some cherries if desired, and serve.

name: Flaming Delicious
instructions: This drink was originally invented in 1974 by Edwin Marshall at his bar in Philadelphia. Its popularity spread to other area bars until it became a nationwide sensation.

name: Flaming Engineer
instructions: The Flaming Engineer was created by some engineering students at Ryerson University in Toronto about 8 years ago. It is a very popular drink in and around the University campus, and wherever a Ryerson Engineer is.

name: Flaming Meggers
instructions: Place a dash of Tabasco sauce on some body part. Lick the Tabasco off, take the shot, and bite the Jalepeno, then hold on for dear life.

name: Flaming Orchard
instructions: 1. Place a 1-oz shot glass on a saucer, then fill the glass with equal amount of peach schnapps and Midori melon liqueur. Across the rim of the glass, place a slice of lime and sprinkle with caster sugar. Pour sambuca over the lime so it flows onto the saucer. Ignite the lime and the liquor on the saucer. 2. To drink, either wait till the flame goes out, or blow it out if you could. Drink from the shot glass, pour the liquor on the saucer into the glass, drink, then suck on the lime.

name: Flatliner #3
instructions: Pour the tequila over the chartreuse in a 2-oz shot glass. Add desired amount of tabasco sauce, and serve. (1-2 drops for the weak, 3-4 for the mid-strength, 4-7 for the adventurous, 7+ for the herculean efforts.)

name: Four Jokers
instructions: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass with/without ice as desired. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Frozen O
instructions: Combine Kool-Aid orange mix, sugar, and Bacardi O orange rum in a blender with ice. Blend until smooth and frosty, pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Fruit Daydream
instructions: Combine all above ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into glasses and serve.

name: General Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Georgia Promenade
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Pour in the Stoli peach vodka, lemonade and cranberry juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Gin Cup
instructions: Place the mint sprigs and sugar syrup in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir about to bruise the mint slightly. Fill the glass with chopped / shaved ice. Add the lemon juice and gin and stir until a frost begins to form. Decorate with extra mint sprigs, and serve.

name: Gin-berry
instructions: Muddle the raspberries in the base of a whiskey sour glass with creme de mure and creme de framboise, then add crushed ice filling the glass. Add rest of ingredients and stir until the drink is a blood red color, and serve.

name: Gingeronno
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Girasole Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Glow Job
instructions: Pour on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass, stir and serve.

name: Golden Almonds
instructions: Stir ingredients together with some ice cubes in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Golden Shower #2
instructions: Combine the three ingredients in a single shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Grandes Smoothie
instructions: Put ice cream, banana, strawberries, and strawberry syrup in a blender. Blend until consistency of a smoothie. Add vodka, and blend again. Serve in regular drinking glass.

name: Grape Beam
instructions: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with grape soda, and serve.

name: Grizzy Adams
instructions: Stir the vodka and the 7-Up Plus in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Grown-up Lemonade
instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec and amaretto over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill glass with desired amount of lemonade. Garnish with lemon slice, and serve.

name: Gummi Bear
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve with a straw.

name: Hairy Muff
instructions: Stir all ingredients together with crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hard Core Hunch Punch
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a large punch bowl or other container. Add ice to chill, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Russian
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hot Apple Pie #3
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Jim
instructions: Stir the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey and the hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hot Chicana
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, DeKuyper Hot Damn cinnamon schnapps and Tabasco sauce into shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Hot Rod
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with some ice cubes. Garnish with pineapple, and serve.

name: Desperation Cocktail
instructions: Using a lime juicer, squeeze the juice of two whole limes into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the dry vermouth and top off with ginger ale. Stir until all ingredients are mixed. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Hot Tequila
instructions: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Hulk
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq liqueur and Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-UP, stir well, and serve.

name: I See Dead People
instructions: Serve in equal parts in a 2-oz shot glass.

name: Kick in the Nuts
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apeachy Procaccini
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Crime Loyal
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Doggy Style On the Beach
instructions: Add all ingredients (except 7-Up) to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes, Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass, top with 7-Up, and serve.

name: Iceberg #2
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Layer the blue curacao on top, and the cream on top of that. Serve.

name: Iced Comfort
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Iced Wild Turkey Hill
instructions: Pour Wild Turkey whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Turkey Hill iced tea, stir and serve.

name: Ichabod Crane
instructions: Blend the ice cream with the Bols Pumpkin Smash and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur in a blender. Blend well and pour into a Champagne flute. Pour Bacardi 151 rum over the top and garnish with nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Icy Ice
instructions: 1. Stir the juices together in a freezable container and freeze until ice. Crush the ice finely with the lemon zest, and mix salt into the crushed ice. 2. Pour the Pepsi into a highball glass, and quickly add the ice cream and cover with the crushed ice to prevent it flowing out. Serve.

name: Incredible Chak
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve. Adjust amounts to taste if desired.

name: Indy Melonade
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Infidelity
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice, and shake well. Strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Bud Bomb Breakfast
instructions: Fill a chilled beer mug about 3/4 full with lager, top off with the V8 spicy vegetable juice, and serve.

name: C.R. Sun Tan Lotion
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add ingredients, and stir. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Ronin Grasshopper
instructions: Stir in an old-fashioned glass, and serve. Give to a captive double agent to get information out of them. (Reference in the 1998 movie "Ronin".)

name: Strudel
instructions: Stir rum and apple juice together in a highball glass. Add a pinch of cinnamon, and serve.

name: Spicy Delirious Fire
instructions: Spicy Delirious Fire (fuego picante del delirio) is a fiery cocktail popular in northern Zacatecas, Mexico.
Serve on ice in a highball glass.

name: 1964 Car Bomb
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a beer mug filled with Budweiser, and serve.

name: 2 Step
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a tall glass, and serve.

name: 2000 Flushes #2
instructions: In a shaker over ice, pour equal parts of vodka and Malibu. Add a splash of pineapple juice, and blue curacao (for color). Shake and strain into shot glasses, and serve.
Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: 352 Shot
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: 358 Magnum
instructions: The 358 Magnum burns going down then gives a cool blast back up.

name: 3rd World Mocha
instructions: Serve hot in a coffee mug.

name: 5 Deadly Venoms
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well (until red-ish). Serve into shot glasses as appropriate.

name: 57 Chevy #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: 7 Coconuts
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.
Add to a shot glass, and shoot.

name: A Crow Left of the Murder
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve with a straw.

name: Hot Irish #2
instructions: Add cloves to the lemon. Pour into a heat-proof goblet, sweeten with white sugar (to taste), and serve.

name: A Roa
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker, shake 3 - 4 times and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: AA Discount
instructions: Mix the vodka with the Tabasco sauce. Add the Red Bull and drink immediately.

name: Absinthe Czech Ritual
instructions: Pour 3/4 of a full shot of absinthe in a sundae glass. put a brown sugar cube on a spoon with holes in it and rest it on the rim of the sundae glass. Pour the remaining 1/4 of the shot of absinthe onto the brown sugar cube, light the brown sugar on fire (put the flame under the spoon). Let the flame burn for a minute while the brown sugar drips into the glass and caramelizes. stir the caramelized sugar into the glass. Add the water to the glass, stir again. and serve.

name: Absolut Chambulls
instructions: Pour the Absolut vodka, Red Bull and sparkling wine into a pitcher 1/3 filled with ice. Serve into wine glasses.

name: Absolut Hunk
instructions: Pour the Absolut Vanilia vodka over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add the gomme syrup, fresh lime juice and a splash of pineapple juice. Shake or stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Absolut Train Wreck
instructions: Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a cup, and serve.

name: ACID Pitchshifter
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass rimmed with lemon zest and sugar.

name: Agent Orange #3
instructions: Stir in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Albino Russian
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: Alize and Hpno
instructions: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Allegro
instructions: Stir ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Almond Gravy
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a small old-fashioned glass. Add a few grains of grinded coffee. Mix with a spoon, drink a shot.

name: Almond Grog
instructions: Boil some water and place a sugar cube in a coffee mug. Pour over the amaretto, then add the hot water and stir until dissolved. Add milk to taste, and serve.

name: Almond Joy #3
instructions: Measure in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Amalyzer
instructions: Shake the amarula cream, vodka and coffee liqueur together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top up with cola, and serve.

name: Amaretto 151
instructions: Pour amaretto, sweet and sour mix, and bacardi into a cocktail shaker. Shake and serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Amaretto Chi-City
instructions: Mix Amaretto di Saronno in equal parts with E&J or if u choose a bit more E&J. Mix to your taste with sweet and sour mix in a shaker. Add ice and shake well. Pour into your favorite glass and watch for the hook - its real slow and tasty.

name: Amaretto Sour #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Sour #3
instructions: Pour the amaretto, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker two-thirds full of ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sour glass. Garnish with the cherry, and serve.

name: Amaretto Sourball
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Amarula Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Amavel on the Rocks
instructions: Amavel on the Rocks is invented by Kacey Cash (kaceycash.com). Amavel is Portuguese for "Lovely" so the name translates to "Lovely on the Rocks." Nice alcohol content but easily passed as juice.

name: Ambrosia Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Anabolic Steroid #2
instructions: Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass - Cointreau on top, and serve.

name: Andes Candies
instructions: Add the Ice 101 to a tall glass. Fill to the top with chocolate milk. Mix very thoroughly and keep drink as cold as possible until finished. Tastes exactly like Andes Candies.

name: Angel Highball
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Angelfire
instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. of each; Stolichnaya Rasberi vodka, Absolut Mandrin vodka, Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice, orange juice and pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Animazement
instructions: Build in a glass over ice.

name: Anthrax
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Antoines Tarred Image
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kist from Jim
instructions: Pour the Jim Beam into a collins glass. Fill with Sunkist soda depending on how strong you want it. Stir and serve.

name: Apeach Martini
instructions: Add the first three ingredients into an iced shaker. Shake to the rhythm of your favorite summertime tune. Strain into a cocktail glass, and sink the grenadine to the bottom. Gently stir the grenadine up to give the drink a peach color, and serve.

name: Apple Jacks
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old fashioned glass and serve.

name: Apple Martini #3
instructions: Chill a champagne or cocktail glass. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into glass and serve.

name: Apple Pie Shot #4
instructions: Pour liqueurs into a shot glass, top with cinnamon and serve.

name: Apple Pie Punch
instructions: Put the juice, cider, and cinnamon sticks into a pan and let simmer on the stove for about 2 hours (not boil). Turn off heat, pour in 1 liter or 2/3 liter Everclear (no taste of alcohol) to the batch and pour into punch cups. Very potent, tastes exactly like apple pie.

name: Apple Pie Margarita
instructions: Chill all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice. Rim the glass with cinnamon and sugar (liberally). Shake and strain into a margarita glass, there will be usually be a lot left in the tin, for seconds or thirds. Sauza tequila (a light tequila) is recommended for this cocktail. Enjoy, tastes just like sweet apple pie!

name: Apple Tango
instructions: Peel grapefruit and orange and remove all the seeds and pith. Core the apple and chop coarsely. Place all the fruits in a blender until smooth. Chill in the refrigereator for about 30-45 mins. Pour into a jug, add lemon juice and syrup and stir well to mix. Fill glass with ice shavings or ice cubes, pour and garnish according to your liking.

name: Appletini #2
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: 3 Fingers of Ron Burgundy
instructions: Stir ingredients with/without ice in a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Appleschlager
instructions: Pour equal parts Goldschlager and apple vodka directly into a glass of your choice (brand of vodka also of your choice, although good quality vodka is recommended), make sure they have mixed thoroughly, and drink. Ice is optional; the drink is better cold.

name: Aquatini
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ashy Larry
instructions: Add pink lemonade to the Everclear. Then add the watermelon Smirnoff. Top with whipped cream and take it to the head.

name: Asskicker
instructions: Pour the four ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake very well. Pour the shaken mixture into a cocktail glass over ice. Serve with a cherry and a orange slice.

name: Asskicker #2
instructions: Add the vodka, everclear, coconut juice and pineapple juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up, stir and serve.

name: Atomic Green
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a sugar frosted highball glass. Add the vodka and a few ice cubes. Top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Atomic Jager Bomb
instructions: Fill a glass with roughly 4 - 6oz. of Sparks alcoholic energy drink. Drop in a shot of Jagermeister and shoot.

name: Axel
instructions: Add the vodka and Roncoco liqueur to a a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Pour into a shot glass and top with a bit of grenadine. Drink the shot, cover the glass with your hand and with a straw, inhale the alcohol vapor that lasts in the shot (with your hand still on it).

name: B-52 #3
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Baby Becher
instructions: Invented by pharmacist Jan Becher in the Czech Republic, this was originally intended as a tonic. Said to be an aphrodesiac.

name: Bacardi Limon and Pepsi
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bacio del Muerte
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Backdraft #2
instructions: Add the rum and amaretto to a wine glass, and ignite the liquid. Cover the wine glass with the palm of your hand. Lift your hand off of the rim just a little on one side. Suck out the fumes, without exhaling take the shot and then exhale.

name: Back in the Old Days 1963
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a shot glass, stir and drink.

name: Back Packer
instructions: Add the vodka, orange juice and 7-up to a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bad News Bear
instructions: Stir ingredients together and serve in a cup.

name: Bahama Mama #4
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour with ice into a hurricane glass and serve with an orange slice.

name: Bahamas Bacardi
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Ball Sweat
instructions: Put 1 or 1/2 teaspoon of salt into a shot glass. Pour the tequila in. Then if you have the skills, layer the irish cream on top (or mix). Shoot. Only use the cheapest ingredients, the worse the better.

name: Bam Bam
instructions: Add the tequila to a shot glass; top with 7-Up and serve.

name: Bamm Passion
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with several ice cubes. Shake once, pour into a large cocktail or hurricane glass and serve with a slice of lime.

name: Banana Rocket
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 1 minute until thick and smooth consistency. Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a strawberry and a straw, and serve.

name: Banana Split #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice, but be careful to not build up too much pressure from the cream soda. Mix, then pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish as desired. Drink slowly.

name: Banana Split #4
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a parfait glass over ice, and serve.

name: Bacardi Smoothie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice, to make a smoothie-like consistancy. Pour into a pina-colada glass, garnish as desired and serve.

name: Bazooka Joe #3
instructions: Fill a shot glass with 1/2 DeKuyper Grape Pucker schnapps and 1/2 Bacardi Limon. Fill a lowball or old-fashioned glass with enough red bull to reach top of shot glass when dropped in, then drop the shot glass in and drink.

name: BC Snowball
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a frosty champagne flute, and serve.

name: Bear Juice
instructions: Combine ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Apple Pie Shot #5
instructions: Mix the DeKuyper apple pucker and Goldschlager in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Top with about a 1/4" of amaretto, and serve.

name: Beaver Shot
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass, and serve.

name: Beer and Clamato
instructions: Preferably use a regular beer (blonde) or a light beer. Pour clamato into the glass (3-4 oz for a 12 oz beer) and top with beer. Very pleasant in hot weather or when you want to cut down on alcohol.

name: Beer Cooler
instructions: Add both ingredients to a beer mug, and serve.

name: Beeta Bomb
instructions: Pour Red Bull into a small glass. Add vodka. In a double-shot glass pour the peach schnapps and carefully place the shot glass into the small glass containing the Red Bull and vodka. Serve.

name: Clementine Martini
instructions: Add the vodka, orange curacao and triple sec to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Float the cranberry juice, then the soda water, the the ginger ale. Garnish with a clementine wedge (if available) or a lightly flamed orange peel twist, and serve.

name: Big Balls
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Big Bear
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Big Red Hooter #2
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a pint glass or 500ml tall glass. Fill to the top with ice. Carefully add the vodka which should remain seperate above the Midori. Pour orange and cranberry juice in equal measures until the glass is 3/4 full. Pour a ring of cherry brandy. Add 1/3 of a can of red-bull (or similar energy drink), and finally pour a ring of galliano on top, and serve. When done correctly the glass will be almost full, there will be a green layer at the bottom from the midori and the rest of the drink will be red.

name: Bikini Martini
instructions: Add equal parts of each ingredient to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a chilled martini glass with an orange slice, and serve.

name: Bill Violator
instructions: Add all ingredients in equal parts to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Biohazard
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a margarita glass, and serve.

name: Bitch Blaster
instructions: Pour the Crown Royal and Peachtree schnapps into a shot glass. Fill a plastic cup or old-fashioned glass with sufficient Red Bull (and with/without ice), then drop the shot into it, and serve.

name: Bitch on Wheels #2
instructions: This cocktail is served at The Vortex in Atlanta. Other versions at other bars use Pernod and white creme de menthe, but this is the real thing. A gorgeous emerald green beauty that will kick your ass.

name: Bitter Tea
instructions: Make tea, mix with juice and Campari. Stir well. Pomegranate juice can probably substituted with 100% cranberry juice as well. Tazo tea could be subsituted with a strong hibiscus tea, or another strong fruity tea. Use 1 or 2 ounces of Campari depending upon how bitter you want the drink. If you like your tea sweet add 1 tsp of sugar.

name: Bittersweet Symphony
instructions: Add all ingredients (except Campari) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Add the Campari to create a multi-colored cocktail and serve.

name: Black and Blue Who Who
instructions: Black and Blue Who Who is a small gem of a drink by D. Fisher who lives in Michigan. He has been a bartender for over 10 years, and has many shot creations. This one tastes like Fruity Pebbles.

name: Black Jesus
instructions: Float the Johnnie Walker scotch over the Jagermeister, and serve.

name: Black Metal
instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a whiskey sour glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Black on Black
instructions: Fill half a pint glass with the Smirnoff Black Ice and then slowly fill the rest of the glass with Guinness. The two should stay seperated. Serve.

name: Black Opal
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a beer glass. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge. When done right it should taste like a grape otter pop.

name: Black Sea Urchin
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Black Silk Panties
instructions: Pour the Baja Rosa into a shot glass. Drizzle the black sambuca on top, allow them to mix, and serve.

name: Black Tooth #2
instructions: Pour the amaretto into a large beer mug. Gently pour in the pint of Guinness, lightly stir, and serve.

name: Bleeding Nazi
instructions: Add the tomato juice, Tabasco, Worcestershire, and Jager into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge if you like, and serve.

name: Blind Bat
instructions: Pour the Coca-cola into a tall glass, followed by the vodka. Add just a splash of Bacardi rum just for taste. Sit back and enjoy.

name: Bloody Sleigh Ride
instructions: Pour together into a shot glass and serve.

name: Blood of Christ
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Blood Orange Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and pour into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of blood orange if available.

name: Blood-Orange Margarita
instructions: The blood orange, with its sweet, deep red colored flesh, was most likely the result of a mutation that occurred in 17th century Sicily. Today blood oranges are common in Mediterranean cuisine. In most varieties of blood oranges even the pulp and skin are slightly less sweet and more bitter than other orange varieties.

name: Bloodthirsty Pirate
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Bloody Dutchman
instructions: Stir the grenadine, strawberry daiquiri mix and Everclear together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Von Dutch, and serve.

name: Bloody Jager
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Bloody Leech
instructions: Place the crushed popsicle into the bottom of a tall glass. Add vodka (to taste) and kool-aid. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Bloody Passion #2
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into a tall glass with ice. Add the pineapple juice, then follow with a few splashes of grenadine. Stir and serve.

name: Bloody Urine
instructions: Pour the liquor into a collins glass with 3 ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew and lime juice, and lastly the Tropicana, and serve.

name: Bloody Vampire
instructions: Pour the spiced rum and Kool-Aid into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a highball glass (incl. ice) and serve.

name: Blowjob
instructions: Layer in a shot glass; Irish cream on top, and serve.

name: Blue Bomb
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a beer glass. Drink fast.

name: Blue Bombsicle
instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass over ice, and stir. Garnish with raspberries, and serve.

name: Blue Brain Trasher
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a large mug or container and add 4 large ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Devil
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well, and serve.

name: Blue Dong
instructions: Mix Cointreau and blue curacao liqueur together in a highball glass and fill up with Sprite soda.

name: Blue Hawaiian #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Helena
instructions: Combine vodka, blue curacao, lime juice, and honey in a shaker with ice. Shake well, then pour through a strainer into a cocktail glass containing ice. Makes 1 serving.

name: Blue Hotty
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Pina Colada glass (can be decorated by dipping the top of the glass in syrup and then in sugar). Also possible to use spoon to achieve layers. Serve.

name: Blue Incan
instructions: Place some mint leaves in the bottom of a highball glass. Bruise them with a muddle. Add ice and pour in the blue curacao and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda as desired, stir and serve.

name: Blue Insanity
instructions: Place some ice in a highball glass. Add the UV, blue curacao and triple sec. Top with Smirnoff, and serve.

name: Blue Monster
instructions: Combine in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Blue Pixie Stick
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Blue Richie
instructions: Stir the vanilla vodka, blueberry juice and apple juice together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 2 - 3 fresh blueberries.

name: Blue Russian
instructions: Place 2 - 3 crushed ice cubes in a parfait glass. Pour the blue curacao over the ice, and add the vodka. Top with cream, and serve.

name: Bohus Jude
instructions: Pour the gin, vodka, rum, tequila and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice, and stir. Garnish as desired, and serve.

name: Boilerjager
instructions: Drop a double-shot glass of Jagermeister into a 3/4 pint of Samuel Adams, and serve.

name: Bombay Cosmo
instructions: Pour the gin, Cointreau and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lemon twist, and serve.

name: Bomber
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bone
instructions: Pour the Jagermeister and coconut rum into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with an energy drink, and serve.

name: Bone #2
instructions: Pour in order into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Bone Fish Shot
instructions: Chill the Malibu. Shake with ice in a stainless steel shaker. Pour 1/3 to 1/2 can of Red Bull into a highball glass. Add Malibu by straining into the glass, and serve.

name: Bottle Cap
instructions: Mix the Sour Puss and rootbeer schnapps together in a shot glass. Mix the 7-Up and margarita mix together in a highball glass. Drop the shot glass into the highball glass, and serve.

name: Booty Call 101
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Boro Punch
instructions: Add all ingredients to a large cooler. Serve as appropriate.

name: Boston Cream Pie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, in equal parts. Shake vigorously. Pour into a margarita or large cocktail glass with a cocoa dipped rim, and serve.

name: Bouzo
instructions: Stir together in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Black Cherrymeister
instructions: Pour the jagermeister into a shot glass, then add the soda. Take the shot. Also works well with six soda to one jager as a cocktail.

name: Pineapple Bomber #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Brahma Bull
instructions: Mix the Red Bull with the Bombay Sapphire gin. Serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Aruba
instructions: Pour the Absolut Raspberri Vodka into an ice filled cocktail glass. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur and Sprite and then the grenadine. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Big Red
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Brandy Mexi
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker. Shake it for 10 seconds and pour it out into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, then serve.

name: Breath of God #2
instructions: Add the Bacardi silver rum, Crown Royal and Wild Turkey whiskeys to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned/lowball glass. Splash cranberry juice on top, float the Bacardi 151 on top, and serve. There is a routine that you do while taking this shot. 1. Breath in deep 2. Exhale ALL the air out 3. Take the shot 4. Immediately after the last drop is down inhale deep. 5. Hold Breath 6. Slowly let out air through nose. The headrush is phenomonal. If you do not know how to float a liquor well then you may mess this up.

name: Brian Auel
instructions: Brian Auel is a dynamic individual whose life on earth was cut short in a car accident at the age of 22. People in Lakeland, FL have now been drinking this concoction in his memory.

name: Brown and Red Weekend
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend well; serve in glasses of choice.

name: Brown Cow #3
instructions: Pour the Coca-Cola into a large cup, add 3 scoops of vanilla ice cream, and serve.

name: Brown Elephant
instructions: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a shaker. Shake and pour into a glass. Lightly dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Bubble Bomb
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bubble Cream Martini
instructions: Combine vodka and butterscotch liqueur in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake for 30 seconds and pour into a martini or any other glass. Pour cream soda into glass, stir and serve.

name: Bubble gum #3
instructions: All ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously, pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bucatini
instructions: Invented by Patrick in the cold region of Upstate New York during hockey season. It gained popularity by a select few who enjoy the taste of black licorice.

name: Bucket
instructions: Mix in five gallon bucket. If too strong mix to taste.

name: Bull Driver
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Incredible Goose
instructions: Stir in equal amounts in a highball glass over ice, and serve.

name: Bulls Eye
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with a slice of tomato on the side, and serve.

name: Burnt Mexican
instructions: Make a regular shot of tequila; add 5 drops of tabasco sauce, and serve.

name: Burried Treasure #2
instructions: Pour the rum and Goldschlager into a shot glass and serve. Also works best when screaming "Arrrr!" immediately after consumption.

name: Butter Cookie
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: ButterCrown
instructions: Add both ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Butterscotch Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with whipped cream and caramel.

name: Buttery Nipple #4
instructions: Pour the Buttershots liqueur into the shot glass first, then add the Tequila Rose liqueur, and serve.

name: C4
instructions: Layer ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass; Rumple Minze bottom, then Hot Damn!, then Jagermeister, and finally Midori on top. Serve.

name: Cafe Oliver
instructions: Pour the espresso into a small cup. Add sambuca, and serve.

name: Cajun Water
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, grenadine and bitters into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with champagne, stir and serve.

name: California Stripper
instructions: Pour the raspberry schnapps into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add half-and-half to taste, and serve.

name: Campari and Bitter Lemon
instructions: Pour the Campari over ice in a highball glass. Add bitter lemon, garnish with a lemon peel, and serve.

name: Canadian Hangover
instructions: Stir ingredients (except cream) together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve. Top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Canadian Hillbilly
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Canadian Pussy
instructions: "Learned this at a resort in the Northernmost region of Minnesota, where it might as well be Canada, eh? Enjoy with two of your North of the Border pals!"

name: Cancun Current
instructions: Pour the 151, Mailbu, and pineapple juice into a mixer full of ice, shake, and strain into a rocks glass. Tilt the rocks glass and pour the Chambord onto the glass. The Chambord will sink to the bottom giving you a golden top layer and a purple bottom layer. Serve.

name: Cancun Rum Runner
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake for a few seconds. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry, and serve.

name: Candy Apple Martini #2
instructions: Shake alcohol and grenadine with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker; strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with ginger ale, and serve.

name: Cannonball
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan Tattoo into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with coke with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Coral
instructions: Pour vodka over a handful of ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add cranberry-raspberry juice, and shake for 5 secs. Pour mixture into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Captain Bucci
instructions: Pour the rum over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with the Canada Dry ginger ale, and serve.

name: Captain Crisp
instructions: Add the rums to a cocktail with 2 ice cubes and fill the glass with the Fresca and Juice Juice in equal parts, and serve.

name: Captain Guy
instructions: Served with ice. Poor the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Add the raspberry iced tea (from concentrate for best results) and serve.

name: Captain Morgan on Acid
instructions: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a double shot glass. Add 2-3 drops of grenadine, and serve.

name: Captain Slim
instructions: Stir together in a beer mug over ice, and serve.

name: Caramel Apple Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Caramel Apple Shot
instructions: Shake ingredients together in cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cardiac Arrest
instructions: Stir ingredients well in a wine goblet, and serve.

name: Caribbean Sunset #2
instructions: Pour vodka, rum, and both juices into a martini shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a collins glass over ice. Finish with a splash of grenadine for the sunset effect.

name: Carolina Piece of Ass
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Caribbean Sunset #3
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Carrot Cake #3
instructions: Pour ingredients into a whiskey sour glass with ice, stir slightly, and serve.

name: Celtic Kick
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cesar Chavez
instructions: Maxaemillion Capone created this drink in Los Angeles, California to celebrate Cinco De Mayo. It has gained popularity in Hispanic clubs because of its delicious taste, resemblance to the Mexican flag and unique method of consumption.

name: Chambord Margarita
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour over ice in a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Serve.

name: Champagne Cup #2
instructions: Combine in a large deep bowl surrounded with ice and leave for 1 hour. Stir before serving in champagne glasses.

name: Champagne Jello Shots
instructions: Add the Jello and boiling water and stir until powder is dissolved. Allow to cool to room temperature. Slowly add the champagne and stir in. Pour into an ice cube tray and refridgerate until set. To serve, dip trays in hot water for 5 seconds then run a knife around the outside of the shot. Place in a large bowl and serve with tongs.

name: Champagne Punch #3
instructions: Mix well with ice cubes. Add fruit in season. Surround bowl with ice, and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Chaotic Pink
instructions: Mix cans of lemonade and limeade first, then add vodka, soda, and beer. Mix well in punch bowl or bucket. Rim edges of cups with pink cosmo sugar for added effect.

name: Charap Margarita
instructions: Freeze the Minute Maid punch cooler (individual pack) in the freezer until icy. Take it out and blend it with some ice then add the absolut vodka and margarita mix. Pour into a margarita glass and serve.

name: Chase Manhattan
instructions: Pour the gin, orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir, and serve.

name: ChaTiffany Especial
instructions: Fill a glass halfway with Smirnoff vodka and split the remaining three ingredients equally over ice or chill in freezer. Can also be made as shot.

name: Cheesecake Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cherry Blossom #3
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff Black Cherry vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with orange juice, adding a splash of sour mix and touch of grenadine before serving.

name: Cherry Blossom
instructions: Add ingredients to a lowball glass and stir vigourously. When ingredients are mixed, shoot back.

name: Cherry Bomb #8
instructions: Pour the amaretto and Midori into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to fill, stir well. Add a straw and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #9
instructions: Stir the whisky and the wine together in a sour glass. Top with cola, and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb Shot
instructions: Pour vodka and Red Bull energy drink into a small glass. Add grenadine slowly so it sinks to the bottom without mixing for a cool layered effect.

name: Cherry Choking
instructions: Pour the vodka into a shot glass. Add the coke and then a few drops of fresh lemon juice, and serve.

name: Cherry Coke
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Cherry Sour
instructions: Pit cherries. Muddle cherries in glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, and ice. Top with club soda and stir. Garnish with lemon, and serve.

name: Cherrylicious
instructions: Add all ingredients together in a shaker half filled with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chi-Town
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a cup, and serve.

name: Chicago Apple Cider
instructions: Stir the Canadian Mist whisky and Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add apple juice to taste, and serve.

name: Chili Margarita
instructions: This recipe for Chili Margarita came from a Thai restaurant/ bar called the Lava Lounge in Eugene, Oregon (pacific northwest).

name: Chilli Vodka
instructions: Mix the vodka, green chilli (seedless) and lemon cordial in a cocktail mixer and pour it over ice. Now add fresh lemon juice, a pinch of salt and club soda. Stir it with a twizel stick, and serve.

name: China Blue
instructions: This is a extremely popular drink in Japan, China and Hong Kong. Hard to find someone to make this drink in America.

name: Chippy
instructions: Shake all ingredients well w/ ice, ensuring the honey is fully dissolved. Strain into glass and float a thin lemon slice on top, and serve.

name: Choad Shot
instructions: Pour the Captian Morgan spiced rum into a shot glass. Slowly add pina colada mix, let it settle to the bottom. Serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #3
instructions: Pour the Godiva into a shot glass, top with grenadine, and shoot.

name: Chocolate Martini #4
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Bomb
instructions: Dissolve everclear and sugar into a tiny bowl. Pour equal amount into two shot glasses, ignite each shot glass for a couple seconds, then blow them out. Mix the grenadine and chocolate syrup into a third shot glass. Shoot the first two everclear/sugar shots right away followed by the grenadine/chocolate syrup shot.

name: Chocolate Covered Raspberry
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice firstly in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate Martini #5
instructions: Mix cocoa and powdered sugar to taste. Dip rim of a large martini glass in caramel sauce, then in cocoa/sugar mixture. Put a drop of chocolate in bottom of glass. Shake Stoli, creme de cacao and praline liqueur in a shaker to chill. Fill glass almost full with crushed or shaved ice. Strain drink into glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate, and serve.

name: Chocolate Russian
instructions: Pour the Van Gogh chocolate vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste, and serve.

name: Chocolate Shot #2
instructions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Chocolate to Die For
instructions: Pour the chocolate vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add cream soda (IBC preferred), and serve.

name: Chocoquito
instructions: Combine all ingredient in a osterizer. Put on a glass bottle, and then in the refrigerator. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Christmas Cheer #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Christmas Punch
instructions: This is a wonderful punch anytime of the year. although the spices truly lend themselves to the Christmas season.

name: Chucktown Crunk Juice
instructions: Serve in a tall glass without ice.

name: Ciclon and Coke
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Ciclon rum over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add Coke to fill or to taste, and serve.

name: Cinnamon Bun
instructions: Sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon on a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with water. Then turn the glass upside down onto the plate to rim the glass with the cinnamon and sugar mixture. Turn the glass over. Add the hot cider and rum.

name: Cioccolatino
instructions: Pour both ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Citrini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin slice of orange, and serve.

name: Citron and Sprite
instructions: Pour the Absolute Citron into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite, and serve.

name: Citrus Bull
instructions: Pour the vodka and Red Bull into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Classic Walker
instructions: Take an old-fashioned glass and place 2 thin slices of lime and ice into it. Add some perrier to extract the essence of the lime. Add Johnnie Walker Black, with lime juice to finish it off. Add a stirrer and serve.

name: Clear Lemonade
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add shaved ice and serve.

name: Clerico
instructions: A popular fruity punch in Uruguay, South America.

name: Cleveland Steamer
instructions: Mix the first amount of Bacardi 151 with vodka and margarita mix. Layer the last amount of Bacardi on top and light on fire before serving.

name: Coat Hanger
instructions: Stir all ingredients in an old-fashioned glass or double shot glass. Place hand over glass, poke a straw through fingers and suck it all up.

name: Cobalt Kiss
instructions: Mix vodka and blue curacao with 7-Up in an old fashioned glass over ice. Add lime juice. Stir. Garnish with twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cocaracha
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Cocky Apple Pucker Fucker
instructions: Pour all ingrdients (except sloe gin) into a cocktail shaker with a little ice. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Pour sloe gin on top slowly. Squeeze slice of lemon or lime over top. Serve with straw.

name: Coconut Batida
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Coconut Fusion
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass 2/3 with ice. Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

name: Coconut Guitar
instructions: Pour the blue curacao and coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to taste, and serve.

name: Code Red
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps and Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Code Red to taste, and serve.

name: Coffee Nip
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cohutta Twister
instructions: Pour the Malibu, vodka, orange juice and cran-orange juice into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Cointreau Caress
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with grated dark chocolate sprinkled over the top, and serve.

name: Colorado Crackpipe
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a chilled pint glass/beer mug and serve.

name: Cold Smoke
instructions: Pour the SoBe Lizard Blizzard juice into hurricane glass. Add the Jagermeister; serve unstirred.

name: Coldsick
instructions: Add the barenjager to some mint tea, stir well, and serve. Good for colds.

name: Colorado Bulldog #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Combat Cocktail
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice. Add a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Coney Island Iced Tea
instructions: Pour rum and iced tea into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice, and serve.

name: Constellation
instructions: Pour both normal advokaat and cherry advokaat in shot glass at same time, beside each other. Add butterscotch schnappes. Then add dash of blue curacao. There should be no set layers, it should be a mix of colours.

name: Cordial Cherry
instructions: Pour amaretto and Coquila liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a wine glass and add Tequila Rose cream liqueur. Sprinkle dark chocolate shavings on top for garnish/ flavor.

name: Corsair
instructions: Layer ingredients into a sherry glass, Tia Maria on bottom. Serve.

name: Cotton Candy #4
instructions: Pour the Malibu rum and peach schnapps into a cocktail glass. Fill with pink lemonade, or add to taste, and serve.

name: Cotton Candy #3
instructions: Pour the gin, blue hawaiian schnapps and tom collins mix over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Pour into a tall glass or cup top it off with sprite (to taste), and serve.

name: Cotton Club
instructions: Pour the Kahlua and vodka into a cocktail glass. Stir then add shaved ice. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a coffee bean, and serve.

name: Cranberry Kiss
instructions: This is a fruity, very delicious drink in which all ingredients blend perfectly. It tastes great for summer get-togethers as well as seasonal celebrations.

name: Crank Head
instructions: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass. Float the irish cream, and over it float Bombay Sapphire gin carefully. From the center of the glass, drop in a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Cherasberry Rum and Coke
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Craptini
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Crazy Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Serve on ice.

name: Creamy Sam
instructions: Mix equal parts sambuca and cream soda with ice. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Creek Juice
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, add the vodka. Nearly fill with cranberry juice, and float Midori on top. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Crimson Fizz
instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a wine goblet, add a little club soda, and serve.

name: Crimson Passion
instructions: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir slightly, and serve.

name: Crimson Tide #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes, stir slightly and serve.

name: Crispy Crunch
instructions: Shake ingredients together, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Crown & Ginger
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Crown & Coke
instructions: Pour the Crown Royal into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest with coke, and serve.

name: CRS
instructions: Pour the alcohol into a mixing glass with ice, and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the splashes of 7-up and sour mix, and serve.

name: Crum
instructions: Pour hte Crown Royal into a brandy snifter filled with ice. Add Parrot Bay, stir gently and serve.

name: Cruzan Confusion
instructions: Stir together in a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cum Shot #3
instructions: Mix the vodka and Malibu and pour into a double-shot glass. Using a straw that has half and half in it, (by holding your finger on one end) slowly drip a few drops into the shot. The effect is disgusting and amazing. Serve.

name: Cutty Beam
instructions: Combine Cutty Sark scotch, and Jim Beam bourbon in a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: D-Dive
instructions: Fill a pint glass with Bacardi and cola, Drop a shot of Di Saronno into the glass and serve.

name: Daniel Island Cosmopolitan
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with slices of lime and cracked ice. Shake hard and well, then strain into a chilled martini glass. The pulp from the lime slices will act as the garnish. Serve.

name: Dark Blood
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Dark Horse
instructions: Pour the rum, Kahlua, vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca-cola. Garnish with a lemon slice, and serve.

name: Dark Mark
instructions: Combine equal amounts of both ingredients. Serve cold to very cold in wine glass or similar "elegant" presentation. NOTE: Mountain Dew Pitch Black original OR sour (type II) may be used, but sour/II gives a better effect.

name: Dark Side of the Force
instructions: Empty the 4 cans of frozen lemonade into a large container and pour in the Everclear, beer and Red Bull. Mix until all the lemonade has dissolved. Add blackcurrent syrup to taste (this will turn the mixture a dark purple colour). Serve on ice or chilled.

name: Death Shot
instructions: Pour the Opal Nera into a shot glass, then over a spoon add the tequila, and serve.

name: Death by Chocolate Martini
instructions: Mix 3 tablespoons Oreo cookie crumbs (available in most groceries in baking isle) plus 1 tablesoon powdered sugar on a flat plate. Coat rim of chilled cocktail Martini glass with lime and then dip rim of glass in Oreo mixture. Set aside. Mix Godiva liqueur, creme de cacao, vodka, and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into the set aside cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Death By Sex
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into shot glasses, and serve. Makes 2-3 servings.

name: Death Mix
instructions: Mix the gin, vodka, Red Bull, and club soda together in a large container. Add lemon juice and cola if needed (to taste). Serve into appropriate cups/glasses.

name: Deez Nutz
instructions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Deez Nutz #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake. Pour into a collins glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Desert Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Desert Water #2
instructions: Combine over ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass, and serve.

name: Desperate Housewife
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drizzle with chocolate sauce, and serve.

name: Dewmeister
instructions: Pour the Mountain Dew in a glass, then mix in the Jagermeister. A lot of the Jager will sink to the bottom, causing a dark, to green effect. Serve over ice.

name: Diabloow
instructions: Frost the rim of a collins glass with salt. Pour the 4 ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake gently. Pour into the collins glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with wheel of kiwi fruit and lemon twist. Serve.

name: Dick Lick
instructions: Pour ingredients into a double-shot glass, and shoot.

name: Dick Tracy
instructions: Shake and strain up into a large shot glass or small highball glass, and serve.

name: Dingleberry
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Dinguskhan
instructions: Pour the bourbon into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Dirty Ashtray
instructions: Fill a cup or highball glass with ice and combine all ingredients. Stir and serve.

name: Dirty Hooker
instructions: Pour in equal parts into a shot glass, stir and serve.

name: Dirty Hunch Punch
instructions: Cut the fruit (orange, pinapple preferably) into desirable size slices. Mix ingredients into something big enough to hold everything (its a lot). An average sized cooler will probably be your best bet here. NO ICE - Fill up a cup of ice then fill with punch and stir. NOTE: Melted ice will water it down if you dont drink it all in one night. This drink is meant to get you there, fast. It is very strong so if you cant handle it mix it with some citrus soda (Fresca, Sprite) It will make it taste like Orange soda.

name: Dirty Monkey #2
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Dirty Mother #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, stir and serve.

name: Dirty Pat-Trick
instructions: Fill a cup with ice. Pour the Kahlua, then add the root beer, and serve.

name: Dirty Sewer
instructions: Combine ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir, and serve.

name: Dirty South #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with ice and serve.

name: Dirty Swingers
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into 2 shot glasses, and serve.

name: Dissidente
instructions: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an highball glass. Fill half glass with ice cubes. Pour the rum and angostura into the glass. Stir well. Fill with chinotto, and serve.

name: Dixie Car Bomb
instructions: Done just like an Irish Car Bomb, pour the whiskey on top of the schnapps in a shot glass, and drop it into a pint of Pabst beer.

name: Dixie Pearl
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Pour over ice in a tall glass, and serve.

name: Dizzy Fizzy Slammers
instructions: Fill half a shot glass with Bacardi rum. Add a squeeze of lemon juice. Top with Champagne, and serve (to drink, place hand over top, slam on bar and down in one).

name: Dizzy Nights
instructions: Chill ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass, and serve.

name: Do Me Now
instructions: Pour the 151, peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Add a splash of Sprite, and serve cold.

name: Dorm Room Citrus Punch
instructions: In a 10 gallon storage tub, place cut up citrus fruit and vodka. Let sit over night. Then pour in the hawaiian pinch, juice and Sprite. Enjoy. Although seeing as this is made for dorm rooms, any of the ingredients can be replaced for whatever is available.

name: Dorm Room Special
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with lots of ice (most of blender). Serve in tall glasses.

name: Double Muff Diver
instructions: Pour ingredients into highball glass, top with ice and serve.

name: Double Shot From Hell
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with some ice cubes. Shake and strain into double-shot glasses, and serve.

name: Double Southern and Squirt
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Squirt, and serve.

name: Dr. Beer
instructions: Slowly pour the beer into the mug as to not make a head. Pour the Dr. Pepper in over a black & tan spoon (concave side of spoon down). Serve.

name: Dr. Jim
instructions: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Dr. SoCo
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Dr. Zhivago
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper, and serve.

name: Dr. Black
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Dragon Piss #2
instructions: Pour the tequila and Midori liqueur into a cocktail glass. Top with Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Drummer Shot
instructions: Mix ingredients in shot glass and prepare to be tough.

name: Drunken Grandma
instructions: Combine the Grand Marnier and iced tea in a tall glass. Add ice and/or lemon wedge to drink for extra flavor. The iced tea washes out most of the liquor flavor... so add as much Grand Marnier as you wish.

name: Drunken Parrot
instructions: Fill blender 2/3 full of ice. Add all other ingredients. Blend to smoothie consistency. Pour into a highball glass, and garnish at will. Serve.

name: Drunken Stupor
instructions: Pour the rye whiskey, Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a beer mug. Top with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Dutch Punch
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail glass over ice and shake well. Garnish with a lemon wedge, and serve.

name: Edible Panties
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass. Stir and serve with or without straw.

name: Egg Nog - Country Style
instructions: Mix eggs and sugar together until well blended. SLOWLY add brandy. (If added too fast, eggs will break) Add whole milk. Add 1/2 of the heavy cream. In a seperate bowl whip the other 1/2 of the heavy cream until stiff. (soft peak stage will work as well) Fold whipped cream into mixture. Chill and enjoy!

name: El Caribe (Caribbean Martini)
instructions: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum, Cointreau, and blue Curacao in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: El Stoner
instructions: Pour the vodka into a large container. Take the frozen limeade and pour it all inside and stir it. Pour in 12 light beers and stir until it is all liquified. Add ice, and serve.

name: Captain Ron
instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Add the juicy juice orange-tangerine juice, stir and serve.

name: Elk Creek Water
instructions: Combine in a large container with lots of ice; serve into cups.

name: Energy Flux
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Destefano
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir until well mixed, and serve.

name: Erection
instructions: Combine all three ingredients in a cup with plenty of ice. The colder the better!

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Pour coffee liqueur, vodka, and espresso into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled Martini (cocktail) glass, and serve. The drink should be slightly frothy.

name: European Dr. Pepper
instructions: Pour the Coke on ice in a highball glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur, and serve.

name: Everlasting Sunset
instructions: Add Everclear to a shot glass, followed by the orange juice.. then pineapple juice. Make sure the cherry 7-up has been in the refridgerator or on ice still in the can. Pour that in last for a fizzy cherry pop to the shot.. take a stirring stick and give it a small stir, then shoot and enjoy!

name: Desperado
instructions: Half fill a pint glass with beer. Add the tequila, then top off with limeade, and serve.

name: Evil Spell
instructions: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour the Sortilege rye whiskey and fresh apple juice. Add a cinnamon stick. Stir and garnish with a slice of apple. Serve.

name: Evil Spell #2
instructions: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour rye whisky, maple syrup, and fill with freshly pressed apple juice. Stir until maple syrup has dissolved and add cinnamon stick. Garnish with apple slice, and serve.

name: Extreme Suicide
instructions: Pour the grain alcohol into a shot glass. Add Goldschlager on top, and serve.

name: Exxon Valdez
instructions: Layer the sambuca on the schnapps in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Fag Juice
instructions: Put the coconut milk in the glass first and then pour the liquors over it. Add 7-up and ice (equal parts) to top off, and serve.

name: Fallen Angel #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Falling Sky
instructions: Stir together in a brandy snifter, and serve.

name: Fast Honey
instructions: Pour the Go Fast! into an old-fashioned or highball glass. Seperately pour the Barenjager into a shot glass. Drop the shot into the Go Fast!, and serve.

name: Fat Bastard
instructions: Combine in glass over ice (first vodka, then godiva, then milk). Stir thoroughly, and serve.

name: Fat Charley
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum, Malibu rum and 99 Bananas into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice, adding a splash of cranberry juice to top. Stir and serve.

name: Fear the Flava
instructions: First add a good load of ice cubes to a punch bowl. Add the blackcurrant squash and then the Fanta, stir it. Then add the vodka and whiskey, stir it. Then add the cider and stir the punch. Finally add the beer and stir for the last time. Serve this punch in highball glasses out of the bowl.

name: Fear the Turtle
instructions: This shot was invented by Kyle Lent, a bartender in College Park Maryland. It looks green like the mascot of the University, the Terrapin.

name: Fedbergs Favorite Caipirinha
instructions: Invented by former bartender Nikolaj Hyldig, in his search for the perfect summer drink.

name: Feliz Navidad
instructions: Feliz Navidad a.k.a. "The Mexican Christmas" - this drink is a great switch from the obligatory "mat shot" and it can be hidden under the radar as a nice innocent clear shooter. Smells minty enough to get past those who make the mistake of smelling a shot. Feliz Navidad!

name: Figs and the City
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass, and serve.

name: Firebomb
instructions: Pour the firewater into the Red Bull energy drink (or Monster) and serve.

name: Firecrotch
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Rim with lime and serve.

name: Firestarter
instructions: Mix the redrum, vodka and schnapps in the glass, then add the coke. Should the glass have room, add a few ice cubes, then serve.

name: Fizzy Watermelon
