instructions: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes in the order of appearance, do not stir, soda water will float at the top of the glass giving a two toned appearance, Garnish with 2 cherries on a sword, resting on the top of the glass.

name: Flaming Armageddon
instructions: Pour a can of Sparks energy drink shared between 2 seperate beer mugs. Shake tequila, Jagermeister, and Rumple Minze on ice and strain into 2 seperate shot glasses. Add 151 to the top of each and ignite. Drop shots into the beer glasses with Sparks in and drink. Serves 2.

name: Flaming Buller
instructions: Layer the Yukon Jack and cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass. Add tabasco and light carefully. Quickly blow out and shoot.

name: Flaming Scab
instructions: Ignite a shot of 151 rum and place into a mug of beer. Serve.

name: Flaming Tree
instructions: Pour the chartreuse first, then top with rum, and serve.

name: Flaming Turd Rocket
instructions: Pour the whiskey and peach liqueur into a shot glass and leave enough room for a layer of 151 over the top. Light the 151 with a lighter (torch lighter preferable). Extinguish the flame with your hand and immediately shoot.

name: Fleur De Lis
instructions: Shake both ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Florida Girl
instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend until a light shade of pink is made, then serve up in a pina-colada glass.

name: Flying Goose
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glasses.

name: Flying Guinness
instructions: Pour half pint of Guinness into a bubble pint glass. Then place a spoon over the top of the glass upside down then pour the Red Bull or energy drink over the top of the spoon (this helps the drink seperate). Serve.

name: Forty 9th Parallel
instructions: Pour the Yukon Jack whisky, Newfoundland Screech dark rum, and Forty Creek whisky into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top off glass with Canada Dry ginger ale, and serve.

name: Foxy Shot
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff Green Apple Twist vodka into a shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well. and pour into a 2-oz shot glass. Splash some Amaretto Di Saronno into the shot glass, just enough to swirl into the shot, and serve.

name: Fremango
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: French 69
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl, stir and serve ice cold.

name: French Kiss #2
instructions: Layer ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass, and serve.

name: French Martini #2
instructions: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Can also be served on the rocks.

name: French Night
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French Toast #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Fresh Air
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and lemon slices, and serve.

name: Friendly Fire
instructions: Pour the Hot Damn into a shot glass. Float 151 on top, ignite and serve.

name: Frost Bite
instructions: Mix vodka and icewine in a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the grapes at the bottom, and serve.

name: Frosty Pineapple Crush
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka, pineapple vodka and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass 1/4 filled with crushed ice. Pour the RedRum rum on top. Put a slice of pineapple and a cherry on an umbrella and place on the side of glass as garnish.

name: Frothy Snowman
instructions: Combine Kahlua, vodka, milk, and chocolate in blender. Blend until frothy. Serve over ice in a large cocktail glass.

name: Frozen Cherry Daiquiri
instructions: Place all ingredients in blender with a cup of crushed ice and blend well. Serve in a margarita or hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Frozen Real Strawberry Margarita
instructions: Mix the limeade, Cointreau and tequila in a mixing glass. Add 2 cups of ice to a blender, and add the strawberries and tequila mixture. Blend until smooth (thin with tequila if necessary). Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Fru Fru Drink
instructions: Mix one gallon of pink lemonade to half a gallon of raspberry vodka. Pour into Margarita machine and freeze or pour over ice. Great drink for the hot summer day and a good party drink for the non heavy drinker.

name: Fruit Cocktail #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Fruity Ball of Fuck
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Fruity Exploration
instructions: Drop 3 regular sized ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour cranberry-raspberry juice in, then orange juice, then pour in the 99 Apples or 99 Oranges leaving which ever flavor you like the most last. Stir gently and wait until the drink is sufficiently chilled before serving. You may want to change ratios depending on your tastes and sensitivity to alochol.

name: Fruity Pebbles #2
instructions: Mix ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into glass of choice - martini or margarita preferably. This really does taste like fruity pebbles. The above ought to make 1 large drink or two medium sized drinks.

name: Fucking Arnold
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and place above ingredients. Shake and fill a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon and enjoy the original Arnold Palmer with a twist of the south!

name: Fuel Injection
instructions: Pour the Bacardi rum into a shot glass; top with Anisette, and serve.

name: Full Throttle
instructions: Combine with ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Fun Loving
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bunny
instructions: Mix in a colins glass until powder is dissolved. Serve.

name: Beautiful #2
instructions: Just mix them together.

name: Biekert
instructions: Huge drink in Lincoln, NE. Ironically named after arch rival University of Colorado linebacker, Greg Biekert.

name: Dirty Gecko
instructions: Add all ingredients with a cup of ice into a shaker. Shake well. Makes up to about 6 shots. Should come out to a dirty purple color.

name: Fuzzy Bull Balls
instructions: Pour the Three Olives orange vodka and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Red Bull. add pineapple juice on top and serve.

name: Fuzzy Goose
instructions: Pour all four liquors into a collins glass, then fill with ice. Next mix equal parts orange juice and sweet and sour until full. Tastes like candy.

name: Fuzzy Hard Navel
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned or highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun #2
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Fuzzy Napalm
instructions: Pour the peach schnapps first. Top with orange, and then alcohol. Shoot before it mixes.

name: Fuzzy Pucker
instructions: Pour the peach and raspberry schnapps over ice in a hurricane glass. Add orange juice, and layer half-and-half on top. Serve.

name: Fuzzy Slammers
instructions: Fill half a shot glass with the Bacardi, add lemon juice and then add the champagne. Place hand over the top of the glass, slam the glass on the bar to release the bubbles and down the shot in one go. This is a great drink to start a party of with, the bubbles are amazing.

name: Fuzzy Sunrise
instructions: Pour the tequila, peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.

name: Gala Appletini
instructions: In a shaker with ice, pour in rum, brandy, apple syrup, squeeze from half of a lemon wedge, and 2 dashes of bitters. Shake hard, and pour into a frosty martini cocktail glass. Top with a dash of cinnamon and garnish with a Gala apple slice. Now enjoy this perfect autumn apple pie like drink.

name: Galliano Milkshake
instructions: Blend until creamy, and serve in a hurricane glass. (optional; serve with a twist of lemon)

name: Gang Related
instructions: Pour all three ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Works best if you add Hennessey first, then the Alize and Hpnotiq in any order after that. Stir and enjoy!

name: Gee String
instructions: Shoot the first four shots in order listed, suck the lemon then chase it with a beer!

name: German Beauty
instructions: Invented by Jessica St.Amour/Kindle. Popular in blackforest southern Germany during summer time when the fieldberry juices are ready made from fresh berries.

name: Gieco
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass half-way with ice. Pour the UV Blue raspberry vodka, then the Red Bull, and watch the transformation from blue to gieco green,

name: Gin and Juice
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Fill a highball glass almost full of ice cubes, and dump ice into shaker. Shake well and pour drink into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Gin Burch
instructions: Combine gin and grenadine in shaker tin. Give a few hard shakes. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add orange juice, and serve.

name: Ginadine Fizz
instructions: Pour the gin, grenadine and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour (incl. ice) into a collins glass. Top with 7-Up, add a cherry and serve.

name: Ginger Bite
instructions: crush lemon and ginger togerther in a shaker. Add all the spirits. Shake and strain into a collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon grass (halved) and a slice of fresh ginger.

name: Ginger Messiah
instructions: Shake the vodka, rum (dark or spiced) and orange juice with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a collins glass, Top up with ginger beer, stir and serve.

name: Ginger-bang Champagne
instructions: Muddle fresh ginger in the bottom of a bar glass. Add chilled champagne and simple syrup, stir gently and immediately strain into champagne flute. Serve.

name: Glo-Jito
instructions: Mash 5 spearmint leaves in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the Everglo and rum, and top with soda.

name: Glo-Tini
instructions: Shake the Everglo and vodka together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a red wine glass. Float ginger ale on top. Garnish with a lime, and serve.

name: Glowstick
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Go With the Flow
instructions: Pour each ingredient over cracked ice into highball glass and stir gently. Serve.

name: Golden Delicious #2
instructions: The most popular shot at the All American located in Seattle.

name: Golden Delicious #3
instructions: Pour Crown Royal, apple schnapps and pineapple juice over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Golden Drop Wineries Mango Daiquiri
instructions: Peel and slice the mango from the flesh & stone, place mango in the blender with all the ingredients except for the mint leaves. Blend until smooth & creamy. Serve chilled with a garnish of mint leaves.

name: Golden Haze
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Golden Shower
instructions: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale in a shaker with ice. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass and top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon slice. Serve.

name: Golden Up
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the Goldschlager, and fill with 7-Up. Serve.

name: Goldtooth Nazi
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Good Action
instructions: Stir over ice in a large cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Goose & Hen
instructions: Combine equal parts Grey Goose vodka and Hennessy cognac in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Gorilla Punch
instructions: Above is for a cocktail. Shake with ice and serve in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. To make this recipe in quantity, dump 1 qt Everclear, 1 pt Blue Curacao, 1/2 gal OJ and 1/2 gal pineapple juice in a punchbowl and stir. Do not add fruit or ice. Juices should be chilled prior to mixing. If Everclear is unavailable, Bacardi 151 may be substituted. Double these quanities for a proper celebration.

name: Grape Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Great Artius
instructions: Place Kahlua in a sherry glass. Make sure coconut cream is in liqueur form (I used microwave). Mix the juice with the coconut cream before pouring into the Kahlua. Stir and serve.

name: Greek Hunch Punch
instructions: Get fresh fruit (apples, oranges, strawberrys, pears) as well as canned fruit with juice (pineapples and peaches). Cut your fruit up and let it soak in a big cooler with the liquor for about 45 minutes. Add in the Hawaiian Punch and lots of ice, and taste. Then add add Sprite and orange juice to your liking. If made properly, then you should not be able to taste any alcohol.

name: Green Ambulance
instructions: Fill the shot glass 2/3 with vodka and 1/3 with childrens style "cool lime" cordial. Serve.

name: Green and Gold Bloody
instructions: Pour tomato juice in jug. Add all liquid ingredients first. Make sure you mix horseradish into the juice well. Add seasoning on top of juice then stir. Serve with vodka in an old-fashioned, with/without ice.

name: Green Apple Bomb
instructions: Pour the Absolut Mandrin and peach schnapps over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add Jones green apple soda to taste, and serve.

name: Green Appletini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into large cocktail glass. Add a big squeeze of lime juice. Garnish with a thin granny smith apple slice, and serve.

name: Green Fairy #2
instructions: Combine equal measures in a straight shot glass - blended not layered. Serve.

name: Green Machine
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill up with Mountain Dew soda. Stir slightly; the drink will turn a bright green. Serve.

name: Green Meanie
instructions: Invented by Mitchell Pfeiffer in St. Maarten, N.A. Very popular on the island. This drink is great for parties, especially in the summer when it is hot. Very refreshing. It is really easy to make a punch out of too. Also, this makes a great beach drink. Light, flavorful, and enough booze to have a kick.

name: Green Tang
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker; strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Green Tee This
instructions: Pour vodka, then zen in an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with green tea and stir.

name: Guajira
instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except syrup) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour over the strawberry syrup in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel, and serve.

name: Gumball Shot
instructions: Pour equal parts Jagermeister herbal liqueur and blue Curacao into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Add a medium splash of Red Bull energy drink. Shake briefly; strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Gummies
instructions: Place gummy worms/bears/etc into large tupperware bowl and soak with vodka and schnapps for 4 to 5 days in room temperature. After a few days of soaking, simply take cupfuls of gummies and drink the left over juice. Both are delicious.

name: Gummy Bear
instructions: In a cocktail glass 3/4 full with ice, pour vodka and raspberry schnapps. Fill with cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: Gummy Bear Shooter
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a double shot glass, and serve.

name: H-Bomb #2
instructions: Fill a highball glass filled with ice cubes half way with Red Bull, then fill the other half with Hpnotiq liqueur. Serve.

name: Hairless Chiahuahua
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hale Bopp
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into an old-fashioned glass. Run a slice of lime around lip of glass, sugared rim optional. Garnish with lime or lemon wedge and stemless cherry. Amount of lime juice can be varied by taste. Serve.

name: Halla Mountain Sunrise
instructions: Originally made with Korean soju, but equally good with vodka. Named for the tallest mountain in South Korea and uses Jeju Island tangerine juice. Made by Aaron Cupps at The Blue Agave, Jeju, South Korea.

name: Happy Birthday Motherfucker
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Happy Megan
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl. Adjust to taste.

name: Happy Monkey
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass, vodka first and Sprite last. Serve.

name: Harry Dolan
instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Add Southern Comfort and DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up. Add grenadine, and serve.

name: Harry Potter
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Serve,

name: Hawaiian Clear
instructions: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in desired glass.

name: Hawaiian Dream
instructions: Pour the Maui blue Hawaiian schnapps, vodka and rum into a 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with fresh chilled pineapple juice, stir briefly and serve.

name: Hawaiian Parrot
instructions: Pour the coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with equal parts of Hawaiian punch and Sprite soda. Stir, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Punch #2
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hawaiian Mai Tai
instructions: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with pineapple spear, maraschino cherry and mint sprig. Serve.

name: Hazy Skyy
instructions: Pour the vodka, Frangelico and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass (chilled). Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Head On
instructions: Stir together the Malibu and 151 in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add other ingredients, stir and serve.

name: Headless Californian
instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass and add ice. Dash with bitters. Fill with equal parts ginger ale and orange juice. Decorate with slice of orange, and serve.

name: Heaven
instructions: Pour liquors into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Heavy Metal
instructions: Combine in equal parts in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Kiss on the Lips
instructions: This drink recipe is one of the bigger hits on Carnival Cruise Lines. It seems like every person who tries it comes back with a mission to find the recipe. :o) Quantities are an estimate, adjust to taste.

name: Hector Bomb
instructions: Fill a glass with half a bottle of Corona. Pour a shot of tequila. Squeeze a lime wedge into the shot glass, and place lime wedge into shot. When you are ready to drink, drop the shot into the glass of Corona and chug fast.

name: Hell
instructions: Starting by pouring the sambuca into an old fashioned glass setting a snifter above it in 60 degrees angle. Pour the chocolate liquer into the snifter, above it absinthe, lighting it up, rolling the glass, letting it to hit up the pouring from the snifter into the old fashioned, covering it to choke the flames. Serve with a straw.

name: Hello Kitty
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice and pour ingredients in order. Similar to a tequila sunrise; the hello kitty is layered when presented but stirred before drinking.

name: Hellola
instructions: Pour the Stoli Razberi vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lemonade and float the schnapps. Add a squeeze of lemon and a cherry and serve.

name: Hendershlager
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Hennessy Alexander
instructions: Combine the 3 liquids in a mixing glass over ice cubes, Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a dash of nutmeg, and serve.

name: Herbie Hancock
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: High on Irony
instructions: Pour the lime juice, soda, and punch into the glass, then add the rum and vodka. Shake and add ice. Top with a cherry. Serve.

name: Highspeed
instructions: Pour all alcohols into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add energy drink, and serve.

name: Hilbert Effect
instructions: Mix all ingredients except for mints in a pitcher, then add crushed mints and stir until the mints are completely dissolved.

name: Home Grown English
instructions: Mix the spirits together. Add fruit, let mellow for an hour. Put ice cubes and splash of bitters in bottom of a punch bowl, and add the juices. Add the spirits and fruit.

name: Honeymoon
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine orange juice, vodka and nectar. Pour over ice and gently stir in ginger ale. Add twist of lime and serve.

name: Hong Kong
instructions: Fill boston shaker with ice. Add bitters, sake, red vermouth and campari. Stir ingredients until chilled. Strain into a martini glass and flame with either lemon or orange. Garnish with a twist of lemon or orange. Serve.

name: Honkey Tonk Lemonade
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker over ice, shake and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with mint and a straw, and serve.

name: Hooch
instructions: Poor fruit punch into a large cooler or bucket. Slice apples and peaches (you dont have to add apples and peaches, you can add just apples, or just peaches. I reccommend both.) Dump apples and peaches into cooler or bucket. Pour the fifth of pure-grain into the bucket and mix! Serve in cups.

name: Hot Apple Pie #4
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #3
instructions: Combine sugars, butter, ice cream, and spices. Blend until smooth. Place batter in the freezer. Store in freezer for up to one month. For each serving, fill one-quarter of a mug w/batter, add one ounce rum and three-quarters of a cup of boiling water. (Or to taste)

name: Hot Buttered Snow
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Lesbian
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a large cocktail glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Hot Neopolitan
instructions: Pour the liquors into a regular hot chocolate, and serve.

name: Hot Spicy Banana
instructions: In a chilled old fashioned glass mix the first three ingredients, then place a single ice cube in the drink and splash the peppermint schnapps on the ice cube. Serve.

name: Hozark Cherry Cheesecake
instructions: Mix equal parts of your favorite vanilla and cherry schnapps/liqueurs. Ice it down and serve as shots, or a mixed drink, or any way you want.

name: Hpnotiq Long Island Ice Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass (incl. ice) and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Martini
instructions: Add cherry vodka to a cocktail shaker filled with ice, then add Hpnotiq liqueur. Shake, shake, shake. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Hpnotizer
instructions: Pour Hpnotiq first followed by the Grey Goose vodka over ice into a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Shake once and enjoy.

name: Hula Bob
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a tall glass almost filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Hula Girl
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Humper
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker over ice and shake until well chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy. Float a small amount of dark rum on top for a little added flavor.

name: Hurricane Ethel
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Hurricane Hawaii
instructions: Shake rums, passion fruit juice, lime juice and grenadine together. Pour into ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Hymen Ripper
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice, shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Golden Shot
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into a shot glass; barenjager, goldenschlager, vanilla schnapps. Serve.

name: Hyp-Gator
instructions: Make sure the Gatorade lemon-lime has been chilled as much as possible. Pour Hpnotiq into the shot glass followed by the Gatorade Lemon-Lime. Serve and enjoy the fruity sensation!

name: Hypno Fusion
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Hpnotiq Liquer and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine, stir, and serve.

name: Hypnocrite
instructions: Pour the Hpnotiq into an 8-oz highball glass. Fill the rest with Sprite, and serve.

name: Hypnosis
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker full with ice. Add vodka and Hpnotiq liqueur, Shake vigorously. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with Squirt. Garnish with a cherry or pineapple chunk, and serve.

name: Hypnotiq Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together with a few ice cubes in a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: I Love You
instructions: Pour in order into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Ice Cream Float
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vanilla schnapps, fill glass with favorite soda (anything you would put on ice cream...root beer, dr. pepper, orange) leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Fill with cream.. not milk. Serve.

name: Iced Captain
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large highball glass and mix together. Serve.

name: Iced Pineapple Sunrise
instructions: Add the ice to a hurricane glass. Pour the other ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Strain into the hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple. Serve.

name: Incredible Orange
instructions: Pour in order into an old-fashioned glass over ice, and serve.

name: Indigo Girl
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into a frosted martini glass. Add a small wedge of fresh lime on edge of glass, and serve.

name: Ink Drop
instructions: Mix chilled Captain Morgan Tattoo rum with your favorite energy drink in a shot glass.

name: Instant Death #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass, and drink fast.

name: Insult Man Shooter
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Irish Anti-freeze
instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender with crushed ice (frozen strawberries also can be added, but optional). Blend, and pour into sugar lined glasses. Top with umbrellas.

name: Irish Kentuckian
instructions: Combine all liquors into a strainer over ice for a few minutes. Wait for liquor to chill, than strain into a large shot glass and drink.

name: Irish Maul Axe
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Irish Pecker
instructions: Fill up an old fashioned shot glass with 3/4 oz. of Jamesons Irish Whiskey, top off with 1/4 oz. of lime juice, garnish with a lime twist, and serve.

name: Irish Trespasser
instructions: Place a squirt of honey in bottom of shot glass. Add other ingredients and pound it.

name: Italian Surfer #2
instructions: Add the Malibu and amaretto to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of pineapple juice. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Death Dream
instructions: Mix absinthe with the aftershock, then add the pernod and drink straight down stick to 1 to 2 any more in one session and your likely to wake up and not remember a thing.

name: Jack-in-the-Green
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh lime wheel and a small slice of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Jackoff
instructions: Mix liquids together starting with the liquor into a blender. Add the cup of ice and blend until it is like a smoothie. Serve.

name: Jagasm
instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add jager and rootbeer schnapps, then fill with Pepsi, and serve.

name: Jager and Dew
instructions: Pour the Mountain Dew into a pint glass (half full), then add in a shot of Jagermeister. You can drink slowly with ice or chug without. Taste of drink will not change with time like some of the other similar ones (Jagermeister and Red Bull).

name: Jager Volcano
instructions: Fill glass with a shot of jagermeister, top off with the same amount of cherry juice. Serve.

name: Jagerberry
instructions: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Drop the shot into another glass containing a shot of blackberry brandy, and drink quickly.

name: Jake White Special
instructions: Pour the rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill glass with cream soda. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Jamaica Shot
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into shot glasses.

name: Jamaican Rumshaker
instructions: Shake the Tia Maria and Malibu in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, top with Sprite, and serve.

name: Jamaican Spirit
instructions: Put the vodka, tequila, gin and triple sec into a shaker with lots of ice. Mix well then pour into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice and the jamaican rum. (the rum goes last) Decorate the glass with a slice of orange and a tiny umbrella. Serve.

name: Jamaican Sunrise #2
instructions: Pour Redrum and fruit punch into a shaker with ice, shake, then pour into a tall glass; float grenadine on top and serve with a straw and pineapple slice/piece for garnish.

name: French Tickler #2
instructions: Shaken or straight up, both are great but you must be prepared for a drink that will tickle the back of your throat and warm your belly.

name: Japanese Lagoon
instructions: Shake vodka, Midori and lime juice over ice. Strain into a margarita or cocktail glass, building over blue curacao. Top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Jeannie in a Bottle
instructions: Combine ingredients in shaker. Shake vigorously with ice and pour (incl. ice) into highball glass. Serve.

name: Jelly Bean #3
instructions: Pour equal amounts of each into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jenna Pop!
instructions: Pour the whiskey into a shot glass. Add cola, eat cherry and consume.

name: Jenny Bomb
instructions: Pour the Red Bull into a highball glass. Mix the jagermeister and Hennessy in a shot glass. Drop the shot into the Red Bull and chug.

name: Jerald
instructions: Stir together in a cup, and serve.

name: Jersey Lemonade
instructions: Add all ingredients to a collins glass filled with ice. Stir, and serve.

name: Jewish Bulldozer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir briefly and serve.

name: Jammie Dodger
instructions: Pour creme de framboise into a shot glass and layer surface with double cream poured over a spoon. Must be served at room temperature and drunk slowly and smoothly in one go.

name: Jim Carrey
instructions: Combine whiskey, Stoli vodka and Frangelico liqueur together in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with Mello Yello soda. Stir and serve.

name: Jim the Ripper
instructions: Combine whiskey, rum, vodka and tequila into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Jimmy Page
instructions: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Jimmy Page #2
instructions: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Jimmy Powers
instructions: Combine bourbon and Irish whiskey in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jimmy Tudeski
instructions: Combine whiskies (Bourbon and Scotch) with dry gin in a shot glass, stir lightly, and serve.

name: Jimmy Two Times
instructions: Combine Jim Beam Bourbon and Romana black (90 proof) sambuca into a shot glass, and serve!

name: John Deer
instructions: Pour the lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda, and serve.

name: Johnnie Meister
instructions: Combine the jagermeister and Scotch in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jolly Rancher #4
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jon Jon
instructions: Jon Jon was made by Jonathan Gandy and the owner of Stonewalls Pub in Sheaperdstown West Virginia.

name: Jones
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Jones Juice
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice to the top. Nearly fill with vodka of your choice. Top off with under a shot of mountain dew for flavor. Serve.

name: Jugtown Classic
instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into a cup. Add the ginger ale and raspberry soda. Stir and serve.

name: Juicy Fruit #3
instructions: Shake all ingredients and ice in a shaker or mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jump Start
instructions: Add all ingredients to a coffee mug and stir for about 5 or so seconds. Serve.

name: Clay
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the peach schnapps, and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Dirty Donkey
instructions: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass, drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Frozen Rainforest
instructions: Mix the vodka, tropical blue Sourz, pineapple juice and lime juice in a shaker and shake. Crush some ice and pour it in to a highball glass, then add the mix from the shaker. Garnish with some pineapple and then dash some Monin Blue Curacao Syrup so it runs down through the crushed ice. Serve.

name: Hyper Beam
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila into a shot glass first, then add the A&W Creme Soda. Serve.

name: Island Donkey
instructions: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass, drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Junior Mint Iced
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend and pour into a brandy snifter. Serve.

name: Kalamazoo
instructions: Stir well with a few ice cubes in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Kamikazini
instructions: Add the vodka and the iced tea to a cocktail shaker. After shaking fill the drink in a cocktail glass. Serve with three green olives on a toothpick.

name: Karl Malden
instructions: Pour into a highball glass in order listed. Add a twist of lime if you prefer.

name: Kentucky Gentleman Top Hat
instructions: Mix the bourbon, amaretto, and hazelnut liqueur into a tall glass and top off with the soda. Serve.

name: Kentucky Tavern Barstool
instructions: Mix the liquors into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with cola, and serve.

name: Key Lime Cosmo
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime spiral. Serve.

name: Key Lime Martini #4
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a martini shaker over ice. Shake well until chilled and pour into a cockail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Key West Cooler
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail tin. Shake. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

name: Key West Rootbeer
instructions: Shake root beer schnapps and Jagermeister with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into shot glass. Add a splash of Coke, and serve.

name: Kahlua Cookie
instructions: Combine all in a blender. Blend extremely well, pour into a large glass (ie. hurricane) and serve.

name: Killer Hunch Punch
instructions: Pour liquor into a large cooler. Then cut up and add the fruit (canned and fresh). Let the fruit sit in the liquor for 30-45 min. Then add lots of ice and the Hawaiian punch. Add the orange juice and sprite to taste. Serve in punch cups.

name: Killer Ice Tea with Orange
instructions: Almost fill the glass with ice cubes, then add the alcoholic drinks. Fill about 2/3 of the height with them. Add the Coke, stir it. Add a slice of orange, and maybe a red cocktail cherry, and serve.

name: Killer Kyle
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass frosted with sugar, and serve.

name: Firecracker #2
instructions: Pour a 3/4 pint of Bud Light. Pour the 151 into a shot glass, with the amaretto layered on top. Light shot on fire, sprinkle cinnamon over shot, drop still burning shot into beer and serve.

name: King Kamehameha
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a margarita glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with one slice of banana and one slice of kiwi, and serve.

name: Kinky Slinky
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker 1/4 to 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Kitchenberry
instructions: A strangely blueberry-flavored concoction.

name: Knock-Out
instructions: Fill a 475ml glass with ice - about 1/4 of the way. Pour beer into glass. Pour white rum & dark rum into glass. Top-up with apple juice, and serve.

name: Korean Karbomb
instructions: Pour the vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add equal amounts of orange juice and Red Bull, stir and serve.

name: Kryptonite #3
instructions: Chill all four mixers in freezer until ice cold. Then mix them all in a small glass and stir, with/without ice. Serve.

name: Kwantini
instructions: Mix vodka, schnapps, and cranberry juice in shaker and strain into cocktail glass. Fill with club soda and sprinkle shaved ice over top. Serve.

name: KY Special
instructions: Fill the glass two-thirds with ice. Pour orange juice and Sprite over ice, then peach vodka. Add 2-3 drops of purple food coloring. Stir, and serve.

name: L.A. Sunset
instructions: Add the Jagermeister, amaretto, triple sec, pineapple rum, and the Di Saronno (0.15 oz is an estimate, just use a small amount, mainly for color) to a collins glass. Swirl the ingredients together until mixed. Fill the remaining volume of the glass with pineapple juice and full pulp orange juice poured in the center of the glass. If poured correctly the ingredients should mix so that the drink has an overall yellow/orangeish-brown color with the brown occupying the lower three-quarters of the collins glass. No extra mixing should be necessary. The pulp of the Orange Juice should swirl in the brown region of the drink giving it an overall "smoggy" appearance, not unlike a Los Angeles Sunset.

name: L.S.E.
instructions: Make the jello with 2 cups of boiling water. Mix in the 5 Hour energy drink and raspberry Stoli. Put in plastic shot cups and let sit overnight in the refrigerator.

name: La Vida Loca
instructions: Cut the chili into small pieces. Put one or two teaspoons of chopped chili in the glass. Fill the glass with ice (not all the way up, gotta save some space for the vodka). Mix the ice and chili well. Pour vodka and pineapple juice in the glass, mix again. Serve with a straw.

name: Ladybird
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker half with ice cubes. Add brandy, cassis and half-and-half. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, serve straight-up. Garnish with chocolate powder (try to create dots, like on a ladybird beetle for effect).

name: Lake Quinault Summer Margarita
instructions: Mix first four ingrediants, shake well with ice (tequila, sweet sour, triple sec, fresh squeezed lime juice). Pour into a salted glass with ice and pour Grand Marnier over drink. Serve.

name: Land Shark
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. shake and strain into a cocktail glass over some crushed or shaved ice, and serve.

name: Lavender Lady
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate and whipped cream. Serve.

name: Lawnmower #2
instructions: As mentioned on The Simpsons, invented by Homer Simpsons - endorsed by Ron Howard.

name: Laze on the Deck
instructions: Pour the white sambuca into a highball glass. Fill up to the top with coca-cola, and serve.

name: Leg Spreader #3
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add all but the Pepsi. Shake vigorously. Fill a highball glass with ice and pour strained mixture into glass. Add the Pepsi and stir. Serve.

name: Lemon Slap
instructions: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Lesbian Love
instructions: Layer in above order into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Letter Bomb #2
instructions: Pour the Red Bull into an old fashioned glass. Pour Amaretto into a shot glass. Add shot glass to old fashioned glass, and drink immediately.

name: Licorice Vyos
instructions: Chill both Jagermeister and Coke. Pour a shot of Jagermeister into chilled glass, then pour Coke over it. Drink through licorice straw, or eat licorice on the side.

name: Lily Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel, and serve.

name: Deceased Rabbit
instructions: Pour the vodka and liqueurs in the above order into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir the ingrediens and fill up with soda water and sprite. Squeeze a lime wedge over (optional but make sure to use one as garnish), and serve.

name: Anzu
instructions: Bombay London dry gin is recommended for this drink; "anzu" is Japanese for apricot.

name: Black Apple
instructions: Both chilled, fill the mug 2/3 full with Strongbow. Add Guinness Stout after the cider has been poured to form a black layer on top. Serve.

name: Black Magick
instructions: Combine spirits in a stainless steel shaker. Shake and strain over ice in a cocktail glass. Top glass off with apple juice, and serve.

name: Bull Moose
instructions: Serve in equal parts in a shot glass.

name: Cherry Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry at the bottom, and serve.

name: Flaming Ho
instructions: Take a shot glass and add the brown sugar and the flakes of dried prune. Fill the glass with 2/3 Midori melon liqueur and 1/3 tequila. Ignite it, let it burn for about 10 seconds and then blow out the flame. Bottoms up!

name: Grape Martini
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry at the bottom, and serve.

name: Hard Goya
instructions: Mix both alcohols together in a tallg lass. Slowly pour the peach nectar in. Stir and add the lime juice. Serve.

name: Absolut Citron Limonata
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Ninja #2
instructions: Combine in a cocktail shaker with ice, shake and strain into a chilled shot glass. Serve.

name: Hillbilly Kool Aid
instructions: Chill all ingredients. Pour all ingredients into big enough cup, stir, and enjoy.

name: Jack Honey Slushee
instructions: Mix the first four ingredients together and store in a freezable container. Place in freezer for 24 hours until frozen to slush consistency. Make sure you use strong rum (140+), or it will freeze solid. Serve in a pina colada or old fashioned glass. Add a dash of bitters and some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Jager and Malibu
instructions: Serve in a 2-oz shot glass.

name: Justine #2
instructions: Combine both ingredients in a shot glass. Chase with a slice of lime.

name: LimonDew
instructions: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Mountain Dew over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Bakewell Tart
instructions: Pour the amaretto Di Saronno into a collins (highball) glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Newcastle Brown Ale. Stir and serve.

name: Kamikaze Bomber
instructions: Pour the Red Bull into an old fashioned glass, splash the grenadine to reddan the Bull. Pour a shot of Jagermeister and drop it into the glass. Consume that beverage kamikaze style.

name: Liquid Candycane
instructions: Pour both liquids into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Liquid Coffee
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Crack #2
instructions: Stir in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Liquid Electroshock
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Liquid Herpes
instructions: Pour the rum, goldschlager and milk into a highball glass. Stir ingredients. Pour tobasco sauce in after toasting and before drinking. Do not stir the tobasco sauce. Serve with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Liquid Marijuana Shot
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Liquid Panty Remover #3
instructions: Vigorously shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: LiT
instructions: Place 5 ice cubes in old-fashioned glass. Pour the Smirnoff triple distilled vodka into glass. Add Green Berry Rush Hawaiian punch and Fruit Juicy red Hawaiian punch. Drink with red straw and enjoy.

name: Hypnotize Me
instructions: Mix together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Lolly Gobble Bliss Bomb
instructions: Add in order to a shot glass, and serve.

name: Golden Buckle
instructions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Peach Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Give a couple shakes and pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Coke to make it a little dark on the top half (may use more coke for a less stronger drink). Garnish if desired, and serve.

name: Long Island Pucker
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Loom Cooler
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, pour into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Lost for Words
instructions: Drop a cherry into a shot glass. Add the cranberry and cherry juice, then add the vodka. Place the lid from the cherry jar over the shot glass, and shake. Drink, making sure you eat the cherry last as it gives the sensation of Lost Words.

name: Love Juice #2
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Love Wrench
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange, and serve.

name: Lovely Wife
instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lusty Leopard Martini
instructions: Thoroughly chill a martini glass then apply small "leopard spots" randomly around the inside of the glass using chocolate shell syrup then returning the glass to the freezer to keep cold. (This can be done hours in advance for parties.) In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the vodka, Malibu rum, mango nectar and candy syrup. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Strain the contents into the prepared glass with spots. What you now have created is a martini with the appearance of leopard hide having the look of deep tawny orange and dark brown spots. Serve and enjoy.

name: Lychee Caipiroska
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Muddle until all ingredients are blended and the ice is crushed. Serve in an old-fashioned glass. no garnish.

name: Shrek
instructions: Invented by Mike Latham from the band Livewire. Originally termed Sex Panther in honor of Brian Fantana from the movie Anchorman. The drink obtained the name Shrek because of its lime green color and overwhelming request for a name change by many beautiful women. The shot is popular among hot girls who love to have a great time at Livewire shows in Birmingham, AL.

name: Jesus Jackhammer
instructions: Pour the Absolut Vanilla into a triple-shot glass. Add the 151 and then top with Everclear. Ignite and serve.

name: Blood Orange Blast
instructions: Mix all the liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker and fill to the brim with ice. Shake until cold and then strain into a highball glass. Take the ice from the shaker and put into the glass. Take the blood orange slice and roll it around the edge of the glass and drop it in.

name: M3
instructions: Add the Malibu mango rum to an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice and then the soda/punch. Stir well, and serve.

name: Macintosh
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass over ice. Stir but do not shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mack Attack
instructions: Fill a shot glass approximately three-quarters full with green chartreuse, and the remainder with black sambuca. Add a couple of drops of Tabasco branded pepper sauce, and shoot.

name: Mackenzie
instructions: Throw a few rocks into a collins glass. Squeeze in a segment of lime (about 1/2 oz). Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into the glass and add the cranberry juice. Top up with orange juice and throw in the other segment of lime. Pain free and delicious.

name: Happy Face
instructions: Pour gin, vodka, liqueur, tonic and pina colada into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Crack an egg and drop into shaker. Shake well and strongly. Pour the shaker contents (with ice) into glass and fill up the glass with orange juice. Garnish with two cherrys and a slice of lemon with puting it on the top of the egg foam so that it makes a happy face.

name: Malawi Shandy
instructions: Pour equal parts of ginger ale and lemon soda into a beer mug filled with ice. Add a round of orange and top with a dash or two of bitters. Very good on a hot, sticky day.

name: Mali P&S
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

name: Malibu Fizz
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add Malibu, then cranberry and top with Fresca. Serve with lime garnish.

name: Malibu Delight
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Malibu Hooter
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, and mix ingredients in order. Stir well and enjoy!

name: Malibu Thong Bikini
instructions: Combine the Malibu coconut rum and Absolut Citron vodka with the pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glasses. Serve with whipped cream and a cherry on the very top of each shot.

name: Malibu Woo Woo
instructions: Add the vodka and Malibu to a cocktail shaker with ice, shake vigorously. Pour into a chilled highball glass and top up with cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Man Boobs
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Mandarin Bomb
instructions: Add the Red Bull to a pilsner glass. Drop a shot of Absolut Mandrin into the glass, and drink immediately.

name: Mang Tini
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice, add Malibu mango rum, sugar (or Splenda), 7-Up, water and lime wedges. Muddle ingredients and strain into a shot glass, or serve in sugar rimmed martini glass. (Add vodka for more kick if desired)

name: Mango Daiquiri #2
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend for a short time at a high speed. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a cherry and straw. Serve.

name: Mango Jello Shots
instructions: Follow the directions on the jello box with 1 exception. Mix the rum and mango nectar together and substitute this mixture for the cup of cold water indicated in the recipe. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Mango Mixer
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a 12-oz highball glass, then add the gin, mango juice and orange juice. Top the drink off with a dash of lemon juice. Serve.

name: Mango Tango
instructions: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Mango Tango #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with fresh pineapple and cherry on a skewer. Serve.

name: Manhattan Iced Tea
instructions: Fill a collins with ice. Add and mix all ingredients. Garnish with a lemon, and serve.

name: Marbella Sunset
instructions: Add the rum, pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice and shake well. Slowly strain into a cocktail glass and add the strawberry liqueur (it will sink to the bottom giving pink and orange hues reminiscent of a Marbella sunset!).

name: Marcos
instructions: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in a highball glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice cubes. Pour the tequila and the grapefruit juice into the glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Margariteata
instructions: Squeeze citrus fruits into pitcher. Add sugar to boiling water until completely dissolved. Let cool and add this simple syrup to pitcher. To serve, combine tequila, green tea, and 2 oz of citrus mixture over ice in a margarita glass.

name: Marijuana Milkshake
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with some ice. Shake and strain into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Marsupial
instructions: Combine raspberry Sour Puss and banana liqueur in a collins glass. Top with 7-Up(to taste), ice and orange or lemon slice.

name: Mary Poppins
instructions: Pour the dark rum, apricot brandy and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and pour into a collins glass. Top up with ice and drizzle the creme de cassis and grenadine over the top. Serve.

name: Marzo Madness
instructions: Pour the Jose Cuervo into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the rum and top with lemon juice. Serve.

name: Mass Confusion
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass or old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Mass Confusion #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Cover and shake once, and serve.

name: Master Chief
instructions: Add all ingredients (except orange skin) to a blender. Blend on high setting for 30 seconds. Add orange skin and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Maui Fizz
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bomb on Bus
instructions: In a shot glass mix Irish Cream and Irish Whiskey. Pour beer into a mug, drop in the shot, and serve.

name: Dirty Futo
instructions: Stir together in a cup, and serve.

name: Melon Margarita #2
instructions: Add the tequila, melon liqueur, orange juice and triple sec to a blender with some crushed ice. Blend until desired consistency. Pour intoa rimmed margarita glass, and serve.

name: Melonade #2
instructions: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the lemonade, and top with grenadine. Garnish with a lemon or a cherry, and serve.

name: Melonchawsey
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mendolsohn
instructions: Pour the Malibu mango rum into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Coca-cola, then top it off with Smirnoff Triple Black, and serve.

name: Metropolis #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of ruby grapefruit, and serve.

name: Metropolitan
instructions: Shake the Skyy vodka, cranberry juice and orange juice in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the cranberries, and serve.

name: Mexicali Crunk Juice
instructions: Add all ingredients to a punch bowl with ice. Serve into cups when chilled.

name: Mexican Bomb
instructions: Pour a shot of tequila and amaretto in seperate shot glasses. Place a very thin layer of Bacardi 151 on top of both shots, light. Shoot the tequila first, then carefully drop the amaretto into a mug of beer. Chug.

name: Mexican Doo-Doo
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a 1-gallon jug. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Mexican Flag #2
instructions: Line up 3 shot glasses; pour the tequila into the first, the grenadine into the second, and the last 2 ingredients into the third. Shoot in that order.

name: Mexican Motherfucker
instructions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Red Hot
instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Snowshoe
instructions: Stir together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mexican Turkey
instructions: Pour the Corona into a beer mug (or other favorite Hispanic Import) and then drop the wild turkey shot into it, and drink.

name: Miami Beach
instructions: Mix ingredients together, over ice, in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker. Shake a couple times and pour ingredients back into glass. Garnish with lemon.

name: Ultimate Margarita #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake. Serve in salted (optional) margarita glasses.

name: Michelada Cubana
instructions: Pour Tabasco and lime over ice in a beer mug. Slowly add Tecate beer. Once foam has subsided, quickly pour the Clamato. No need to stir if done right.

name: Midori Champagne
instructions: Stir together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Strain into a champagne glass, and serve.

name: Midori Firecracker
instructions: Fill a whiskey sour glass with cubed ice. Pour in Midori, then sour apple, and finish with cranberry juice producing a layered effect. Serve.

name: Midori Martini
instructions: Shake Midori and vodka with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Midori Pearl Diver
instructions: Add Midori and Malibu to a highball glass full of ice. Fill glass with pineapple juice. Stir and serve.

name: Midori Splice
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Midori, then Malibu, and top with pineapple juice to create a layered effect. Serve.

name: Mighty Martian
instructions: Pour all contents into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Mighty Mouse
instructions: Fill a 2-oz shot glass halfway with Hot Damn. Fill remaining half with Jager, leaving a little room to top off with Everclear. Igniting optional.

name: Milhaus
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice. Serve with some orange slices.

name: Cherry Coke #2
instructions: Pour the Crown Royal whisky into a shaker filled with a half a cup of ice. Add grenadine and shake thoroughly. Strain into a shot glass and add a splash off coke. Serve.

name: Fearless Redneck
instructions: Pour in above order into a large glass or cup.

name: Green Nazi
instructions: Stir together in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Bloodbath
instructions: A popular Halloween drink, and a goth staple.

name: JB Black and Pepsi
instructions: Fill a glass with about a 1/5 of ice, then pour Jim Beam Black Label until ice is covered. Fill the rest with Pepsi cola, and serve.

name: Mind Fuck
instructions: Pour the Kahlua into a small glass filled with ice. Layer the vodka on top and finish with a splash of club soda. Do not stir. Insert a straw into the bottom of the drink and drink through the straw in one.

name: Mindtrip
instructions: Stir in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mingtini
instructions: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake till ice cold. Place a cherry in the bottom of a large martini glass, strain contents of shaker into the glass, and serve.

name: Mint-Chip Backdraft
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass in above order. Allow to settle a bit; the cream liqueur will rise slightly in the glass. Shoot when ready.

name: Minty Crotch
instructions: Add the white rum, banana liqueur, apple schnapps and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously with ice. Pour into a collins glass, top up with ice and drizzle the creme de menthe over the top. Serve.

name: Miscegenation
instructions: Put the vanilla and chocolate ice cream into a large martini cocktail glass. Add the half and half and vodka, give it just one stir. Drizzle on the Kahlua, top with a splash of bourbon and the cherry. Serve.

name: Miss Kitty
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine gin, lemon juice, pineapple juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: MLK
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a 2-oz shot glass, and serve.

name: Mochatini
instructions: Shake all ingredents with ice in a martini shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Modest Mouse
instructions: Serve in a shot glass.

name: B-52 Flame
instructions: Mix together the Absinth and the Stroh rum. Carefully top the shot with Kahlua, and serve.

name: Being Bobby Brown
instructions: In an ice filled cocktail glass, throw in the Wild Turkey and top it off with Coca-cola. Sprinkle powdered sugar around the rim of the glass. Mix and serve.

name: Caramel Apple
instructions: Stir ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Cinco de Mayo #2
instructions: This Cinco de Mayo recipe is the kind of drink you want to make for those who like mingling around the bar so everyone sees it. When the drink is finished it looks like the Mexican Flag.

name: Island Breeze #2
instructions: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass. Add ice as desired, and serve.

name: Masturbating Butterfly
instructions: Pour Midori, Absolut and sour mix into a glass on the rocks. Splash with the Sprite. With a spoon turned scoop side down, float your shot of Jager on top. Serve.

name: Mojito Diablo
instructions: Muddle sugar, mint and squeezed lime wedges in mixing tin until mixture smells like spearmint gum. Fill with ice, add tequila and cassis, shake until the tin is icey to the touch. Pour into a collins glass, top with 7-up and garnish with a sugarcane stick and fresh mint.

name: Momosa
instructions: Pour orange juice and ginger ale in equal parts into a chilled hi-ball glass. Add mango nectar and stir once or twice. Garnish with speared mandarin piece, and serve.

name: Monday Night Hit
instructions: Pour goldschlager, than jagermeister, than amaretto into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Money Shot
instructions: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass; serve.

name: Mongolian Motherfucker #2
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a rocks glass or old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Monkey Bite
instructions: Add the Malibu to a 3-oz shot glass with the Red Bull, and shoot.

name: Monstermeister
instructions: Pour the Monster energy drink and Jagermeister into a shaker with ice, shake briefly. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mop Water
instructions: Add all ingredients to a large container with ice. Serve into cups.

name: Mophead
instructions: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Morning Energy
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Moroz
instructions: Stir in equal parts in a shot glass, and serve.

name: Mountain Blue
instructions: Add blue curacao, schnapps, vodka, and gatorade together in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass over ice, and serve.

name: Moxitizer
instructions: Add the shots to a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Moxie energy drink, and serve.

name: Mozart 142
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass half-filled with ice, and serve.

name: Mr. Beefy
instructions: Stir together in a punch bowl, and serve.

name: Mr. Jetson
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a pre-chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mr. Jones Pucker
instructions: Get a cup that fits the ingredients and then add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps. Add a can or bottle of Jones Soda Co. Green Apple Soda, stir, and add ice. Serve.

name: Mrs. Santa Claus
instructions: Pour the Firewater into a shot glass. Top with the Tequila Rose liqueur, and serve.

name: Muddy Madagascar
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top off with a slice of pineapple, and serve.

name: Mulatto
instructions: Serve in a 2-oz shot glass, and stir, without ice.

name: Murder of Crows
instructions: Pour ingredeints into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw, and serve.

name: Murky Water
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Murky Water #2
instructions: Very simple shot, pour and serve. Tastes fruity and delicous. Great for anyone looking for a yag bomb but without the horrible taste.

name: Mustache Ride
instructions: Add the schnapps to a shot glass. Top with Everclear and lastly the chocolate milk. Shoot.

name: My Dear Aunt Ruby
instructions: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a citrus slice, and serve.

name: Naked on the Bathroom Floor
instructions: Stir together in a short glass, and serve.

name: Naughtios Anemos
instructions: Stir together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass, and serve.

name: Naughty Gnome
instructions: Pour the rum into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with Vernors ginger soda, add a dash or two of bitters, and serve.

name: Neon Green Punch
instructions: Combine ingredients together in a chilled shot glass and serve.

name: Neon Loki
instructions: Stir the apple pucker and Absolut citron together in a shot glass. Top with lemonade, and serve.

name: New York Motherfucker #2
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into collins glass. Garnish with a lemon. Serve.

name: Newtron Bomb
instructions: Invented in Auburn, Alabama by A Mr. Will Newton, a discrete field goal kicker on the Auburn football team, he was known more for his wild parties than his kicking ability. This drink has been around for nearly a decade in Auburn, but is known mostly by people in the athletic and fraternity circles.

name: Nifty
instructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a martini cocktail glass. Fill with cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Ninja Turtle
instructions: Pour the vodka into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with the Hawaiian Punch juice. Add a lime slice, and serve.

name: Nookie
instructions: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Now and Later
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Nun on the Rag
instructions: Pour the vanilla vodka into a shot glass. Slowly add the grenadine, and serve.

name: Nut Sauce
instructions: Pour the Smirnoff watermelon vodka into a cocktail glass. Add the raspberry sparkling water. Serve with a piece of watermelon and 2 raspberries inside the glass.

name: Nutty Islander
instructions: Pour ingredients in above order into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Nutty Morgan
instructions: Invented by Socky Feinberg in 1990. The combination of Captain Morgan Spiced Rum & Dekuyper Hazelnut Liqueur is so enjoyable that the Nutty Morgan can be consumed as a chilled shooter or a chilled Martini.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, amaretto and Frangelico. Fill with milk. Stir and serve.

name: Nuttylua
instructions: Stir the Kahlua and hazelnut-flavor creamer together in a shot glass, and serve.

name: O-n-Coke
instructions: Pour the Bacardi O orange rum into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Coke to taste, and serve.

name: Orange Peach Plus
instructions: Pour the Absolut peach vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Island Fruit 7-Up and a splash of Canada Dry ginger ale. Stir and serve.

name: Oban Water
instructions: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a shot glass. Add the lemonade, and serve.

name: Ocean Breeze
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Ocean Breeze #2
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka, then add the juices in equal parts. Float blue Curacao on top. Garnish it with an orange wheel on the glass, and serve.

name: OC Margarita
instructions: Pour the tequila, orange cognac and triple sec on the rocks in a tall salt-rimmed margarita glass. Add sour mix to taste. Serve.

name: Oh Yeah!
instructions: Mix blackberry brandy, triple sec, grape pucker schnapps and a splash of 7-up together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Ohio Bulldog
instructions: In a cocktail shaker, add ingredients and shake up. Pour over ice in old-fashioned glass. Serve with a coffee stirrer.
Pour the orange vodka into a glass with ice. Fill it with half orange juice and half lemon-lime soda.

name: 24 Karat Nightmare
instructions: Combine both ingredients into shot glass.

name: 4th of July Tooter
instructions: In layers, pour the grenadine then the blue Curacao and finally the vodka.

name: 57 Chevy
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: 57 Chevy #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Pour in layers the coffee liqueur then the hazelnut liqueur and finally the Irish cream in a shot glass.

name: 8 Seconds
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: 911 Fuck Me Up
instructions: Pour all the liqueurs into a glass with ice. Fill it with cranberry juice and pineapple juice.

name: A Day At The Beach
instructions: Pour rum and amaretto into a glass with ice. Fill it with orange juice. Add grenadine on top.

name: A Furlong Too Late
instructions: Pour rum into a glass with ice. Fill it with ginger beer.

name: A Fuzzy Thing
instructions: Pour vodka, peach schnapps and triple sec into a glass with ice. Almost fill it with equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Add the splash of sweet and sour mix.

name: A Night In Old Mandalay
instructions: Pour light rum, añejo rum, orange juice and lemon juice into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a glass.

name: A Piece Of Ass
instructions: Pour amaretto and Southern Comfort into a glass with ice. Fill it with sweet and sour mix.

name: A-Bomb
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: ABC
instructions: In layers, pour the amaretto, then the Baileys and finally the Cognac.

name: ABC #2
instructions: In layers, pour the amaretto, then the Baileys and finally the Cointreau.

name: Abbey Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Aberfoyle
instructions: Pour vodka and Drambuie into an old fashioned glass with ice.

name: Abilene
instructions: Pour dark rum and peach nectar into a glass with ice. Fill it with orange juice.

name: Absinthe Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Absinthe Cocktail #2
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Absinthe Drip
instructions: Pour absinthe in an absinthe glass. Place an absinthe spoon (a spoon with small holes) across the top of the glass and place the sugar cube on it. Pour water drop by drop on the sugar so the water melts the sugar into the drink.

name: Absinthe Special Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Absolut Royal Fuck
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Absolut Sex
instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant and melon liqueur into a glass with ice. Fill it with equal parts of cranberry juice and lemon-lime soda.

name: Acapulco
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Acid
instructions: Pour 151-proof rum and Wild Turkey into a shot glass. Drink the shot and chase it with cola.

name: Acid Cookie
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Adam
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Adam And Eve
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Adios Mother Fucker (A.M.F.)
instructions: Pour the vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec into a glass with ice. Fill with sweet and sour and add the float of Blue Curacao.

name: Adonis Cocktail
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Affair
instructions: Pour strawberry schnapps into a glass with ice. Fill it with equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice.

name: Affinity Cocktail
